1b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ TIpar ma de na ma ma hA yA nA ka lwa par
1b2(rgyud): pa ra ra/ da na ma ra bA ya nakal
1b3(rgyud): du/ dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po
1b4(rgyud): rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
2a1(rgyud): 'gru 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zlos pa dus gcig na
2a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
2a3(rgyud): dadam tshig dang / mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa thums ca dang ldan pa/ de
2a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum
2b1(rgyud): dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cang mkhyen pa'i ye shesra dang ldan pa/
2b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi mnyam pa
2b3(rgyud): nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ sems can gyi kham sa ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams
2b4(rgyud): cad kyi rib thams cad yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba/ rnam par snang mdzad chen
2b5(rgyud): po rtag pa/ dus gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje/
3a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags pa/ bstod pa// nor bu chen po dang rin po
3a2(rgyud): ches smras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang //
3a3(rgyud): dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhan
3a4(rgyud): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di
3a5(rgyud): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spun
3a6(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ma mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub semaso /
3b1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag
3b2(rgyud): tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad
3b3(rgyud): rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston/
3b4(rgyud): te/ thog mar dag ba na bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba don bzang potshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa yongs su byed pa/
3b5(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di yang dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di/
3b6(rgyud): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod tshogs kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par
3b7(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
4a1(rgyud): gyu/ thams cad la dbang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/
4a2(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni//
4a3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// bsnyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas dra ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni//
4a4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i
4a5(rgyud): gnas de ri/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag
4a6(rgyud): pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gan
4a7(rgyud): de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos
4b1(rgyud): thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// badz+ra hUM ka lag na rdo rje su
4b2(rgyud): la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i gnas sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na'ang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du shes bya'i sgrib
4b3(rgyud): pa thams dang / cho pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgring pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su nams kyang skye bar
4b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// sdig pa'ang byang ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa 'am/ nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la
4b5(rgyud): byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pas chos thams cad la dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang //
4b6(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dum/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro//
4b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/ rdo rje dbyings mtha' dag gi sems dpa'i mchog
5a1(rgyud): khams gsum po mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po ma lus par las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa 'dul bar spyod pa
5a2(rgyud): don thams cad grub pa/ lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa thams cad pa/ dam tshig chen po pa/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
5a3(rgyud): tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas rang gi snying khar gtod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje
5a4(rgyud): dor yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa 'jig
5a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum thams cad nas rjes su mnyes par byas te bkug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste/ dam
5a6(rgyud): tshig gis bcings nas dbang du byas te dngos grub thams cad grub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bde ba chen po'i snyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin
5a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig 'byung ba dkyil
5b1(rgyud): 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje dbyings kyis byin gyis brlangs pa chen po zhes
5b2(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dab pa ste// de nyid drang po dam chog che// rdo rje byi rlabs zhes bya'o// gru bzhi
5b3(rgyud): bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // khyams rnams kyis ni yongs bskor ba// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// 'od zer 'bar rab 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams dang
5b4(rgyud): sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// zla ba phyed la rab gnas pa'i// rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes// rtse mo sna tshogs pa da ni// dril bu mchog btags rlung gis bskyod/
5b5(rgyud): me tog chun 'phyang ma long sbas// byi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru// rdo rje thig gis thig gdab bo// rdo rje 'khor
5b6(rgyud): lo zhes byar bshad// de yi dbus su ci rigs pa// sangs rgyas sgyu ni bzhag bya ste// 'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje
5b7(rgyud): 'phreng sogs kyis spras shing // sna tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni// lugs ma'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'o// rang gi snying po
6a1(rgyud): kun bzlas te// de tshe dkyil 'khor rtag par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// snying po nyid kyis yang dag dgod// rdo rje shugs
6a2(rgyud): kyis brgal nas ni dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus// bzhag ga ma yang na bri bar bya// phyogs rnams kun tu ston pa'o// mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni//
6a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can// rdo rje mtshon ni gsor ba brtson// dbar skya dag tu nges par dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs su// rdo rje kI lI kI la ni// yan lag
6a4(rgyud): kun gyis yongs 'khyud pa/ rdo rje can gzugs nyi ma'i 'od/ rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa ni/ chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan thogs/ sngo skya'i mdog can ci rigs pad/ blo dang ldan
6a5(rgyud): pas bzhag par bya// g.yon du rdo rje bsnyems pa ni// bsnyems pa'i rdo rje gnyis kyis ri// rdo rje bsnams pa gnyis 'dzin pa/ btse ma'i gser dang 'dra bar dgod//
6a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshams rnams su// me tog la sogs kyis mtshan cing // thal mo spyi bor legs 'jog pa'i// mchod pa chen po gzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'kho/
6a7(rgyud): mtshams rnams su// lha ma'i tshegs rnams dgod par bya// sgo yi dbus ni thams cad du/ gzugs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod/ sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor can brgyad
6b1(rgyud): ni/ rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad du// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis bskor/ khyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su/ 'dod pa'i dbang phrug bri byas/
6b2(rgyud): mdun du 'jig rter gsum rtul lo// 'dod pa tshangs pa'i byed mchog/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'byung ste/ de la dang po nyid du ji skad bshad
6b3(rgyud): pa'i cho ga 'dis zhugs pa'i slob dpon ni rdo rje chen po'i slob dpon dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang / dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang / chos thams cad rig pa dang ga las
6b4(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje semasadas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa dang / thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa dang /
6b5(rgyud): mchod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ba dang / 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'di'i phyag rgya thams cad
6b6(rgyud): kyang rang nyid kyis bcings pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad kyi lam la nyes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing byin gyis brlabs par rtog par 'gyur
6b7(rgyud): ro// ma brlabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// mdor bsdus na tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi
7a1(rgyud): mchog ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe nas 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
7a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' 'di'i snying la bzhugs shing don yod pa'i phyir bkug cing dam tshig gis bcings la dbang du byas te rjes su mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug
7a3(rgyud): cing bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ snying po lan cig brjod nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya'o//
7a4(rgyud): de nas de rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan cig byas la/ phyag byas nas gos dmar po gyon la me tog gi 'phreng ba thogs te gdong dris byugs pa dang / rdo rje thal
7a5(rgyud): mos rdo rje'i gar byed cing bskor bas snying khar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas kyang rnam par sgeg pa dang / bskor bas gdud cing snying po'ang bzlas
7a6(rgyud): brjod bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag
7a7(rgyud): nyid dgyes pas mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing smin ma bskyod la sku thams cad dam yan lag rnams bskyod cing kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro// 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi
7b1(rgyud): zhal lam gru thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa'ang ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong ba stsol lam dngos grub mchog kyang
7b2(rgyud): stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis mi tshugs pa mi sod par 'gyur
7b3(rgyud): ro// dngos grub thams cad dang / phun gsum tshogs pa thams cad dang // ye shes thams cad dang / bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sgrub par mdzad do//
7b4(rgyud): de nas de yang dag par mchod de rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur zhing dpa' bo'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/ snying po bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsal nas
7b5(rgyud): rang nyid kyis stsol ces brjod la rang gis blang bar bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na bdag nyid kyis zla ba
7b6(rgyud): drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'ang
7b7(rgyud): de bzhin no// de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshe gas bsgrubs la 'byung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba sgrub pa lan
8a1(rgyud): cig bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de la dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'jug par bya'o//
8a2(rgyud): zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pas phyag rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom
8a3(rgyud): ldan 'das bsgrubs pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste/ shes nas phyag rgya chen po nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ zhugs
8a4(rgyud): pa 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin du rdo rje blang ba la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje slob ma la cho ga rgyas pa 'dri bzhin
8a5(rgyud): du byas te phyag rgya bcing babang bslab par bya'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dam tshig la mos pa de rnams la'ang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i
8a6(rgyud): 'jug pa'i tshig rgyas pa dang de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas lnga gzhan dag la dad pa rnams la de bu'i du 'jug pa'i
8a7(rgyud): ge rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang / ro bcud dang / gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par
8b1(rgyud): par byas la/ ji ltar shes pa'i grwar dang / glu dang / dgod pa dang / bu dang / bu mo dang klu mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen mtshams dang bcas pas kyang
8b2(rgyud): mchod par bya'o// de la 'dir ni snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams byung ba che mo rdo rje dam tshig 'di
8b3(rgyud): dang / 'dod pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas rdo rje chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir ro// dkyil 'khor
8b4(rgyud): chen po'o// de nas cho ga 'byung ste/ zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ ji ltar skyo bar ma gyur par dang
8b5(rgyud): por byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje tshig gis brjod cing ji srid zla ba gcig gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro//
8b6(rgyud): nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ris 'dri ba 'am 'drir gzhug par 'dod nas dang por
8b7(rgyud): rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la/ nga'i 'og tu ni ci bder bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang de nyid kyis dang por brtsam par bya ste/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das tshe
9a1(rgyud): ga ji lta ba bzhin du byi zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba nyanas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po
9a2(rgyud): bcings la/ de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul ltar bzlas na zla ba nye ba'i mtshan mo thog thag ji lta ba bzhin du skyo bar ma gyur pas phyag rgya ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o//
9a3(rgyud): de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong ba stsol cing sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub
9a4(rgyud): mchog rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro// cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs thams
9a5(rgyud): cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bri bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo// ras/
9a6(rgyud): lnga bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje bsnyems pa dang bcas par bris la/ dri'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te/ 'bum rdzogs na phyag na rdo rje
9a7(rgyud): nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo gcig pa bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil
9b1(rgyud): 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bde ba tha/
9b2(rgyud): cad phul bas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed pas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba
9b3(rgyud): la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pas so// rdo rje thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba ni rang gi snying po bzlas pas so// gzhan srung ba lha la sogs pa sems can thams cad rjes
9b4(rgyud): su chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum bzlas pas so// bdag srung ba la ni yungs kar la lan cig bzlas pas so// gzhan srung ba la ni rdo rje bskor bas so// thams
9b5(rgyud): cad srung ba la ni yid kyis lan cig go// mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni lta ba 'am yungs kar la sogs pas so// sems can
9b6(rgyud): thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'tshor bas so// sems can thams cad rmongs
9b7(rgyud): par bya ba la ni mig btsum nas bzlas pas so// thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje dral bas so// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag
10a1(rgyud): rgyas so// snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad za ba la ni ldang zhing myur bar zlog pas
10a2(rgyud): so// thams cad bsreg par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgyas so// nor thams cad dgug pa la ni gser gyi bzlas pas so// nor dang 'bru thams cad dgug
10a3(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pi wang brdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'i glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad
10a4(rgyud): 'bigs pa dang rjes su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mnga'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad chags par bya ba la ni phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes pas so//
10a5(rgyud): sdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya ba la ni snying brtan pos nges par 'tshir bas so// ma rungs pa rab tu sgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyen pas so// rgyun thams cad dbrog pa la ni/
10a6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i lta bas dbrog pas so// thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bzhag pas so// mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje kha shar du bltas te bskor
10a7(rgyud): pas so// lus bde bar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyi bzlas pas so// gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so// sgra thams cad
10b1(rgyud): zos par bya ba la ni rdo rje pi wang gis so// dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i glu yis so// zas dang / skom thams cad dang / bcud thams cad sngo
10b2(rgyud): ba la ni rdo rjes spro bar bya'o// dbab pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / sre gol dang / glu'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni
10b3(rgyud): bdag nyid gar byed cing bzlas pas so// thams cad glu lan du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas so// thams cad smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje mchu yis so//
10b4(rgyud): thams cad babs nas lan ston pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pas so// gdon thams cad las thar par bya ba lnga ni rdo rje myu gu'i phyag rgyas so// gdon thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la
10b5(rgyud): ni tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu dga' ba'i khro bos bzlas so// rims thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje'i rims kyi gdon gyis so// rims thams cad bsal ba la ni
10b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i lta bas bsal bas so// dug thams cad sbar ba la ni rdo rje lta bu'i dug gis so// dug thams cad gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i chun pos so// dug thams cad bza' ba
10b7(rgyud): la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyas so// bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas pas so// mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon
11a1(rgyud): thams cad las grol bar bA dA la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas so// phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas so// mkha' 'gro ma thams/
11a2(rgyud): cad dbug pa dang / gzhug pa dang // gdul ba la ni rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas so// ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / snying po dang / phyag
11a3(rgyud): rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa dang / gsang ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i yi ge phaT kyis so// ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la/
11a4(rgyud): ni ma mo'i gnas su khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gad rgyangs kyis so// gzhan gyi
11a5(rgyud): dpung thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje la yongs su bzlas la 'phang ngo // 'thab pa thams cad las thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas so// thams bcing ba
11a6(rgyud): la ni gos la mdud pa bya'o// thams cad grol ba la ni yi ge mu yis so// ro langs dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis so// lcags sgrog
11a7(rgyud): thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab long gis so// me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shal gyis so// chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje chu shal gyis so//
11b1(rgyud): nam mkha' las zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad la sogs pa yo byad mang po 'byung ba la ni nam mkha' la lta zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// nam mkha'/
11b2(rgyud): la sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa gzugs thams cad sten pa la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran la nam mkhar lta zhing bzlas pas so// nam mkha' las yi ges 'das pa dang /
11b3(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni yi ge a bris la bzlas brjod 'bum byas pras so// pra se na thams cad lus 'das pa dang / ma
11b4(rgyud): 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pa se na thams cad dbab pas so// de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig
11b5(rgyud): la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so// rna bas thos par bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas pas so// snas bsnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pas so// lces
11b6(rgyud): rang nyid smra ba la ni lce la bzlas pas so// lus kyis reg par bya ba la ni lus la bzlas pas so// yid kyis shres par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas pas so// rmad du byung
11b7(rgyud): ba thams cad bstan pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so// sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgo'i chun po la 'bum bzlas so// thams cad g.yogs
12a1(rgyud): par bya ba la ni zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so// thams cad la lan+da ljon par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rjes so// rdzu 'phrul
12a2(rgyud): thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so// cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so// rang gi lus la sogs
12a3(rgyud): dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas
12a4(rgyud): so// lha thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje bskor bas so// klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni klu'i rgyal po'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o// gnod sbyin thams cad/
12a5(rgyud): mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje bka' bsgo bas so// 'byung po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po munan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// ser ba thams cad
12a6(rgyud): bzlog pa la ni rdo rje srid srung gi phyag gi phyag rgyas so// glog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgyas so// char 'bab pa la ni klu'i mchod
12a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya'o// char gcad pa la ni dri ma med pa'i chu'i sbyin lugs bya'o// sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug pas bdug par bya'o// sprin bshog pa
12b1(rgyud): la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i spyan gyis so// chu med pa'i phyogs su shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshogs rtag tu 'byung ba la ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so// gter thams cad shes
12b2(rgyud): par bya ba la ni snod du chu blugs par bya'o// gter thams cad brko ba lA ni rdo rje 'dzer gyis so// gter thams cad rnyed pa la ni rdo rje nor gyis so// rgyal srid
12b3(rgyud): thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so// sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni rdo rje sams dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor
12b4(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pA lA ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// dam tshig thams cad sgrub
12b5(rgyud): pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje bsnams pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so// ma grub pa thams nang
12b6(rgyud): grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgyas so// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas so// rdo rje thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje
12b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdo rjes so// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag
13a1(rgyud): rgya chen pos so// sangs rgyas nyid sgrung pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag nus so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i
13a2(rgyud): rgyal po chen po las dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
13a3(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
13a4(rgyud): byin pa'i tshul gsungs te/ rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chubo chen po'o// don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi
13a5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang
13a6(rgyud): chub chen po'o// thams cad la ni rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// lag na rdo rje gang la la chos
13a7(rgyud): mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad la spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las/
13b1(rgyud): yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa'i gdon gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin
13b2(rgyud): 'dzum pa dang bcas te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// aHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag
13b3(rgyud): bar 'dus par mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs pa dang sems dpa' chen po
13b4(rgyud): brgyad phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa
13b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba
13b6(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbus su thig gsum
13b7(rgyud): gyi 'khor lo bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zad kar sna tshogs pad+ma rab tu gnas pa'i 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen
14a1(rgyud): sa la sogs pa las byas pa bzhag go// de'i phyogs thams cad du sa la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad du gzhag grAm bI/
14a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas tshon gyis thig le rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// phyi'i dkyil
14a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dang / mtshams rnams su byang chub sems dpa' brgyad ji lta ba bzhin gzhag nas bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnamasA su dgrod par bya'o// byang chub kyi
14a4(rgyud): mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ shar nas brtsams te ne'u gsings dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang / ro drug gis yongs su gang zhing dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po/
14a5(rgyud): che dang / gos lu sogs pas yongs su bkang ba'i snod dang / 'dzum zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgod do// mas de bzhin du tho rtso da sems
14a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings nas zhugs na/ bdag nyid slob dpon meng par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
14a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de rjes brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang / dngos gru thams cad la mi rmugs pa dang / mi song pa dang / slob pa thams cad
14b1(rgyud): dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma'ang de bzhin du gzhug go// zhugs nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin lnga rdo rje ming gis dbang bsgyur ba'ang sbyin par bya'o// nga nus
14b2(rgyud): dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o// sems can kun+da la pa ni phyir dang // bstan+da pa thams cad srung ba'i phyir// rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis// ci bde bar ni tha ma
14b3(rgyud): cad kyis// zhes bya'o// de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ji lta bus skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa ni ras la
14b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'bum pa dang bcas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin par bya'o// gzhan thams cad ni dam
14b5(rgyud): tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byon// de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog sgrub pa dang // dngos grub mchog rnams kyang de bzhin no// gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan
14b6(rgyud): 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te/ 'di'i mdun du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas na shes rab
14b7(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing dngos grub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsrubs pas kyang dkyil 'khor du
15a1(rgyud): zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni ji sed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
15a2(rgyud): bde ba thams cad phul bas so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa la ni bdag phul bas so// dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la ni me tog la sogs pa
15a3(rgyud): la bzlas pas so// sems can thams cad mchod pa la ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas pas so// chos thams cad bsdu ba la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po gdon pas
15a4(rgyud): so// bdud thams cad 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rgya na thams cad dbul zhing rang nyid
15a5(rgyud): bcings pas so// chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje pad+ma lnga lta bas so// de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid dngos grub thob pa la ni rdo rje las kyi mchog
15a6(rgyud): gis so// sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen pos so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgya
15a7(rgyud): po chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje mtshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so// / de nas ma rungs pa
15b1(rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
15b2(rgyud): pa sgrub pa 'dri gsungs te/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyi sa gti mug gi spos pa me pa
15b3(rgyud): nyid do// gti mug gi spros pa mang ba nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid du
15b4(rgyud): rig par bya'o// lug na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan dang ga 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams
15b5(rgyud): gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// myu rA du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha
15b6(rgyud): rgyu bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lhag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston cing / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
15b7(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya bcings lakhro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste 'ab ra bar blta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod da mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum pa'i
16a1(rgyud): tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad
16a2(rgyud): kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste lhung bar mdzad nas dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rnam par rgyal bar mdzad
16a3(rgyud): bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rjes su btul te bslangs nas yang dam tshig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang bcas pa zhabs
16a4(rgyud): gnyis su phab nas mnan pa mdzad do// de nas de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad du sgra chen po bsgrags tegakye rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su skyeb pa ra mdzod cig bdag
16a5(rgyud): cag rnams ma gzir ciga'adir khyod la bdag cag skyabs su mchi'o// dam tshig dang bka' bsgo ba'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o// ma mo thams cad kyang btul zhing dam la
16a6(rgyud): btags nas dkyil 'khor yang rnam par bshig ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang / dam tshig kyang dral zhing rnam par bshig pa dang / gdon thams cad kyang bzlog cing nad thams cad
16a7(rgyud): dang / rims thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / dug dang / ngan 'gro rnams dral cing rnam par bshigs pas sgra chen po sgrogs shing 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par
16b1(rgyud): byed pa'i tshig rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal rnam par bzhad pas de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug se/ rab
16b2(rgyud): tshig gis bcings nas rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs te rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'ang rjes su stsal nas sems can ma lus
16b3(rgyud): ba'i don du phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs su rab tu bzhag go// de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje las phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid can kha dog dang / rgyan dang / mtshon cha rnam
16b4(rgyud): pa sna tshogs pa bsnams pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ tshems kyis sgros gnon pa/ smin ma mi bzad cing khro gnyer bskyer ga spyan dang dbu skra dang /
16b5(rgyud): ag tsem 'bar ga zhal 'jigs pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / mtshon cha mda' dang / dbyig pa dang / ral gri dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / zi rings dang / chu gri phyag na bsnams
16b6(rgyud): pa/ khro bo chen po hUM mdzad las phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so// lha la sogs pa de rnams kyang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyis
16b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag go// gdon la sogs pa de dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
17a1(rgyud): thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khams gsum po mtha' dag las rnab par rgyal ba rdo rje byimagyis/
17a2(rgyud): brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// 'dul ba chen po
17a3(rgyud): 'dul byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor ba yis// phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su
17a4(rgyud): khro bo che// phyag na rdo rje gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas 'phreng la sogs pa sa spa sa// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal ni cung zad mche ba gtsigs// khros bcas
17a5(rgyud): bzhad pa'i zhal mnga' ba// g.yon brkyang ba yis legs bzhugs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsdus pa'o// g.yon gyi zhabs kyis legs mnan pa// de yi bya ba dang
17a6(rgyud): phyug che/ g.yas ni dka' thub bzlog pa yi// nu ma'i steng du rab tu 'jogapa 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa/ sa sogs bcas pa'i khams rnams kyi/
17a7(rgyud): khro bo kun tu gzhag par bya// 'a bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// 'khor lo de yang mkhas pa yis// 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od can bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas
17b1(rgyud): rnams su// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams so// khro bo'i mtshan ma bzhi po ni// gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang // 'khor lo de bzhin rtse gsum sbeng // sgo rnams kun tu
17b2(rgyud): bri bar bya// phyi rol gnas pa'i gdon rnams kyi/ sna tshogs gtor mas bkang ba dang // ba dan sngon po dril btags shing // rtse mo kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// de nas 'dir
17b3(rgyud): 'jug pa la ni yan lag thams cad ras sngon po zung gis g.yogs shing khros pas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bcas par 'dzin par gyur pas zhugs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
17b4(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas brtsams te sdig pa las rnam par grol zhing mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mu stegs thams cad la tshar gcod pa
17b5(rgyud): dang / phan 'a dogs nus shing thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la snying po byin te dkyil 'khor thams du'ang bya'o//
17b6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rnon po rtse bzhi pa 'bar ba byin la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya// 'di ni gdug pa 'dul byed pa'i// phyag na rdo rje rdo rje ste// ma
17b7(rgyud): rungs thams cad 'dul ba la// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de nas de bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa ni ras la bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i dbang phyug byas la/
18a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyang sems dpa' chen po thams cad bya'o// phyogs thams cad du ni lha la sogs pa dang ma mo rnam bri bar bya ste/ de nas sgrub pa chen po
18a2(rgyud): la'ang de bzhin te/ de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams la ni ras la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas/ de'i mdun du lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod
18a3(rgyud): 'dum bya'o// de nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang / de bzhin du thams
18a4(rgyud): cad rjes su chags par yang bya ba dang / dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang gabacing ba dang / dgrel ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang lpags par bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang /
18a5(rgyud): rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyis med par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang ltung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / gsad pa dang / gso bar bya ba la sogs pa'ang lan cig bzlas pas byed
18a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo mthar byed kyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni khro bo'i lta ba'i bzlas pas so// thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khros pas
18a7(rgyud): gzhig par bya'o// thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje dang khros pas phyogs der brdeg par bya'o// gdon thams cad dbug pa la ni rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed kyis so// thams cad kyi snying /
18b1(rgyud): 'byin pa la ni nus pa'i yid kyis dbyung bar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad sngar bcad pa la ni khros pas rdo rje bsor bar bya'o// gdug cing zlos pa dag bra la mi thos pa su zhugs bye/
18b2(rgyud): sbyin sreg gis so// bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni ring gis bon gyi sbyin sreg gas so// gnod sman thams chung bskang pa la nA~M ha sa zhes dgod cing brtas pas so// klu rdoH/
18b3(rgyud): cad gdon pa la ni rdo rje sa la rdeb cing bzlas pas so// lha rnams ltung bar bya ba la ni lha mo rdo rje ltung byed kyis so// lha'i bdag po thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / 'dul ba dang /
18b4(rgyud): bsnun pa dang ga gsod pa dang / dul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje srid pa gsum po gdul bar byed pas so// rnam thos sras rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rnam thos sras mnan nas khros pas bzlas
18b5(rgyud): brjed bya'o// lus ngan po mnan nas dpal dbrog pa la ni rdo rje skyes bus so// 'dod pa'i lha dbang du bya ba la ni 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// tshangs pa lhung bar
18b6(rgyud): bya ba la ni rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so// khyab 'jug gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dral bas so// dbang phyug chen po gdul ba la ni rdo rje tri shU la dral bas so// ma mo thams
18b7(rgyud): cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mos so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang dam tshig dang / chos dang / gsang ba'i dngos grub rnam par gtor zhing
19a1(rgyud): rnam par 'jig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed pas so// ri dang / shing dang / khyim dang / gtsug la khang dang grong khyer dang /
19a2(rgyud): mchod rten dang / lha'i khang pa dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / glang po dang bcas pa'i rta la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas mig la reg pas so// ltung ba
19a3(rgyud): thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje khro ba bsrung bas so// thams cad spong ba la ni rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas so// thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang dbrog pas so// 'jigs
19a4(rgyud): pa thams cad bskyed pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so// dpung thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod sbyin mos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / gnon pa dang / rmongs par
19a5(rgyud): bya ba dang / long par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa la ni rdo rje khreHma rungs pa'i srin mos so// rgyal po la sog pa mi chen po thams cad gsad pa la ni dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag
19a6(rgyud): gis sbyin sreg byas pas so// lha thams cad gzhig pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur bus btab pas so// lha'i bdag po thams cad sreg pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs
19a7(rgyud): brnyan gyi yam shing gis so// rang gi khrag gi rgyun 'bab pas sa thams cad nub par bya ba la ni rdo rje khro bo sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so// khams gsum thams cad gsad pa la ni rdo rje 'jig
19b1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgyas so// 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i khro bos so// khams gsum thams cad dbab/
19b2(rgyud): pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so// khams gsum po thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba
19b3(rgyud): dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gnon par bya ba dang / sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bas so// bde ba chen po
19b4(rgyud): rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas
19b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba
19b6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma thams cad
19b7(rgyud): rnam par dag pa nyid kyis 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//
20a1(rgyud): shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten ra shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
20a2(rgyud): pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+mo lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang dri ma rnams
20a3(rgyud): dang rnga glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te ga myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byung
20a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid yang rgya chen por ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod
20a5(rgyud): cha ga sa la sogs pa'i dri ma sa mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma'i gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// hrIHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis
20a6(rgyud): pad+ma chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba'i pad+mas mtshan ma'i gzugs can nges pa byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan
20a7(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos thams cad la gzigs pa'i ye shes/
20b1(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// phyi'i
20b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa las de bzhin du sgo dang mtshams su bcas pa dri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du thig bzhi thig btab pa la tshen dpar
20b3(rgyud): bos pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgod par bya'o// de'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po chags pa sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gzugs
20b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i pad+ma chen po dang / mda' dang / gzhu bsdams pa/ g.yas su bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po'i gtum po dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//
20b5(rgyud): rgyab tu pad+ma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog nag po gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po
20b6(rgyud): gzhag par bya'o// g.yas kyi mtshams su pad+ma chen po sa 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtshams gnyis par pad+ma chen po rgya mtsho chu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//
20b7(rgyud): gsum par pad+ma chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can gzhag par bya'o// bzhi par pad+ma chen po drung gi gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su
21a1(rgyud): shrI hrI grI d+hi lha mo bzhi gzhag par bya ste// thams cad kyang g.yas na rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin par bya ste/ sgo rnams su ni 'dod chags dang /
21a2(rgyud): zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ 'dri lta ste/ bud med kyi gzugs dang / sbrul gyi gzugs dang / phag gi gzugs dang
21a3(rgyud): pad+ma'i gzugs bya'o// de nas gos dkar po bgos te/ gos dkar pos gdong g.yogs la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas par bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste//
21a4(rgyud): gang du babs pa de des bsgrub par bya'o// de nas pad+ma blangs la pad+ma'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma la blta bar bya ste/ ji lta ra pad+ma dmar/
21a5(rgyud): po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos te// 'dab kyi nang na dag pa ltar// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin// de ltar chos rnams bsgoms na nI// blo ldan nyon mongs bcas
21a6(rgyud): gyur kyang // nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas/ myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
21a7(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so// de nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu
21b1(rgyud): yongs su dag pa dang / song bring dngos grung thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ slob ma gzug pa'i chog
21b2(rgyud): rgyas pa'ang de bzhin no// ye shes kyi dkyil 'khyer ra// sgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang thams cad
21b3(rgyud): rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pad+ma la lan stong bzlas te phyin par bya'o// thams cad gsad pa la ni pad+ma chen po'i khro ba'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po bag
21b4(rgyud): gis so// nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so// sa thams cad kyi bdag por bya ba la nis la skyil mo kru
21b5(rgyud): bcas pas bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o// chu thams cad dbab pa la ni klu bris nas de'i steng du 'dug nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// thams cad
21b6(rgyud): snang bar bya ba la ni mun par nyi ma chen po'i 'od kyis so// rlung thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rlung gi mchog gi so// bde ba chen po rdo/
21b7(rgyud): don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dam chog ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//
22a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las drung
22a2(rgyud): papa ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// nor sbyin pa ni re
22a3(rgyud): ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang gangag drang ga sems kyi bde ba
22a4(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas te rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po ches dbang bskur ba'o
22a5(rgyud): 'phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// traM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom
22a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi rin po che de la thams cad dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i
22a7(rgyud): gzugs nyid kyis zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs nas
22b1(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'digasas so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas pa'i//
22b2(rgyud): nang du rin po che zur brgyad pa/ rin po che'o ka ba brgyad la gnas pa/ dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las rin po che'i lcug mas yongs su bskor ba ka rdo rje rin po che'i ra btsog dang
22b3(rgyud): me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / ba dan dang // gdugs dang / rnga yab kyi nye bar mdzes par bya'o// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rta'i khri la bzhugs pa dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba rang
22b4(rgyud): nyid 'ching bar mdzad cing // zhal rnam par bzhad cing margad kyi mdog can gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
22b5(rgyud): bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// g.yas su rin po che chen po'i nor sbyin pa dbyig gi gter 'dzin pa gzhug par bya'o// rgyab
22b6(rgyud): tu chos chen po'i rin po che'i gle gas bum 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du rin po che chen po ro myang ba zas dang skom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtshams rnams
22b7(rgyud): su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang karda dang / srog shing rnams 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol gyi mtshams su bum pa gang ba rnams so//
23a1(rgyud): sgo rnams su dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol tu ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba da na dang bla res rnams
23a2(rgyud): kyis kun tu khyab par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas zhugs nas/ de nas brtsams te nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob/
23a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng ba bcings te rin po che blangs nas rin po che'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la sbyin pa thams cad phul nas slar dbyung
23a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'ang de bzhin no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs par dbang bsru
23a5(rgyud): ba thams cad 'thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i 'phreng bas so// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la ni nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byas/
23a6(rgyud): pas so// chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la blta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// zas dang skom thams cad la sogs pa dang / ro thams cad thob par bya
23a7(rgyud): ba la ni nam mkha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas brjod stong byas pas so// shin tu mthon po thob par bya ba la ni gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod
23b1(rgyud): 'dum bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gis so// glags pa dang snyan pa chen po mchog dang ming thob par bya ba la ni nyin re zhing kha thams cad du/
23b2(rgyud): bltas nas bzlas pa bya'o// bdag po chen po thob pa la ni rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ dbang bskur
23b3(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thob
23b4(rgyud): pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes
23b5(rgyud): bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur
23b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su/
23b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo/
24a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa
24a2(rgyud): dang / sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer
24a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
24a4(rgyud): chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'dri rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra zhing rdo rje sra pa'i phyag rgya tham cad kyi dngos grub kyi
24a5(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// aHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sem
24a6(rgyud): dpa' phyag rgya thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas gdab bo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis yang
24a7(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad las phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' phyung nas kyang dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis
24b1(rgyud): bzhugs par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
24b2(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor bas bris la nang du rdo rje'i thig gis 'khor
24b3(rgyud): lo bro'o// de bzhin du de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig btab la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur phyag gnyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhal rnam par bzhad
24b4(rgyud): pa gzhag go// de'i mdun du rdo rje sku'i mchog ces bya ba rdo rje 'ams par 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje ljags zhes bya ba rdo rje lce'i mchog 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya
24b5(rgyud): ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya ba bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o// shar lho'i mtshams su phyag rgya'i khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / gnyis pa la ni nor gyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / gsum pa
24b6(rgyud): la ni chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / bzhi pa la ni las kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / rang gi phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang 'dzin par bya'o// sgo rnams su ni rdo rje bsnyams ma la sogs
24b7(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung la rang nyid zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te dngos grub
25a1(rgyud): thams cad don yod par 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur bar mngon par rdzogs
25a2(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// der zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya zhing rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la 'di skad brjod par bya'o// sku gsung thugs
25a3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan lta bur sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun zhes bya bar bsgrags// dam tshig dngos grub kun ster ba'o// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin no// phyag rgya thams cad kyi dkyil
25a4(rgyud): 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams kyang de bzhin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa la ni snying khar rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis
25a5(rgyud): so dbyug rgya thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i khu tshur gyis so// ma tshig thams cad thub pa la ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sems ca rjes su chags par bya ba la ni chags
25a6(rgyud): pa chen po'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dbang dubya ba la ni rdo rje bzhang pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bsdam par bya ba la ni
25a7(rgyud): rdo rje lu gu rgyad kyi du dur gyis so// thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje zhal zhal gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad btsir ba la ni rdo rje bsdam pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad
25b1(rgyud): gsang pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bu tshur gyis so// thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje nges par 'chir ba'i khu tshur gyis so//
25b2(rgyud): thams cad dral ba la ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyis so//
25b3(rgyud): thams sgyur gzhug pa la ni rdo rje brdung ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad lkugs pa dang / 'phye bor bya
25b4(rgyud): ba la ni rdo rje chen po'i phye ba'i khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje thar pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad
25b5(rgyud): kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dbye ba la ni hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad rjes
25b6(rgyud): bya ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje ma mo'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad phye mar bya ba la ni rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rnam par gzhig
25b7(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje gdug pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gzhig pa dang rnam par gzhom pa la ni dbang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// chu'i nang du gnas shing chags pa la ni rdo rje gnon po'i
26a1(rgyud): khu tshur gyis so// gzugs mang por ston pa la ni rdo rje sna tshogs pa rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so// mi snang ba'i dngos grub la ni mi snang ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so//
26a2(rgyud): rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni rdo rje nam mkha'i khu tshur gyis so// nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rig pa 'dzin pa'i
26a3(rgyud): dngos grub la ni rdo rje ral gri'i khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje las kyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad mkhyen bzung ba la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu
26a4(rgyud): tshur gyis so// nor thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po nyid la ni rdo rje phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyis so// las thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni
26a5(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis so// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rang nyid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dngos grub rnams
26a6(rgyud): ston pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyu mchog gi khu tshur gyis so// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sangs rgyas nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu
26a7(rgyud): tshur gyis so// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs
26b1(rgyud): so// pa de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol
26b2(rgyud): tu byin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma me bya'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul
26b3(rgyud): gyis chos thams cad smon pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
26b4(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di rgya cher ston zhing bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'dabs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di
26b5(rgyud): gsungs so// a/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa mdzad nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas 'jam dpal
26b6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pas spros pa med pa'i ral gri zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil
26b7(rgyud): 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i nang du 'khor lo bris la/ a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i 'breng ba go rim bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul
27a1(rgyud): gyis thig btab la/ de'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang zhing 'dzum pa dang bcas pa nam mkha'i mdog can phyag bzhi dang /
27a2(rgyud): ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs par gzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i mtshams rnams su
27a3(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi lung ji ltar thob pa bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// sgo rnams su ni mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / lhung bzed
27a4(rgyud): dang glegs bam rnams so// de nas ral gri dang / glegs bam gyi phyag rgya de bzhin du chos kyi slob dpon du byin gyis brlab bo// de nas ral gri'i blangs te ral gri'i ming gi dbang bskur
27a5(rgyud): khas dbang bskur la chos 'di bshad par bya ste/ ral gri 'di ni rtag zung la// shes rab tshul ni dkar smra zhing // nam mkha' sangs rgyas sbyor ba yis// 'debs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
27a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bstan pa srung phyir dang / sems can mang po srung ba'i phyir// 'dis bsad sdig par mi 'gyur zhing // bsod nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur// slob ma rnams la'ang de bzhin te/
27a7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi
27b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa'ang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs par yang de bzhin du las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thos la ni thams cad nam mkha' bsgoms pas/
27b2(rgyud): so/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas so// ston pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni smon pa med pa bsgoms pas so//
27b3(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi ye shes 'thob pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas so// nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa la ni chos bsgoms pas so// yi ge
27b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes la ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas so// gnas thams cad du yi ges chos kyi bya ba mthong ba la ni a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i nge
27b5(rgyud): nyid bsgoms pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub pa thob pa la ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
27b6(rgyud): po las/ 'khor lo chen po ltar yi ge bskor ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
27b7(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bdi bshad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de
28a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la
28a2(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams
28a3(rgyud): cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum nas/ rdo rje 'khor
28a4(rgyud): lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di sbas so// hUMHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po can
28a5(rgyud): khams gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' rnams
28a6(rgyud): nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo 'khor lo thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes
28a7(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji ltar
28b1(rgyud): bzhin du byas te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'khor lo bris la/ dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo bskor ba gzhag par bya'o// phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam pa/
28b2(rgyud): srad du dkyil 'khor dang po'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o// bya'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ba ni bri bar bya'o// sgro rnams su mtshangs pazhi gzhag par byaste/ 'di lta ste/
28b3(rgyud): sesra pa'i sku dang / rdo rje khro bo'i sku dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku dang / nam mkha'i snying po'i sku rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du
28b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lo blangs la 'khor lo'i ming gis dbang bskur ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi thig btab pa'i rigs rnams
28b5(rgyud): su 'jug par bya'o// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa'ang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs par yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los
28b6(rgyud): gter rang gi khar bcug la gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo chen pos so// de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa
28b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so// de bzhin du dmachog gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni dam tshig chen po'i 'khor los so// las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi
29a1(rgyud): 'khor los so// de bzhin du rjes su chags par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / don thob pa dang / rgyus gdab pa dang / bcad pa dang / 'jug pa dang / mchod pa dang /
29a2(rgyud): gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la ni sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya g.yon na 'khor lo dang bcas pa rnams kyis so// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal
29a3(rgyud): po chen po las/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
29a4(rgyud): thams cad la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyid ni de
29a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
29a6(rgyud): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang // 'dzin
29a7(rgyud): pa dang // klog pa dang / rjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas
29b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// //
29b2(rgyud): de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' thams cad las mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa nam mkha'i khams ma lus par spros par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byang
29b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting
29b4(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i mchod pa'i mchog don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du rin po che'i ka ba brgyad
29b5(rgyud): byas la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ zhal 'dzum pa/ sku dang yan lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can gzhag par bya'o// de'i phyog
29b6(rgyud): thams cad du dam tshig sems dpa' rnams gzhag par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po// byang chub kyi sems
29b7(rgyud): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid smra ba dang / dkyil 'khor 'dri ba dang / mchod pa thams cad dang / sems can rnams yongs su
30a1(rgyud): skyob pa ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa phyag na 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag go// phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni me tog la sogs pa rnams dang /
30a2(rgyud): sgo rnams su ni dbyig dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rin po che ste mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thams cad kyis mchod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// zhugs
30a3(rgyud): nas sna tshogs rdo rje blangs la// sna tshogs rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhi bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las thams cad dang // phyag bya ba dang / ngag dang / yid dang /
30a4(rgyud): sems kyi chos kyi dbyings su spros pas mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya zhing / rdo rje dang phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas pa'o// mam kyi gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin
30a5(rgyud): no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa dang dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs par yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying khar rdo rje bsgoms pas so//
30a6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag par bsgoms pas so// dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba sna tshogs kyis so// phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs
30a7(rgyud): kyis so// stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa la ni a la sogs pa'i yi ge lung bstan pas so// dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni 'khor lo sna tshogs kyis so// mchod pa tham cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so//
30b1(rgyud): bdug pa 'dul ba'i mchod pa la mi thenas so// me tog la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas pas ma/ bde ba che po don yod pa'i dam com ma rtog pa'i rgyal bachen pa las/ dacog
30b2(rgyud): don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes
30b3(rgyud): kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khrob
30b4(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid do// sems can thams cad dul ba nyid pas khro ba dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid do//
30b5(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te bzhin rab tu
30b6(rgyud): 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// haM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis gdug pa thams cad 'dul
30b7(rgyud): ba'i sems dpa' rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi thug las byung ste dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs thams cad
31a1(rgyud): kyis 'dul ba khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gdug pa thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi dkyil
31a2(rgyud): 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang rim nyid du ni// dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa// sgo bzhi pa la thig bzhir ldan//
31a3(rgyud): tshon sna lnga yis rnam par bri// ka ba brgyad ni mdun gnas par// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// rdo rje gnod sbyin gzhag bya ste// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs
31a4(rgyud): pa dang // 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// 'jigs byed kha dog sngo ba dang // ha ha zhes bzhad gsal ba'i zhal// de yi kun tu gnod sbyin ni// shin tu 'jigs pa gzhag par
31a5(rgyud): bya/ de nyid dang po la sogs mchog/ phyag na rdo rje sogs mtshan 'chang // phyi'i dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i mtshan ma
31a6(rgyud): gzhag par bya// de nas 'jug pa la sogs pa byung ste/ rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang bcas pas zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus shing myur du rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par
31a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs nas rdo rje mche ba rlang la rdo rje bong gi dbang bskur la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid bsnun no// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur
31b1(rgyud): ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srung ba po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje gtum por bdag grub pa yin no zhes shes par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing /
31b2(rgyud): bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// de nas mchod pa la de bzhin du yang dag par tshim par byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig brjod la slar dpung bar bya'o// de bzhin du phyag
31b3(rgyud): rgya bcing ba la sogs pa cho ga rgyas pa ni dang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya'o// phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin te/ ma bsgrubs par yang
31b4(rgyud): dang po ji lta ba bzhin no// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro bas ha ha zhes dgod cing zlos pas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs
31b5(rgyud): rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las lhung bar bya ba la ni chos gos dang snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dbang bskur ba thams cad dbrog pa la ni khams thams cad kyi phye ma'i sbyin sreg gis
31b6(rgyud): so// thams cad rgyus gdab pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad gcad pa la ni gzugs brnyan byas nas gtubs pas so// ma rungs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam
31b7(rgyud): par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gzung nas 'jug par bya'o// mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad skrag par bya ba la ni 'jigs byed kyi lta bas blta
32a1(rgyud): bar bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so//
32a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// chos
32a3(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
32a4(rgyud): phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
32a5(rgyud): cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hA/ de nas/
32a6(rgyud): 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs las byung ste/ dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs par gyur to//
32a7(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nges par btud de dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po bris la dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyad du rdo rje
32b1(rgyud): khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so sor gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thug
32b2(rgyud): nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo rje 'khor lo bris nas/ 'khor lo'i gnas rnams
32b3(rgyud): su dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyang dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis btab cing sems dpa' chen po gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs
32b4(rgyud): ji ltar rjes su 'thun par bri bar bya'o// sgo rnams su ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o// de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis
32b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i de kho na nyid dam chog ces bya ba'i rdo pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po che
