32b6(rgyud): po rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab
32b7(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
33a1(rgyud): po can no// thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sem ca thab cad rdo rje'i snying po can no// ngag thams cad rab tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi/
33a2(rgyud): snying po can no// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgyu
33a3(rgyud): cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje dbang phyug chen po rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// tri/ de nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ kun nas zlum pa thig gsum pa dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi
33a4(rgyud): pa mtshams rnams su mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri bar bya'o// de'i logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad po bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ nag po chen po dang / dga' byed/
33a5(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / dril chen dang / gar gyi dbang phyug rnams ni phyogs rnams su'o// mtshams su ni thod pa bzang po dang / gtum po'i dbang phyug dang / lag na kha T+wAM ga dang ba lang rna ba'i dbang phyug dang
33a6(rgyud): ngo// thig gi mtshams rnams su ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// sgo rnams su dbyig pa'i dbang phyug dang / mgo'i dbang phyug dang / dril sna dang / drag po chen
33a7(rgyud): po'o// phyi rol tu ni 'byung po rnams dang / yi ge rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon thal ba gtsang mas lus bskus shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ mdung rtse gsum gyi mtshan ma gzhag
33b1(rgyud): par bya'o// zhugs nas kyang snying po bzlas par bya'o// de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la lag par mdung rtse gsum pa byin la chos bshad par bya'o// sems can kun la phan phyir dang /
33b2(rgyud): bstan pa thams cad srung phyir dang // 'dod kun bdag po nyid phyir dang // drag pa'i las la gnas par gyis// de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs te gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// de nas
33b3(rgyud): brtsams te 'jigs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / thams cad rjes su myong nas drag po'i 'jig rten du mchod par 'gru
33b4(rgyud): ro/ dkyil 'khor chen po zhi ba'i mdung thung gi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ dang po mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang
33b5(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / gsad pa dang / sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// b+h+yo/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o// zur bzhi pa byang gi sgo can gyi dkyil 'kho/
33b6(rgyud): thig btab la/ dbus su nag po gar byed bzhin pa gzhag par bya'o// de'i phyog dang mtshams thams cad du ma mo brgyad bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ drag mo dang / tshangs pa mo dang / khyab 'jug
33b7(rgyud): mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / nag mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / zab mo dang srin mo'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni drag po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bri bar bya ste/ zhi ba mo dang be
34a1(rgyud): ruN+DA dang / gtum mo dang / 'jigs byed ma rnams so// de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang // thod pa khrag dang /
34a2(rgyud): bcas pa dang / 'khar gsil dang / mche ba dang / kha T+wAM ga'o// ske srungs rnams kyi ni thod pa dang / rus pa'i lu gu rgyud dang / bya rgod dang / byi la'o// de nas phyag rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod pa/ ga
34a3(rgyud): ba gos gtsang ma bgos pa thams cad za ba 'am/ thams cad spyad pa la'ang smad pa med de/ zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas zhugs la snying po bzlas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas b+h+yo chen po
34a4(rgyud): thos par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ji ltar 'ongs pa zhugs par 'gyur zhing 'thob par 'gyur te/ gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so// de nas slob ma las
34a5(rgyud): na me tog thogs pas ras kyis mig bkab la nag po chen po'i phyag rgyas bcug ste/ rnam par dam tshig chen po b+h+yo zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas skrag nas me tog 'dor ro// de nas
34a6(rgyud): gang du lhung ba de lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub par bya'o// gal te lhung bar ma gyur na'ang 'dor du gzhug go/ des ni 'jigs par byed par nus shing rnal 'byor yang so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas
34a7(rgyud): gdong g.yogs dkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o// bdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas mchod nas snying po dang rang rang gi mtshan ma sbyin par bya'o// de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ sem
34b1(rgyud): can thams cad rgyas gdab cing // dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar bya// sngags rnams bstan par mi bya ste// dam chog rnal 'byor grub ster bya'o// drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse dang // ma mo rnams
34b2(rgyud): kyi rgyus 'debs par// gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying // rtag tu 'jig par byed par 'gyur// de nas brtsams te gang sha chen po za ba ni de ring po mi thogs par rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang za
34b3(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur ba de'i rnal 'byor med do// gal te dam tshig las 'das par ma gyur na tshogs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsod par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya'i gar
34b4(rgyud): dang mchod pa byas nas gtor ma sbyin zhing bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod la sogs pas tshim par byas nas phyir byung bar bya'o// dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
34b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// swa/ de
34b6(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi par// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du dkyil 'khor ni// gzhu yi dbyibs can dri bar bya// de yi dbus su ming po ni//
34b7(rgyud): mchog gsum dag ni gzhag bya ste// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal byed dang // don kun grub byed ces bya ba'o// go cha ya la da bgos pa dang // de bzhin thod pa mtshan ma 'dzin// lha yi gos
35a1(rgyud): dang 'phreng ba 'chang // cung zad dgod cing khro ba dang // seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mdzes pa'o// dngos grub kun ster dag pa ste// gsu
35a2(rgyud): ni srid gsum dag dang mtshungs// sgo dang mtshams ni thams cad du// tshogs la sogs pa legs par gzhag/ grub dang 'phel chen gnod sbyin dang // gtum dang khro mchog gsod pa'o//
35a3(rgyud): phyi rol pa dan rtse mo la// dril bu'i 'phreng bcas thams cad du// bum pa gang ba rol mchog bcas// 'byung po ma lus gtor mar bcas// klu rnams glu ru len pa dang // rol mo rdung bar
35a4(rgyud): byed pa dang // de bzhin slob dpon gar byed pas// phyag rgya kun gyis 'jug par bya// zhugs nas spun la dad pa yis// yang dang yang du 'dud bya zhing // me tog kun gyis mchod pa yis// sgrub
35a5(rgyud): dang de nyid dag kyang brjod// 'jig rten gsum po srid gsum mchog/ ngan song gsum mchod gsum rnam gsum// legs ldan spras pas grub pa ni// dngos grub kun la rtag tu'o//
35a6(rgyud): de nas snying po lan cig brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad kyi g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas la dgug par bya'o// de nas dril bu dang bcas pa'i 'phreng ba rnams g.yo'o// thams
35a7(rgyud): cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o// de nas dam tshig 'di brjod par bya ste/ gal te dam tshig 'das gyur ma// pa gsod 'gro ba gang yin dang // ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba gang
35b1(rgyud): 'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rtag tu dam pa bsten par bya// dam pa min pa yongs su spang // gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya// rtag tu ming po gsum po sgrub// 'di ni dam tshig
35b2(rgyud): go de nas glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang / dgod pa dang / dga' dang / za ba dang / mgu bas me la rtse bya'o// phyag rgya dang gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa'ang byas la ga/ slob dpon gyis kyang phyag rgya de
35b3(rgyud): dang bcas pas byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes brjod par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'byor pa thams cad 'grub
35b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// hUM/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad
35b5(rgyud): par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum por thig btab la/ thig bzhi la 'khor lo bzhi pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor de rnam su sgo bzhir lta ba'i lha mo bzhi'i gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya ste ka'adi lnga
35b6(rgyud): ste/ dga' ba mo ni shar du lta ba/ mda' dang gzhu thogs pa la brtson pa/ sgeg ma mdog dmar ba'o// gsod ma lho phyogs su lta ba/ lag nA gri dang phub thogs pa/ mdog nag po'o// phag mo nub tu
35b7(rgyud): lta ba/ lag na gser gyi gter thogs pa// gser gyi mdog can no// grub pa mo zhi ba mo zhes bya ba byang du lta ba/ lag na gri dang sha ka ra thogs pa/ mdog dkar mo'o// phyi rol gyi sgo bzhir mtshan
36a1(rgyud): ma dgod pa gzhag par bya'o// de nas slob dpon dril bu dkrol zhing lag pa g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas snying po bzla bar bya'o//
36a2(rgyud): de nas phyag dang gar gyi mchod pa btab par bya'o// de nas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i//
36a3(rgyud): gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa dang ka'adi ni nor rnams kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i thams cad kyis mnyes par byed pa dang / gter thams cad 'byin pa dang / dngos
36a4(rgyud): grub thams cad sgrub nus par 'gyur ro// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin no// de rnams kyang 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
36a5(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas
36a6(rgyud): mu med pas mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyirachos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes
36a7(rgyud): bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha
36b1(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar
36b2(rgyud): thug pa med pa nyid pas las thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no// gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang /
36b3(rgyud): rjed pa dang gasgom pa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thar thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te sgrib pa thams cad zad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur
36b4(rgyud): ro/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no//
36b5(rgyud): sems can chen po legs so legs// bde ba chen po legs so legs// zag pa chen po legs so legs// blo gros chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras//
36b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje'i mdo 'di'i byin gyi rlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs
36b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis// de dag mi song mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // phos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring po
37a1(rgyud): mi thogs 'thob par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni
37a2(rgyud): mngon par bstod// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po A
37a3(rgyud): tsar+ya shud d+hA ka ra barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
37a4(rgyud): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya brdo rje chos nyid shes
37a5(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dpal mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po'i dngos
37a6(rgyud): grub dam pa ni/ bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
37a7(rgyud): byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par
37b1(rgyud): byed pa'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad
37b2(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi dngos grub dam pa ni/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
37b3(rgyud): lus pa med par yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor ba la'ang ma chags shing brdzun 'grus chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus
37b4(rgyud): pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i
37b5(rgyud): gnas bu ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'dar byed par rus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang // ye shes gam
37b6(rgyud): su bsgrubs pas ni// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten
37b7(rgyud): sdig byed de sbyang phyir// 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar ba// 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pas// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro ba na rnams la
38a1(rgyud): mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag bde ba chen po nor che la/ khams gsum dbang phyug thos pas na// sems can don rnams ston par byed//
38a2(rgyud): gang la la zhig nang par langs nas dpal mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang /
38a3(rgyud): sgom pa de yis bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
38a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dpal mchog dang po las/
38a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
38a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi che ga rgyas pa'i rgyal po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang
38a7(rgyud): baba'i don yod cing bstan pa'i cho ga phyag rgya btab pa'i sku gsung thugs thams cad kyis rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po thams cad la rab tu zhugs nas chod nyid
38b1(rgyud): rtogs pa'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i 'phrin las kyis dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par spyos pa las kyi
38b2(rgyud): mtha' rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ zla ba byed pa du ma la rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa rnam par 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gus la pa
38b3(rgyud): gser gyi dril bu btags pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i ba dan rlung gi bskyod pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs pa dang / na bza' dang / me long dang
38b4(rgyud): mu tig gi 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bas mdzes shing brgyan pa// sna tshogs pa'i kha khyer la gnas pa mchog tu gyur pa'i lha'i bu mo dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang / gar dang ga glu yis rab tu brgyan pa
38b5(rgyud): dang / bstod pas sad par byed pa/ bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gzhal yas khang pa la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams
38b6(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad drang // dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin las thabs
38b7(rgyud): cad mchog tu gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa/ thams cad dbang du byed pa po 'byin pa po 'dod pa thams cad pa// rgya che ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga thams cad pa/
39a1(rgyud): rtag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba btab pa/ ji srid srid pa'i bar gnas pa// de srid sems can don mchog mchod// sems can khams ni
39a2(rgyud): mtha' yas dang // rgyal sras srid par 'dod pa'i phyir// srid pa'i skyon rnams 'joms phyir dang // bde ba chen po 'phel bya'i phyir// gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog gsung ba'i//
39a3(rgyud): rjes su gnang bar bdag la stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa nyid la lhag par dgengs nas/ gdul bya thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sna
39a4(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ka ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thams cad yongs su bskya
39a5(rgyud): ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang ka ye shes dang ka las dang / mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams/
39a6(rgyud): cad nyid dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po thob pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi don bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams
39a7(rgyud): cad kyis sku'i 'phreng ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa
39b1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang por srang ste/ g.yon pa bsnyems pa'i tshul du mdzad nas g.yas pa rdo rje gsor bas rang gi thugs kar/
39b2(rgyud): dang po'i rdo rje mchog gi sbyor ba 'dzin cing ga bde ba chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid kyi su dang / gsung dang / thugs las 'byung ngo // e ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM
39b3(rgyud): su ras+t+wa~M/ de nas byung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rnams slar yang byang chub chen po mngon par rtogs
39b4(rgyud): nas de rnams kyis bzhad pa chen po mngon par mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yos pa dang shin tu g.yos pas yongs su dag par gyur to// khams gsum rgyas par spros pa
39b5(rgyud): thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor chen por gyur to// gang gi sems can thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs
39b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi don yod cing // thogs pa med pa las mngon par 'byung bar rdo rje chen po phyag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnam par
39b7(rgyud): gnon par mdzad nas de'i sku thams cad las dngos grub thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba ster ba rtag tu rjes su 'brel ba can lhan cig tu spyod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi sems dpa'
40a1(rgyud): rnams phyung nas phyogs thams cad du byung ste/ mdun du rdo rje gsang ba yid las byung ba/ g.yas su rdo rje kI li kI li/ rgyab tu 'dod pa'i dzirje/ g.yon du rdo rje bsgyings pa'o//
40a2(rgyud): mtshams rnams su mchod pa'o lha mo rnams so// phyi rol gyi kha khyer mtshams su lha'i bu mo rnams so// sgo srung ba rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrogadung / dril bu
40a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa'o// phyi rol tu rdo rje smre srungs kyi tshogs dang / pho nya dang / bran rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khu tshur bcings te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham
40a4(rgyud): cad byang chub rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang chen po la gsol ba btab ste// sems can kun la bde don du// rgyal
40a5(rgyud): ba chen po 'byung ba ste// chags bral de rnams chags ldan yang // rang gi btsun mo'ang gsol mdzad pas// de phyir bdag gis khyod la gsol// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i/
40a6(rgyud): rtog pa'i dngos grub ste// 'dul ba mchog ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub 'dul ba rdo rje 'a
40a7(rgyud): pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas/ rdo rje chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po/
40b1(rgyud): dam pa ste// bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ dam tshig dam pa'i ming can yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni 'dus byas nas// de'i dbus cho ga bzhin du ni// phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas/
40b2(rgyud): der ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// gsar zhing legs par bsgril ba dang // mdud pa dag ni med pa yis// thig skud dmar pos thig btab nas// tshon gyi phye mas bri bar bya// rdu
40b3(rgyud): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud bzhis ni mdzes pa dang // kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor// mtshams su lha yi bu mos mdzes// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams dang // sgo
40b4(rgyud): dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen 'od zer 'bar// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu mchog/ ba dan sna tshogs mdzes pa dang // me long dra ba me
40b5(rgyud): tog 'phreng // ldan pa'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri// de ni nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang 'dra ba// rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba'i// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri
40b6(rgyud): dbus cho ga bzhin du ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// blugs sam yang na byas pa 'am// brdungs sam yang na bris pa yis// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba'i 'od zer dmar pos
40b7(rgyud): khyab/ sangs rgyas 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// sku la chen gyis yang dag byugs// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas
41a1(rgyud): spyid khar rnam par dgod par bya// de yi logs ni thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po rnabs bris te/ tshon nam yang na rdul rnon gyis// go ma ji bzhin
41a2(rgyud): bar bya// mdun du sku mdog dmar po ni// rdo rje mtshon cha la brtson pa// g.yas su dag pa'i dkar po ste// legs par 'khyud pa'i rdo rje can// rgyab tu sku mdog ser po ste// chu srin gyi
41a3(rgyud): ni rgyal mtshan 'dzin// g.yon du sku mdog sngon po ste// phyag gnyis bsnyems pa 'dzin la sogs// mchod pa'i snod rnams 'dzin pa'o// mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// sgeg mo
41a4(rgyud): bzhad ma glu ma dang // dkar mo lha yi bu mo'i tshegs// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // rdo rje lcags sgrog dril bu bsnams// sgo ni bzhi po rnams la ni// sgo srungs bzhi po dgod par bya//
41a5(rgyud): de nas de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin te/ hUM badz+ra driSh+Ti sa mA ke maT/ hUM badz+ra kI li kI la ye hUM/ hUM sma ra badz+ra bai d+ha hUM/ hUM tuSh+Ta badz+ra Ni hUM/ rdo rje bran no// de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni/ hUM ma
41a6(rgyud): d+hu ra badz+ri hUM/ hUM badz+ra me g+he hUM/ hUM shA rad badz+ra hUM/ hUM badz+ra shi shi ri hU~M/ de nas lha'i bu mo rnams kyi ni/ hU~M badz+ra lA s+ye/ ma hA ba ra badz+re ni/ oM badz+ri gI te badz+ra/ oM nri Ne badz+ra/ de nas sgo srungs rnams kyi nidza
41a7(rgyud): aM ku sha pra ti ha ra/ hUM badz+ra pA sha ga na/ ba~M badz+ra sweT dra ha/ a badz+ra g+ha Ta ts+tshe da/ de ltar lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ bud med grags pa nyid ni dgod// bkod na de dag rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs
41b1(rgyud): panyid 'grub padin byas na po 'dzig kyil lakho na du zhes byas nas/ khrum du nga me dang / maldan la sogs pan gyis marjod/ dril drugags pa'i dang
41b2(rgyud): mtshams rnams su ni gzhag par bya// lcug ma dang dus bum pa rnams// sgo yi phyi rol dag tu gzhag/ rdo rje dang bcus gzhi dang bcas// bcug myi yongs su bzlas nas ni/
41b3(rgyud): chus gang ba'i bum pa ste// phyag na rdzo'i mdun gzhag bya// de la 'di ltar bde bachen po'i dam tshig gi 'dud rtse'i tshwa byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni/ e ma phras kha badz+ras pra ya/ a
41b4(rgyud): khe ka dzaHhUM baM hoH/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brla'o// chu 'di gtor ba 'am 'thungs na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu byang ba dang / bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba yon no// de nas
41b5(rgyud): rang gi dam tshig rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o// dzaHhUM ba hoHzhes brjod nas/ dgug pa dang / gzhugs pa dang / bcings nas skad cig gis dbang du 'gyur ro//
41b6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag ste// de bzhin g.yas su mdzub lcags kyus// dgug pa 'di ni lan cig gis// 'grub par rab tu gzhug par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra sa tra/ a a hi
41b7(rgyud): shri glai su kha badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra pra ru sma ra pra b+hU ta sa ma ya sI hrid yaM/ su toSh+yo me b+ha wa/ mu po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga bAM a na hi nad na sed sbyi hu me man+t+ra
42a1(rgyud): #pa de/ dzaHhUM baM ho// de nas rtag tu bcom ldan 'das// dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid byin// dgug cing bcug nas brtan pa dang // dbang du 'gyur zhing 'grub pa yin// rmad du/
42a2(rgyud): byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul du ma rnams mthong ba 'am/ yang na bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis slob dpon ni phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa/ dam
42a3(rgyud): tshig thams cad shes pa/ las thams cad nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// 'jug pa'i cho ga 'di yis rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid ji snyed pa'i dris byugs shing
42a4(rgyud): bsgos pa rgyan dang bcas pa'i me tog gi 'phreng bas lus shin tu brgyan pa/ gos dmar po gnyis bgos pas rang nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsnyems
42a5(rgyud): pas rang nyid 'jug par bya'o// bstod pa ni drug ldan la sogs pa glu yis bya'o// 'dod chags la sogs bde kun yid khyod ni// kun tu bdag la bde ba la stsol cig/ rdo rje sems
42a6(rgyud): dgos byung du bdage bslong mjed// bdag kyis mdzod dang bde mchog grub la 'dud// de nas rab tu zhugs nas dgangs su gsol bar bye ma// zags bya myod pa'i sems dpa' sa/
42a7(rgyud): rjes ses pa 'a'ad ni// kun tu bang po kyad yinate/ rnams padag kyab bdag pa// sems kyi sems dpa tshong 'dzir// de bzhi rdo rdo 'dzis// thams
42b1(rgyud): tshig dngos grub can// rdo rje sems bdag de grub mdzod// de nas bcom ldan de nyid kyis// rdo rje slob dpon byin brlabs gyur// de sngar ma byung ba'i so so rang rig pa'i bde ba gnyis ka sa rtse/
42b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// phra mo dbab par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das grub par gyur to zhes shes par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du 'dug la ci 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas de bzhi na
42b3(rgyud): 'dug la rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'dod pa'i ngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te sems dpa' chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing mthong bar 'gyur ro//
42b4(rgyud): de rnams kyis kyang de la dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad do// phyag rgya thams cad kyang bdag rang nyid kyis bcings na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad kyang 'di
42b5(rgyud): la bstan par 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'dod pa'i las rnams kyang byed pa yin no// bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad nyams su myong zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang mi sod pas lo gcig 'das nas
42b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin no// de nas sems can thams cad zhugs pa'i don du brtag par bya ba yin no// rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid snga ma bzhin du lus
42b7(rgyud): la brgyan nas rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bcug ste/ de bzhin du de le na nyid chen po bskul bas yang dag par bskul la dgug pa'i bya ba 'di skad ces brjod do// srid pa'i
43a1(rgyud): bde ba rnam dag phyir// sngar gyi srid pa la khyod dga'// 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub che// 'gro ba kun la'ang 'grub par gyis// de nas mchod pa byas la/ rang gi lhag
43a2(rgyud): pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i dam tshig phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa gzhug par bya ste/ bcug nas rna bar 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// chags bral nyid kyis 'dul bar gyur// 'dod chags chen po
43a3(rgyud): bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi// sdug bsngal gzhan ni rang bzhin med// de bas sems can chags bral la// slar yang yid ni ma byed/
43a4(rgyud): cig/ de nas me tog la sogs pa snying po 'dis 'dor du gzhug go// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra sa twa pra ti gr-ihA sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gang du babs pa de ni de'i lha yin no// de nas de kho na nyid
43a5(rgyud): chen por brjod par bya'o// gang 'dod pa'i snying po byin la sgrub tu bcug la rang nyid lhag pa'i lha dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de'i mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su byin te/ de'i rigs kyi
43a6(rgyud): ming gi dbang bskur la snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma ko&haM/ badz+ra d+ha ra sa mu khaM b+ha a b+hi khe tAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi grih+Na sid+d+hi badz+ra te a mo g+ha sid+d+hi s+t+waM/ de nas
43a7(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa bslab par bya'o// de nas ci 'dod pa'i mchod pa byas shing byed du bcug nas ci 'dod pa bza' ba dang btung bas slob ma rnams tshim par byas la phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i
43b1(rgyud): lan dang gar dang rgod pa byed du bcug cing rang nyid kyis kyang bya'o// de nas thams cad bslad nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ thog mtha' rgyu yi 'gro ba 'di// dga' bas mchog la rag lus/
43b2(rgyud): te/ sems dpa' chen po rdo rjer 'gyur// slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol// dri nas snyim pa'i me tog dor nas dbyung bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor yang rang nyid kyis phyag la rdul
43b3(rgyud): tshon de dag gi ril bu byas la bzhag na las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i tshul de'ang badrug na tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las thams
43b4(rgyud): cad dgongs pa yin no// de nyid kyis dbang bskur na'ang dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa dang mchog gi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gal te sku bri ba'i ri mo mkhan ma rnyed
43b5(rgyud): na rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gal te de'ang mi shes na phyag mtshan gzhag par bya'o// phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas
43b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das don yod pa thogs pa med pa myur du 'grub pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rdo rje 'chang chen
43b7(rgyud): bos 'di gsungs so// bde ba chen po rab bsgrubs dang // 'dod pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa ni// rtag par myur du bshad par bya// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas
44a1(rgyud): su ni// de srid sems can gnon par bya// mya ngan 'das pa byang chub sgrig/ de nyid kyi ni dam tshig rnams// ji srid pa la gnas pa ni// de srid sems can don nyid byir//
44a2(rgyud): thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos bya// ji ltar sems can kun gyis don// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa// de phyir sbyin tshegs pha rol phyin// byang chub spyod pa mchog gi min//
44a3(rgyud): de babazhin gshegs ni 'dul min la// sems can kun rnams don mdzad pa// 'di ni dngos grub rab sgrub na// dus kun tu ni thams cad mdzad// de nas sgrub pa 'di bya ste/
44a4(rgyud): dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yin// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu brtag pa'i dngos grub thob// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs kyang // dam tshig rnam par spangs pa 'am//
44a5(rgyud): bsod nams med kyang thams cad du// srid pa 'di la myur du 'grub// gal te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na// rtag tu yul dang ldan gyur na// gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas ni//
44a6(rgyud): rang rang phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu// chags pa kun kyang phyir 'dod par// bzlas pa'i don ni ci nus pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya/
44a7(rgyud): 'di yis 'dod pa'i kun dbang phyug/ ci 'dod 'ong ngo mkha' la rgyu// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub// rga shi med cing gtso bor 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas la// rang
44b1(rgyud): gzhan kun gyis bsnyen dkur zhing // rdo rje 'chang chen dang mtshungs shing // don yod kun spyod pa yin no// bde ba chen po rdo rje grub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos
44b2(rgyud): grub thams cad rab tu ster ba'i rdo rje 'chang byang chub sems dpa' yin na/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
44b3(rgyud): gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa ras ris la bri bar bya'o// bzhad pa dang bcas pa dngos po thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
44b4(rgyud): kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas/ rdo rje tshig gis stong phrag brgya bzlas par bya// 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan byed
44b5(rgyud): na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pas bcom par bya'o// de nas the rangs kyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid dang byang/
44b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod na des lugs sam// 'dus byas pa 'am brdungs pa 'am/ ras ris la sogs par legs par
44b7(rgyud): bris pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du sngar grub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par ji ltar thob pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa bshad do// zla ba drug gi rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub chen po
45a1(rgyud): 'grub bo// gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po dgug na bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyus dgug cing ci 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// zla ba gcig bzlas nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o//
45a2(rgyud): gal te rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid 'grub na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms pas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes bsgoms la bsgrub par bya'o// de ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i
45a3(rgyud): bzlas pas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o// yang dang yang du sgom zhing bzlas pa de srid bdag gis bya'o// ji srid rdo rje 'chang nyid zla ba phyed bzlas nas thob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'dod pa thams
45a4(rgyud): cad kyi dbang phyug bsgrub par 'dod na/ de bzhin du rang yid du 'ong ba dang bcas par rab tu zhugs te phyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par bya'o// ji srid bdag 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang phyug dang
45a5(rgyud): khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i rdo rje'i rgyun gyi rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes
45a6(rgyud): rnam par rol par mdzad nas ma bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgya'i las kyi rgyun rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs so// ma bsgrubs pa'i snying po'i las rnams 'di lta ste/ bdag nyid srung ba ni bde ba chen
45a7(rgyud): po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis so// thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mdzod spus so// phyogs thams cad dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni bde ba chenapo
45b1(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas so// bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba mi bskyod pas so// tshe 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bdud dris so//
45b2(rgyud): gzugs chen po phun sum tshogs pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gzugs can gyis so// gzi brjid dang na tshod shin tu bzang por rab tu 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bcud
45b3(rgyud): kyis len gyis so// stobs dang mdog 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mthu yis so// dbang bskur ba thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i cod pan gyis so// nor thams cad
45b4(rgyud): thob par bya ba ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug gis so// rnal srid thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas so// sa ma lus pa thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rtsal gyis so// thams cad
45b5(rgyud): dbab pa dang / g.yo bar byas pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dus gsum bden pa nyid du smrar gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug pas so// pra se na thams/
45b6(rgyud): cad grub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pra se na dbang pas so// gdon thams cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rengs pas so// thams cad gnyid log par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnyid kyis so//
45b7(rgyud): thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro mas so// thams cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba mthar byed kyis so// thams cad bskyal ba la ni rdorje
46a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i hUM mdzad kyis so// thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis bslang ba'o// thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba bcing bas so// thams cad
46a2(rgyud): thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge mus so// 'phra men ma thams cad las thar par bya ba la dang po sngon gyi gnas skabs rjes su sbyin pa la ni gsang ba chen po he ru ka'i rdo rjes so// ma mo
46a3(rgyud): gdon thams cad las thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i drag mos so// 'phra men ma thams cad kyis rgyas btab pa la dang / thar par bya ba la dang / snying zos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar 'jug pa
46a4(rgyud): dang / shi ba gse ba la ni dmachog chen po gsang ba'i he ru ka'i rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas so// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhog pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rjes so// rims thams cad zhib
46a5(rgyud): la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so// dug thams cad gzhog pa dang / bza' ba dang / 'bab pa dang / 'chi ba gso ba la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyas so// dug thams cad
46a6(rgyud): dang / sbyar ba'i dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i drug med pas so// gshed byed thams cad dang / byad dang / ro langs dang / byur dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi gzhig pa
46a7(rgyud): la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// rtsod pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal rab tu gdangs pas so// yams dang / 'tshe/
46b1(rgyud): ba thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngarab gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhi bas so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang rmongs par bya dang
46b2(rgyud): lkugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bsad pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gshed byed kyis so// 'thab mo thams cad las rgyal ba thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dpung rgyun/
46b3(rgyud): gyis so// gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje legs pas so// bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thabs sbyor gyis so// dgra po thams cad rnam par gzhig
46b4(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'thor bas so// bdud kyi stobs thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rab tu 'dul bas so// sprin bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin chen pos so// char dbab
46b5(rgyud): pa la ni lang ba'i sdigs mdzub kyis so// thog dpapa dang / klog dang / rlung dang / char zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i smon srung gis so// sprin dang / mun pa dang / khug rngu zhipa bya ba la ni rdo rje
46b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i sgrar gyis so// klu thams dkrug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams cad dbang du bya ba li ni gsang ba thams cad kyi nir bu'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams ca
46b7(rgyud): rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'dul bas so// klu thams cad 'byin pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'don pas so// sa ma lus pa g.yo zhing 'gul bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i thar pas so//
47a1(rgyud): chu med par chu'i phung po char bsil zhing dri ma med par bskyed pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so// mun par nyi ma'i snang ba chen po bskyed pa la ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag
47a2(rgyud): rgyas so// rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje rlung thams cad kyis so// nam mkha' la gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'dzin pas so// nam mkha' las dngos po thams
47a3(rgyud): cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'byung bas so// nam mkha' la rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po kun tu bstan par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis so// nam mkha' la de bzhin
47a4(rgyud): gshegs pa dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'phrul pas so// nam mkha'i
47a5(rgyud): shing thams cad lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dus kyi phyag rgyas so// sa'i cha thams cad la 'bras bu'i cha thams cad smin par 'gyur ba la ni rdo rjegs/
47a6(rgyud): ba'i gshel gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad lha'i kha zas dang / bzung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / gnas gsar pa dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'byung ba dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bran pa dang / dran
47a7(rgyud): mo thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bsod nams kyi chu bos so// g.yul du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bstan te g.yul 'gyed pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i sdom pas so//
47b1(rgyud): sgrub thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje bde mchog gis so// bde mchog gi bya ba thams cad la ni rdo rje sgyu ma'i bya bas so// rgyud du byung ba dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul
47b2(rgyud): gyi rnam par 'phrul pas so// lan thams cad gdab par bya ba la ni rdo rje ldan bstan pas so// me rangs par bya ba la ni rdo rje shin tu grang bas so// chu 'bab par bya ba la ni rdo rje zla ba'i chu shel gyis
47b3(rgyud): so// dgon pa dang / grong dang / nags dang / chu bo dang / rdzing bu dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zas dang / skom dang / gtsug lag khang sprul pa la ni rdo rje grub pas so// chu'i steng du gzhag pa dang ka bdag
47b4(rgyud): nyid gzugs mang po'i dngos po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgyas so// lha la sogs pa thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba
47b5(rgyud): la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' bsgo bas so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang gis so// mi rgyu ba thams cad drang ba dang / dbab pa dang / bden par smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje
47b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i dngos grub chen po'i phyag rgyas so// gzugs brnyan thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dgod par bya ba dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / kun tu rol par bya ba dang / bsgo ba zam
47b7(rgyud): cad byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad khyer te 'ong ba dang / las thams cad byed du gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig sgrub pas so// thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni bde ba
48a1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje yid las byung bas so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rtser gzhug pa la ni rdo rje ki li ki la'i gsang bas so// thams cad brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgyas
48a2(rgyud): so// thams cad dang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje bsnyems pas so// rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa la ni rdo rje ngag gis so// gzhan dag gis rang 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bya ba la ni rdo rje lam mthong bas so//
48a3(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sreg blugs kyis so// rmi lam bzang ba thams cad sgrub pa brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje rmi lam grub pas so// dung gdod pa thabs cad bsal ba la ni rdorje
48a4(rgyud): sman gyis so// rims thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje dUr bas so// dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan 'gro thams cad gzhig pa/
48a5(rgyud): la ni rdo rje sdig pa dral bas so// sku thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sku mchog gis so// gsung thams cad sgrub pa la ni rang gi lce 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dngos po thams
48a6(rgyud): cad bden par ston pa'i rdo rje gsang ba'i ljags kyi mchog gis so// thugs thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje thugs thams cad bskyed pas so// rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ni rab tu dag pa'i rdo rjes so//
48a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen pos so// thams cad dam tshig thams cad/
48b1(rgyud): sgrub pa la ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// las thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pas so// dngos grub thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i grub pas so// phun sum tshogs pa/
48b2(rgyud): thams cad la ni rdo rje lhung ba las gdon pa'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad kyi mchod pa bya ba nyid la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gar gyis so//
48b3(rgyud): rje thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes so// sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa las rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
48b4(rgyud): dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i mchog gi bde ba chen pos so// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dngos grub dam pa la ni bde ba chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i/
48b5(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig gi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa
48b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i chos can rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
48b7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas nyid// dam pa'i rigs
49a1(rgyud): ni bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bde ba chen po mi phyed pa'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
49a2(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang // thugs rdo rje rdo rje thams cad la rab tu zhugs nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid mnyam par spros nas// bde ba chen po rdo rje phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di gsungs so// oM d+haMHde nas 'di ni gsungs
49a3(rgyud): tsam gyis// rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur te// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// kun nas 'dus shing bstan par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad 'grub phyir kun nas bzhugs// bzhad
49a4(rgyud): pa chen po'i khyad par gyis// rmad byung chen po rab tu bzhad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin du rdo rje la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje gsang
49a5(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// ji ltar chos kyi bri nas ni// rgyal ba g.yon du bsnyems 'dzin pa// dam tshig mchog gi mchog bkod nas// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod do// de bzhin
49a6(rgyud): gshegs pa sras dang bcas// rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs gzung // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// me tog la sogs spyir thal sbyar// de la 'jug la sogs pa yi// cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad
49a7(rgyud): par ni 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje glu 'dis 'jug par bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa yis// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glur
49b1(rgyud): blangs pas// rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas rab tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gzungs bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM badz+ra/
49b2(rgyud): d+hA ra su ra ma hA su khe sar+b+ba ha ra rma pa ma ta ya/ sar+b+ba ta tha ga ta dz+nyA na ma mu drA pa daiHdzaHhUM baM hoHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzin pa dang bcas pa yang dag par byon par 'gyur ro// yid bde ba la sogs
49b3(rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma 'byung ngo // cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong ba yin no// de nas cho ga rgyas pa dang / sgrub pa dang / yid kyi 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du dam pa
49b4(rgyud): 'grub pa yin no// de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma bsgrubs par lan cig bzlas pas las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad srung ba la ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba
49b5(rgyud): la ni rdo rje mdzod spus so// chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje chos nyid kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje mchod pas so// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro/
49b6(rgyud): bos so// byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus par rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje spyod pa'i phyag rgyas so// bdud thams cad gzhom pa la ni bdud thams cad 'joms par byed pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
49b7(rgyud): nyid du bya ba la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das da
50a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje chen po thabs bde ba chen po'i khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
50a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// rang gi sprul/
50a3(rgyud): mdzod rdo rje 'dzin// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so// hUM rak+Sha dz+wa la mA le pra ti la /
50a4(rgyud): ag+ni pra bi ta te/ ma hA su ra ta badz+ra kro d+ha dzaHhUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsung ba tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje las kun nas 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba'i snying po can smin ma 'gyur zhing khro gnyer bsdus pa
50a5(rgyud): sma ra ser zhing spyan 'bar pa/ rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pas mchu'i sgros rnam par gnon pa'i zhal mnga' ba// dbu skra gyen du 'bar ba// rdo rje dang gzhu la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor
50a6(rgyud): chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khams gsum pa'i gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad nas/ rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig
50a7(rgyud): gdab phyir// de la dang po khros pa gzhag/ su ra tod b+ha ba hUM zhes zlos// ut+pal sngon po'i 'od 'bar ba// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ mche ba cung zad gzigs pa'i zhal// khro dang bcas pa bzhad
50b1(rgyud): ba'i zhal// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// thams cad du ni khro bo bri// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya chen pos dang por slob
50b2(rgyud): dpon gyis 'jug par bya ste/ slob ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// slob dpon zhugs nas khros pas lcags kyu de nyid kyis dgug par bya'o// hUM su ra ta badz+ra krod+ha/ a ya te/ ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dza/ sarba badz+ra ku la ne/
50b3(rgyud): trapra ba sha ya hUM/ sar+b+ba mu drA ga Na baN+Da ya baM/ sarba ma yaM bi sha ku ru ho/ sarba ka rma Ne tra satwa ya a/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pa byon zhing grub pa yin no// slob dpon dang slob ma rnamal/
50b4(rgyud): dgyes pa dang / khro bo 'bab pa'i mtshan yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang cung zad 'byung ba yin na de grub pa dang / dngos grub dang / cho ga rgyas pa'ang de bzhin du'o// gal te ma grub na lan cig bzla'o//
50b5(rgyud): khams gsum pa ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so// sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang bas so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba la
50b6(rgyud): ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal po'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhig pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang /
50b7(rgyud): rgyas gdab pa dang / bsgyel ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje khro bos so// thams cad lhung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje khro mo'i khro bos so// thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'beb pa'i khro bos so// thams cad nges
51a1(rgyud): par gnon pa la ni rdo rje gad rgyangs kyis so// las thams cad nye bar dgod pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bos so// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba las/ rab tu dga' ba las
51a2(rgyud): byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa
51a3(rgyud): med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // 'dod
51a4(rgyud): chags chen po rnam dag phyir// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// mchog chen khyod kyis bskyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams cad la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par
51a5(rgyud): gnon par mdzad nas// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM grI baM hoH'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas pad+ma'i mdog gi mdangs can zla ba'i dkyil
51a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi 'od lta bu pad+ma'i mdangs la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / ral pa'i cod pan dang / na bza' dmar po 'chang ba dang / pad+ma chen po'i sems dpa' rnams byung
51a7(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas rdo rje g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje bsnyems pas skyil mo krung gis bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor ni
51b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad thig gdab bo// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag/ pad+ma'i mtshan ma'i tshogs rnams bri// de nas rdo rje pad+mas zhugs la mdzub mo'i lcags kyu/
51b2(rgyud): gnyis kyis dgug par bya'o// oM hri baM hoHoM hriHma hA su kha badz+ra a lo ke shwa rA ya ma/ A A he pra be shi d+ha d+hi me b+ha ba sid+d+hi m+be ra mu drA pa deHdzaHhUM baM hoHde nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon
51b3(rgyud): te mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang / sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs kyang lan cig bzlas pas/
51b4(rgyud): las thams cad byed do// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba la ni pad+ma chen pos so// thams cad srung ba la ni pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis so// thams cad rjes su chags pa la ni pad+ma la blta bas so// thams cad dag pa'i
51b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni pad+ma kha 'byed pas so// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po 'dod chags kyis so// skyes pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po'i dbang phyug gis so// rmi lam gdab
51b6(rgyud): pa la ni pad+ma chen po dmar pos so// bcom ldan 'das kyi mchog thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa med pas so// bde ba chen po pad+ma gsang ba las/ bde ba chen po pad+ma'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o//
51b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang drug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba
52a1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// dade ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// nor bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni// mgrin
52a2(rgyud): sbyor phyir ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes
52a3(rgyud): bya ba'i rigs sngags 'di gsungs so// oM li ti d+ha b+harbA Ta te traM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po che rab tu phyung nas phyag g.yon
52a4(rgyud): pa la rab tu gnas so// nor bu rin po che dag pa de'ang mar gang rnyog pa med pa'i mdog can rdo rje rin po che rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba can/ nor bu rin po che'i mda' la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
52a5(rgyud): yongs su bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bya// rdo rje rin chen bdag
52a6(rgyud): po gzhag/ nor bu'i rigs ni chen po bri// rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas zhugs te/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje lcags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra bi b+hU te ra
52a7(rgyud): b+ha ga bI daM A kaR+Sha ya gi ra ba~M sarba ta thA ga ta a gr-i sa tra sa ma ba na nA ma b+hai ra ma tra be traM pa Ta Da swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu thams cad dang bcas pa byon pa yin/
52b1(rgyud): no// spyi bo nas spu ldang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya'o// de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste cho ga rgyas pa thams/
52b2(rgyud): cad de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan cig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che myu gus so// don thams cad thob pa la ni
52b3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mos so// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje ra bu chen po'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgyas so// gter chen po thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi sa 'og
52b4(rgyud): gi phyag rgyas so// rdo rje dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i 'phreng bas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i 'phreng bas so// de bzhin gshegs
52b5(rgyud): pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dam pa'i 'phreng bas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog
52b6(rgyud): gi rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyi 'phreng bas so// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba las/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas bcom
52b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rigs thams cad bsdus pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes thob pas sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i 'khor lo rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
53a1(rgyud): thog ma tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub pa// chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// bde ba chen po don gyi phyir/
53a2(rgyud): 'gro rnams ci bder bzhugs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad pas rnam par rgyal ba 'gro ba kun 'dul ba/ dam tshig thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba rdo rje 'chang chen po ston
53a3(rgyud): pa po/ sgrub pa po/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa// thogs pa med pa thams cad la rjes su ston pas don yod par grub pa dam tshig rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po
53a4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i don yod pa mtshungs pa med pa'i thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// hoHAHhUMHhrIHtrAM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
53a5(rgyud): la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rtem pa 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der yang dag par gnas te/ dkyil 'khor gcig nyid du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos sems
53a6(rgyud): can thams cad rjes su gzhug pa bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gsang ba gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu bri// dkyil 'khor chen po dang por
53a7(rgyud): ni// de yi dbus su brtag par bya// de yi dbus su rigs rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// phyi yi mtshams kyi mtha' ma ru// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri// sgo
53b1(rgyud): rnams kun tu 'jug par ni// rang gi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga sdud cing // rdo rje shugs kyis 'jug par bya// cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang kadangos grub thams cad/
53b2(rgyud): dang / las thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas lha la sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad bcom ldan 'das las rang rang gi rjes su gnang ba mnos nas/ sems can thams cad
53b3(rgyud): la bde ba'i don yod pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i zhabs la phyag byas nas rang rang gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di rnams phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gsum pos gsol pa/ oM b+hU tAM ka re
53b4(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// de yi dbus su dngos grub phyir// gzhu yi se ral kar ldan zhing // mda' dang tsa sha ga thogs bri/
53b5(rgyud): sbrang rtser byed dang rgyal bar byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa po// rtse gsum mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yis// pus mo lha nga btsugs byas te// zhugs nas dam tshig bcings nas ni// yang dag dgug
53b6(rgyud): pa nyid du byas// oM d+hA ra b+hu ba swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad kun gyis yongs bskor ba// dngos grub kur sngon 'odra pa la// ji ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin// slob dpon gyi
53b7(rgyud): ni 'jug pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// dam tshig mchog ni de nyid dang // gsang ba'i de nyid brjod par bya// gal te ma brtags ma smras dang // 'on te 'di skad bshad pa'i chos
54a1(rgyud): 'dir ni kun tu ma spyad na// rtse gsum gyis ni khyod snying 'joms// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// ming po gsum po 'di dag ste/
54a2(rgyud): nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// gang zhig 'di dag la brnyas pas// yang dang yang du rab bzhugs nas// dkyil 'khor mchod pa byed pa de// dngos grub thams cad thob pa ni//
54a3(rgyud): phyag rgya dag kyang bstan byas nas// de yis gar gyi mchod pa bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i lha mo rnams kyis rang gi phyag
54a4(rgyud): rgya phul lo// hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bya ba ni// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// thig bzhi dang de yang dag ldan// ka ba chen po bzhi dang bcas// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par mdzes/
54a5(rgyud): de yi dbus su de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor bzhi po bri bar bya// sgo ru mngon phyogs bzhi pa ni// snying po dang bcas gzhag par bya// dga' mo lag na mtshon cha thogs// dngos grub bya ba bsnyems
54a6(rgyud): dang bcas// de nas dang po dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin kun nas 'jug par bya// sring mo rang gi phyag rgya yis// go rims ji bzhin 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas 'jug pa la sogs kyis/
54a7(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du mchod byas nas// gsang ba de nyid rab grub pas// dgug pa yang dag bya ba yin// oM kA li ma nir de pro ta la/ me d+hu rak+Sha sa~M pa ra s+thA ma ya he ba ho ba// ba ra he did+ye s+thA ma ya swAn
54b1(rgyud): sid+d+hi ke sid+d+hi s+thA ma a he/ phyag rgya 'di rnams kyis so// hriHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ de nas thams cad 'bab par 'gyur ro// babs nas gzhug par bya'o// de nas de bzhin phyag rgya bcings pa bslabs/
54b2(rgyud): la mna' bsgrags nas gsang ba brjod par bya'o// sems can don la gang zhugs pa// gang du dkyil 'khor ston pa rnams// gal te gsang ba mi srung na// khyod kyis de dag gsang ba
54b3(rgyud): yin/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // de bzhin zas dang skom dang ro// chos kyis brten pas bde ba dang // chos min pas ni sdug bsngal te// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis//
54b4(rgyud): ci 'dod par ni mchod par bya// ji snyed pa dang ci 'dod bzhin// yul rnams la ni brten par bya// de nas lha ma yin thams cad kyis rang gi snying po phul lo// oM sarba ma hA tsa kr-i pra brda ya
54b5(rgyud): daR+sha ya baM hUM phaT/ zur bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// khru gang tsam du brkos byas nas// gyen du kha bltas sgo bri bar// bde mchog la sogs bri bar bya// 'khor lo rab tu zhugs byas la/
54b6(rgyud): yang dag dgug par dgug par bya// me tog la sogs gtor bar bya// sha la sogs pa'i gtor ma byas// oM biSh+Nu tsakra A na ya/ sha brtsi ma tsi ta tra su ra a d+hi pa he sho haM/ sar+b+ba mA yA g+hA taM d+ha pa
54b7(rgyud): me sid d+h+ya hA hA swA hA/ de nas yid kyi 'dod pa'i sgyu ma thams cad grub pa yin no// slob ma gzhug pa'ang de bzhin du bya'o// de nas klu rigs bzhis snying po phul lo// phuHde nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni//
55a1(rgyud): zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbrul gyi thig gis kun tu bri// klu yi gdengs ka'i btsun mos 'khyud// mtshams kyi char ni mjug rtse 'dud// de yi dbus su sa 'dzin pa// klu yi
55a2(rgyud): rgyal po she Sha bri// she rab can gyis klu chen gyi// rigs rnams thams cad bri bar bya// de nas sa 'dzin shugs kyis ni// khros shing drug pas 'jug par bya// dkyil 'khor der ni rab zhugs nas//
55a3(rgyud): gdengs ka'i phyag rgya dgug par bya// oM hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga pri thi b+hin+da d+ha ra She Sha Na/ A ya hriHphu sarba nA ga ku la a na ya hUM phu/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phu/ sar+b+baM swa d+hA ya phuHpuHphuHphuH/ de nas klu
55a4(rgyud): thams cad phu zhes bya ba zlos shing dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas babs par 'gyur zhing 'thob bo// de nas slob dpon gyis ri mo'i phyag rgyas dug med par bya'o// de nas brtsams te thams cad zos na'ang
55a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi bzhin du 'ju bar byed do// 'di rnams lhan cig tu gar byed pa dang / dug thams cad sreg pa dang / 'jig pa dang / za bar nus par 'gyur ro// de nas ci 'dod pa'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste
55a6(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum mo// gal te bden las 'das gyur na// 'chi ba'i 'jig rten 'di rtag nas// gal te dngos grub thob 'dod na// glo brnyas par
55a7(rgyud): yang mi bya zhing // ser ba bzlog par mi bya'o// sbrul ni gang yang gsad mi bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las// bde ba chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga
55b1(rgyud): nus pa'o// / de nus rdo rje chen po ye// ri raba'i yi rtse mo ni// rdo rje rin chen 'od gsal ba// dri med gzi brjid mdzes pa la// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khrud kyis ni rnam par/
55b2(rgyud): mdzes// kha khyer rnams la gnas pa'o// rdo rje lha me tshogs kyi mchod// zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes// rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar bzangs kyis// ba dan dril bu'i sgra
55b3(rgyud): sgrogs pa// dra ba me long me tog gi/ 'phreng ba chen po btags pas brgyadan// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje kun gyi mngon 'dus byas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnas chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis nges
55b4(rgyud): bsten pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa mchog/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// nor bu chen po mchog ces bya// rdo rje chen po'i khang pa na// bde ba chen po bzhugs gnas yin/
55b5(rgyud): thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// brtan
55b6(rgyud): phyir sems dpar bshad pa yin// mnyam par gzhag pas ting 'dzin te// nges pa'i phyir ni rdo rjer 'gyur// sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis// slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur//
55b7(rgyud): nyid rtag pa bcom ldan 'das// byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'gro yin// rang sems so sor rtogs sogs na// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// bdud ni sangs rgyas rdo rje can// rdo rje 'chang chen de
56a1(rgyud): nyid yin// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// de nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs dam pa// de nyid 'dod chags bral ba yis/
56a2(rgyud): 'dod dang thar pa nyid yin te// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// mi g.yo thams cad mchog de nyid// brtan zhing snying po nor bu che// rgyub sems
56a3(rgyud): kyi 'du byed thabs// thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ byang chub sems dpa' bde rab stsol// sems dpa' skyil mo krung bcas nas// pad+ma'i lte
56a4(rgyud): bar zhugs pa yin// btsun mo'i tshogs bcas sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyis bskor// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// ma lus gdul bya'i don
56a5(rgyud): dang ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// bdag nyid la sogs sems dpa' che// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig chen po dam tshig rnams// rgyal bas kyang ni srung
56a6(rgyud): bar mdzad// snyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang // rdo rje bsnyems bcas yang dag ldan// phyag rgya thams cad rnam dag dang // rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dngos
56a7(rgyud): grub thams cad sgrub pa la// ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// snying po chen por dam pa yin// gang gi bsod nams mi ldan dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma lus zhugs// don yod thogs med/
56b1(rgyud): nyid mchog gi/ dngos grung thams cad rnyed mi dka'/ bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i mchog de dam chog bstan/ dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin// rtog pa thams cad myur 'grub byed
56b2(rgyud): thog mtha' med par dang po 'byung // bsod nams thams cad cher mthog/ gari can rnams dang bde mchog dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// rjes su chags pa sgom pa zhes// ji bzhin
56b3(rgyud): ye shes rab 'jug pa// nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskul thob bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsung tsam gyis// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams// nye bar 'dzin
56b4(rgyud): pa mdzad nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad bskyed par mdzad// sna tshogs 'gro ba kun bskyed nas// gtso bos dngos grub dris gyur pas// ji ltar skad cig gis 'di 'grub// sems dpa' chen po myur
56b5(rgyud): du spros// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni// thog mar dkyil 'khor byin rlabs ni// rdo rje kun mchog dam tshig ni// cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas ni// de la phan chad sems can 'byung /
56b6(rgyud): ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'gro ba// rtag par sdig pa kun spyod dang // ngan sems dang ni le lo can// da ni skye bo gsum gzigs nas// 'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyi gzigs// bcom ldan
56b7(rgyud): ji ltar bo na ni// byis pa dge ba kun tu bskyed// de rnams kyi ni tshig gsan nas// tshig ni 'di skad gsungs pa yin// rdo rje 'dzin kun byed pa pos// las kyi 'chi ba ltos gyur pa// da
57a1(rgyud): yi tshig de thos nas ni// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thugs rje chen pos 'di skad gsungs// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // shin tu chags pa rnam dag
57a2(rgyud): phyir// kun mchog cho ga rgyas pa yis// snying po 'di ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad stsol ba yin// rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che// rdo rje gsang ba dang po
57a3(rgyud): mchog/ gzhan yang snying po bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga che// sna tshogs phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas// dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed// 'jig rten thams cad khams chen po// phra
57a4(rgyud): rab rdul rnams dang mnyam pa// snying po chen po 'di nyid kyis// grub pa'i bden pa dam par 'gyur// de nas bde gshegs de rnams ni// de yi tshig mchog gsan gyur nas// dang po'i dkyil 'khor
57a5(rgyud): grub stsol ba// de tshe de la gsol ba btab// chags pa dang bral 'dul ba'i phyir// chags bral bstan pa bya ba 'am// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag phyir// nyid kyi thugs kyis chog
57a6(rgyud): gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i glu chen po gsung zhing dkyil 'khor brtag par mdzad do// thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu byung ba
57a7(rgyud): yin// rab tu dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen po// brtan mtho de ring bdag la myur 'grub mngon phyogs mdzod// ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor glu len cing brtags par mdzad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor
57b1(rgyud): ba yis// dang po'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// phyag na rdo rje thams cad du// rdo rje lha mo la sogs tshogs// ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni// brgyan par byas te rab 'jug bya// g.yon du bu mo rdo rje 'dzin/
57b2(rgyud): bsdus te rnal 'byor bca' bar bya// rdo rje dang bcas bstims pa yi// phyag rgya mchog gis rang nyid 'jug/ dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas kyang // lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya//
57b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i mdun 'dug ste// de nyid gsang ba'ang brjod par bya// hUM hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ dri D+ho me b+ha ba/ a d+hi ti/ Sh+Tha
57b4(rgyud): b+ha ga baM/ a na di ni d+he na swA hA/ ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa sa ma ya gu h+ya sa ma sid+d+hi m+me pra ya ts+tsha oM ha ha ha ha a/ de nas rab tu dga' bas rdo rje lha mo dga' ba'i gtam bya'o// oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti sa ma ya
57b5(rgyud): kaM maT/ badz+ra kI li kI li ha~M/ hUM s+pha ra badz+ra Ni bi d+ha hUM hUM tuSh+Ta badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du nye bar 'dug ste/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'grub par mdzod cig ces
57b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba brjod par bya'o// myur du thams cad rjes chags par// ki li ki las thams cad nus// thams cad rjes su chags dran dang // rtag tu legs par mnyes
57b7(rgyud): gyur bdag/ oM ma hA su kha sid+d+ha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/ sid+d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM sid+d+hi hU~M/ de nas chen po'i rdo rje chus dbang bskur zhing 'thungs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ste/ bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhes rang gi rtsa
58a1(rgyud): brjod pa la snga ma bzhin du gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa bya ste/ ji ltar rnyed pa'i yul dang ldan pas slob ma dang lhan cig mchod pa byas nas byung bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug par bya
58a2(rgyud): zhing rang nyid kyang der zhugs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje slob dpon thams cad phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po dam tshig thams cad shes pa thams cad la tshar
58a3(rgyud): gcod pa dang phan 'dogs par nus pa / dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las byed pa/ rang nyid 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis slob dpon ma yin pa dang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par
58a4(rgyud): skad cig nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi rlob par 'gyur ro// de tI'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid nges par rang nyid rang gi dam tshig gi rdo rje slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug par mdzad do//
58a5(rgyud): las thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par yang mdzad pa yin no// snying po 'di'i byin rlabs kyis dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na'ang dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa dang / thams cad kyi slob dpon
58a6(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// lan cig bzlas pas mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / thams cad du sna tshogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis mthong ba dang // thos pa dang / rig pa dang / shes pa yin no//
58a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad ma lus par mdzad nas/ dngos grub thams cad de la stsol ba yin no// yongs su sbyang ba dang rten pa'i don du ma yin no// bgegs/
58b1(rgyud): byed pa rnams kyang bsdug bsngal bar gyur pa ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang chen shin tu brtan zhing shin tu dgyes pa rjes sa chags pa shin tu rgyas pa dngos grub thams cad/
58b2(rgyud): dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad las thams cad gdon mi za ba'i grub pas myur du sgrub par mdzad pa yin no// 'on kyang gang gis dris sam/ 'drir 'jug gam lan
58b3(rgyud): cig brjod pa 'am/ 'dzin pa des ma bsgrubs shing dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na'ang tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad grub pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
58b4(rgyud): lta ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i bdag po'i bdag dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so// thams
58b5(rgyud): cad rjes su chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rjes su chags pa las byung ba yin no// 'dod pa brtan pas rjes su chags te/ de mi 'dod pa ji ltar mchog gi bde ba chen po la sogs
58b6(rgyud): pa'i go 'phang thams cad du 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar thogs pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos gsungs so// grub na bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje chags pas skad cig ster/
58b7(rgyud): grub pa'i dam tshig 'di yin te// 'di ni kun gyi 'da' bar dka'// sdig pa chen po byed pa 'am// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba// lan cig bzlas pas sdig sbyangs pas// mchog grub
59a1(rgyud): pas ni grub par 'gyur// rtog par gsungs pa 'am 'dod pa yis// gzugs brnyan rjes su dran bsgoms na// snying po yang na glegs bam du// thams cad nyid phyir bdag po
59a2(rgyud): grub/ gang la gzugs brnyan med pa dang // glegs bam med par 'gyur na yang // yi ge hUM ni thams cad du// bris te bdag sgrub bsgrub par bya// zhes bya ba don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa'i
59a3(rgyud): dngos grub can rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i// las kun sgrub par 'dod na ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad thog btab nas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya/
59a4(rgyud): dang po'i rdo rjes zhugs nas ni// brjod par bya ste/ chags pa che las thogs pa che// thogs pa che las bde ba che// bde ba che las rdo rje brtan// rdo rje las ni phyag rgya 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi
59a5(rgyud): rdorje yi// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya thams cad bshad pa ste// dam tshig 'dab bar dka' ba'o// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs//
59a6(rgyud): yang dag bsdus par gyur nas ni// mnyam pa'i 'jig rten grub par 'gyur// ji ltar rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yis// bka' ni 'da' bar dka' ba ste// de bzhin rgyal ba kun gyis ni// phyag
59a7(rgyud): rgya 'da' bar nus pa min// sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang // de ltar bskal pa bye ba yis// thob min ji ltar phyag rgya mchog/ bsdus pa tshe 'di nyid la thob// ji ltar gdul ba'i 'jig rten
59b1(rgyud): ni/ de bzhin dngos po gsungs pa yin// de yi thubs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub thams cad byed pa cho ga/ de bzhin cho ga rgyas pa dang // dngos grub thams cad gdon mi za'o// de nas dang
59b2(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor gyi// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di yin te// sor mo thams cad kun sbyar nas// rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do// sor mo nang du bcings pa las// rdo rje bsdams pa dag tu bshad//
59b3(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni// mdzub mo mthe bong yang dag sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni mthe bong ste// bcug ste btsir ba'i lcags kyu 'dzin// mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings pa nang du gnas/
59b4(rgyud): mthe bong bsnyems pa'i mtha' rdo rje// dang po'i bde ba dam pa ste// mtheb mdzub rtse sbyar dbus ma'i rtse// mig 'bras ltar sbyar 'dzin pa'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i 'og tu ni/ mthe bong
59b5(rgyud): gis mnan bitsi ra bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dren ma dang 'dren pa// srin lag mthe chung kha phye ba// bskor nas pus mor gzhag pa ni// dang po rdo rje las byung ba'o// gyen du gtor dang zur du blugs//
59b6(rgyud): mthe dong sbyar nas bskor ba dang // rab tu brkyang zhing byugs pa dang // bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang // bskor nas snying khar gzhag pa dang // yongs su bskor zhing dgod pa'o//
59b7(rgyud): las gyen du 'byung ba dang // de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba dang // mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyi dang // g.yon pa'i mdzub mo g.yas kyi gzung // mdzub mo'i mthe bong bcing ba dang // mthe bong
60a1(rgyud): mtha' ma'i nang du gzhag/ khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di rnams kho na'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba mchog tu gsang ba bla na med cing
60a2(rgyud): bla ma'i las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa'i bdag gis kyang gnon par mi nus so// de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i las rdo rje sen mo'i rtse mo
60a3(rgyud): mchu la sogs par gzhag pa dang / 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / rdo rje nor bu dang ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun tu byed pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
60a4(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / mchog gi dngos grub bo// rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig 'bras kyi las so// g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i mig gis bltas pas thams cad rjes su
60a5(rgyud): chags pas so// mig 'bras tshur 'dren pas ni dgug pa'o// gzhug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o// btsir bas 'ching ba'o// btsun pa med pas dbang du bya ba'o// rdo rje ki li ki li las
60a6(rgyud): dbus ma la dzum pa na dang / 'khyud pa dang / rol pa dang / dbus ma dang mthe bo'i rtse mor bde bar rdeg pas mthong ba dang / rol pa dang / btsir ba rnams kyis thams cad la rol pa ste/ chu
60a7(rgyud): bdang mi rUb thams cad du lha'i gzugs kyis bud med rnams 'byung ba yin no// ji srid 'di rnams dang rol cing rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo la'ang rol bar byed do// rdo rje chu srin mas btsir
60b1(rgyud): ba dang / gyen du bteg pa dang / myang ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / myur du za ba rnams kyis brtan pa'i chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chu'i nang du gnas pa
60b2(rgyud): dang 'chag pa dang / thams cad za ba grub pa'o// rdo rje bskor bas g.yo zhing g.yo ba dang / lhod par byed pa dang / btsir ba dang / dbus ma phan tshun lhan cig dgug pa dang / mgyogs
60b3(rgyud): par dbus ma'i rdo rje dral ba rnams kyis khro ba thams cad 'bar ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang / ltung ba dang // gsod pa rnams myur du 'grub bo// mthe bong rdo
60b4(rgyud): rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na rdo rje 'chang chen pos kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lha'i bu mo rnams kyis mthe bong rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i las rnams kyi lha'i
