88b7(rgyud): 'grub pa/ don yod par grub pa/ phyag rgya mchog tu grub pa'o// de nas dang po'i snying po ma bsgrubs pa'i thams cad don yod pa/ thogs pa med pa/ las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig
89a1(rgyud): grub pa rjes su bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i 'phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// don yod pa thogs pa med pa/
89a2(rgyud): bdag kyang bder gshegs lhan cig tu// las kyi rab 'byams 'di dag ni// dngos grub skad cig gis sgrub byed// 'di lta ste/ thams cad shin tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang
89a3(rgyud): zhi ba dang / bde legs su bya ba dang / tshe 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas so// dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dam
89a4(rgyud): tshig dang dngos grub btsong zhing srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen pos so// nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / slar zlos pa dang / rtag pa can dang / khyab 'jug gi rigs
89a5(rgyud): thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nad med pas so// gdung ba thams cad dang / gnod byed dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi sdug bsngal te/
89a6(rgyud): bar zhi ba'o// dug dang sbyar ba'i dug la sogs nye bar thar pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / bza' ba dang / bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug gis so// gdon thams cad dbab pa
89a7(rgyud): dang / bcing ba dang / dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / rab tu gdul ba dang / srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar pa'o// thams cad la bcing ba dang / thar pa dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba
89b1(rgyud): dang / ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / gdon las thar par bya ba dang / shi ba bslang ba dang / tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang
89b2(rgyud): shin tu srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis so// sgrib pa thams cad dang // sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / b+hur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so//
89b3(rgyud): thams cad dbab pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad bden par sbyar gzhug pa dang / pra se na thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas so//
89b4(rgyud): thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyi mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so// thams cad rengs par bya ba dang /
89b5(rgyud): rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / gsad pa dang / bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang / gzhig par bya ba dang /
89b6(rgyud): dbang du bya ba dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis so// khro bo thams cad bsal ba dang / bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang / rtsod pa las rgyal ba dang /
89b7(rgyud): 'jigs pa las thar pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so// sprin thams cad yang dag par gzung zhing mi g.yo
90a1(rgyud): bar bya ba dang / char chen po dbab pa dang / rlung dang // char dang / glog dang / ser ba bzlog pa dang / dro ba dang / grang ba bsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so//
90a2(rgyud): gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang /
90a3(rgyud): dbang du bya ba dang / rtse ba dang / las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so// lha thams cad dbab pa dang / klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang /
90a4(rgyud): 'byung po dang / ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog gis so// rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang /
90a5(rgyud): lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rtse ba dang // 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa
90a6(rgyud): la ni rdo rje gar gyi skye bu byed pa chen pos so// mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gnom pa dang // phyag rgya thams cad bcing /
90a7(rgyud): ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi rgyu myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i myur ba'i las/
90b1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// nyin re dang po lan cig ni// phyag rgyas thams cad rab sgrub byed// snying mchog lan cig bzlas
90b2(rgyud): nas ni// phyag rgya chen po rab grub bya// de yi rjes la nye snying po// las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas// dor yod grub pas las rnams ni// kun la shin tu grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya thams
90b3(rgyud): cad rab byin rlob// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// dkyil 'khor drag kyang mthong ba la// ma bshad pa la'ang rab grub 'gyur// rtog 'dir 'jig pa yod min te// 'khor lo med pa'i brgya byin la/
90b4(rgyud): gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas// rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin/ sdig pa chen po byed pa la'ang // bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya// 'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed// dngos grub
90b5(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o// // de nas ston
90b6(rgyud): pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'byin pa byed pa bde ba che// bde chen can du bstan phyir dang // sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med// kun gyi bdag nyid la
90b7(rgyud): zhugs te// mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs byung ngo // mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad// 'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas/
91a1(rgyud): de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang // 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs// sems can thams
91a2(rgyud): cad pa dag pas// rang rig las kyis dag ma gyur// de tshe sems can khams rnams ni// rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka' phyir// rang gi las ni sbyang don du// btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa
91a3(rgyud): yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems dpa' chen po bde ba che// byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas// skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul// sems can la phan bsod nams
91a4(rgyud): tshogs// byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag/ sems can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas// shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi
91a5(rgyud): rdo rje can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs// byang chub sems mchog khyod spros shig/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil
91a6(rgyud): 'khor chen po dam pa yin// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyi// 'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung // de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis// sems can thams cad yang dag
91a7(rgyud): bsgrubs// sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la// de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la// 'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs/
91b1(rgyud): pa'i rin po che// sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// yang dag spros te
91b2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM b+h+rUM khaM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni// byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs//
91b3(rgyud): nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa// sems can la ni bde don phyir// rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po
91b4(rgyud): dam pa ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri// 'khor lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid// 'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM// oM sid+d+ha mA/
91b5(rgyud): zhes brjod dgod// mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal// mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag bri// g.yas su byang chub sems dpa' yi// nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba// rgyab tu byang
91b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' dang // mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// g.yon du log par rnams dregs pa// sdig pa bsdus par 'byin pa'o// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po// badz+ra satwa/
91b7(rgyud): badz+ra rat+na/ badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satwa badz+ra/ badz+ra rat+ne/ badz+ra pad+me/ bi shwa badz+ra/ mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang // rin chen sdong bu nor bu bri'o// mtshams rnams
92a1(rgyud): su ni lha mo ste// lcags kyu la sogs sgo rnams su// de bzhin snga ma ji lta bar// 'khor lo de ni rtag par bya// mchod pa'i thal mo snying khar bcings// g.yon du de
92a2(rgyud): bzhin bskor bar bya// me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim// me tog bcas te snying khar bcing // bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// mgon la mgo bos/
92a3(rgyud): phyag byas la// skor ba lan gsum byas nas ni// zhugs nas me tog dor bar bya// shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba
92a4(rgyud): dang / dgug pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan na tAta/ de nas cho ga ji bzhin du// ston la me tog sil ma dor// sangs rgyas byang
92a5(rgyud): chub rang grub phyir// 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod// de yi kun nas sangs rgyas ni// thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad stsol
92a6(rgyud): bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog/ sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas de bzhin cho
92a7(rgyud): ga ni/ rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu zhugs// mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che// mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar bya// sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub kyang // cho ga ji bzhini rab bshad bya//
92b1(rgyud): ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs// rnam par rgyal ba mnyes par bri// sgrub 'di lan cig tsam gyis ni// de 'dra'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur// sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag/
92b2(rgyud): par// ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la// rdo rje'i tshig gi cho ga bzhin// bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na// ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad du// tshe mchog 'di la
92b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud ni/ phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na/
92b4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che// brtan par myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni// snying khar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la// bzlas
92b5(rgyud): brjod 'bum gyis bsgrubs nas ni// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab
92b6(rgyud): tu bskor// mtshungs med sems can don byas la// las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub
92b7(rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog/ las rnams rab 'byams dag pa ste// sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa// go rims bzhin du rab bshad
93a1(rgyud): bya// 'di lta ste/ nang thams cad dang / mya ngan dang / gnod pa dang / gnod byed dang / dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gshed byed dang / g.yeng byed/
93a2(rgyud): dang ro langs dang / sngags dang / sman dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba drang / rims drang / gdon dang / mkha' 'gro
93a3(rgyud): ma dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi sdug bsngal tha mas rnam par bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug
93a4(rgyud): bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so// tshe dang / lang tshe dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi byin chen po dang / mdangs dang / stobs dang / spro ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpal dang / skal pa
93a5(rgyud): bzang po dang / bsod nams dang / ming dang / snyan pa dang / grags pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / rtogs pa dang / stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phung po dang / 'du byed/
93a6(rgyud): dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs 'phel ba la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen pos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa/
93a7(rgyud): dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ye shes dang / stobs dang / thabs dang / rdo rje dang / sgrub pa dang / gzungs dang / sa dang / spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
93b1(rgyud): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / chos dang / las dang / sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang / sems can gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
93b2(rgyud): grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod
93b3(rgyud): pa rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i sa dang gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang ga mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / byang chub
93b4(rgyud): kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / 'jig
93b5(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / lha las babs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gdug pa tham sku 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba la rab tu gzhag pa dang / ngan 'gro
93b6(rgyud): thams cad las 'don pa dang / mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang / rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
93b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so// ji ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis// byang
94a1(rgyud): chub sems la mngon rten pa// de ltar byang chub spyod tshogs kyis// byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur// don yod bsod nams dam pa yis// las kyi rab 'byams
94a2(rgyud): sgrub byed pa// cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub// sangs rgyas chos ni rab sder byid// rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i// sems can kun la sbyin par bya// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa// skad
94a3(rgyud): cag gis ni sbyor bar byed// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i rdo rje rtog pa rgyas pa'o// de nas/
94a4(rgyud): sna tshogs las chen po// khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed cing // gang /
94a5(rgyud): phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'i// rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis// zhi bas sems can kun gyi don// gdul bar rab tu sgrub mi nus// sangs rgyas kun gyi bsgrub bya ba'i// 'gro ba 'di dag
94a6(rgyud): thams cad yin// gang tshe bder gshegs sems can don// dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa// de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun// gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab// sems can thams cad 'dul
94a7(rgyud): mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab// ud+hiSh+Tha sa ma ya kro d+ha ni sum+b+ha dz+wa la badz+ra hU~M/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las/
94b1(rgyud): slar byung nas ni mdun na gnas// khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis ni// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'od kyis gsal bas// sreg pa'i bskul pa bzhin 'dra/
94b2(rgyud): ba/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pa che// drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing // 'bar ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba// rnam par 'phros pas sreg pa yang // 'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni/
94b3(rgyud): bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra// dang po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas// rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa// de la rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar// 'bar ba zhes bya'i snying po 'di yin te// hUM Ta de nas
94b4(rgyud): 'dir gsungs tsam gyis// sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad// 'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rter gsum// thams cad g.yos shing 'dul bar 'gyur// lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni/
94b5(rgyud): g.yo ba med cing rmongs par 'gyur// rdo rje 'bar ba khrug pa kun// de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar 'gro// lha la sogs
94b6(rgyud): pa'i srid gsum kun// de tshe kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad// sems dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po// dam
94b7(rgyud): pa yang ni thugs su chud// de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa'i 'od// rdo rje mche ba gcig pa'i zhal// zhal ras khro dang bcas pa yis// g.yon brkyang bas
95a1(rgyud): ni legs par bzhugs// spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste// dbu skra gyen du brdzes shing g.yo// kun nas 'khyil cing 'bar ba che// rdo rje gsang ba'i rnal 'byor che/
95a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi yul can rnams// phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams// thams cad du ni 'bar ba 'khrug/ rlung bskyod bskal pa'i me ltar bur// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs/
95a3(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni ma lus na// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa// yang dag bzhugs pa legs bskul te// 'jig rten thams cad yongs su bskor// bkug nas sems can
95a4(rgyud): kun don dang // brtan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum dag de rnams dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// kun mchog lha yi dbang po ni// de rnams//
95a5(rgyud): la ni thugs rje yis// 'chi bar slar gso brtan por gsungs// oM ut+tiSh+Tha ma hA a d+hi pa ti badz+ri Ni shI g+h+raM ud thA pA ya hUM / rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad bslang bar bya'o// de nas sa gsum blang ba na/
95a6(rgyud): thams cad du ni shi ba gso// sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur cing // rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul// de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bas// 'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing // nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes/
95a7(rgyud): sna tshogs pa la bka' rab bsgo// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ 'di su zhig lags bcom ldan sku ni zhi ba la// gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs// khyed kyi dam tshig rtsi 'dra
95b1(rgyud): ga zhus pa bde ba'i tshig tu gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba// gdod skyes rdo rje gnod sbyin che// dkon mchog gsum pa de bzhin du/
95b2(rgyud): nga la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'di thos nas// tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas// bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi// 'bar ba'i mtshon gyis 'thab par
95b3(rgyud): brtsams// de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas rigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin shes ma yin// bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig/ gnod sbyin bsgo bas ci zhig bya/
95b4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas// khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gnas// de nas khrog nyer thams cad ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod// g.yon pa bsnyems pargya bcas pas// srin mo spyan
95b5(rgyud): bsdus pas rgod cing // nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni// rtag tu khros bcas pas smras so// de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying po sems can ma lus rgyal po la
95b6(rgyud): ni 'od yin te/ hi/ de nas snying po 'di phyung byas// nges rgyal bcu gcig bcings pa dang // dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur nas// lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas/
95b7(rgyud): rdo rje ming ni byin nas su// 'jig rten gsum po ting 'dzin bzhag/ de nas rdo rje chen po mchog mgon po yis ni gsol btab pa// sems can kun la rjes ston pas// rtog pa 'di ni bshad du
96a1(rgyud): gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag bri// de yi dbus su gzhag bya ba// sngon po 'byar
96a2(rgyud): pa gzugs bzang ba// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis legs bzhugs// bsnyems bcas shas che rababar ba la// 'od
96a3(rgyud): zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa yi// rdo rje gsor ba mdzad la brtson// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs// rdo rje mtshon cha mdung chen dang // ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin
96a4(rgyud): pa/ mtshams su mda' dang kha T+wAM ga/ 'khor lo bdan sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje rigs ni sna tshogs pa// 'bar ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni// thig
96a5(rgyud): bdun gyis ni yang dag tu// dang po rdo rje phyag rgya gdab// gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste// gsum pa rdorje rgyal po ni// rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor// rdo rje chen mo sgeg mo che// bzhi pa glu mkhan
96a6(rgyud): ma la sogs// rgyal rigs gsol ke dran rnams kyis// khro ba rnams nI lnga pa las// drug par rdo rje po nya mchog/ gnod sbyin srin po gang kar// dbang drug dam pa drag po sogs//
96a7(rgyud): po chen po 'dul bar mdzad// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams su// mdor na mang po gsum la sogs// lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad// legs par bri 'am gzhag par bya/
96b1(rgyud): mtshams su lha mo rab bshad pa// de rnams kyi ni sgo dbus su'ang // lcags kyu la sogs de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// go rims dag ni ji bzhin du// cho ga rgyas pa ji
96b2(rgyud): bzhir bya// khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang // khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas pas 'dud// de nas khro zhing slob dpon che// rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis sdigs mdzub// hUM mdzad
96b3(rgyud): rab tu sbyar bar bya// snyems dang bcas pas rgyas btab nyid// de bzhin khro bas gdul ba la// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyas pa yis// gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes// de nas me tog blangs nas ni//
96b4(rgyud): khros pas bdag po che la gtor// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches// yang dag par yang dgug par bya// oM ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la yA na lArka ya hi dzaHsarba badz+ra ku la pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba mu dAM gA nA na ban
96b5(rgyud): na traT/ sarba sa ma yaM sA d+ha ya phaT/ sarba duSh+TA na da ha pa tsa b+hasmi ku ru mahA kro d+ha ig+ni badz+re Na hUM phaT/ a a a a/ de nas bcom ldan khro bo yis// rgyal po bstan pa che byin 'gyur/
96b6(rgyud): rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun// dngos grub thamaca gsol bar mdzad// de nas hUM mdzad la sogs sbas// mtshan ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te slob ma la sogs la// snying
96b7(rgyud): khar dbab pa phra ba skyed// de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis// phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya// bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa' yi// rang gi snying po brjod par bya// hUM hUM badz+ra pra ha ra Ni phaT hUM
97a1(rgyud): badz+ra shU la yA gr-i ni tri ta/ ma ta/ sar+b+ba badz+ra ke She ts+tshin+da haM/ oM badz+ra ma ma la pA she maT/ rdo rje 'gugs pa dang / rdo rje mdung dpa// rdo rje ral gri dang // rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rdo rje
97a2(rgyud): khro bo'i srung ba'o// de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yod thogs pa med pa shin tu grub pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyus gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar
97a3(rgyud): bya'o// oM badz+ra gu h+ye saMd+bi pa ra mi yo gi shwa ri hi/ hUM badz+ra tsat+ta ho kha T+wAM ga ma hA badz+ra ka pA la ya ma ku ste/ ru lu ru lud+d+hi hUM badz+ra nA ra ya ni dzi/ hUM badz+ra phaT ke dzi/ rdo rje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro ma lan cig
97a4(rgyud): bzlas te dgod pa 'om bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos bzhugs su gsol na/ dngos grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig
97a5(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ sems can thams cad bde phyir dang // bstan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul ba bsod nams ni// 'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// de nas bcom/
97a6(rgyud): ldan 'das hU~M mdzad kyis phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yang dag
97a7(rgyud): par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi pa bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems
97b1(rgyud): can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang ga phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / gsad pa dang / slar 'tsho bar bya'o// gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o// de nas
97b2(rgyud): 'tshe bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas 'tsho bar byas la shin tu srung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu srung ba yin pa'i phyir gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod pa mi byed do// de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang
97b3(rgyud): kyil 'khor tshogs ni kun gyis kyang // mi tshugs pa dang mi song por// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ste// ji bzhin spu ni dge 'dun du// rdo rje gsor zhing dang
97b4(rgyud): por ni// bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// 'bum tshang nas ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam mchog/ rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog/ rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gdug
97b5(rgyud): pa rnams ni rjes 'dul zhing // sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par// 'jig rten gsum du legs snang zhing // cis kyang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying po
97b6(rgyud): sgrub pa ni/ bgreng ngam yang na 'dug pa 'am// 'gro 'am nyal bar byed pa na// ji ltar de ltar 'bum bzlas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis 'dod pa'i dbang
97b7(rgyud): byug kun// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug grub// rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang // rang gi nye du rnams
98a1(rgyud): kyis brten// gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing // gang la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya'i
98a2(rgyud): dam pa sgrub pa yin// ji bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcings// bdag nyid nye bar bsregs nas ni// srid 'di nyid du khro chen po'i// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni//
98a3(rgyud): bdag ni thams cad gsad bya zhes// brjod mi phyag na rdo rje yis// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'gyur// de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni// las rnams dam pa
98a4(rgyud): sgrub pa ni// rnam pa bzhi ni rab byed cing // thams cad bde ba'i phyir zos na// rdo rje las nyid thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// / de nas dngos grub sgrub
98a5(rgyud): pa ni/ rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi// las kyi rgyun ni dam pa rnams// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// 'di lta stegathams cad sreg pa dang / bskrad pa dang gzhig pa dang / rengs par byed pa
98a6(rgyud): dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gradab pa dang / rmongs pa dang / gzhig pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzir ba dang / dral ba dang / rdeg pa dang / 'bar ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / btso ba
98a7(rgyud): dang / gcad pa dang / dbug pa dang / phye mar bya ba dang / gtor ba dang / rnam par gzhom pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang / sbyor bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rna
98b1(rgyud): rje hUM mdzad kyis so// thams cad 'dug par bya ba dang / nges par bkod pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du gzhug pa dang / brgyal du gzhug pa dang / rtser gzhug pa dang /
98b2(rgyud): ha haM zhes dgod du gzhug pa dang / 'khor ba dang / drang ba dang / bong du gzhug pa dang / skom pa dang / nub par bya ba dang / dbyung ba dang / 'phang ba dang / nye bar ldeg par bya ba dang / bskur ba
98b3(rgyud): dang rang ro 'don par bya ba dang / ngur gzhug par bya ba dang / rang nyid brdeg par bya ba dang / 'ching bar bya ba dang / skra 'bal bar bya ba dang / zhe 'gras par bya ba dang / gos bshu ba dang / khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la
98b4(rgyud): ni khro bo'i gdan gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang ka pra se na sgrub pa dang / bden pa smra bar brjod pa dang / sgyu ma ston cing lan ston pa dang dus tshigs kyi 'khor/
98b5(rgyud): lo yongs su bzlog pa dang / dus ma yin par shing las me tog 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang / 'bru thams cad yang dag par ston pa dang / rims dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gdon dang /
98b6(rgyud): dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma las thar par bya ba dang // g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar par bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang / phyogs dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing
98b7(rgyud): ba dang / shin du srung ba dang / yongs su skyob par bya ba dang / thar par bya ba dang / bgrang ba dang ka dbang du bya ba la ni khro ba chen po sna tshogs grub pas so// lha la sogs pa thams cad srung bar bya ba/
99a1(rgyud): dang / klu 'don par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / srin po skrag pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad dang / bdud kyi dpung thams/
99a2(rgyud): cad gzhom pa dang / ma mo rnams gdul ba dang ga gdug pa'i tshegs rnam pa gtor ba dang / gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa dang / 'dum pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yang dag par bskyed pa dang
99a3(rgyud): nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba dang / nor sbyin las nor thams cad dbrog pa dang / rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang rtse 'job ba dang / brgya byin
99a4(rgyud): mnan nas bde cog ma dbrog pa dang / skom byed tshar gcad pa dang / tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang / khyab 'jug 'dul ba dang / dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug
99a5(rgyud): mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang / rdo rje sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang // dam
99a6(rgyud): tshig gi bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgrub pa la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dang pa'i dngos grub kyis so zhes kyang gsungs so// lan cig bzlas pas mchog grub pa// thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang
99a7(rgyud): lan cig/ de yi 'og tu khro gnyer gyis// bsgrub bya thams cad grub pa yin// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i
99b1(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas ting 'dzin thams cad ni// rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las// spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yin// gdug pa
99b2(rgyud): thams cad 'dul don du// rang rigs chen po che ni bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che// thabs med pas ni thabs yin no// 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas// ma dag sems
99b3(rgyud): can khams dag ni// de rnams la ni rab spyod par// skye bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen// mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad// 'jig rten kun na 'jig
99b4(rgyud): rten mchog/ rang snying bzang ba la snyoms zhugs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi
99b5(rgyud): ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi thugs su chud par gyur pa'o//
99b6(rgyud): bsnyems pas pad+ma g.yos pa ni// bzung ste 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pas// ci nus pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// rang bzhin gyis ni gzigs par mdzad// ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di// tshon gyis
99b7(rgyud): nyes pas mi gos pa// gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i// khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag/ 'di la gzigs pa la sogs pa// rgyal ba rnams ni dbang por 'gyur// de yis rdo/
100a1(rgyud): rje sems dpa' ni// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur// de bas bsgoms pa'i snying po 'di// dag par bsgoms pas sgom par ni// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po ni// badz+ra
100a2(rgyud): chen po 'chang bar 'gyur// gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ste// rgyal po chen po dang mnyam pa/ bsnyems pa g.yon pa'i bad mchog gis// tshul gyis 'dul ba mdzad pa na// pad+ma'i rig
100a3(rgyud): mchog ston pa'i phyir// rgyal po rnams kyis gsol ba btab// de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa// rdo rje ches te rang rgyal po// 'jig rten dbang pos
100a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yi dbus su spyan 'dzum pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya// gser sbyangs lta bu'i pad+ma ni// g.yon bsnyem
100a5(rgyud): tshul gyis gzigs mdzad pa// rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras// sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku ni brgyad po bri// rang gi 'dzin pa pad+ma
100a6(rgyud): che'i/ ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs// 'jog rten dbang po'i gzugs logs su// sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha// zhi ba sred med bu tshangs pa// 'dod pa'i gzugs ni pad+ma can// /
100a7(rgyud): spyi bor 'tsher zhing mgrin 'degs pa// rta mgrin lcags kyu bcing nas ni// chos kyi tshig gis spyan drang bya// de nas pad+ma'i snying po ni// sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma dza/ hUM badz+ra pad+ma he pad+me ga pad+ma
100b1(rgyud): Ta/ ho badra ni rAng/ de nas mtshams rnams su ni// d+hU d+yeHt+te shwa ra hU~M/ se mar+b+ba bi shwA dad+hA tsA ra Ne sa~Md+d+hi dz+dza/ man gyi bad+ma d+mo/ d+h+r-i ma ho bad+ma aH/ la ma tha mdzu / kyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
100b2(rgyud): gyis ni// tshig rgyas par byas nas ni// pad+ma chen po me tog bcas// ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin// las byung gzugs 'di brjod par bya/
100b3(rgyud): tho sho d+ha ya/ sa nus ni shu d+h+ya hAs // rnams pa ma// dA ga dI N+Da le/ tsai t+ta me sar+b+ba d+ha meSh+Ta bidz+ri Ni tsat+ta ma~M sar+b+ba d+ha me sh+ya dzi ni// gzungs kyi phyag rgya gsan nas ni// dgyes pas pad+ma 'dzin pa ni// de nas
100b4(rgyud): mdzub mo ljags kyu bcing // chos kyi tshig gis legs spyan drangs// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ke shwa ra pad+mA haH/ ya~M hi shIg+h+ra ma me badz+ram+ba drA a gri sh+yA sa be sa ma yer ba drA bi shi ko ma
100b5(rgyud): dzahUM baM ho/ go d+ha ya sarba sA drA ya pa ma mye/ mahA badz+ra d+har s+ho// de nas/ 'jig rten 'dzin pa rang nyid byon// 'jig rten kun mchog grub 'gyur ba'o// ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad// de nas/
100b6(rgyud): de bzhin slob ma rnams// gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni// dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa yis// ye shes dag ni bslab par bya// ting 'dzin snying po 'di yi ni// sgrub pa chen po gdod nas
100b7(rgyud): 'byung // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa'am// gdug pa kun gyi nang chud pa'am// gang yang rung bar 'dug nas ni// dz+ra
101a1(rgyud): chen po yongs su gzung // dus dang stobs ni ji bzhin du// nye ring ci nus bsgrub par bya// cho ga 'di yi tshe 'di la// myur du mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod chags
101a2(rgyud): kun gyis bde myur ba// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid// phyag na rdo rje nyid dang //
101a3(rgyud): ni/ dngos grub kun gyis mtha' yas mchog/ tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya sgrub pa ni// phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas// dngos grub chen po nyid tho bo// dam tshig dam tshig
101a4(rgyud): mchog gis te// las kyi las mchog phyag rgyas so// sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga'i rgyud do// / de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i// ting 'dzin las ni 'dres pa dag/ dang po'i ting 'dzin
101a5(rgyud): grub pa ni// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / yams dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro
101a6(rgyud): ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / byis pa'i gdon dang / dmu rgod dang / nyon mongs pa dang / ngal
101a7(rgyud): pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / dbul ba dang / rgyags pa dang / reg na mi bde ba dang / skal ba ngan pa dang / nad med pa ma yin pa dang / nor brlag pa rnams la ni pad+ma chen
101b1(rgyud): po zhi bas so// rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / khrag dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rims dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / dug dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / g.yan
101b2(rgyud): ba dang / rkang shu dang / sman dang / chu'i dmu rdzing dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / sha bak+ku dang / zad byed dang / khrag zad pa dang / khu ba zad pa dang / nad thams cad dang / gnod pa dang
101b3(rgyud): gnod byed dang / gdon dang ga 'phra men rnams gso ba la ni pad+ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas so// thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang / chos dang / go cha dang gtsug tor dang / gtsud pu dang /
101b4(rgyud): tshams dang / phyogs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sa dang / nam mkha' dang / rdo rje'i gdon dang / khang pa chen po dang / rdo rje ra ba dang / me 'bar ba dang / thal ba'i ra ba dang / rdo rje dang
101b5(rgyud): ri be don yod pa la sogs pa dang / srad bus yongs su bskor ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / zas dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / phyag rgya dang / srung ba la ni pad+ma chen
101b6(rgyud): po thams cad srung bas so// tshe thams cad dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang ga gzi brjid dang / mdas dang / lang tsho dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dang / nad med pa dang / dpal dang /
101b7(rgyud): skal ba bzang po dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbang phyug dang / 'byor pa dang / dngos grub dang / bla dang / rnyed pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / ming dang / grags pa dang / snyan pa dang ting
102a1(rgyud): 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa la ni pad+ma chen po mchog grub pas so// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med
102a2(rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mi 'gyur nam mkha' che// thams cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rin chen thams
102a3(rgyud): cad 'dzin// ting nge 'dzin gyis rab byin rlab// bdag po chen po rab sad mdzad// chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas// kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung // nyi zla dang ni gza' skur
102a4(rgyud): can// nam mkha' nyid du 'gyur ba yin// de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni// nges par rdo rje can du brjod// de nas nam mkha' rdo rje nyid// ljang ston bai DUR+Ya mnyam mdangs// rdo rje rin
102a5(rgyud): chen rnams dge ba// nam mkha'i snying por yang dag gyur// de nas bcom ldan thog ma nyid// mdzad spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs// ting nge 'dzin la rnam gzigs pas// 'jig rten dbang
102a6(rgyud): phyug bdag po nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo rje rin chen de yis ni// kun rigs kun gyi dbang bskur phyir// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
102a7(rgyud): bya'i phyir// kun mchog kun lo dbang bskur nas// shis pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba badz+ra satwa a d+hi pa ti twe/ a b+hi She 'u mi b+hur+N+Na be swa/ de nas bzang pos 'di gsungs
102b1(rgyud): shing / ka legs par shis brjod dbang bskur bas// rdo rje rin chen che de las// chos kyi gtso bor byung bar gyur// byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni// ci rigs par ni kun dbang bsgyur/ rdo rje/
102b2(rgyud): kun gyis dbang bskur nas// slar yang dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs// bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs pa// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog
102b3(rgyud): dngos grub gsol ba'i rtog pa gsungs// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol ni// nam mkha'i 'khor lo nam mkha'i mdog/ nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang // gza' rnams kyi ni brgyan pa ni// de/
102b4(rgyud): dbus nam mkha'i snying po ni// bdag nyid thams cad dgyes par gzhag/ dag pa'i bai nuR+Ya mdog 'dra// 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug/ g.yon pa rin chen thugs kar bstod// g.yas
102b5(rgyud): bas nor chen rab stsol pa// de yi ngos su sems dpa' mchog bzhi po gzugs bcus dam pa yis// dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang // nor bu chen po bla med dang // 'byor
102b6(rgyud): dpal ni phun sum tshogs// rang nyid mkhyen mas mchod pa ni// de la de dag gi snying po 'di yin te/ badz+ra satwa dzaHbadz+ra rat+na hUM/ badz+ra d+har+m+ma baM badz+ra karma ho// de nas gzungs rnams kyi
102b7(rgyud): snying po shad de/ oM pra ti badz+ra Ni phaT/ e badz+ra pI ti hi hi/ oM tsin+da ma Ni he/ oM badz+ra ma hA ma he haM/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i khu tshur gyos// cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bri// nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bcug
103a1(rgyud): ga/ mkha' skyes las ni mgos phyag bya// bzhugs nas nam mkha' mkhas pa yi// dam tshig dam pa brjod par bya// khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba'i// thams cad
103a2(rgyud): kyis ni lnga pa yin// oM e sid+d+ha b+hurU ba sid+d+ha ka sid+d+ha swa ka sid+d+hi ma hU~M rat+na/ be baT Ta tru ga 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang // pun tshogs kun la shin tu ni/
103a3(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so// de nas nor bu khu tshur can gyis lcags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM b+hu rA ya hI dza/ b+hu
103a4(rgyud): ba pra be shahUM swa/ gr-ih+Na baM ba baT Ta sid+d+ha ho taM/ de nas bcom ldan myur du ni// byon nas dngos grub thams cad ni// 'byor pa shin tu g.yo ba la// don ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/
103a5(rgyud): nas slob ma phyag rgya ni// me tog bcas pa mchog gis gzhug/ bcug nas de nyid mchog snying po// bden pa lan cig brjod du gzhug/ de nas 'byor pa'i mchog brtag pa// dpal gyi
103a6(rgyud): phun tshogs mchod pa che// 'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub rnams// bde bar gshegs pa bzhin du 'thob// de nas de phyir sgrub pa bshad// de na rdo rje rin chen rgyal mchog gis// dpag
103a7(rgyud): med zlos pas bsgrub bya zhing // 'di yis skyes mchog 'di nyid la// 'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur// rin cheni kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// dngos
103b1(rgyud): grub kyi dam pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no// phyag rgya sgrub pa ni dga' ba nyid kyis so// dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin du las sgrub pa ni dengs grub bla na med/
103b2(rgyud): pa yin no// phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa nyid de'i rgyud do// / de nas de phyir las rnams kyi// rab 'byams rgyun ni dam pa dang / dngos grub chen po kun bsgrubs pa// go rims
103b3(rgyud): bzhin rab bshad bya// 'di lta steg 'byer pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsags pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang /
103b4(rgyud): 'gugs pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar
103b5(rgyud): dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang // rdo rjer bya ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur bas so// dpal thams cad dgus
103b6(rgyud): pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsags pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang /
103b7(rgyud): 'degs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang /
104a1(rgyud): 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen dpal gyis so// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug
104a2(rgyud): pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsags pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa
104a3(rgyud): dang / 'bebs pa dang / brdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang /
104a4(rgyud): 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen phun sum tshogs pas so// mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / btsong ba dang /
104a5(rgyud): dbang du bya ba dang / de breg pa dang / bsags pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'dogs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang /
104a6(rgyud): rdeg po dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / brkyong ba dang / kun tu 'gyed pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byor/
104a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa sgrubs pas so zhes kyang gsungs so// sems can thams cad pade don du// rdo rje sems dpa' nor cheg// rang gi rgyal mchog
104b1(rgyud): lan cig sgrub// yi ge tra ni sbyar bar bya// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
104b2(rgyud): de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la// 'jog rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa// cho ga bzhin du rnam
104b3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // sems can don phyir chags bzhugs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin// mi mnyam pa yis rnon gyur na// drug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro//
104b4(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin// 'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin pa// zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gti mug khyab 'jug brtan mdzad nas// 'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs//
104b5(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas// chos kyi rten nas gsum mchog ste// chos min rten pas ngan song gsum// 'dod chags spong rtsir byed par bshad/
104b6(rgyud): zhesdang rgyal bar byed par bshad// gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces// kun tu gsang ba'i ming yin no// nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad// nga ni 'dod pa gcig
104b7(rgyud): bu nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yin// de nas gsum po 'di yis mchog/ sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa// gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid// bdag nyid kho na 'byung ba yin//
105a1(rgyud): gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni// rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra// tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de rnams sbya /
105a2(rgyud): phyir bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni// gzugs gsum pa 'di mdzad nas ni// phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid ma 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha// 'jig rten gsum
105a3(rgyud): mchog dbang phyug che// dkyil 'khor der ni gsang snying po'o// rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul// oM b+hur thu ba swa/ zur bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa// sgo srungs bzhis ni rab srung ba// kha khyer gyis ni
105a4(rgyud): legs bskor ba// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang ma nyid dang ni// dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs can la// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal nyid byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa ni// go
105a5(rgyud): rims dag ni ji bzhin du// legs par bri ba'am gzhag par bya// pus mo gnyis kyis zhugs la dang // rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas// zhugs te dam tshig bcings nas ni//
105a6(rgyud): yang dag par ni dgug par bya// oM b+hur+N+Na ba swaH/ swasti nA ma swA hU~M/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba// thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la// de nyid pa yi
105a7(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin// slob dpon rab tu zhugs pa yi// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya// gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag
105b1(rgyud): snying po snod min la smras sam// ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni// gal te 'dir ni ma spyad dam// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid// tshangs pa drag po gsu drung ste// ming po gsum po
105b2(rgyud): 'di nyid ni// nam yang bskas par mi bya'o// gang zhig 'di rnams skom pa slob// yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchod par byed pa dang // dngos grub thams cad thob par
105b3(rgyud): 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bslabs nas ni// de la gar gyi mchod pa dang // 'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// 'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do//
105b4(rgyud): de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum phyung don grub tu// slar yang srin mo rnams 'byin mdzad// kun tu chags dang zho sdang rmongs/
105b5(rgyud): brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// dga' dang pa dog bud med ni// rab tu grags pa'i grub kun ster// gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu bshad// tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams// zhi dang 'jigs ma
105b6(rgyud): de bzhin gser// grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad// phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang // rtogs don khong du chud bya'i phyir// de rnams kyi ni snying po dang // dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig bshad/
105b7(rgyud): he hUM shrI sh+ya/ dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi pa ni// srad bu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bya// mtshams kyi thig ni ka pa che// bzhi po dag gi rims pa bzhin// de yi dbus su dkyil 'khor ni// bzhi po dag
106a1(rgyud): gi de bzhin bya// rang gi snying po bzhi po ni// rang gi skor ni phyogs pa gzhag/ skal bzung lug na rang gi mtshon// sring mo phra bzhin zhi dam// phag mo lagan
106a2(rgyud): gter nyid do// grub pa mo ni bsnyems dang bcas// de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du// kun nas de bzhin bzhugs nas ni// skying ma rnams kyis rang gi rgyas// go rims dag ni ji bzhin du// zhugs nas
106a3(rgyud): de bzhin cho ga bya// spos la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nyid gsang ba rab bsgrub pas// kun nas dgug pa dag tu bya// oM suM b+ha ga ra tiSh+Tha ma ya hI b+hu/ rak+Sha sa mA tiSh+Tha ma ya hI b+hur b+hu ga ba ra hA a mir+ya
106a4(rgyud): tA ma ya swAhA/ sid+d+hi ke sid+d+hi sa ma ya hi I mA mri mu drA d+hiH/ hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ de nas lus ni thams cad kyis// de bzhin du ni legs bzhugs la// de nas phyag rgya bcings brtan te// gsang ba mchog 'di brjod
106a5(rgyud): par bya// gal te gsang nyid ma gsungs na// gang zhig sems can don bzhugs dang // gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa// de rnams khyed kyis bsad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan la bdud
106a6(rgyud): rtsi nyid// chos min pas ni dug pas lhag/ ci rnyed pa dang dus ji bzhin// yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang // phyag rgya gar gyis bshad pa yis// ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod// sring mo bzhi'i/
106a7(rgyud): rgyud do// / de nas sten pa rdo rje 'dzin// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// sgrub pa dag ni rab sgrub nyid// 'dod chags sogs dug gnyis
106b1(rgyud): phyir dang / kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir// zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de la snying po 'di yin te// phu zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// srad bu thams
106b2(rgyud): cad yang dag bri// sgo khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog/ mtshams kyi rtse mchog mjug ma mdud// de yi dbus su klu rgyal ni// mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa ni/ klu yi rigs ni
106b3(rgyud): brgyad po dag/ shes rab can gyis kun tu bri// de nas khros dang zhugs nas ni// klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du// sbrul gyi gdengs ka sa dgug par bya// oM
106b4(rgyud): hrIHa nI la dza ba be ga pri thi b+hin da ri She sha ya hi phu sar+b+ba nA ga ku lA n+yA na phu/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phu sar+b+ban sA d+ha ya phu/ ta ta sa sar+b+ba na ga pu Ta ka phu/ de ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing
106b5(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis dug med par bsam par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro// nor rgyas par brtse bar byed do// dug thams cad sbyar/
106b6(rgyud): ba dang gzhig pa nus par 'gyur ro// de nas mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// 'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug/ gal te bden pa las 'das nas// 'di dag gis
106b7(rgyud): ni rtag gsod 'gyur// khyed kyis gleg la bsdus mi bya// ser ba'i zlog par mi bya zhing // g.ye dngos grub la dga' na/ ci nas sbrul ni gsed mi bya// klu'i dkyil 'khor ro//
107a1(rgyud): de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog/ sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir// gdon gyi dkyil 'khor bsdu ba yi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti
107a2(rgyud): mug rnams// nyes byas kyi ni dug nyid 'gyur// gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang // dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// de nas gdug pa'i snying po ni// haM/ zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// bdon
107a3(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// de'i dbus dang por gdon la sogs// cho ga rgyas par dgod par bya// de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas// dgod cing myur du dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs
107a4(rgyud): nas ni// khros pas rkang pa g.yon pas mnye// de nas gdon dang rims sdig kun// dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // rdo rjes rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur//
107a5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// sdug bsngal thams cad 'dren pa'i rgyud do// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis/
107a6(rgyud): sems can kun don rab bsgrub phyir// dkyil 'khor thams cad gsungs pa yin// de la snying po 'di yin te/ oM AHhUMHhriHtAM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// kur mchog
107a7(rgyud): dbang phyug dam pa yi// gzugs kun gyis ni kun mchog ni// dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin// gsang ba chen po lnga yi ni// gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa// de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa/
107b1(rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin// dam pa yang dag bshad bya ste// kun mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni// de yi dbus
107b2(rgyud): su cho ga bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la// rdo rje lha mo tshogs dkyil 'khor// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// kun mchog bdag po sku rnams so// rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan
107b3(rgyud): ma ni/ rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba gzhag/ rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i// gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo rnam par bri// khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje// gtum dbang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa// rdo rje
107b4(rgyud): bad 'byung pad+ma 'byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs pa'i gzugs// nam mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs// rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams su// rigs
107b5(rgyud): kyi lha ma bri bar bya// rdo rje dpal me dkar mo dang // rdorje spel ma mkha' rdo rje// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po bshad par bya ste// oM badz+ra nA rA ya Sha d+han pra ti ga na 'dzum
107b6(rgyud): Na ho b+ha ga bAM badz+re ta thA ga ta/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badz+ra d+ha ra taM/ badz+ra ta thA ga ta hUM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA yo gi nI ga Ne shwa ra/ ma hA badz+ra ku le gra pa ne ho b+ha ga bAM badz+ra tsan+de shwa rA ya~M ka ha ha ha ha hrIHbadz+ra pad+mo b+ha ba ho b+ha ga baM
107b7(rgyud): badz+ra lo ka shwa re/ ma hA pra me sid d+d+he/ oM d+hA ra d+hu \u0f7fswaHsa sbyin ma/ swAhA/ he badz+ra ku su mA yu d+ha/ sarba kA ma me sA d+ha ya ho/ b+ha ga bA badz+ra A kA sha ga r+d+ha/ ba pa TaT dza/ badz+ra Aka sha gar+b+ha a she
108a1(rgyud): / mu drA/ na mo ye nas+dza d+he na/ thA ga ba te prad+d+ha pA ra mi tA yud+ha/ ts+tshan+na badz+ra Nits+tshakre NA te na sa t+ye na bA pa kan/ oMd+hI shrI shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA/ na me yan/ e dadra gau ri
108a2(rgyud): mahA bi d+ya tre lo kya bi dza ye shwa ri badz+ra kr-i d+ha ag+ni sa ma ye/ badz+ra d+ha ri na me stu ste ke tad+ya thA/ oM ha li mi l-i/ la li tA li badz+ra mu ka ye swA hA / badz+ra sa ma ya/ nA mo ye na sA d+he na b+hi ga ba te/ bud+d+ha dud+d+hid+hAd+b+ha d+hA ra
108a3(rgyud): badz+rad+har+m+ma pra yo ge na/ te na sa te na sid+d+ha mAM/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swAr+tha/ badz+ra d+ha mo ta / oM kA ma badz+rA Ni sid+d+ha bi shud+d+ha sA d+ha ba ha ga ga mod+d+ha be yo ge na sid+ha mAM pa ra ma ka re/ tad+ya thA ka ga ga na bi shud d+he
108a4(rgyud): sar+b+ba ma b+hi pra ya pa ri pU ni swA hA/ byi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// rdo rje 'dzin pa rab spyod gnas// lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid// 'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya// tshegs kyi dbang
108a5(rgyud): byug rdo rje yi// rol mtsho bcu rdzu byed pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor kha khyer la// sgo dang mtshams su'ang 'di bri'o// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni// rang gi phyag rgyas rab tu gzhug/ dkyil
108a6(rgyud): 'khor dam pa lnga par ni// dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o// de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// dang po lcags kyu che ba nyid// snying po 'di ni rjod byed cing // 'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya// oM ma hA
108a7(rgyud): su kha badz+ra satwa sid+d+hi hUM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA na ka sa ma ya A kiR+Sha ya dzaHbadz+ra ku la dI paM da ma ye tA pra be sha ya hUM kasar+b+ba lo ke shwa ra pra be sha ya sa ma ya ban+d+ha na baM/ sa ma ya sar+b+ba rat+na dI ba~M ma hA ma Ni rA dzA nA
108b1(rgyud): bashrI ku ru ho hUM a/ hUM hriHtra/ de nas gsang ba chen po yi// snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas/ rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni// 'khor lo thams cad dang bcas pa/ bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang /
108b2(rgyud): bden pas bcings te dbang du byas// dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad// dngos grub kun gyi sgrub par 'gyur// de nas go rims ji bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang // dngos
108b3(rgyud): grub de rnams nyid kyang ni// thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'di ni sgrub la sogs// 'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur/
108b4(rgyud): de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyis cho ga 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba mtha' med cing sna tshogs pas mnyam pa med cing phul du phyung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams
108b5(rgyud): cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa ga rgyal ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa gsungs pa yin no// dpal mchog dang po'o rtog pa'i rgyal po la sa/ rtog pa
108b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// dam tshig mchog gi
108b7(rgyud): sgrub pa dang // bad pa chen po gzhal yas khang // dngos grub kun gyi lus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// rin chen rgyal ba sogs kyi sa brgyan// bde ba chen po'i chags pa che/
109a1(rgyud): #glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa// bla med dga' ba chen po yi// mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod// dpa' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas// rang gi zhugs gnas mchog de
109a2(rgyud): la// rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog/ mi 'gyur mchog tu yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ kun tu dbang po 'khor ba dang // byang chub
109a3(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ kun mchog rmugs pa chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa// glu dang rol mo
109a4(rgyud): thog mtha' med// mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// hUMHde nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur//
109a5(rgyud): rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che// rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha// phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste// sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin te/ sku
109a6(rgyud): mchog so sor rtog pa dang // dngos grub kun gyis bde ba'i mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba dang // thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che// dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang // dga'
109a7(rgyud): bdag dang bdag po rnams// rdo rje lha mo thog mtha' med// rdo rje sems dpa' sku yi mchog/ ces bya'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal don yod dga' ba'i dam
109b1(rgyud): cheg dod pa'idi ma dang dga' bachen po dang ladon yong la rgyags pa'i dam rtag ga shu ka li kI 'i dang / dga' ba chen po dpa la rdo don yod lachags pa'ingamatshig rnam para' myul ba rnam
109b2(rgyud): dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o// 'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni// mkhas pas gang zhig dad pas brjod// de ni
109b3(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi// dngos po kun bdag bdag por 'gyur// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas gsungs pa yin no// de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba// dngos
109b4(rgyud): grub shin tu brtag pa ste// sdig pa che las dga' ba dang // sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// de dag kyang ni myur du grub// nyin re 'am ni zla re'am// de bzhin lo//
109b5(rgyud): ni re re la// ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya// ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas// ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste// gang zhig bris par gyur na ni// mchog
109b6(rgyud): rtag pa'i thar pa thob// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs// sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' ldan// sems dpa'
109b7(rgyud): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba// g.yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag/ de yi logs na bzhugs pa rnams/
110a1(rgyud): de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten// rab tu dga' ba bde ba'i sku// gsang ba chen po dgod par bya// dang po bad+ma ltar dkar dmar// gzhan ni ba la sha ltar dkar/
110a2(rgyud): gzhan ni ut+pal 'dab ltar sngo// rdo rje bsnyems ma ser po 'dzin// dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag/ g.yas kyi lcogs la brten pa ste// gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag/ g.yon gyi logs
110a3(rgyud): su bzhi pa yin// rdo rje kI la kI la ma// dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro// de yi logs la rdo rje che// mda' ni gsor ba la brtson pa// bsnyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i/
110a4(rgyud): chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng dang bcas// de yi logs na bzhad dang bcas// mchod pas bdag po la blta ba// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur mtshan// thams cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs//
110a5(rgyud): rang la bdag gi thugs gtad pa// zur du lta zhing bzhugs pa'o// ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni brtag pa yis// mchog tu
110a6(rgyud): dga' ba'i thar pa thob// ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni// mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gas
110a7(rgyud): zhing rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di// thams cad gzigs rnams mchod pa chen po'i dpal 'dis rol// 'khor lo de ni brtag byas nas// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/
110b1(rgyud): rnam par dben pa'i khang par ram// yang na skyed mos tshal sogs su// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis brgyan// dril bu dang bcas yid dga'
110b2(rgyud): ba'i/ bla re phul bas mchog gyur pa'i// rdo rje glu yi mchod tshogs dang // glu dang rol mo rnam 'phrul pa// me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba// mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag
110b3(rgyud): mchod// khang pa gsum brtsegs dkyil 'khor du// mchog gi gsang ba bsgrub par bya// yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog/ rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya// de nas 'khor lor
110b4(rgyud): mazhugs kyang // rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nas// rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni// dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur// rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos// ci rnyedu rgyun dang
110b5(rgyud): gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klungs// 'phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// me tog spos dang dri snod bcas// rdo rje gla ni 'di dag
110b6(rgyud): gis/ gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grubya pa 'di yin te// dngos grub
110b7(rgyud): kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i// thar ba'i grong du bcom ldan padade chen 'jun/ mchog tu ba ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// pardzi ba po rab tu grub par mdzod/ rab tu zhugs te gzin
111a1(rgyud): ba yis// de rna mig gas mgon 'dud// g.yon pa pazhes su pacung da da// baspyod cing ngas pa'i mig gi sa nams dul zlog rtagasang pa dang /
111a2(rgyud): dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil mdor ba'i mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te// mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol par ldan/
111a3(rgyud): sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud// dzaHhUM baM ho hi haM hi hi hi/ mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol// de nas me tog sil mdor// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang
111a4(rgyud): bskur bas// rdo dril bu'i phyag rgya dang // ldan pa'i 'od gsal sbyin par bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu
111a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i rdo rje'i bu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ mo sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis brgyan// zha'i cod pan dadu bcus khyod la 'dud// rA rje 'chang bdag rin chen
111a6(rgyud): dbang bskur bas// sems dpa' sa ma ya swA hUM/ de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher/ byin gyis brlabs nas snying
111a7(rgyud): po bzlas// rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyal po// rdo rje can gyis byin gyis brlabs// 'gyur zhes bya ba
111b1(rgyud): mchog tu gsang pa dam pa'i dpal mtshig gsum gyis bdag 'a byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa gcig du'i cho ga mchogs grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas
111b2(rgyud): 'dir grub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu rtag pa yang // gang gis sgrub pa dam pa dang // thig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// mgrub rnams kyang
111b3(rgyud): grub par 'gyur// lugs ma'am ning rdungs pa 'am// 'dus byas pa'am bris pa 'am// dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas// de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'cha
111b4(rgyud): zhing / dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab sogs sgrub rnams su// de la ji ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dang la dam tshig gsum gyi
111b5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las// thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba las// yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas// gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya//
111b6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ dza mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde rtog rab tu dga' ba khyod bdag
111b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas so sor rtogs// hUM mchog rdo rje las ni mchog tu zad med srid pa mi 'gyur bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la de grub mdzod// po mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad
112a1(rgyud): rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po kye/ ho rab mchog ni mchog gi dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig
112a2(rgyud): rtag par bdag 'phel nam mkha'i snying po khyod// hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod// dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste// rab tu dga'
112a3(rgyud): pa mchog dang po// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ji ltar yin/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// mchod pa/
112a4(rgyud): kun mchog sku rnams kyis// rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i/
112a5(rgyud): dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/ thams cad rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin// bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la
112a6(rgyud): brtan gyur cig/ myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs kyis sgrub pa chen
112a7(rgyud): po ji ltar yin/ rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// phyag rgya kun gyis byin brlabs pas// de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni// rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa/
112b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ oM nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog/
112b2(rgyud): ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje tshe rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug
112b3(rgyud): chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mngar rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa// 'dod pa chen po
112b4(rgyud): dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpa' bdag
112b5(rgyud): grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas// rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ dpal mchog dang po'i bcom
112b6(rgyud): ldan khyod// gang gis don dang glu yos bstod// de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po
112b7(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// dngos grub cho ga 'di yis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug nyid ni
113a1(rgyud): #rab sgrub pa'o// kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang // so sor ston pa'i rmang byung rnams// rdo rje tshig gis rang lha las// ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar byug/ gnog pa kun/
113a2(rgyud): gyis sna tshogs che// dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyis// myur du rang gis byin brlabs pas// rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bo// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog dang pos
113a3(rgyud): gsungs so// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gi lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ji ltar yin/ rang lha rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// lba
113a4(rgyud): kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis// rang lha rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// rang lhag lha nyid bsgrub par bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub
113a5(rgyud): chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba bde ba dam pa
113a6(rgyud): dang / yid 'di thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i chog rgyas pa rjes su sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rang lnga'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// rdo rje kun mchog su rnams kyis// klu dang rol mo'i cho ga/
113a7(rgyud): ni// rdo rje nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur// rang lha'i sbyor baji bzhin du// dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnams sad pas// klu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// dril bu nyid kyis rjes su brjod// rang 'i/
113b1(rgyud): sbyor ba ji bzhin du// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog/ glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// dam tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya// de yi rtog pa thams cad la// rdo rje 'bebs pa rab sad nas//
113b2(rgyud): rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni// thams cad gzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang rol mo'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa
113b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de rjes gnas ji bzhin// ci rnyed pa ni ci bde bas// me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni// khang pa'am skyed mos tshal sogs su//
113b4(rgyud): bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas// ci rnyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs// me tog 'phreng bcas kha dri zhim// lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa'am//
113b5(rgyud): 'dus pa 'am ni ri mor bri// dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du// cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ji bzhin du// rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas// thams cad
113b6(rgyud): dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab sogs bsgrub par bya// sngon du lan cig bsgrubs byas na// de nas de rjes ci 'dod pa// ci 'dod ci spyod ci smras pa// thams cad bza' zhing
113b7(rgyud): thams cad byed// langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am// rab tu dgod dam smra ba 'am// ji bzhin de bzhin de dang der// ci 'dod par ni ji bzhin bzhag/ gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni// me
114a1(rgyud): tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni// ji bzhin du ni rjes bsgrub bya// 'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na 'phur// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug
114a2(rgyud): grub// rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' grub chen po// phyag rgya kun gyis dbang phyug bdag/ rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal po ni// rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin// mi thub pa/
114a3(rgyud): dang mi sod cing // thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten// sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// tshar gcod rjes su bzung bar nus// kun mchog rjes su chags pa che// 'dod pa grub pa bde ba mchog/
114a4(rgyud): kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i go 'phang nas// rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas
114a5(rgyud): thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur// de ltar mchog tu rdzas chags dga' ba pad+ma'i ra ba che// mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas gang
114a6(rgyud): zhig rjes su bstan pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las//
114a7(rgyud): gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang / dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang / mchod pa chen po dang / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas
114b1(rgyud): pa'o// / gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thog mtha'/
114b2(rgyud): med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa'i
114b3(rgyud): lha ni gcig pu nyid// ces bya ba grub par 'gyur ro// de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+mar che// mchog tu bsngags pa bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog gi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba
114b4(rgyud): gang zhig rjes su bstan pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las/ dga' ba chen
114b5(rgyud): po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'i yongs su
114b6(rgyud): rdzogs so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes su bzung ba bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
114b7(rgyud): sems dpas gsungs so// de la dang por kho nar re zhig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan cig brjod pas sems bskyed du bcug ste/ oM sarba yo
115a1(rgyud): ga tsit+ta ud pA dA yA mi// 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing ldog pa dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag
115a2(rgyud): rgya byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du'ang rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'ang gsungs so// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni// byang chub sems ni bzhag
115a3(rgyud): nas ni// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho/ 'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na// 'dod pa kun las 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul ba'i myur du ni// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i/
115a4(rgyud): phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// gar byas spyi bor thal mo sbyar// gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams//
115a5(rgyud): ci 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod dngos grub sems pa yis// slob mo me tog dor du gzhug/ phyag rgya gang la de bcas pa'o// de de'i
115a6(rgyud): lha mo bsgrub par bya// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol byas la// rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin// de la
115a7(rgyud): rdo rje chen po mna'i chus dbang bskur te 'di ltar brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chus// dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu
115b1(rgyud): 'dis 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras// skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas// dad pa med pas bzhad gad mod// ces bya bas mna' bsgag go/ de la sangs
115b2(rgyud): rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA gad
115b3(rgyud): mahA sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti s+tha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu sbyin par bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'chang gi brtul
115b4(rgyud): zhugs che// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog gi sems chen po yongs su mi spang bar rtag tu sgrub pa shin tu gsang ba de 'di yin te/ oM
115b5(rgyud): badz+ra karma pA d+hi d+hi shrI badz+rA nA ma sid d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu baHswAHgang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la k+She'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o// de'i ming de'ang ji srid byang chub snying po mthar thug pa'i bar gyi
115b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang ming du 'gyur ro// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa'
115b7(rgyud): dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho
116a1(rgyud): na nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o// 'di bcom ldan 'das srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos
116a2(rgyud): kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par mdzad pa ni/ srid pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni dag/ rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa'i mchog ni mdzad pa yin//
116a3(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba 'am lha sgrub pa dgrol bar bya'o// de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i//
116a4(rgyud): phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no// rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rab tu dang bar byed//
116a5(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba sgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu brten par bya'o zhes bya ba'o// de la 'di ni dang khyod kyi//
116a6(rgyud): srid bde shin tu gyur pa ni// sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ci 'dod/
116a7(rgyud): par ni rten bzhin du// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang
116b1(rgyud): chen po dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam tshig go// 'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // 'dul ba ru ni mi mdzad pas// phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces ni bsgrags// yid/
116b2(rgyud): kyi sku ni brtan phyir ro// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di brjod par bya ste// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug
116b3(rgyud): par gyur pa'i tshe// ji srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs// bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa// rtag tu/
116b4(rgyud): dngos grub kun dbang phyug/ sems can don ni byed pa yin// dam tshig 'dis ni bdag sgrub cing // ci bde bar ni sgrub byed pa// nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis// rnam pa kun du gnod mi
116b5(rgyud): 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po sgrub par 'gyur// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang // thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis/
116b6(rgyud): ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur// bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas// yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang // don yod mchog tu grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub
116b7(rgyud): byed// dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje la
117a1(rgyud): sogs thob 'dzin pas// dngos po kun gyi bde ba kun// phab pas rdo rje slob ma yis// dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong // de nas thams cad gzengs bskyod
117a2(rgyud): pas// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid dngos// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa'i rdo rje/
117a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bstan pa che// gzengs bstod pa yis gang lung bstan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o// oM/ 'di/
117a4(rgyud): ni ngas khyod lung bstan te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod bton// he badz+ra nA maH/ ha thA ga ta sid+d+hi sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu baH/
117a5(rgyud): swaHgang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang // phyag rgya chen pos lung bstan mchog tu gsang ba'i tshogs byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
117a6(rgyud): 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par/
117a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par mdzad do// 'di lha ste/ gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po dang / mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dang /
