145b3(rgyud): sarba ti thA ga tA b+ha bi shud+d+he/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra/ a/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngag gi phyag rgya ni dbyangs shin tu zab pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i chos kyi ngag
145b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngag thogs pa med par 'grub pa'o// de nas bzlas pa ni rjes su dran pas so// sgrub pa la de bzhin no// las la nye bar sbyor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
145b5(rgyud): cad rjes su dran pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o// de nas rdo rje nyi ma ma ltar 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ de la phyag rgya chen po ni bdag nyid thams cad kyis
145b6(rgyud): rjes su'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo thams cad kyi 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang mthe bong gi rdo rje bzhag la khams gsum pa thams cad sred
145b7(rgyud): pa dang / 'tshed pa dang / thal bar byed par nus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi g.yon pa'i sor mo sdigs mdzub bya zhing g.yas pa'i lcags kyus
146a1(rgyud): dgug par byas na thams cad 'gugs pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i ni khro bo'i rdo rje khu tshur gnyis pa'i rdo rjes mthe'u rlung gi sngags kyus bcings te/ des
146a2(rgyud): sdigs mdzub bya ba bzhing las thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad nyams su myong ba yin ro// rdo rje thal mos mdzub ma bcings la khro gnyer thur du gzhag par bya zhing me stag tu myur du 'gro zhing
146a3(rgyud): g.yo ba ni rdo rje khro ga nyer ro// thams cad sreg par byed pa dang / thams cad 'dul bar byed pa dang / rab tu 'dul bar byed pa ni khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mos legs par bskor
146a4(rgyud): bar g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ste dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / sgrub pa thams cad la don yod pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma dbus mnyam pa'i kha 'bus kyi mdzod do// rdo rje pad+ma ni thams cad
146a5(rgyud): gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa ni mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i gdu bus g.yas pa'i hUM gis mdzub mo bzung ste thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / mchog tu grub pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad
146a6(rgyud): las byung ba ni g.yas pa'i mdzub mos g.yon pa'i yi ge hUM bzung ba ste/ gzhu rgyud 'dren pa zhes bya ba thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa dang 'bigs par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa
146a7(rgyud): las rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi mchog go// rdo rje bsdams pa'i g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur g.yas pa'i rtse gsum gyis mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba ste/ thams cad dral bar byed pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad
146b1(rgyud): kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe'u chung yang dag par brkyang ba g.yon lag pa'i steng du bzhag pa ni kha T+wAM ga bsgreng ba ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya phye zhing dral bar byed pa dang / rgyas 'debs pa
146b2(rgyud): dang / gsod pa dang / zab la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad g.yas pas 'khor lo bzung ba'i tshul gyis stod cing dor ba ste/ thams cad gcod pa dang / gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje chen po
146b3(rgyud): khro bo'i rdo rje'o// g.yas pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / sbyor ba spro zhing g.yo ba'i 'dab ma can gyi ba dan gsum pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i
146b4(rgyud): srin lag mnyam par sbyar zhing mthe'u chung kha phye'o// dpal thams cad byed pa dang / rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang / gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dang / thams cad
146b5(rgyud): 'bebs par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi ni/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam byas la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis dar dpyangs bcings// mthe
146b6(rgyud): bong srin lag rdo rje ni/ yongs su bskor te dbang bskur ro// 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyag nas gzung bar bya'o// ci 'byor pas slob dpon la yon phul te/ dngos grub thams cad kyi
146b7(rgyud): mchog phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje phyag rgya rdo rje rin ti ri las 'byung ba ste/ don yod thams cad
147a1(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi dam tshig ni rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pas
147a2(rgyud): bsnyems pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje gsor ba ste/ 'dis thams cad brgyal ba dang / 'bar ba dang / sreg pa dang / ltung ba dang / rgyas btab pa dang / bsad pa/
147a3(rgyud): dang / slong ba dang / khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / brtan pa dang / g.yo ba thams cad la nges par sbyor ba dang / dngos grub dang / mchog thams cad sgrub pa'o// de nas las kyi
147a4(rgyud): phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur sdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo ni khro ba'i khu tshur ro// de dag las dam tshig phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis thams cad dgug pa'o// snying khar cig
147a5(rgyud): shes dang g.yas pa'i gdug pa thams cad gcod pa'o// ma khrig ma'i mdud pas g.yas pa'i khro bo 'gugs pas thams cad dgug pa rab tu gzhug pa'o// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i mda'
147a6(rgyud): 'phangs pa'o// de bzhin du rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi phyag rgya gyen du 'phang ba'o// las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas la rdo rje thal mo rnams kyi las
147a7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi dam tshig gis phyag rgya steng du dor ba ste thams cad la rgyas gdab pa dang / sgrub pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / 'tsho bar byed pa/
147b1(rgyud): ninirdo rje gar gyi mchod pa'o// de nas ngag gi phyag rgya ni sprin gyi sgra sgrog pa'i hUM yig gi hUM pra pa'i sgra dang bcas pa khro zhing gsal ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje dgago// sgrub pa'i don bsgrub par bya'o// de nas/
147b2(rgyud): mgrub na las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o// sgrub pa ni de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po lan cig tu bya'o// las la nges par sbyor ba khrog nyer gyis so// rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba'o// rke tshe dang
147b3(rgyud): bcas pa'i til mar rnon po'i sbyin sreg ni g.yas pas so// de nyid kyis btang ba'o// de nyid kyi thams cad 'aring ba'o// g.yo ba med pa nyid do// gnyis log pa bstan pa'o//
147b4(rgyud): khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba'i sdigs mdzub bo// phyag rgya glod par gyur pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas phye ba'o// de dag nyid kyis gdu bu bcing ba'o// mche bas btsir ba'o//
147b5(rgyud): de nas dral ba'o// g.yas pas brdeg pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'bar ba'o// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo g.yon pa ltung ba'i tshul lo// mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'bar bar byeraro//
147b6(rgyud): gcod pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyi sor mo sbyar ba'i rtse mo gcod pa'o// lag pa gnyis drag tu mnye ba'o// thams cad du sor mo thams cad dor ba'o// cig car du phyag rgya dgrol
147b7(rgyud): pa'o// drang zhing g.yo bas sdigs mdzub bo// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gdengs ka bskyod pas sdigs mdzub bo// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo mche bas gzung ba'o// ngu ba dang
148a1(rgyud): dgod pa dang / rgyag pa la sogs pas bstan pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis se gol rdeg pa'o// g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// sa la rab tu gzhag
148a2(rgyud): pa'o// bskyod par bya'o// gar bya'o// 'byin pa'o// brlab par bya'o// thams cad du brlab par bya'o// ha har dgod pa'o// bskor ba'i dgug par bya'o// drang bar bya'o// gtang
148a3(rgyud): bar bya'o// yongs su bskor nas nub par bya'o// de nas dor ba'o// myur du dor ba'o// de bzhin du kur nas 'dren pa'o// de bzhin du gyen du zang ba'o// rang nyid kyi nga ro bya'o//
148a4(rgyud): bdag nyid la brdeg par bya'o// snying khar brdeg par sbyin par bya'o// rang nyid kyis rang gi skra 'bal bar bya'o// snang bar sdom pa'o// rang gis gos stod par bya'o// khro bas de bzhin
148a5(rgyud): du 'bar ba ston pa'o// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu'o// de nyid kyi rab tu gzhug pa'o// g.yas pa'i sa gol lo// g.yon pa'i so gol lo// lce reg pa ni ri mdzub mo gnyis kyis so// yan
148a6(rgyud): lag la baspu g.yas su bskor bskor bas 'khyil ba'o// ltung ba la sogs pa byed pa'o// dus su sgom pa'o// khro ba'i lta bas shing drung rnams la yid kyis 'dod pa'o// de bzhin du sa la'o//
148a7(rgyud): lte ba'o// smin ma'o// so'o// pu'o// phyag rgyas brdeg pa'o// rgyal mtshan gleng ba'o// khro bo dang bcas pa'i 'jigs byed kyi blta bas so// 'dzum pa med pas blta bas so//
148b1(rgyud): de bzhin du 'bar ba'i ching bas so// phyag rgya bskor ba'o// gtsug tor las mdzub mo'i rdo rje gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du snying khar ro// phyag rgya de dgrol ba'o// phyag rgya zur du bsrung /
148b2(rgyud): ba'o// mdzub mo'i rtse mo brtan par sbyar ba'o// lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung ba'o// 'og nas gyen du 'dren pa'o// yi ge hUM khros pa'o// 'jigs byed kyi blta bas so// rdo rje
148b3(rgyud): kha T+wAM ka dral pa khro bas so// rdo rje snying khar sgom pa'o// rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhig par bya'o// yi ge hUM gis so// hi'o// g.yas su dbugs dbyung ba'o//
148b4(rgyud): de nyid kyi dong rtse gsor ba'o// khro bo'i lta ba de bzhin du'o// khu tshur g.yas pas mnan te g.yon pas so// bzung nas dgug par bya'o// dong tshe gsor ba ni gnyis kyis so// g.yon
148b5(rgyud): pa'i dril bu dral ba'o// de bzhin du rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur g.yon pa'i rdo rje khro bos mnan te mthe'u chung gi gdu bu dkrol ba'i khu tshur gyis 'phrog par bya'o// g.yas pa'i dril
148b6(rgyud): bu dral ba'o// tshegs dang bral ba ltung ba ni yid kyis so// 'khor lo dral ba'o// rtse gsum dral ba'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yon pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mnan te/ de bzhin
148b7(rgyud): dugadu bu bkrol bas 'phrog par bya'o// rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pas mdun du bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje
149a1(rgyud): po rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do// / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni/ pad+ma chen po rdo rje thal mo kha sbub pa dbu ma dang /
149a2(rgyud): mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung 'phye ba'i 'dab ma bzhi pa chos nyid thams cad thob pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa'o// phyag rgya chen po rnams ni de bzhin no// dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje pad+ma bshad
149a3(rgyud): pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyis rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de la pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nang gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma bang par gyen
149a4(rgyud): du kha phye ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming can gyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya'o// rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i rdo rje pad+ma snying khar rdo rje bcing ba rdo rje pad+ma'i chags pa zhes bya'o// pad+ma chen po'i bdag po mdzub
149a5(rgyud): mo mnyam pa 'og tu kha lta ba pad par bzung ba pad+ma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma chen po'i ba dan rin po che gnyis bzung zhing des pad+ma sbyin pa'o// 'di rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad
149a6(rgyud): las thob pa dang / thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thams cad las sgrol ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu grub pa zhes bya'o//
149a7(rgyud): rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o// de nas pad+ma lha'i bdag po rnams kyi phyi rol gyi bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de la don yod rgyal po ni 'og tu mdzub mo gnyis kyi kha 'bus pa khro gnyer la gzhag
149b1(rgyud): par bya ste/ pad+ma'i khro gnyer gyi spyan no// rdo rje bsdams la kha gyen du 'bar ba ni mgrin sngon gyi'o// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa mthe bos yongs su bzung ste/ dung gi dbyibs de g.yas pa'i ma/
149b2(rgyud): bong ba slang ba bteg ste/ mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i pad+ma dang / sor mo lhag pa yang dag par brkyang ba'i 'khor lo ni pad+ma'i khyab 'jug ma'o// pad+ma las byung ba'i mdzub mo gnyis
149b3(rgyud): bkug pa'i lcags kyu dang sor mo lhag ma kha phye ba'i pad+ma las byung ba'i zhes bya'o// rta mgrin gyi ni mdzub mo gnyis shin tu sbyar ba'i lcags kyu rgod ma'i kha shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i srin lag
149b4(rgyud): gi rtse mo dang / mthe'u chung dang gnyis rab tu brkyang ba so sor phye la g.yon g.yo zhing bzung ba ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya'o// 'di rnams kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / las thams
149b5(rgyud): cad dang / grol ba thams cad dang / dgug pa thams cad kyi dngos grub don yod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bshad pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni kha
149b6(rgyud): nAM ga bcings nas pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du gzung bas so// ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzungs dgug pa ni chos kyi ngag gis bzlas pa'i don shes pa'o//
149b7(rgyud): ped+ma chen po bcings nas yid kyi sbyin sreg bya'o// sems kyis zhi bar bya'o// dngos po bsrung bar bya'o// rnam par srung bar bya'o zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya'o// las thams cad
150a1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud do// / de nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po de bzhin
150a2(rgyud): no// dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje rin chen te mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i sor mo bzhi ni rtse mo mnyam na sa 'og tu rab tu bsdu te/ dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje thal mos dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'o//
150a3(rgyud): des ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje de nyid snying khar ro// gyen du kha blta ba'o// de nyid khu tshur ro// khu tshur spyi bor bzhag la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o//
150a4(rgyud): 'di nyid dbus su bzhag nas las kyi phyag rgyar bzung ba'o// dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter gyi mchod pa thob pa'i don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
150a5(rgyud): kyis las kyi dam tshig ni gsal ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar bstod nas g.yas pa nor sbyin pa bkrol ba'o// nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya nyid kyis
150a6(rgyud): so// snying po'i ngag klu'i rgyal pos bzla ba ste bka' bsgo zhing de bzhin du las la nye bar sbyor ba'o// gal te ma grub ni dbang bskur bar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis nam mkhar
150a7(rgyud): las thams cad kyi bka' bsgo ba'o// chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi tshogs ni 'di'o// don yod thogs med grub pa dang // las kyi tshogs ni sgrub pa dang // ngag gi phyag rgya'i bka'
150b1(rgyud): bsgob// thams cad myur du mkha' las byung // zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// // de nas phyi
150b2(rgyud): rgyud ni phyag rgya cher po ni g.yon par kham por dang g.yas na mda' bstod pa'o// de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'jug pa la bya ste/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gi gdu bu sa lu gu rgyud
150b3(rgyud): bcing bar byas la mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag mnyam ste rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ni ming po rnams kyi'o// ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas lha mo rnams kyi'o// rdo rje bsdams pa'i
150b4(rgyud): dbus ma dang srin lag gis sor mo'i rtse mo bzhi la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung bzhi'i rtse mo 'dus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go// sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi
150b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyis brtag par ma nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings te bltas na dkyil 'khor brtag pa dang / mthong ba dang / mchod pa ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur ro// gdengs
150b6(rgyud): ka car gyi dbang po rnams kyi ni mthe bong bcings nas phyi rol tu kha bltas pa'i sor mo gdengs ka sgreng ba ste/ klu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya
150b7(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig ste/ gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// lto 'phye lag pa ste thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// dbus ma srin leg bzhi'i mdud pa legs par byed pa'i sbyor bas
151a1(rgyud): nye bar stod cing bsdus la mthe'u chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis kyis 'ardeg par bya ste/ nye bar 'phel ba dug thams cad 'bar ba'o// kun nas bsdus na dug thams cad
151a2(rgyud): 'ching ba'o// 'di nyid kyis dug thams cad bza' ba dang / 'pho ba dang / dug med par bya'o// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rjes khros nas myur du gzhig par bya'o//
151a3(rgyud): phyi'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mchog dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag nas// ba dan gsum ni yongs
151a4(rgyud): su bzung // rdo rje khyab 'jug ces bya ba// dor na thams cad gcod par byed// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi mgo rnams bcad nas mchog tu byung ba thams cad//
151a5(rgyud): grub pa'o// mthe'u chung mthe bong dang spel ba'i// lag gnyis steng du 'og tu ni// dbus ma gsum gyi rtse gsum mtshan// rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dam tshig
151a6(rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba don yod pa'i dam tshig go// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bzhag nas// gang der ji bzhin de bzhin du// shin tu thob dka'i sangs rgyas kyang //
151a7(rgyud): sgrub pa bzlas pas sgrub par byed// rdo rje chos nyid ces bya ba'i phyag rgya sgrol ma'o// mdzub mo bsdams pa'i phyi rol dgug/ mthe bong rdo rje bkab pa ste// rdo rje chen po'i nor bu ster//
151b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/
151b2(rgyud): de la dang po re zhig dang po'i dngos grub brgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po stong 'gyur te/ ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis lag pa
151b3(rgyud): g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa dag ni rdo rje chen po'i sbyor ba las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu sgrub par byed pa'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bcings pas so// de ltar
151b4(rgyud): ra rang gi mtshan gyi khu tshur rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya stong dang po'i las kyis tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje las byed pa gsum mo// de ltar lag pa g.yas pa dang // g.yon
151b5(rgyud): pa'i cig shos kyis las thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya stong bzhi pa'o// de ltar na ma lus pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni lag pa gcig gis phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar ba
151b6(rgyud): tu sgrub pa'o// de ltar 'gro ba don kun tu// 'khor dang dam tshig las dang bcas// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpas sgrub par mdzad// de ltar gas/
151b7(rgyud): brgya chen rmad du byung // mchog tu 'gro ba thams cad skyong byed pa// mchog dang po yi tha mabla na med// gsal ba'i rgyud ni nga yis yang dag mi shad// dpal mchog dang
152a1(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po las// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud do// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba kun gyi bdag brtan pas// de nyid
152a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rgyud chen po// mtshon cha dam pa 'di gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i tshogs mchog tu mkhas shing phra
152a3(rgyud): ba rgya che la zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa/ bla na med pa'i bla ma mthar thug pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med/
152a4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub pa po don yod cing thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang bas gsungs so// ma ma ru so rnams kyis
152a5(rgyud): bzung la dga' ba chen pos dang po'i rdo rje blta bas lta zhing byed bdag gis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// bde ba chen po'i
152a6(rgyud): gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhad pa chen pos dgod cing brtan pa'i rdo rje lta bu byed pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
152a7(rgyud): cad kyi las rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// khro gnyer dang bcas pa/ khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i byed pa dang / sna'i dbugs
152b1(rgyud): chen po'i yi ge'i hUM gis rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ rdo rje nyi ma ltar me 'bar ba'i lta ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bas cung zad 'dzum pas dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi
152b2(rgyud): ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba'i byed pa rnams kyis mchu mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ pad+ma chen po'i
152b3(rgyud): spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phra bar 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i byed pa rnams dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang bzhad pas nam mkha' la dngos grub
152b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa ste/ rdo rje chen po ni nor bu'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// don yod thogs med grub pa dang // bden pa'i bdag nyid 'jigs pa med// sangs
152b5(rgyud): rgyas kun dang bdag nyid kyang // gsang ba'i phyag rgya legs grub stsol// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang // de nas de phyir mchog dang po// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ dang po
152b6(rgyud): shin tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ mchog gi mchog ni dang po dang // mchog tu gsang ba dam pa ste// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs tshogs// rdo rje sems
152b7(rgyud): dpas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje 'chang chen slob dpon ni// mchog tu dang zhing rab dga' bas// snying po la sogs rnams med kyang // myur du thams cad sgrub par byed// snying po phyag rgya sngags
153a1(rgyud): rigs pa/ sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas// ma grub rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig grub par ma gyur dang //
153a2(rgyud): bsod nams phur tshogs mi ldan na// bdag nyid dam ni rdo rje sems// bsgrubs na de ni myur du 'grub// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po sogs dang nye snying pos// bsgrub pa byas kyang /
153a3(rgyud): ma grub na// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya// de phyir gsang ba'i btsun mo 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' rab dga' byed// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// dgyes pa de yis myur du 'grub/
153a4(rgyud): de nyid chen po 'di grub pa// dam pa mchog gi bdag nyid ni// gsang ba mchog tu bsod nams ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod min// de nyid grub pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rdo rje sems
153a5(rgyud): dpa'i grub pa dang // gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// de bzhin gzhan la sbyin mi bya// gang gis grub par ma gyur na// de la de nyid sbyin par bya// de nyid 'dzum pas myur du ni//
153a6(rgyud): bdag byin brlabs pas 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po dag pa 'di// rdo rje can gyi mtshon cha mchog/ phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla med pa// mchog tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// de nyid
153a7(rgyud): dang pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon kun mchog la// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni gcig pu 'di// bdag nyid gang
153b1(rgyud): la yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis ni// mi thub pa dang mi sod 'gyur// de la rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dngos grub kun gsol ba// kun gsol kun byed thams
153b2(rgyud): cad du// bka' bsgo ba kun grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po gsang ba'i bla ma dam pa'i dpal rang gi dam rig gi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'o// /
153b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog dang po mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab la mtha' med cing shin tu mtha'
153b4(rgyud): yas pa/ tshad med cing gzhal du med pa/ bla na med pa// don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi snying po mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba thams cad
153b5(rgyud): kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dam pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dang / rab tu dga' ba thams cad
153b6(rgyud): dang bde ba dang / yid bde ba'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa dang / mchog gi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs
153b7(rgyud): so// tsum pa nas 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog dang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni/ dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor
154a1(rgyud): zhes bya bar te thams cad rnal 'byor zhes bya bar gang brjod pa'o// de gang dang gang la nye bar sbyor ba de dang der bcom ldan 'das ni kun mchog dngos grub chen
154a2(rgyud): po yi/ dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// byin rlabs mchog ni rtags mdzad nas// rdo rje sems dpa' myur du 'grub/ tsum pa na 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya'i rgyas
154a3(rgyud): btab pa tsam gyis kyang ma lus shing lus pa med pa dang / lhag ma med pa thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs
154a4(rgyud): yid kyi 'dod pa grub par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g.yo ba'i mig gi zur gyis blta ba'i phyag rgya
154a5(rgyud): ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i mda' zhes bya bas rgyas btab pas thams cad rjes su chags pa dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dngos
154a6(rgyud): grub mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// 'dzum zhing cung zad phye ba'i mig gis lta ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i
154a7(rgyud): dpal rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par byed pa ste 'dis blta zhing btung bar bya'o// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga'
154b1(rgyud): ba'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ tshe zad pa thams cad kyang 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod gzhon pa dang / nad med pa dang / gzugs dang
154b2(rgyud): stobs dang / gzi brjid kyi stobs dang / sme ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / shin tu bde ba thams cad
154b3(rgyud): dang / yid bde ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa ste/ ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyis rgyas btab pa tsam
154b4(rgyud): gyis skad cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o// bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i g.yon pa'i mig dgod cing bstod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog
154b5(rgyud): gi dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang / phyag byed du bcug pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / ji bzhin ji srid
154b6(rgyud): mchog thams cad grub cing dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang / 'dzum pa dang / gsong zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom
154b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba chen po dpal don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan
155a1(rgyud): pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos grub thams cad la rgyas brtab pas 'dud par gyur nas/ dngos grub mchog thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi
155a2(rgyud): tshogs kyis mchog gi dam pa'i dngos grub kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'phrul pa dang skrag pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje
155a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod dga' bas rnam par 'phrul pa brtson pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
155a4(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mchog dang po'i glu ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni// dbang phyug cher po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin kun rgyal ba ste// mi 'gyur mchog
155a5(rgyud): ni 'grub par 'gyur// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyis thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen
155a6(rgyud): po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams 'grub par byed do// sarba ku ru ya thA su khaM/ zhes bya ba brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa
155a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
155b1(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus
155b2(rgyud): shing lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las
155b3(rgyud): tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing smin ma'i khro gnyer rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khre bo ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste
155b4(rgyud): 'dis rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'bebs pa dang /
155b5(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / gar dang / glu dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang / bden ngag thams cad dang / grol ba dang / phra dbab pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / sgyu ma thams
155b6(rgyud): cad dang / rmad du byung ba thams cad so sor ston pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba ston pa dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang gnod pa dang
155b7(rgyud): gdul ba dang / gsod pa dang // thams cad phyir 'dzin pa dang / thams cad sgrub pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gzhom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi
156a1(rgyud): tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// thams cad dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs// sna tshogs pa yi bya ba la// rab tu 'jug
156a2(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa byin gyis brlab// rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste/ thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang / srung ba dang /
156a3(rgyud): yongs su sbyong ba dang / rims thams cad dang / dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / nad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya nye bar zhi ba dang / shi ba yang dag par gso ba
156a4(rgyud): dang dbang phyug thams cad thob pa dang / gzugs sna tshogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
156a5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu byed pa'o// nam mkha' phra bar bskyod pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams cad kyi rjes su chags par bya ste/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i
156a6(rgyud): snying po'i rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas btab pas bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags shing dgyes pa dang / brtan par rjes su chags nas nam mkha'
156a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag nyid kur gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi rogs yid/
156b1(rgyud): la 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba yang gsungs so// mchog dang po ni mchog nyid du/ gsang ba dam pa gsungs pa yin/ mig sogs phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
156b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje kun 'dzin slob dpon gyis// tsum+ban dang 'khyud sogs kyis// thams cad rnal 'byor rjes sgrub ste/ myur du kun la rgyas
156b3(rgyud): gdab bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// sgrub pa med pa rnams la yang // dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// gang la dngos grub med/
156b4(rgyud): gyur dang // bsod nams phun tshogs med pa yang // bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ma/ rgyas gad ba myur du 'grub par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog
156b5(rgyud): snying po la sogs te snying pos// bsgrub bya grub par ma gyur na// tsum+ba sogs kyis rgyas gdab bya// gang phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya re// dngos grub kun gyi bde dam pa// rdorje
156b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i mchod pa mchog/ de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po 'di grub pa/ mchog gi bdag nyid dam pa ste// mchog tu gsang ba bsod nams ldan//
156b7(rgyud): so so'i sgo bo la brjod min// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sbyin te gzhan la sbyin mi bya/ 6/
157a1(rgyud): rgya'i rgyud 'di 'ba' zhig gis// bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// mi thub pa dang sod mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje
157a2(rgyud): 'dzin/ kun mchog dngos grub kun stsol ba// thams cad mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen// thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
157a3(rgyud): dpas gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud phyag rgya bcu pa rdzogs so// // de nas mchog tu mkhas shing
157a4(rgyud): phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shin tu mtha' yas pa/ tshad med cing gzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi lang zhing rab tu khyab pa/ mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i
157a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad pa'o// zhe bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'i rdo rjes gsungs so// de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid thams cad skyed par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i
157a6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o// sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du
157a7(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa ste/ de la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang / kha nAM ka'i phyag rgya bcings nas g.yon pa dril bu dang bcas shing g.yas pa bslang ba'i tshul du byed pa ste/
157b1(rgyud): sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo la sogs pa dkrol ba'i gar gyis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma bstod pa ste/ thams cad kyi mchog dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog
157b2(rgyud): gi phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dgyes pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba ste/ des rdo rje bsnyems ma yongs su btang bar
157b3(rgyud): byas na dngos grub bzhir 'gyur ro// rdo rje bsnyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btab na thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur/
157b4(rgyud): ba'i mchog go// mda' gsor bas rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rjes su chags par byed na/ bud med gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos// rdo rje ki li ki las rgyas btab na lha
157b5(rgyud): dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rol par byed cing ma grub na'ang thams cad sgrub par nus pa yin no// chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad las rnam par rgyal
157b6(rgyud): bab dang gsod pa'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongs su dgod cing 'phreng po dor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa'o// mchog/
157b7(rgyud): tu gsang ba'i ras ris kyi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi mchod pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad thob pa
158a1(rgyud): mi bzad pa'o// rdo rje bstod pa'i phyag rgyas srid pa gsum thams cad bskyod pa dang rab tu byed pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya dang rkang pas lha'i gzugs brnyan
158a2(rgyud): maran cing rgyas btab nas sdigs mdzub byas te/ lha la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de ring por mo thogs par rgyas btab pas bka' bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur
158a3(rgyud): ro// stan mthon po la skyil krung byed pas 'dug ste rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas/ dngos grub yid du
158a4(rgyud): 'ong ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams nyams su myong na/ lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang dgos/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi rtags bzung nas
158a5(rgyud): g.yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol bar byed pa'am sgrub par byed pa ste/ rdo rje sems
158a6(rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba ni bcu ste/ snying khar sen mo 'drud pa'o// lcags kyu brdeg pa'o//
158a7(rgyud): g.yon pa'i lcags kyu la zhags pa de gzhug pa'i lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o// phan tshun sems drud pa'i snying khar byas pa'o// lce mnyam par byin pa'o// snying khar rdo rje bstan par rab/
158b1(rgyud): tu bzhag pa'o// rdo rjes byab pa'o// rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo // 'di rnams kyis dngos grub dang / phun sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil
158b2(rgyud): 'khor dang / chos dang / ye shes dang / las dang / bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod par thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las
158b3(rgyud): byung ba'i las bcu ni/ dbus ma'i lcags kyus so// kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so// mthe bong rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthil gnyis su drud pa'o// mdzub
158b4(rgyud): ma rdo rje de nyid kyi lcags kyu gnyis so// dbus ma'i rdo rje'o// de nyid kyi sor mo'i rtse mo bcing bar bya'o// srin lag gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o// mthe'u chung
158b5(rgyud): gi rdo rje'i// de nyid kyis mthe bong gnyis kyi sen mo btsir ba'o// 'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang / rjes su chags pa
158b6(rgyud): dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dgug pa dang / rol pa dang / chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad smar gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgod du gzhug pa
158b7(rgyud): dang gsod pa'o// de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni/ rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad brtan par rjes su chags
159a1(rgyud): pa ni rdo rje lta bas so// rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang du g.yo bar byed pas mya ngan dang btung ba'o// chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas
159a2(rgyud): so// de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyis dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung pa gnyis bstod pas so// thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying khar bzhugs pas so// yod pa thams cad rnyed
159a3(rgyud): pa ni mig dgug pas so// 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i sman pa'i gdong gis blta bas so// thams cad 'bebs pa'i cho ga ni rang snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las
159a4(rgyud): rnams kyis so// 'dod pa'i chags pa bsad pa ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid sdang bar byed pas so// 'dod pa thams cad kyi rjes su spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed
159a5(rgyud): pa ni bka' bsgo bas so// de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la'ang nye bar sbyor ba na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing //
159a6(rgyud): mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni
159a7(rgyud): bsnyems pa'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'o// rdo rje mtshon chams thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang rjes su chags pa'o// rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang
159b1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad bde bas grub pa'o// rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal lo// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do// dus kyi
159b2(rgyud): mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do// rdo rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o// rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang thams cad 'phrog pa'o// g.yon pa bsnyems shing
159b3(rgyud): g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis las rnams kyi sgyu ma dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang / so sor ston pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa
159b4(rgyud): dang bskor ba dang / baspad pa dang / 'bru dang / ltung ba 'pho ba dang / dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
159b5(rgyud): bcu ni// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o// rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams cad do// mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams
159b6(rgyud): cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyi mthe bo'i rdo rje btab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o// de nyid kyi mthe bong gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad srung ba'i mthe bong rdo rje/
159b7(rgyud): nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems can rjes su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du byed pa sgrub pa'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis
160a1(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyis legs par bzung bas mthe bong ni dpal dgug pa dang dbang du byed pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang dpal
160a2(rgyud): dbrog pa'o// de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su btsir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o//
160a3(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// sems dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol du gzhug pa'o//
160a4(rgyud): de'ang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so// rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los
160a5(rgyud): so// mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag gi 'khor lo bsgreng bar byas la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung mnyam la bral bar bya ste/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis
160a6(rgyud): rgyas btab cing sgrub par 'gyur ro// btsir bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o// mdzub mo phrag dog la
160a7(rgyud): sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o// rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas sgrub pa'o// skye gnas g.yo bas bud med dang skyes pa dag gis
160b1(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha' yas pa'o// kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba'ang ngo //
160b2(rgyud): rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil drud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi blta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu bde ba de yid bde ba
160b3(rgyud): ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// skye gnas kyis sen mo drud pas skyes bu rnams so// de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ de la lus
160b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud la ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/ rmongs pas bde ba ster du gzhug/ sgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje sems
160b5(rgyud): dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta s+t+waM zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas grub par 'gyur ro// rab tu dga' ba'i ye
160b6(rgyud): shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i gsang ba khu tshur ni thams cad sgrub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i blta bas thams cad grub pa'o// smin
160b7(rgyud): ma gyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong ba'o// rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba bzang po chen po sgrub pa'o// rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyis bden pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid gsal
161a1(rgyud): zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o// rang gi lus la 'bebs pas gzugs thams cad yongs su bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rang sangs rgyas su'ang 'gyur ba yin/
161a2(rgyud): no// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas nam mkha' la 'gro ba'o// de nas dang po'i las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni// rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAMgs so// dngos grub thams
161a3(rgyud): cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do// thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i
161a4(rgyud): khu tshur dag gis so// nor thams cad dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa ni
161a5(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams
161a6(rgyud): cad gzhug cing don yod par sgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs par
161a7(rgyud): med pa skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / mu kuN+Da dang / cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga zlum dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / guny+dza
161b1(rgyud): dang / ti mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rims dang / dug dang sbyar dug dang / gdon//
161b2(rgyud): las grol ba dang / gsod pa dang / 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa yin no zhes bya ba gsungs so// 'dod chagaso chen po rnam dag
161b3(rgyud): phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin// phyag rgya'i rtog pa rab tu brtags// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rje 'brang la// rtogs tsam gyis ni skad cig
161b4(rgyud): gis / don yod kun grub bde bar gsol// zhes bya'o// dpal mchog dang po las/ mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas
161b5(rgyud): mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa/ tshad med cing gzhal du med pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub
161b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa'i grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
161b7(rgyud): dpas gsungs so// phyag rgya chen po mnyam bzhag nas// sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis// las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya// thams cad gar gyis bsgrub par bya// bde ba
162a1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ste/ brgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje
162a2(rgyud): bsdams pa bcings nas ni// kha sbyor mang du gsal ba ste// mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis// las kyi phyag rgya brgya gzhan yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//
162a3(rgyud): rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa che'i// thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na// dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo
162a4(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsnyems mas gar bya zhing // sgeg bcas mthe'u rung sogs bkrol bas// de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing // phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin// zhes bya
162a5(rgyud): brdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag nas// thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya// mchog
162a6(rgyud): dang po yi las chen po'i// phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin no// zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya// mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya/
162a7(rgyud): rab tu dga' mchog ma bkrol bar// bde ba nyid du mngon par sbyar// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje mis
162b1(rgyud): de bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas// las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya// mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag/ ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o//
162b2(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga/ lus kun gyis ni gar bya zhing // rdo rje gar mchog glu blang zhing // dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o// ji ltar gong du brgya gsungs pa// rol mo
162b3(rgyud): mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa// phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste/ phyag rgya
162b4(rgyud): stong mchog tu grub pa'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo
162b5(rgyud): grub mchog ster// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu zhugs// dam
162b6(rgyud): pa mchog tu grub par byed// mchog gi dam pa rgyud chen po// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// phyag rgya kun gyi/
162b7(rgyud): tshul 'di ni// bstan par bya ste gzhan la min// de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi// mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan// dpal
163a1(rgyud): mchog dang po'i gsal ba'i de nyid mchog gi sku'i tshul lo// mchog tu rtag pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug pa'o// dpal mchog dang po las/ dam pa
163a2(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'chang chen gcom
163a3(rgyud): ni// mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol// kun mchog nam mkha' chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// de nyid sems
163a4(rgyud): dpa' chen pos gsungs// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa// gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la// dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags// de bzhin
163a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid// rdo rje bsnyems bdag ji ltar lags// sems dpa' sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang
163a6(rgyud): chen nyid dang ni// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub sangs rgyas ji ltar lags// rdo rje gtum mo mthar byed nyid// phyag rgya rdo rje ji ltar lags//
163a7(rgyud): ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang // 'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags// ji ltar mgon po rnam gsum dang // khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid// dang po'i snying po ji ltar lags// de ci
163b1(rgyud): nye snying ji ltar lags// bde chen rdo rje chen po yi// don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor zhes bya ji skad gsungs// de yi rnam smin ji lta bu// thig gdab pa dang
163b2(rgyud): brtag pa yis// dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags// gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba// ji ltar gyur pa ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni// rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar
163b3(rgyud): lags// thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang // phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang // thams cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che// bdag byin brlabs sogs sgrub pa che// de ni de nyid
163b4(rgyud): gsang ba dang // don yod pa ni mchog nyid de// mi 'gyur dam pa sgrub pa'i phyir// thams cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
163b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis mchog gi mdo gsungs so// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni// the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su// 'di yi lan ni gsungs pa yin//
163b6(rgyud): la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las// sems can don ni yongs brtags pas// des na rtogs par gsungs pa ste// rtog pa yongs su dag/
163b7(rgyud): phyir ro// de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na/ rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad// phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung // de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang // phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod// de la/
164a1(rgyud): dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog/ bde ba chen po dga' ba che'i// grong/
164a2(rgyud): khyer der ni mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so// de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems
164a3(rgyud): dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na/ nam mkha' sgrub mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan
164a4(rgyud): 'das de gang yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ de la bcom ldan 'das
164a5(rgyud): dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa// de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di// 'dod chags chen po'i dga' ba che//
164a6(rgyud): de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag la kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga
164a7(rgyud): mchog/ de la rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis// dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog/ rdo rje dbang phyug cher bstod pas//
164b1(rgyud): rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod// dngos grub kun gyi/
164b2(rgyud): 'byor pa rnams// de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom
164b3(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis sems can ji ltar yin zhen
164b4(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba// zab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba// thams cad khyab cing dri ma med// byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa// de nas 'di las khyad par ni// sems/
164b5(rgyud): nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas// ting 'dzin de la mnyam par bzhag/ rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun// rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na//
164b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i byin rlabs ni// bdag la byin brlabs mchog sgrub pa// nyin re sgrub par byed na des// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i
164b7(rgyud): spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang // gang phyir sems can don gyur pas// de phyir nga ni kun tu bzang // byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o// de la
165a1(rgyud): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rang
165a2(rgyud): sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor
165a3(rgyud): rtog pa'i phyir// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de phyir de nyid sangs rgyas nyid// bdag byin brlabs mchog grub phyir ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/
165a4(rgyud): mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang // gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste// byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdag/ kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni//
165a5(rgyud): mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin// brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// des na phyag na rdo rje des// de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa rgyud yin zhe na/ shes rab pha rol
165a6(rgyud): phyin pa yum// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir// rigs rnams rab tu byung ba'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thar pa yin zhe na/
165a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che// dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir// dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan
165b1(rgyud): 'das rnam pa gsum pa yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir// nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir// gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir// 'jig rten gsum pa
165b2(rgyud): khams gsum nga // de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ nga ni brtan pa thams cad bde// bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus
165b3(rgyud): byas phyir// sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ srid pa
165b4(rgyud): shin tu grub pa yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir// gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir// bskal pa thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de nas de gang yin zhe
165b5(rgyud): na'adod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ gsang ba'i phyir ni snying po brjod// yi ge hUM ni mi 'gyur mchog/ de nas nye ba'i snying po yi//
165b6(rgyud): de kho na nyid shes pa ni// de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang // snying po rab tu brjod par bya// snying po'i rjes su sgrub par 'grub// nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod// de la ji ltar bde
165b7(rgyud): ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje de nyid don yod grub// dam tshig 'da'
166a1(rgyud): bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin/
166a2(rgyud): zhe na/ ji ltar gnas dang 'khor lo dang // ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba dang // 'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang // de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis sprul// de nas rnam par shes pa ni// /
166a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyis// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no// de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni// shes
166a4(rgyud): rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// rdo rje thig gis yongs
166a5(rgyud): bskor bar// ka ba brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing // sgo bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang // dra ba dra phyed la sogs brgyan// der bdag po yi don shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na/ nam/
166a6(rgyud): mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das gang zhe na/ kun
166a7(rgyud): mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//
166b1(rgyud): de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang gis// pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa// thams cad dag pa bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug nyid//
166b2(rgyud): nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid ni/ rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir// sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus//
166b3(rgyud): zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar nam mkha' snying po yin zhe na/ thams cad nam mkha'i bcom ldan 'das// sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che// nam mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang //
166b4(rgyud): de nas nor bu'i rigs kyis ni// dbang bskur ba dang gter dang ni// rdo rje rgyal tshan mchod pa che// nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o//
166b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas rin
166b6(rgyud): chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la// spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o// de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do// kun mchog dngos grub cher
166b7(rgyud): po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon ma che// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do// de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid ces pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams
167a1(rgyud): cad sangs rgyas nyid// sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje nan// 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos// nor bu nor bu bsngags pa'o// zhes bya ba dbyung bskur ba thams cad
167a2(rgyud): phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyis// rdo rje lcags kyu
167a3(rgyud): dril bcas pas// bkug ste de nas rjes sgrub pa// dril bu nyid kyi bya ba yin// ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// rab tu dga' bas
167a4(rgyud): mchod nas ni// klu dang rol mo rnams 'phrul bas// mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod// de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin/
167a5(rgyud): zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// phyag rgya kun gyis legs byin brlabs// dam tshig chen po'i 'di nyid kyis// / rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas
167a6(rgyud): thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba'i mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// /
167a7(rgyud): de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya gang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag
167b1(rgyud): thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas// rdo rje dril bus rab sad cing // rtog pa thams cad rjes sgrub pas// mchog
167b2(rgyud): dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// de la ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni// phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yis// ci 'dod spyod
167b3(rgyud): pa la spyod cing // thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'// langs pa'am ni 'dug pa 'am// gang dang de ru 'chag pa'am// dgod pa dang ni smra ba'am// gang der ci bzhin de bzhin no//
167b4(rgyud): dbang po gang dang gang lam 'gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// mnyam par bzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad//
167b5(rgyud): nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni// mkhas pa gang zhing dad pas klog/ de ni
167b6(rgyud): sdig kun dang bral bas// dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug 'gyur// zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams mchog gi bla
167b7(rgyud): mi gsal// mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol// rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin brlabs pa/
168a1(rgyud): bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin padaga' chen mchog gis de gsungs so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/
168a2(rgyud): mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bstod nas ni// rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungs so// bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o// bde chen mchog
168a3(rgyud): gi mchog dang rjes su chags pa che// kur mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni// kun mchog 'byor pa'i dbang phyug gso ba yin// mtha' yas pa dang thog
168a4(rgyud): med mthar thug med pa ni// mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po// nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel go sol// de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par
168a5(rgyud): rus pa min// sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'// dad pa med cing slu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa// rtag tu rjes su chags shing chags bral la chags pa//
168a6(rgyud): rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o// gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu sgrub pa'am// yong na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed// so sor nyams su
168a7(rgyud): myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du// bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad
168b1(rgyud): 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs// des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan// bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan
168b2(rgyud): la sogs pa// ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed// rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur//
168b3(rgyud): rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni// gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min// 'dir ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin// rtogs pas dngos
168b4(rgyud): grub 'phel zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yin// nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin// rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis/
168b5(rgyud): sgrub byed pa// de la nga ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed// dngos grub chen po la thams cad du rjes su chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang // shin tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang
168b6(rgyud): rtag tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no// gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po sgrub byed pa// rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad// de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde
168b7(rgyud): ba'ang thob// de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ yang mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs//
169a1(rgyud): sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legs so legs/ rdo rje mchog na rdu rje 'byung ba legs// dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs so legs// sangs rgyas
169a2(rgyud): rnams kyis yang dag byin brlabs pa// rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa che// ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyis nas kyang ni de bzhin grub pa 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen gsungs
169a3(rgyud): nas ni// sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi// gsung la rjes su yi rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang po las// rtog pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog
169a4(rgyud): rdzogs so// thugs dam sa'i snying po zo ling du rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po man+ta ka la sha dang / snga bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba lha btsan po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i
169a5(rgyud): 'od kyi zhal snga nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ lo tsa chen po rin chen bzang po yi// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la// bar ba dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas// bdag gis
169a6(rgyud): 'bad pas dpe btsa la rnyed pas bsgyur// rgya kar skad du/ Ar+ya pra dzA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsa sha ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags
169a7(rgyud): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
169b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin
169b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
169b3(rgyud): nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyis bya ba mdzad de/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che
169b4(rgyud): ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang
169b5(rgyud): byed kyi gnas/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu sbas pa dang / ba dan kha dog sna tshogs jil bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba
169b6(rgyud): dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan 'phreng dang / chun 'phyar dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa shes pa bstod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'
169b7(rgyud): bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang nam mkha'i snying po dang //
170a1(rgyud): dam la tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma pag su chos kyi 'khar lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/
170a2(rgyud): chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' byeb phrag 'argya dang thabs cig ste/ yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas
170a3(rgyud): nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kying bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i no zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba
170a4(rgyud): don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to// 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni
170a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags kyi mda' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag
170a6(rgyud): pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
170a7(rgyud): thams cad la dbang phyug dang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
170b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
170b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// snyoms pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyar rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
170b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/
170b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/
170b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
170b6(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
170b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi
171a1(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// lag na rdo rje su la la chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
171a2(rgyud): lar cig thos na'ang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang / chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags/
171a3(rgyud): kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur// sdig pa'ang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa dang //
171a4(rgyud): nyi re bzhin klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas chos thams cad la
171a5(rgyud): dbang bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de
171a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'am/ rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/
171a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa dag na/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems
171b1(rgyud): can gyi khams lus med pa 'dul ba/ don thams grub pa/ dam tshig chen po la rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can du mas g.yog byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don
171b2(rgyud): 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas/ rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / bde ba chen po rdo rje
171b3(rgyud): don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs/
171b4(rgyud): bathams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa
171b5(rgyud): nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo
171b6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid
171b7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// lag na rdo rje su la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom
172a1(rgyud): pade sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro// myur du bla na med
172a2(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin padon
172a3(rgyud): gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di rab tu smras so// a de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba
172a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang / yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di
172a5(rgyud): bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis so// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do// gti mug gi spros pa med
172a6(rgyud): pa nyid kyis/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rje sul la shes
172a7(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / slom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song
172b1(rgyud): ma 'gyur pa/ snang brdzun mdas dzugs rgyas mngan rnams par / []sa u smAs m+b+ha k+Sha da
172b2(rgyud): po ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgya ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas// khrog nyer dang bcas shing sbyin ma bteg ste 'bar bar lta la pang+gA'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ myan ba gcig
172b3(rgyud): nas rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas
172b4(rgyud): yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas/
172b5(rgyud): 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pas
172b6(rgyud): 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje su la
172b7(rgyud): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang / pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes
173a1(rgyud): pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
173a2(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmyal te pad+ma'i 'dag
173a3(rgyud): mkha'abyed pas/ 'dod chags la sogs pa dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing / pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hrIH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
173a4(rgyud): khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad
173a5(rgyud): de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad
173a6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
173a7(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum ste/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i 'greng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin
173b1(rgyud): po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// trAM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin/
173b2(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshes
173b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams
173b4(rgyud): cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
173b5(rgyud): kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
173b6(rgyud): 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / skom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang /
173b7(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
174a1(rgyud): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas/
174a2(rgyud): 'di rgya cher ston te/ de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// A/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de
174a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o//
174a4(rgyud): mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ chos
174a5(rgyud): thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du/ bdag gi ral grings
174a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smras so// A/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor/
174a7(rgyud): der 'dus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ de bzhin
174b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro//
174b2(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug
174b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum nas/
174b4(rgyud): rje 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas
174b5(rgyud): pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ma
174b6(rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni ga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de
174b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tham cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang /
175a1(rgyud): ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems dpa' dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub
175a2(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// oM/
