175a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/
175a4(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ khro bo mnyam pa nyid do// sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid las/ khro bo 'dul ba nyid do//
175a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad chos nyid pas/ khro bo chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas/ khro bo rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas
175a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis khro bo'i gad mo zhes
175a7(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu
175b1(rgyud): phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams
175b2(rgyud): cad chos nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin
175b3(rgyud): gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
175b4(rgyud): ces bya ba'i snying 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
175b5(rgyud): tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams/
175b6(rgyud): cad snying rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas/ sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no// ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas/ sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no// sems can
175b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas/ sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no// de nas pha rol gyi rdo rje rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra byung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing sring lodul
176a1(rgyud): te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di yul lo// tI de nas mamo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ mgrin gcig tu thams/
176a2(rgyud): cad dgug pa dang / gzud pa dang / gzhig pa dang / slu ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// b+h+yoHde nas sbrang rtsir byed la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das
176a3(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal te/ mgrin gcig tu rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di smras so// swA/ de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// hUM/ de nas
176a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi
176a5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas/ de bzhin gsheg pa
176a6(rgyud): thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas/ rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad du mnyid/
176a7(rgyud): do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' thug pa med pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad mthar thug pa medapa nyid yin no// yul la shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di ldan pa dang / 'dzin pang /
176b1(rgyud): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / smyon pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ grib ma thams cad pang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'ang/
176b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ lag na rdo rje la legs
176b3(rgyud): mo zhes bya ba byin no// sems can chen po legs so legs// bde ba chen po legs so legs// theg pa chen po legs so legs// blo gros chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras/
176b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams
176b5(rgyud): cad kyis// de dag mi sod mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs
176b6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas sngags grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod// de nas bcom
176b7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas/ yang bde ba chen po rdo rngon/
177a1(rgyud): yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa'/
177a2(rgyud): chen po rnams kyis 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba
177a3(rgyud): chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub chen po grub pa dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma
177a4(rgyud): cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'jom pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stob
177a5(rgyud): rab tu 'joms la dngos grub dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum thams
177a6(rgyud): cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor ba la'ang chags shing brtson 'grus che
177a7(rgyud): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma lus pa na/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba dang /
177b1(rgyud): mchog tu ga me rjen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/ mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don/
177b2(rgyud): mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang // ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas na// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par gyur/ chag
177b3(rgyud): la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de skyeng phyir// 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'dul// ji ltar pad+ma rab 'bar yang // tshon gyi nyes pas
177b4(rgyud): mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba re zhing nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thob pas na
177b5(rgyud): sems can don rnams brtan par byed// lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang
177b6(rgyud): nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang
177b7(rgyud): tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog kyang grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro//
178a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po la gan d+ha rgyal bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pad+ma bdag pa shes rab kA rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rtsa sgo'i sngags
178a2(rgyud): tshig ni nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so// oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM 'gog pa med pa/ oM skye ba zlog pa/ oM rnam par shes pa
178a3(rgyud): byams cad/ oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/ oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i sems/ hUM phaT oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
178a4(rgyud): oM ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ oM las rnam par sbyong ba/ hUM oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can hUM phaT oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/ oM
178a5(rgyud): spong ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM thams cad 'dul ba/ oMhrIHoM a zhes bya ba'i sgo/ oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ A b+h+rUM hUM oM a/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mcho
178a6(rgyud): oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs rnam par dag pa/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aHoM a sdig pa 'ching ba thams cad choms shig/ ngan song gi rgyud thams
178a7(rgyud): cad las thar par gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen
178b1(rgyud): po dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi lag tu thob par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa
178b2(rgyud): rnams kyis mnyan pa'am/ yi ger 'dri ba'am/ yi ge brir gzhug pa'am/ bklag pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ bsgom pa'am/ bsti stang du bya ba'am/ ri mor bya ba 'am/ mchod par mi nus so//
178b3(rgyud): gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na'ang / sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa
178b4(rgyud): yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba phrag gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma la bkur stim byas pa dang / bla mar ma byas pa dang / bsti stang ma byas pa dang /
178b5(rgyud): mchod par ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur/
178b6(rgyud): ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de la bdud
178b7(rgyud): sdig to can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// yang ba ma spangs
179a1(rgyud): par 'chi bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der
179a2(rgyud): skye'o// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phar yon mang mod kyis/ ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
179a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang ga lha dang ga mi dang / lha ma yin dang ga dri zar bcas
179a4(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul brgya lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// /
179a5(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da a laM kA ra nA ma ma hA tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi
179a6(rgyud): zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gtsog na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang /
179a7(rgyud): las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dmachog gis ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs shing khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos
179b1(rgyud): rgyal por dbang bskur ba bems pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dmachog gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag chu ba rnyes pa
179b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su rud cing las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi reb thams cad yod/
179b3(rgyud): su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
179b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis bstan cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu brtags pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi 'phan dang / me tog gi chur po dang /
179b5(rgyud): dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing nye bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khang bzangs 'od mtha' yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
179b6(rgyud): pa'i gtsug lag khang la me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa/ de bzhin
179b7(rgyud): gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' yas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po 'od gsal ba'i gzhal med khang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
180a1(rgyud): gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi 'khrungs mi 'gog 'gog par mi 'gyur/
180a2(rgyud): ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
180a3(rgyud): sku/ de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la bzhugs so// de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems
180a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar te chos ston par mdzad pa ni thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge
180a5(rgyud): ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul yongs su dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do//
180a6(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa
180a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa rgya maro ltar
180b1(rgyud): zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa klu dang / gsung dang gzugs rdo rje nam mkha' lta bu/ kun+ten mo rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ klu rin po che chos kyi su
180b2(rgyud): pa'i sku/ ros mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems/ don yod pa/ yongs su bsdus pa/ dge ba 'phel ba/ rgyal po chen po/ snang ba'i tog bzhad pa po/ chos dang ldan pa/ shes rab
180b3(rgyud): 'khor lo/ skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung ba po/ gnod sbyin can/ mtshams sbyor ba/ yang dag pa'i gter/ gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo
180b4(rgyud): can/ ye shes can/ khyab 'jug chen po/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ka nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs
180b5(rgyud): su 'grod pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po/
180b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pas
180b7(rgyud): mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag las chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa'o// gzugs
181a1(rgyud): thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
181a2(rgyud): don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa// rin chen tog ste 'od byed pa// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i
181a3(rgyud): mgon// don yod pa ni las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
181a4(rgyud): la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes /
181a5(rgyud): su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su
181a6(rgyud): med cing mnyam nyid dmigs pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
181a7(rgyud): smon pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
181b1(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas so// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
181b2(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan rmongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu
181b3(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba chen po rab tu bgyis pa'i zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se gol brda bas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
181b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bsdus pa chen po'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ bud+d+ha sa mA dza AHhUMHoM hUM badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams
181b5(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byams rgya mtsho sprin khyab par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
181b6(rgyud): snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo gros kyis ye shes yongs su bskyed de gnas thams cad du rnam par garas
181b7(rgyud): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de
182a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pan kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i snying /
182a2(rgyud): bdag la yod de ngas bshad par bya'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ b+h+rUM/ de nas/ mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang // rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs/
182a3(rgyud): pa 'od dpag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs te/ zhugs/
182a4(rgyud): pa tsam gyis de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po thams cad kyi phyir byin gyis brlab par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po rnams las/
182a5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa
182a6(rgyud): de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i glang yin pa de ni 'di ltar
182a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpe'i gnas so// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang /
182b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i gnas so// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub
182b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub
182b3(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang
182b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar bya chub sems
182b5(rgyud): dpa'i gnas so// yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
182b6(rgyud): gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ji rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
182b7(rgyud): so/ ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dngos
183a1(rgyud): po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam
183a2(rgyud): par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ chos thams
183a3(rgyud): cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa'o// sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba brtan pa/ rdzib med pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying pos
183a4(rgyud): bka' stsal pa / b+h+rUM/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig tsam yang thos na/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i
183a5(rgyud): bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po thams cad nye bar bsags kyang nams kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song
183a6(rgyud): rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang sdig pa rnams byas na'ang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / rgyun ma chad
183a7(rgyud): par yid la byed pa de ni skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la dga' zhing mgul
183b1(rgyud): rab tu dka' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de
183b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po
183b3(rgyud): dang / rang ba sgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po'i rdo rje lta bur sra ba dang don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par
183b4(rgyud): byang chub pa'i rang bzhin mngon par bzhin rnam par dag pas/ chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub rin po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis thams
183b5(rgyud): cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pas byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di thos nas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / skom/
183b6(rgyud): par byed naji srid byang chub snying po la thug gi bar du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par ldan pa'ang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
183b7(rgyud): pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro// i/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pos chos thams cad mnyam pa
184a1(rgyud): nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dod chags
184a2(rgyud): kyi spros pa med pa'o// ne sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'o// gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad
184a3(rgyud): spros pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smos pa med par rig par bya'o// 'jam
184a4(rgyud): dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'dod la klog par byed na/ des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams
184a5(rgyud): bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i
184a6(rgyud): chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang chos thams cad rnam par gzigs pa'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di
184a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa / 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
184b1(rgyud): phyir/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen/
184b2(rgyud): ba'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jig rten gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
184b3(rgyud): pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin no// 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas nyan par byed cing 'dzi cing 'dod la sgom par byed de/ de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang badz+ra/
184b4(rgyud): lta bur 'dod rags kyi sbyor glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// hrIHde nas
184b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes
184b6(rgyud): bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal po yongs su thob par 'gyur ro// don gyi sbyin pas thams
184b7(rgyud): cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang /
185a1(rgyud): yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// tAM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnyed pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'drang ba de bzhin
185a2(rgyud): gshegs pa brtags pas/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de
185a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i
185a4(rgyud): don du 'gyur ba dang thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams
185a5(rgyud): cad rdo rje mchog tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos ras 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na/ des dngos grub
185a6(rgyud): thams cad dang / phun sum rogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad sos/
185a7(rgyud): yongs su thob par 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// AHde nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med
185b1(rgyud): ba'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yongs su bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa sbyor ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong
185b2(rgyud): pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med par nye bar bzung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab
185b3(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// AM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khongs su chud pa de
185b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang 'dus pa chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
185b5(rgyud): la 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas
185b6(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs par 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
185b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka'
186a1(rgyud): stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de ba'i/
186a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i ro ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang /
186a3(rgyud): 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
186a4(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal
186a5(rgyud): pa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang
186a6(rgyud): semA can thas cad rdo rje nyid dpas khro ba rdo rje dade/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas
186a7(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di dka' stsal ba/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas
186b1(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos nyid thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
186b2(rgyud): phyir pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par bya'o// hrI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
186b3(rgyud): kyis/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kur tu bzang po bdag nyid
186b4(rgyud): thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas sems
186b5(rgyud): can thams cad rin po che'i phung po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad las kyi
186b6(rgyud): snying po'o// hrI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i chos la mi gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ slar yang chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas pas
186b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha'
187a1(rgyud): med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos
187a2(rgyud): thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad yongs su mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol
187a3(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de ni dag cing mthar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par
187a4(rgyud): grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro// b+h+yo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
187a5(rgyud): kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas/ slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo
187a6(rgyud): dam pa thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus las grol ba pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog
187a7(rgyud): tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang
187b1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'jom pas mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems
187b2(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po
187b3(rgyud): rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum mtha' dag gis dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i
187b4(rgyud): mchog shin tu bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur te ra sAM/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa// de srid mnyam med sems can don//
187b5(rgyud): mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni thams cad rnam dag pas// srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro// chags sogs rab
187b6(rgyud): ldan 'jig rten ni// kun nas sred par sdig byed pa// de dag rnam par sbyang don du// de rnams 'dod chags chen po 'dzin// ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba// dmar po'i skyon gyis mgos ltar// bag chags
187b7(rgyud): skyon gyis srid pa ru// rtag tu 'gro phan gos mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen po nor chen po// khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su// de dag don ni brtan par byed//
188a1(rgyud): 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sku'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid re bzhin du rang bar langs te/ gang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang
188a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / brjod par byed na/ des bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro//
188a3(rgyud): hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste/
188a4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ oM nA maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwa nAM/ oM bo d+hi ts+tshit+ta badz+ra/ oM samAn+ta b+ha dra tsAr+ye d+hi/ oM tsan+ti ma Ni/ oM a ni ro d+hi/ oM dzat+ti b+hi b+ha te/ oM dzA te pa ri wa ra te/ ma hA rA gA d+har+m+ma te/ oM bIr+ya ka wa
188a5(rgyud): dz+ye/ oM sarba gA mi nI/ oM badz+ra Tots+tshiHka wa nr-i te hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga te/ oM swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ni hUM/ oM ni suM b+ha badz+re Na~M hU~M phaT/ oM kar+m+ma rA ke
188a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra hUM badz+re/ oM sarba d+harma NI/ oM hrIHoM a kA ro mu khe/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi te oM haHye hUM oM oM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badz+re/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra aH
188a7(rgyud): oM s+pho Ta saM sarba A pa ya big+h+nAM ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarba a pA yag ti b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
188b1(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa'am/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grags par mi
188b2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bris pa dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang // rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'ang nus pam
188b3(rgyud): yin no// gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung ngu na/ yi ge gcig yang thos na sems can de sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun
188b4(rgyud): par rig par bya na/ slar yang mtha' dag ma lus par rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang+gA'i klu gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla ma
188b5(rgyud): byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas nas des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus so// sa'i khams gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de mchod rten du gyur pa ste phyag bya ba'i
188b6(rgyud): gnas so// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bzung ba 'am/ glegs bam du bris par gyur na de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de la bdud sdig to can gyis
188b7(rgyud): bar du mi gcod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams dang / gzhan yang lha rnams kyis phyi bzhini rjes su 'brang ste/ de la srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur zhing tshul ma yin pas dus
189a1(rgyud): byed par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar
189a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sa'i chos kyi rnam grangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug cher pos rdo rje snying po
189a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa de bzhir gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa 'khor los sgyur ba ren
189a4(rgyud): po bzhis yongs su bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad stong
189a5(rgyud): pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad kyis sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad ros kyi dbyings yongs
189a6(rgyud): su rgyas pa'o// AHb+h+rUM trAM hrIHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pas sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad shin tu gsal bas
189a7(rgyud): snang bar gyur to// de ni sa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi slar yang bsdu bas byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
189b1(rgyud): cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
189b2(rgyud): rdo rje snying po rgyar ces bya ba bshad par byas nyon cig/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gyis shig bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ 'jam dpal
189b3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po la rdo rje'i
189b4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs byos shig/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
189b5(rgyud): kyi thugs kar zhugs te ga byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
189b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dpyid kyi rdo rje po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams
189b7(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen la bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag pa shad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje snying logs chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun rgan
190a1(rgyud): dge/ rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin
190a2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun mos spras// grwa yin ni
190a3(rgyud): thams cad dang // sgo 'gram dang ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// nang gi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi phyi rol du bya ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa bdun// sgo khyud du/
190a4(rgyud): ni rin chen ni// mchog tu rmad byung gzhag par bya// rdo rje srad bu dag dang ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan// rdo rje ka ba'i mdun bzhag pa// bum pa la sogs dag gis spras// tshad mdzes pa
190a5(rgyud): yi snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo sogs pas brgyan// rab rab chen po ni// ri bo gnyis kyi phyi rol tu// sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor ba// khyad par ji bzhin bri bar bya// nang gi dkyil 'khor
190a6(rgyud): phyogs kyi char// dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam bzhir bya// gru bzhi pa dang zlum po dang // grugasum rnam pa las byung dang // zla ba phyed pa'i tshul 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni bzhi pa'o// de yi nang gi
190a7(rgyud): la ni// pad+ma lo ma brgyad pa bri// de ltar shes rab chen po yi// slob dpon rdo rje 'byung bas bre// de yi rjes su lha rnams kyi// kau rims ji bzhin bri bar bya// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang //
190b1(rgyud): gzi brjid dra ba rnam par rgyal// dam tshig mchog gi rnam pa bzhi// slar yang 'dab ma'i mtshams su bri// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru// mi bskyod la sogs
190b2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri// mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya// der ni rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// kun mchogs yi dbang phyug rnams// rdo rje slob
190b3(rgyud): dpon stobs po che// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// rdo rje rin chen sogs gang ba'i// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor yin// rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor tshe dpag
190b4(rgyud): med pa'i 'o// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri bar bya// rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams//
190b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor der ni bri ba yin// rdo rje snying po rgyal po che// khyab bdag gsang ba'i dbang phyug gtso// 'dod pa'i dor kun grub pa'i phyir// 'bad pa'i yis ni bri bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad
190b6(rgyud): byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang // nam mkha'i snying po grags chen po// kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang // phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i 'khrigs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rigs
190b7(rgyud): gi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// srab pa tham cad nges par sel// de nangs yi snying lo mchog/ nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzad dam pa// lag na rin chen bla na med// mi phan pa kun 'joms
191a1(rgyud): pa ni// za ba can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che// dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste// shar du sangs
191a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims bzhin du dgod// 'khor lo mdzes pa'i dge legs bri// rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par brgyan// lhung bzed
191a3(rgyud): dang ni 'khar gsil dang // chos gos kyang ni khyad par du// 'di dag shAkya seng ge yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// de rnams blo ldan brtan par bri//
191a4(rgyud): byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te// pad+ma u t+pal nyid dang ni// spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang // dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis// ma myos pa ru bri
191a5(rgyud): bar bya// slar yang lho ru song nas ni// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag rgya 'bad pas bri bar bya// rdo rje pan+ti sha dang ni// dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang // dbyug gu
191a6(rgyud): dang ni thob dang // dbyug pa rdo rjes mtshar pa dang // lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang // 'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo gros kyi/
191a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri// ut+pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ral gri yang ni khyad par du// thod pa dang ni dgra sta dang // rma bya dang ni seng ge nyid// phyag rgya 'di rnams/
191b1(rgyud): brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i grwa ni legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi yi 'khor lo'i grwa ru ni// rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid chen po
191b2(rgyud): 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya// myi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// gzugs kyi rdo rje zhes bya sogs// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// khyad par du ni ro dang yang // reg dang chos kyi
191b3(rgyud): dbyings dang ni// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo myong ba ni dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gzhan pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// go rims bzhin/
191b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi// yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang // phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan// ji srid de bzhin
191b5(rgyud): gshegs rig ma// thams cad shar du dgod par bya// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni// gos dkar las gnas sgrol ma che// khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma// khyad
191b6(rgyud): par du ni dpal bdun dang // mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mor yang dag ldan// de bzhin po nya pho nya mo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri//
191b7(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis song ba ni// lha'i phyogs su rab byin la// mA ma kI dang lcags srog dang // khab rtse rdo rje mtshan ma mchog/ de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su song nas
192a1(rgyud): ni// der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis// sra can stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu mda' rgyud dang // lha mo zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra// lha mo nye ba'i sgra can ma// 'bad/
192a2(rgyud): pa yis ni bri bar bya// rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang // 'gugs byed po nya lnga dang ldan// grA ya~M na ru bi bya ba// rdo rje mdung rtse zhes bya sogs// sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni rnam par bri/
192a3(rgyud): gzhan gyi zub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog/ rdo rje dregs ma lha mo che// rdo rje kum+b+hi yang dag bri// de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad las ni 'thon nas su// shar gyi
192a4(rgyud): cha ni thams cad du// sngags pa rnam par gzhag pa yis// khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa// de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya
192a5(rgyud): zag lnga yis bskor// de ltar bris nas sngags pa yis// de nas byang gi char song ste// rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang // skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o// khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// waM
192a6(rgyud): bablo ldan brtson 'grus che// pho nya zan rnams thams cad dang // mamo stong gis yongs bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lha yi phyogs su/
192a7(rgyud): song nas ni// der ni phyin te brtson chen po// khro bo chen po stobs po che// rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang // de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang
192b1(rgyud): sgrag can khro ba stobs po che// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // rdo rje sa 'og sa 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang // rkang pas bskrun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro
192b2(rgyud): dang // bran dang pho nya khro bo ni// stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor// de ltar khris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogasu phyin nas ni// der ni song ste brtson chen po// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba//
192b3(rgyud): gdong drug pa la lag drug pa// khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bgyi// khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni// bdud dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du// khro bo gtum po thams cad
192b4(rgyud): bri// de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas su// rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya// de yi phyi ru tshangs sogs
192b5(rgyud): lha// dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bya// dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang // gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong // rgyal chen ris ni bzhi po dang // de bzhin sum cu
192b6(rgyud): gsum dang // 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan dang // 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang // tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams dang // 'od rlung rnams dang / tshad med
192b7(rgyud): 'od rnams dang // 'od gsal rnams dang / dge rlung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu
193a1(rgyud): re bo rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang // mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i
193a2(rgyud): gnas rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mer me'i lha dang / gshin rje rag shin rje dang
193a3(rgyud): bden bral du bden thal dang / chur murma dang / rlung du rlung dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po na/
193a4(rgyud): par bya'o// lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi sbyar gyi phyag rgya che po dgod par bya'o// nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshir rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po dan/
193a5(rgyud): par bya'o// phyi rol du rab dag gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po bdun dgod par bya'o// de'i phyi rol tu 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me
193a6(rgyud): tog gi chun po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan sgreng ba/ rnga ba dang drab pyad pas klubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgya
193a7(rgyud): po lhun po'i tshang du dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rgyas pa de'i steng du rdo rje sang ga'i khrel bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshugs/
193b1(rgyud): mchod la mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pas spro ba dang bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas/ nam mkha'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
193b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsams nas spyan drangs te bcug la bcings nas dam tshig la rnam par gzhag ste/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mdog nyid
193b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad yin no snyam du snyems pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas snying rje dang byams pa'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i
193b4(rgyud): sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog gis rdo rje sems dpa' hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs
193b5(rgyud): thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug
193b6(rgyud): ste bcings la dam tshig la bzhag pa byas nas// rdo rje sa gol gyi sbyor ba dang kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'di bzhis rol pa dang bcas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
193b7(rgyud): thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o// de la de'i snying po ni/ a A aM aHbdag byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas nas brjod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
194a1(rgyud): bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas snying po 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar
194a2(rgyud): bya'o// de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ b+hU tA hrIHhUM/ badz+ra sa mA dza/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha nu sarba ta thA ga ta sarba bo d+hi satwa pa ri pri ti pra t+ye ka ri ha te swA hA/ oM badz+ra sa mA dzaHA gats+tsha sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra yo gI shwa ra satwA na yeH/
194a3(rgyud): sahA a hAHa hAH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
194a4(rgyud): kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / gzugs rnams dang lhar cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas 'byon par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas/
194a5(rgyud): ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po rnams kyis rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa las byas te/ las
194a6(rgyud): ren po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhiran gshegs pa thams cad bzhug par byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa d+hi tiSh+Than+tu sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA maN+Da laM/ de nas gsang ba'i
194a7(rgyud): mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags
194b1(rgyud): kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad sbrul du gsol/
194b2(rgyud): jiltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kur nas bkang ste byin gyis
194b3(rgyud): brlab par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyar chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par
194b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'dis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas/ sngags 'dis snyan gsan dbang bar bya ste/ sa ma
194b5(rgyud): ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na me ku ru mAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA sa ma ye Shu me a d+hi tiSh+Than+t+ra sarba bud+d+ha mAM pra be sha yan+tu/ sarba ta thA ta badz+ra maN+Da la a laM kA re ma hA badz+ra maN+Da le pra ti ba la
194b6(rgyud): yan+tu mAM b+hu dzAny+tsA me pra yats+tshan+tu/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal sor mo me tog dkar po'i 'phreng ba sngags 'dis btags ras nang du me tog bzhi dang / sor mo'i rtse mor me tog re raM bcug la/ de nas
194b7(rgyud): sngags 'di brjod cing gtsug par bya'o// hUM d+ha hri/ Te bru~M rje baHkaHwi waM shri dz+riM haM/ aM a d+hi tiSh+Tha mAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya satwA pra bi shA me/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings
195a1(rgyud): la/ de bzhin gshegs bcud kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer ros kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la/ sngags 'dis me tog gtor/
195a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sa ma yo haM sa ma ya s+t+waM sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar byin par bya'o// de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'das dbab par bya'o// sa ma yo haM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa mas
195a3(rgyud): hUM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+haM ma/ badz+ra hUM/ bi kri ta bid+yu/ dz+r-i hA dur dA rA da ma ka/ ha si ta lam+bo da ra/ ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aT+Ta Tu hA sad ra bid re/ badz+ra badz+rabadz+rod ga te/
195a4(rgyud): badz+ra ne tra/ badz+ra shro tra/ badz+ra g+hA Na/ badz+ra daMSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si pra bi sha badz+ra pA Ne hri de ya mA bi mA bi sha g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/ pUr+Na pUr+Na/ g+hur+Na pa ya g+hur+Na pa ya/ b+hU ma ye b+hU ma ya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ A be sha ya/
195a5(rgyud): dzalpa dza lpa/ dza lpA la dza lpA ya/ le g+hu la g+hu/ sarba ta thA ga ta dzA ka ra pra ba ra/ d+harmA la b+hU bi dza ya he he badz+ra dzaM kA ra hUM kr-i ta sAhA/ dbapa pa'i dam tshig go/ de ltar babs nas kye khyod kyis gang dge ba 'am/
195a6(rgyud): mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes 'dri'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis de
195a7(rgyud): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su gzhag la rig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi pa byas la/ de'i dbus su kha dog thams
195b1(rgyud): cad kyis pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba'am seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ deras de la dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa khyad/
195b2(rgyud): bar du gzugs dang / skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang / gar
195b3(rgyud): dang / glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rjes su 'thun pa'i
195b4(rgyud): ming du byas nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+reSh+NI Sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi/
195b5(rgyud): Shiny+tsa/ spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying kha dang / lte ba dang / rked pa nas/ rdzi ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas byin gyis brlab pa
195b6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams bslab par byas te/ de la rdo rje'i gnas tshogs rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te// rdo rje
195b7(rgyud): gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges pa 'joms par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa la
196a1(rgyud): 'jug par 'gyur ro// hUMnamangon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur pa'i sems nges par rig par 'gyur ro//
196a2(rgyud): oM/ 'dod chags kyi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'dis 'dod chags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ha/ zhe sdang gi mtha' zhi ba'i
196a3(rgyud): phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu 'bral bar 'gyur ro// me/ gti mug gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron ma rdo rje'i mtha' ste/ rdo rje'i mtha'
196a4(rgyud): 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// raMg sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang sems can gyi rang bzhin
196a5(rgyud): rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hrI sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon
196a6(rgyud): par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// a/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i dor dang / mnyam
196a7(rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// aM chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang /
196b1(rgyud): rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// aM/ bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don/
196b2(rgyud): dang las thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hUM/ ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs
196b3(rgyud): pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// baM chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste// rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don
196b4(rgyud): dang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro// maM/ chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i
196b5(rgyud): don dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro// khaM/ 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi de nyid rab rtogs te// bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshu
196b6(rgyud): mnyam med 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 'khor lo thams cad dang // rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang /
196b7(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud lon rnams dang // gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa dang /
197a1(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ hUM/ yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yi// sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgom/
197a2(rgyud): nas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya// sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
197a3(rgyud): dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i// kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// lo ni phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar
197a4(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje rin cher phyag rgya re// legs par mnyam par bzhag las bsgom// rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni// yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya re// de nas rang gis
197a5(rgyud): brtan por bsgom// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang // thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smos// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang // de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas//
197a6(rgyud): rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur// de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom//
197a7(rgyud): phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid dra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta
197b1(rgyud): zhig smos// gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya na/
197b2(rgyud): deni yang dang yang du sgom// chos kyi rgyal po rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdus pa ni thob par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yi// dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya// legs par rab gnas 'od
197b3(rgyud): zer can// dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams
197b4(rgyud): bdag nyid mchog/ de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ rnal
197b5(rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams
197b6(rgyud): so// da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bsgrub par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni rnam par spyod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o// a
197b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o// oM A aM a aH/ pa zhes bya ba na chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
198a1(rgyud): pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta bar bya'o// oM paM na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs dang / shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa yongs su shes/
198a2(rgyud): pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM naM/ de zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod
198a3(rgyud): do// oM daM/ sa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang /
198a4(rgyud): khams dang / skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM sruM/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i/
198a5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o// oM taM/ ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o//
198a6(rgyud): oM kaM/ ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do// oM maM ga zhes bya ba ni zab mo la spyod/
198a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM gaM/ rdza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor
198b1(rgyud): blta bar bya'o// a dza~M/ d+hu zhes bya ba rna chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi byed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sbyor blta bar bya'o// oM d+hi/ shes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang thAH/
198b2(rgyud): mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blte bar bya'o// oM shaM/ Sho zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang bzhin
198b3(rgyud): gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor ba rnam par gzhag go/ oM ShaM/ k+Sha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba skye ba med pas mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad yongs
198b4(rgyud): su dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM k+Sha nga zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta
198b5(rgyud): bar bya'o// oM ngaM/ tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM thAM/ D+ha zhes bya ba
198b6(rgyud): ni sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM D+ha/ dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni myur du 'chi ba
198b7(rgyud): med pa rjes su dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+nye/ ka zhes bya ba ni lus rnam par spyod pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs
199a1(rgyud): te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM A zhes bya ba ni sems rnam par spyod pa ni nyes pa dang / rmongs
199a2(rgyud): pa dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM AM/ ba zhes bya ba ni ngag rnam par spyod pa/
199a3(rgyud): ni ngag gis spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM baM/ tshe zhes bya ba ni grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad
199a4(rgyud): kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM tshe/ g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bya'o// oM g+he/ Ta zhes bya ba
199a5(rgyud): ri ca co dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor ba shad do// oM TaM/ pha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu brdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i
199a6(rgyud): b+hair/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM paM/ Da zhes bya ba ni dgra chen po las grol ba'i nam mkha' las 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//
199a7(rgyud): oM DaM Sha zhes bya ba ni ma sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM Sha/ u zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam
199b1(rgyud): par gzhag go/ oM U na ya zhes bya ba ni rgyan du byed pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i dor du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi skor blta bar bya'o// oM ya/
199b2(rgyud): ta zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid ni smos pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// e t+ta Ta zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa
199b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM hUM/ hI zhes bya ba ni yongs su bzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spongs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta
199b4(rgyud): bar bya'o// oM hrI/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga g+ha nga / rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid
199b5(rgyud): bzung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas so// oM tsa tsha dza dz+nyA nya/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ sgom pa ni chos thams cad gnyis
199b6(rgyud): su mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM ta tha da d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ oM ba pa ba b+ha ma/ byang
199b7(rgyud): chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ya ra la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni glo bur ba thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi
200a1(rgyud): dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM sha Sha
200a2(rgyud): sa ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o// // de nas rig pa
200a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngor bzhin nges par byas nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas// ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// /
200a4(rgyud): de yi steng du rdo rje che// de yi steng du pad+ma gzhag/ 'dab ma brgyad pa cher bkra ba// rnal 'byor stor zhes rnam par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che// 'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor
200a5(rgyud): can// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// yongs su rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis// rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas kun
200a6(rgyud): bdag bsgoms na ni// bskal mthar yang ni de gnas 'gyur// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs
200a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thams cad du// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos/
200b1(rgyud): gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa// gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni// de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa// sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgom/
200b2(rgyud): na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes so// / 'khor lo sgyur ba rgyal po che// kun mchogs yi dbang phyug
200b3(rgyud): ni/ rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// mnyam med 'khor lo sgyur ba mtshungs// gzi brjid 'phreng ba phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs
200b4(rgyud): shing mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rang bzhin gzi brjid 'phreng bar 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/
200b5(rgyud): 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis// sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya// ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis// mnyam
200b6(rgyud): med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yis rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur
200b7(rgyud): rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// kun tu bzang po dam pa'i gzugs// mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
201a1(rgyud): gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis/
201a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// de yi don du bsgoms nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya
201a3(rgyud): che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par
201a4(rgyud): bya// legs so ba ni rab gsol bas// bud med thams cad tshim par byed// byang chub kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// // rdo rje rin cher phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas
201a5(rgyud): 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgom// de yi dar thod dbang bskur thob// rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa
201a6(rgyud): bsgom par bya// kun mkhyen ye shes ster bar byed// rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs
201a7(rgyud): par byed// rdo rje bzhad pas phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje bzhad pa ltar gyur te// de ni skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes
201b1(rgyud): so// / pad+ma yi ni pad+ma che// dag pa'i chos ni mnyam bzhag pas// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes rdo rje rno// bsgoms/
201b2(rgyud): pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom bya de// mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu yi phyag
201b3(rgyud): rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag bsgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse// mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor// rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje
201b4(rgyud): bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chad// chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// // rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// kun nas kun nas
201b5(rgyud): rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba byams pa che// rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin sngo//
201b6(rgyud): 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor
201b7(rgyud): pas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ster// 'phreng ba yang ni dbang 'gyur ba// thums
202a1(rgyud): mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i ji yin te// me tog byang chub yan lag nyid// sgrol mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o//
202a2(rgyud): bdug pa bdug pa dag la brtson// lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po'ang 'ching 'gyur na// gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos//
202a3(rgyud): lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs sogs dbang phyug chen po'ang 'ching // 'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na// dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi ni sbyor
202a4(rgyud): ba yis// chos kyi yi ge dang ldan pa'i// phyag rgya'i ye shes dang bcas pas// de dag thams cad myur du 'grub// 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par bya//
202a5(rgyud): spyi gtsug nas ni rkang pa'i bar// yi ge yis ni yongs gang bar// gzugs brnyan gcig giso go 'phang 'gyur// sems ni rtse gcig 'gyur bar bsam// sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni//
202a6(rgyud): dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen dag ni las su bshad//
202a7(rgyud): chu ni zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'i 'dab mas rnam par mtshan// zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de bshad do// me ni gru gsum shes par bya// bzhi mdo yi ni gnas
202b1(rgyud): su bshad// dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma ra ga'adra ba'i 'od// mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus te// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// ral gri yini phyag rgya'i dbyibs// dbyar gyi sprin dang /
202b2(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od// ser dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyad par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor nas sbyangs te// tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang po rdo rje rab tu gzhag/ de mi
202b3(rgyud): rjes su rin chen te// pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin
202b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o// rtag pa dang chad pa
202b5(rgyud): yongs su dag pas/ chos thams cad zhi ba dang / mtha' dang / mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// zad pa'i sgo dang / zad pa'i mtha' dang / zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas//
202b6(rgyud): chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas/ chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab
202b7(rgyud): pa'o// mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas/ chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btang ba'o// sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir/ chos thams
203a1(rgyud): cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings yongs su khyab pas// chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btang pa'o//
203a2(rgyud): chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas/ chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas/ chos thams cad kyi
