203a3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba myed pas/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
203a4(rgyud): btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid pas/ chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas/ chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi
203a5(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas/ chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas/ chos thams
203a6(rgyud): cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// spros pa'i dmigs pa
203a7(rgyud): rnam par bral bas/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// dngos
203b1(rgyud): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na/ chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na/ chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas/
203b2(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas/ chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
203b3(rgyud): don dam pa'i bden pas yongs su khyab pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
203b4(rgyud): btab pa'o// shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad
203b5(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ming rnams kyi gzhi gzhi med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir/ chos
203b6(rgyud): thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ chos
203b7(rgyud): thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gdo de ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rnam par spyod pa kun tu spyod/
204a1(rgyud): pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta med med pa'i phyir ba chos thams cad
204a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi
204a3(rgyud): dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad las kyi rnam par smin
204a4(rgyud): pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// nam mkha' dang khyad par
204a5(rgyud): med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
204a6(rgyud): byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir/ chos
204a7(rgyud): thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas// chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
204b1(rgyud): mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad
204b2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed
204b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs
204b4(rgyud): rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
204b5(rgyud): pa dang // theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas
204b6(rgyud): rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang thams
204b7(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor
205a1(rgyud): rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par
205a2(rgyud): dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya'o// muH/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye
205a3(rgyud): shes kyi tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/ sems can thams
205a4(rgyud): cad kyi ses kyi rgyu ci phyag rgya'i tshig rnams la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / byang chub kyang byung ba
205a5(rgyud): yin no// a aM oMHAM/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'dis rgyas btab na de bzhin gshegs po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o// hUM/ myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par
205a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ khaM/ de nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa'i/ slong gi dbus su rtag tu sgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
205a7(rgyud): son par// pad+ma'i 'greng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// 'phar ba'i 'greng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi steng du rtag sgom pa// yi ge yi ni gtso'i mchog thog ma tha ma med
205b1(rgyud): zhig khab mo'i 'od 'dra 'od// dpa' bo kun zla ltar dkar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba// de bzhin
205b2(rgyud): gshegs pa gnas kyi gsang // ra sa yan dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya// thig le nA ngas rnam par skyes// gsang ba chen po mchog tu mdzes/ thog
205b3(rgyud): mtha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du rdo rje re// rtse mo lnga dang yang dag ldan// de yi steng du sgron ma che// 'bar ba'i 'greng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi steng du rtag bsams pa//
205b4(rgyud): yi ge mchog gi go 'phang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ni nga mi smra// sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so// rnam
205b5(rgyud): par grol ba gsum thob nas// thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lce ni rka na la sbyar bar bya// sna yi rtse mor yi ge hUM// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'phang
205b6(rgyud): tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing spos med po// shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya// khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya bas ma
205b7(rgyud): gtan gcig byaste// mig deng sngon ma'i 'od bzhin du// sun tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa/ mgrin pa 'bad pas bcum nas ne// dkar mo ser ma sngon pa 'od// dmar po yang ni thams cad du/
206a1(rgyud): 'bar ba 'di dag 'bad pa yis// sgrub po dam pas mtshon par bya// snying khar gsal bar byas nas su// de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song // gnas de la ni
206a2(rgyud): 'thon nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// de la 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs par kun nas thams cad du// slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni// de ni 'jug pa rab tu bsam/
206a3(rgyud): yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// rang nyid 'khor lo sgyur lta bu// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang /
206a4(rgyud): mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ji skad bud med yon tan dang / ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni// bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su// dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan
206a5(rgyud): cig yongs bsten nas// sngags pas mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa che// zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas
206a6(rgyud): bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rtag par shes par bya// bar mas phur sum tshogs pa ste// stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/
206a7(rgyud): smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed// sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis// pha rol phyin pa thams cad thob// rdo rje sems
206b1(rgyud): dpa' marog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis len// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ theg chen mchog tu yid 'ong ba// stong nyid sgom
206b2(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang gis rtag tu sgom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal lo// yon tan mchog las skyes par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig sdomasangs ma//
206b3(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyad// lus ngag yid kyi sbyor ba yis// yongs reg A ling gtsum pas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med kha dog ljang khu gang // rgyan
206b4(rgyud): rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de tshe de ni sngags pas te// mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs// bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang
206b5(rgyud): lhan cig sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags pas de dang lhan cig gnas// shes rab
206b6(rgyud): pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in+d+ra nI la mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis// sngags pa chog shes pas bstan// rig 'dzin rnams kyi stobs chen 'gyur// gsang chen
206b7(rgyud): mar ka ta mtshungs// gang gis rtag tu bstan pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad+ma rA ga 'dra/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang
207a1(rgyud): po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bu sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang gis rtag tu sgom pa
207a2(rgyud): ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// mchog gi gnas kyi bsgoms pa ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring bar// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur// yang
207a3(rgyud): dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs// so sor yang dag rig pa bzhi// shi
207a4(rgyud): tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// zhen med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// dbang po/
207a5(rgyud): gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i
207a6(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje sbyor bar bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga/
207a7(rgyud): dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni//
207b1(rgyud): 'khor lo sgyur ba brtson 'grus che// stobs 'dzin lta bu nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// gsang sngags bsgoms pas bsgoms na ni// rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis/
207b2(rgyud): khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa// de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten shes las rab tu 'da'//
207b3(rgyud): rjes su dran pa rnam pa drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru// sngags pa dug mi ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms// sgoms pa'i rnal
207b4(rgyud): 'byor de nyid kyi// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang // sa rnams
207b5(rgyud): kun ni nges bskyed nas// myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// bud med nu ma shin tu bsnun// rje ngar rje ngar de bzhin du// mchu yis ma nu ni yongs su bzung // 'bad pas dam du A ling ga
207b6(rgyud): rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su// byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che// rdo rje dbyings su bdag bstan pas// rnam pa sna tshogs kang na// rnal 'byor shes pa
207b7(rgyud): de bsten bya// sngar bzhin thams cad byas nas su// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig sgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi nyer nas bsnun// ling ga myur du gang
208a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis// stobs chen sangs rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi
208a2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos su grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa/
208a3(rgyud): ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste// de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs med pa//
208a4(rgyud): yi rtag par yang // 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa 'o// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdur// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba// de rnams sgom pa dang
208a5(rgyud): ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing // sbyor ba thams cad thamra cang du'o// de nas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par
208a6(rgyud): bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam// ye shes rin chen rab rnyed dka'// mchod dang dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// zhu zhing gsol ba gdab pa
208a7(rgyud): dang // bdag nyid dbus pa de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang bzhin// de bzhin yongs su bsngo ba dang // byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun tu'o//
208b1(rgyud): chog ma par dang phye ma red du// ji lta bzhin du rjes bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// 'di la the tsom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyi spo ba ni// brtan pa'i snying po legs par
208b2(rgyud): bshad// skyong nyid de bzhin nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' de bshad do// 'gro ba thams cad bkug nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag pa ste/ rdorje
208b3(rgyud): rgyal po mchog ces bshad// rdo rje rags pas rags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa// de yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams
208b4(rgyud): ku na ni rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing gnyis su med// gang tshe dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong // de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yis/ ming dang brda ni sbyar
208b5(rgyud): ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mdog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso//
208b6(rgyud): rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te// rnyog pa med cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// nam mkha'i
208b7(rgyud): mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad legs gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che// rdo rje tog ni bla na med// ye shes snang ba rin chen che// yongs su skye ba yongs su blta/
209a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes su bshad// chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bas/
209a2(rgyud): du med// rdo rje chos zhes rab tu grags// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes ji med mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po la// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor
209a3(rgyud): lo// gnyis su med las byung bar mchod// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming // rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad// dgongs pa'i skad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa de//
209a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bzlas pa che// de ni rdo rje smra bar bshad// sems can kun gyi don la sbyar// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de ni rdo rje las su
209a5(rgyud): bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba gong ma med// dga' ba'i chos ni brtson chen po// rdo rje srung ba zhes su grags// shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun
209a6(rgyud): dang rjes 'thur pa// nyon mongs thams cad zab che// de ni gnod sbyin chen por brjod// lus ngag yid ri yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis
209a7(rgyud): gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tha ma med bzhi pa// rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad//
209b1(rgyud): de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa// oM sarba bud+d+ha
209b2(rgyud): pa ra ma pra yud+d+ha shwad+d+ha/ la li ho su b+hA ga su ra ta ma hA ma hA A d+hi ma hA bo d+hi bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ yo kI shwa ra ta thA ga tA b+hA bi tA ta ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyas
209b3(rgyud): kun la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo/
209b4(rgyud): rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po che// hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa// thams
209b5(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin tu yongs su mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po// rdo rje ye shes ji ma med// rnam par dag par rdo rje mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab
209b6(rgyud): gsol byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mchog/ dus gsum bsam pa dbang gyur pa// sems can rnams la phan don du// khyab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje snying po rgyan las/
209b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thag
210a1(rgyud): kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don zhu ba zhus pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
210a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cheran po dam pa ste// rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi ni rnam par mdzes// sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang // phyag
210a3(rgyud): rgya dang ni rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnam par dbye ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor
210a4(rgyud): nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas su legs brtag pa// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ge sar gtams pas rab tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par
210a5(rgyud): snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can rnams kyi rjes brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni// de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub
210a6(rgyud): tu ste// gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri// mer ni steng du dgod par bya// steng 'gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal po chen po
210a7(rgyud): gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa yi// rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di dag bri// mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don
210b1(rgyud): sod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'o// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnams
210b2(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// 'phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje bdug pa la sogs bri/
210b3(rgyud): bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// sgo srungs 'bad pas bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// kun tu bzang sogs rim bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya
210b4(rgyud): 'khor rnams dang // pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang // khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin pho nya pho nya ma// rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol
210b5(rgyud): rdo yang ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen min// dbang po la sogs
210b6(rgyud): tha ma cang // ma mo kun dang srin mo rnams// rgyal chen rnams dang klu dang bcas// de bzhin lha rnams thams cad dang // brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lding // 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya//
210b7(rgyud): de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su// khyad par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug spos rol mo dang // de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs// 'greng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin
211a1(rgyud): gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod
211a2(rgyud): par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug/ yongs su dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa// cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren
211a3(rgyud): pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba ni de nas spyir// seng ge'i khri yi stang du ri// dar dang me tog rkun pos sbas// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin
211a4(rgyud): chen che// bla re rgya che 'bar ba dang // de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras las yang dag sprul// g.yon gyi drung du
211a5(rgyud): thams cad nas// 'bad pa yis ni gzhag par bya// rin chen sman kur gyis gang ba'i// bum pa legs par gzhag bya ste// rdo rje chu so gas dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gis dbang
211a6(rgyud): bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya// kun gyis cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang /
211a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa ni// sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyir// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron mo'i sbyin/
211b1(rgyud): de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba// khyad par du ni sngags pas byas// de la dam tshig cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyin par bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad
211b2(rgyud): mi bya// sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la// smad par mi bya blang mi bya// de la mngon par
211b3(rgyud): dga' ba spangs// sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs shing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya sma mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan
211b4(rgyud): sems dpa' ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs
211b5(rgyud): las 'khrungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kun dang // dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya//
211b6(rgyud): khyod kyis ser sna mi bya ste// phra dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde// chung gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spa // thams cad mkhyen
211b7(rgyud): pa yongs mi dor// rtag tu srog chags gsad mi bya// sems can rnams la snying rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs su bya//
212a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyob pa// dam tshig 'di nyid 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcings
212a2(rgyud): pa// go rims bzhin du bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul bzhin du// thal mo legs par bsdam par bya// sangs rgyas
212a3(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad kyis// pad+ma'i thol mo zhes su bsgrags// sems dpa' mchog ni legs brkyang ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhos su brjod// re re'i mtshams su nges bcings pa// de ni rdo rje thal mor
212a4(rgyud): btags// sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa// rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa// sor mo brkyang ste steng du bsta ra// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas ni//
212a5(rgyud): gnyis ka sbyar bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no// ming med nang bcu
212a6(rgyud): khu tshur gyis// kun gyis gtso mor yongs su brtag/ rdo rje'i rnam par legs par sbyar// rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrags// mthe'u chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs par brkyang nas
212a7(rgyud): su// mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su sbyar// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni// gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar//
212b1(rgyud): glang mo gnyis ni brtag par bya// gzi brjid 'phreng ba phyag rgya che// gzi brjid 'phreng ba nyid gsol byed// de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya
212b2(rgyud): ba/ rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas// gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro bzhes su bshad
212b3(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa yongs su sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis// legs
212b4(rgyud): so ba ni sbyar bar bya// gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse// phye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che/
212b5(rgyud): dbu ma paud+ma lta bur bskum// ral gri'i chos ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i 'khor lo 'dra // kha ra byi ba'i phyagrA r+b+ha che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni/
212b6(rgyud): gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad// khu tshur bcangs
212b7(rgyud): khu tshur gyes// rdo rje thal mo snying khar gzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags// yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag rdo rje 'greng bzhes su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdong du dgrol// rdo rje glu mar rjes
213a1(rgyud): su bsgrags// 'gyen cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad// pad+ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye// spyi bor yongs su sbyar la gnag/ snying khar mthe bong gnyis/
213a2(rgyud): po las// gdong ni legs par brkyang bar bya// lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gnag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni byug pa
213a3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// dri yi phyag rgya zhes su bshad// gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni// ro yi phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg pa zhes su bshad// mthe'u chung gnyis
213a4(rgyud): ni yongs su sbyar// mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag
213a5(rgyud): phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongs su sbyar la bsnga mas// mdzub mo gnyis po bskums nas ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing // kun tu bzang po blo
213a6(rgyud): ldan gyis// de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas su// mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// ral gri'i rnam pa brtag pa ste// 'di ni nam mkha'i snying po yi//
213a7(rgyud): phyag rgyar sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha yi// rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog pa// thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod// gar ni sdud
213b1(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang // pad+ma lta bur rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis// de nyid me tog zum tshul dang // ut+pal rnam pa ltar mdzes pa// 'di ni pad+ma sgrol
213b2(rgyud): ba'i rgya/ pad+ma'i mgon po zhes su grags// mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'dra bar legs par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha yi phyogs su rab tu brtag pad+ma'i tha la
213b3(rgyud): mo dpral ba yin// khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar// rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che// dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan// yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa zung // thal mo legs par rab tu brkyang // mi zad
213b4(rgyud): blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtag/ gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar
213b5(rgyud): byed/ rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe'u chung mthe bong nges par bcing // lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du bsgreng /
213b6(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis po sgyur bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur nang du byas nas su// mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste/
213b7(rgyud): rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid sha ga ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur// mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag/ mdzub mo bskum/
214a1(rgyud): par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongs su gzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pa'i// gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid ral grir byas pa ni/ skra car/
214a2(rgyud): gyi ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te// mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya// 'di ni nye ba'i skra can rgyar// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa steng
214a3(rgyud): bcings te// dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spangs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin/
214a4(rgyud): mdzub mo mthe bong bsdams pa ni// mA ma kI ni yongs su bshad// mdzub mo lcags sgrog rnam pa las// gung mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya// 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya// rdo rje lta bur yongs
214a5(rgyud): su bshad// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// khro bo gzegs mar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya// rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyir bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis le/
214a6(rgyud): par brkyang bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya// skul byed lha mor yongs su bshad// thal mo yongs su sbyar ba las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya/
214a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan gyir rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyi ni skyil krung bca'// rnal 'byor rig pas lung srang ste// lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad/
214b1(rgyud): 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya// sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'i// mi bskyod pa yis la reg/ rin chen tog gi mchod sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med// rnga za nyid kyi don/
214b2(rgyud): rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'jigs pa ni med pa sbyin// blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mnyam par bzhag pas byag/
214b3(rgyud): kun// 'ching ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug/ 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la// lag pa gcig ni rab brkyang ste// dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bong mthe'u chung mnan par bya// lha yi dbang
214b4(rgyud): po'i rdo rjer 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pas bteg par bya// me yi oM yig lag pa dag/ mthe bong gung mo nyid la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid
214b5(rgyud): khyab 'jug 'khor la ste// 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa gcig gis thod pa ni// ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis bsgreng ral gri ni// srin po'i bdag nyid chen
214b6(rgyud): 'o// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyis
214b7(rgyud): rab tu brtag/ dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug to'i phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni//
215a1(rgyud): tshangs pa yi ni legs par bshad// drag po'i gsal shing shes bya ste// lha mo'i paN+Di s+ya ru brjod// tshogs bdag gi ni snu ru bshad// zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'kho//
215a2(rgyud): ro// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya// dpa' bo kun gyi rab
215a3(rgyud): tu gnas// dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir/
215a4(rgyud): don chen pos ni rab tu brtags// ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis// dri za rnams kyi rab tu bsgrags// pi wang bslong ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad// rtag tu
215a5(rgyud): dun du b+hi sgrog pa// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod// lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa// klu rnams kyir ni legs par bshad// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyen dang 'dud pa'i
215a6(rgyud): de bzhin no// lag pa zhags pa nges bcings pa// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs// las kyi sbyor ba 'ab pa/
215a7(rgyud): yis na 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni// rin chen yang du yang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdod nas ni// chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong
215b1(rgyud): pa mkha' 'drar shes na su// mkhra pa yi ni bsgom par bya// 'di dag zam cad pa skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab tu gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bur shin/
215b2(rgyud): tu nid 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru// srid pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yis// sgyu
215b3(rgyud): ma smig rgyu brag cha dang // lbu ba chu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten na// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar/ po chun khyod
215b4(rgyud): mo ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba/ zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par blta// rtag tu glog gi 'phreng ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par bshad// 'khor ba shin tu brlang
215b5(rgyud): ba ste/ rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni// sgom pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis// sems ni legs sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad//
215b6(rgyud): stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lhan nyid dang // de nyid gsum ni
215b7(rgyud): rab tu gnas// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to// phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste/
216a1(rgyud): rnam pa med cing snang ba ste// dngos po med pa'i tshogs rnams la// dngos po'i de nyid nyid du bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin min// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po min/
216a2(rgyud): dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang tshe de ltar
216a3(rgyud): nyid 'gyur ba// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min zhing // rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gas
216a4(rgyud): med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// / de nas bcom
216a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin
216a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dga' ldan gyi
216a7(rgyud): gnas su bzhugs nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar
216b1(rgyud): gnas nas nye bar 'khod do// bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstar nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
216b2(rgyud): bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing
216b3(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dza A kaR+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga tA na hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs
216b4(rgyud): pabapar byon te/ chos kyi dbyings su spros nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams bkang ste/ nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang
216b5(rgyud): bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byol gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/ de nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu bzhugs
216b6(rgyud): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs par mdzad do// a
216b7(rgyud): tsit+ta pra ti be d+haM ka ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos sku rang bzhin gyis
217a1(rgyud): 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par 'byung ste spros par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtsham
217a2(rgyud): pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa/ nam mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par
217a3(rgyud): gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang 'chi bas rnam par khyab par 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems nye bar bskyed pa bstan pa oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da yA
217a4(rgyud): mi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de'i thugs kar sems 'od gsal ba de yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te/
217a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par gzhag go// legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa spros pa thams cad spangs pa/ me long lta bur brtan par
217a6(rgyud): byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do// oM dzA nar smi bi sri 'dza/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa phra ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo //
217a7(rgyud): de byung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas
217b1(rgyud): nas gtsug tu 'dres te/ dadza smra chen pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi mugs gang rjes sazhugs nas za pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rab tu gnas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pa
217b2(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pas sngags 'ang byin gyis brlabs so// a ta Sh+Tha bar parang b+hA ya daSh+Ta mu d+ha mar yang sngags 'dis smos pa mo sbar ba / thar yang sngags 'dis bsdus so//
217b3(rgyud): oM sa har badz+ra de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos
217b4(rgyud): sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid mnyes pas sngags
217b5(rgyud): 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa oM badz+ra At+ma ko&de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs
217b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thug rje gzigs nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tA sta thA a ha mi ba de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
217b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs
218a1(rgyud): pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes smra bsgrags so//
218a2(rgyud): de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
218a3(rgyud): sgom pa'i rim pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa
218a4(rgyud): par bsgrubs nas de thugs ka las rdo rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag tu gzhag par gyur to// de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/
218a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
218a6(rgyud): dngar dang 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so// de nas thugs ka nas phyung nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te de bzhin
218a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang / drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'breng
218b1(rgyud): ba rnams par gnas so// de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / bdug pa la sogs pa khyad par du nges par bskyed cing gzugs la sogs rnams dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams/
218b2(rgyud): bskyed de/ 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhes su
218b3(rgyud): gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// sgo logs dang ni rig byed dang // rta babs kyis ni so sor sbas// de yi dbus su khri chen po// kun nas yongs su
218b4(rgyud): gru bzhi pa// de yi steng du pang chen po/ ge sar ldan zhin rab mdzes pa// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni/ sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun tu// sangs rgyas thams
218b5(rgyud): cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du// 'khor lo sgyur ba la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// kha dog ser po gzi brjid che/
218b6(rgyud): dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan// brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
218b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/
219a1(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya// ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs pas/
219a2(rgyud): sgo dang sgo logs brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng ba sa brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen pos// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// 'dab ma brgyad kyi ka
219a3(rgyud): ba la dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar po mchog/ kha ba ba zho ltar dkar gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od// kun da zla/
219a4(rgyud): pa ltar dkar bstan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
219a5(rgyud): la gnas pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshangs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ chu'i
219a6(rgyud): lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/
219a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su brjod// gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya// shing rta'i rnam pa dang mtshungs shing // 'bar ba'i 'phreng /
219b1(rgyud): 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o/ kha dog dmang pa skabs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'drab/ rtag tupadra gu mtshungs// deyi dbus su gzi brjid ce/ male ba dog stobs po rgya/
219b2(rgyud): gsum sna tshogs pa/ shing ta'i snying khar gnag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs// ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dga' bar/
219b3(rgyud): bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras// khro bo dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa
219b4(rgyud): yis ni dgod par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// thams cad dmar po'i
219b5(rgyud): mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus// 'phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya// dkyil 'khor
219b6(rgyud): mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las// me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar
219b7(rgyud): yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// chung gi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad/
220a1(rgyud): phra ba byed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// a ta si yi me tog 'dra/ in+da nI la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad chen po/ bi/
220a2(rgyud): DUR+Ya yi 'od dang 'dra// shin tu gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po 'khyil ba 'bar
220a3(rgyud): ba'i gzi// mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa nam mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri/
220a4(rgyud): khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo// thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsdams// kha dog nag/
220a5(rgyud): po thams cad du// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba// bla re rgyas pa mnyam pa ni// kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/
220a6(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'di lta bu/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgom// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje/
220a7(rgyud): snying po rgyan gyi rgyang chen po las/ rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
220b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rngoH/
220b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa
220b3(rgyud): kun/ yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por/ bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru bya/
220b4(rgyud): sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i 'phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// dzu sngags pas snying khar
220b5(rgyud): son par sgom// gsang sngags dge ba brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba// pad+mo rnal 'byor dbang /
220b6(rgyud): byuphyug go// dus min sprin gyi hUM gi sgra// tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gi/ sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsung / nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen sgra
220b7(rgyud): rururab tu bshad// bi zang gling bu de bzhin glu// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni// rnga dza'i ngar sma hUM gi sgra// spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun las rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs
221a1(rgyud): las rnams dang // de nas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la/
221a2(rgyud): rang gi tshul rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam// lha'i sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i//
221a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'ang snying khar son shes bya// rang gi rigs ri mchog yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thams cad du// kun nas ba spu'i
221a4(rgyud): rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng dge bas// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa yis// gsang sngags sgrub pa brtsam par bya// mchod dang byin
221a5(rgyud): brlabs dbang bskur mchog/ spro la sogs rim thams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa mchu lce min// dkan dang spyi bo nyid
221a6(rgyud): ma yin// nang min phyi dang gnyis par min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/
221a7(rgyud): sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad// de nas rjes su mdor bsdus te// snying khar dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya// dri ma med cing legs//
221b1(rgyud): ban/ mam ldan pa dgapa/ gas thang pa dpa/ // de lam
221b2(rgyud): byed cing // ji ga mi ge'i 'azed // mchog gi sum sa dang 'jug pa// de lta de la chags kyi smras// mA mi bdag nyid kyad du 'gyur// mthu stobs na dbang thams cadan// tshangs pa
221b3(rgyud): 'jug las chen lhag/ bzlas pa'i dacing mchog 'dan/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'o// ji ska sems ni sgom pa 'i// de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ rdorje'i snying ba ca kyi rlung /
221b4(rgyud): po las/ bzlas pa'i ngo khon nyid kyi le'u'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/
221b5(rgyud): mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yom nyam
221b6(rgyud): med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams//
221b7(rgyud): sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa/
222a1(rgyud): mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshang dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa go 'bang dam pa brnyes gyur/
222a2(rgyud): kyang khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin
222a3(rgyud): rnams kyi nang na go 'bang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pas/ dam tshig mchog gsum dngos
222a4(rgyud): grub dam pa bdag la gsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
222a5(rgyud): bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsol gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskal par bskul// lus ni g.yo ba med pa
222a6(rgyud): rung bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med// don yod rgyal ba thams cad du/
222a7(rgyud): dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed/ dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs/ re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa
222b1(rgyud): mingal 'dod pa ster bar byed/ ye shes te dang stobs da 'khrugs/ mchog tu dge ba gsol bar ma dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa stong pa'i rgyal pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
222b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa tshes grangs med
222b3(rgyud): cing rgyu skar med// smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med// ji ltar bshad pa tshogs bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te
222b4(rgyud): me tog sil ma bkram la bdug spos kyi bdug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags
222b5(rgyud): oM sarba pA paM ta kA ya bA kr-iN+Da ma na shud+d+ha b+hU tA rA ga dwe Sha mo ha mA na mA na biSh+Te Na ya da kri tri kA li ke hU~M hUM hUM baT phaT phaTasarba pA pa~M s+pho Ta yA mi swAhA/ oM sarba pA pa pra ti de sha lA mi swAhA
222b6(rgyud): de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyis dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA nAn At+ma b+ha bA nir yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga taHpra ti gr-ih+Na nu mA~M sAhA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
222b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu t+yA dz+nyA na saM b+ha rA na a nu mo da yA mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags
223a1(rgyud): sa // spyan wAg a swA thams da thab / ud+hA ma / denas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa
223a2(rgyud): rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po sang
223a3(rgyud): ge'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// oM shud+d+ho ho/ sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ oM swa b+hA b+ha shud+d+haHsarba ta thA ga tAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho ha/ sngags 'dis bdag
223a4(rgyud): nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal ba'i snang bar shin tu gnas par bya ste/ oM d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ 'jig
223a5(rgyud): rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+he sho ro haM/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya/
223a6(rgyud): chen por spros nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do nas nga rgyal bskyed la/ bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar lhan cig gnas/
223a7(rgyud): par byas te/ nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa bsam par bya ste/ yi ge la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhing / nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag
223b1(rgyud): re ba zas te ji srid mtshan ma mthob pa de srid du'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur sum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te/ nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa cho 'phrul gyi zla
223b2(rgyud): 'am/ sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad spar la rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas te/ sna ma'i me tog gam me tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mchod rten mchod de/ ji srid
223b3(rgyud): 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa ma thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de nas sreg thugs 'bum phrag gcig dgang bar byas
223b4(rgyud): pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas
223b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten byas la mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa'am/ yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag
223b6(rgyud): pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi mchod rten nyi ma re re la re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha ma'i mchod rten 'bar
223b7(rgyud): ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas/ ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi ris kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha rnams me
224a1(rgyud): tog gi char 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas/
224a2(rgyud): kyang stong par byed cing / ji srid a bi tsi mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad bsil bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas rnams kyang mi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur
224a3(rgyud): ro/ sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems can rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de'i rjes la lus dang gser
224a4(rgyud): gyi mdog lta bu dang lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug la
224a5(rgyud): sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing steng du 'gro ba dang rig pa
224a6(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu
224a7(rgyud): mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis ltung bar/
