225a1(rgyud): chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro//
225a2(rgyud): mchod phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'os bzung ste sa srungs kyi bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyur ro//
225a3(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tha ba'i ste/ 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gang gis mtshan mar bzung ste/ des de'i longs
225a4(rgyud): spyod la spyod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu 'am bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o// bdun byas
225a5(rgyud): pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas bka' stsal pa 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhun po'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo yang hUM zhes brjod
225a6(rgyud): pas lhung ba dang / rgya mtsho skems pa dang / ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang bum pa nam mkha' la 'phen pa dang glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde mngon
225a7(rgyud): par 'joms par byed pa dang bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad 'bebs par byed do// sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa
225b1(rgyud): de dang de thams cad byed do// yang na zla ba gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams
225b2(rgyud): cad ston par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do// me 'bar ba dang glog 'gyub la sogs pa ston par byed do// gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro// 'jig
225b3(rgyud): rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bye ba phrag bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang chos gos dang stong
225b4(rgyud): g.yogs dang / 'khar gsil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang sprul pa du ma byed
225b5(rgyud): pa dang 'dod na 'chi ba dang skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
225b6(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho tshad kyi mchod rten 'gram thag gcig byas te/ mamed pa'i ras thangasas
225b7(rgyud): cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de brgyad pa 'am bcu ban pa 'am nya gang ba la skyil krung bcas te ji srid du ral gri 'bar ba de srid du bkra bar bya'o// de 'as
226a1(rgyud): thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgra grag go/ steng nas me tog gi char 'babs par 'gyur ro// lhan cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa steng du 'gro'o// rig pa 'dzin pa thams/
226a2(rgyud): cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// ral gri'i rim 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos gos dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur rgyu ba skad cig
226a3(rgyud): tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par spyod pa dang / rga shi med pa dang / nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
226a4(rgyud): cad du mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa chen po stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo 'am pa Tis blangs te 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa
226a5(rgyud): dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/ nim pa'i lo ma tsha ba'i mar khu la btab pa 'bum phrag gcig sreg blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams
226a6(rgyud): cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na 'bub zag gnyis sam/ gsum du sreg thugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa
226a7(rgyud): po la zhu bar byed de/ kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas nas 'jug par bya'o// ral gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po/
226b1(rgyud): 'gyur ba 6ga ga sa rnams kyi mang bdag mam par kyitham mams cad ba pa/ gsang sngags gru pa gnan ba ma pan ga dzin 'arnams kyi ba tu/
226b2(rgyud): kyi bangs pa/ snyam min chen pa'i sprul pa byed pa pa brgal pa chen pa gas pa khyab 'jug ga' lang ma dzunas bya ba brjod pasamagyis zag par byed pa khyab 'jug kyang rgyun sa pang brtsam gyi
226b3(rgyud): rnam par byedas/ gzhanas rlom kyi tshigag dgas/ sgrub pa thabs gzhan ya ba'i ba gshegs pa'i brjod rten 'jam zag smas na byas te/ na semang du nang zag paca ba \u0f7f/
226b4(rgyud): bar bya'o// thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ tha mar me tog can gyi lcags la 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang rnam pa bzung ba la tshe 'phrul gyi tha ba byed pa skyil krung bcas te//
226b5(rgyud): ji srid 'bar ba de sring du bzlas par bya'o// de bcangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i
226b6(rgyud): lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'tsho ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis gnon pa dang mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod
226b7(rgyud): pa byed pa dang sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams la nyi ma re re zhing mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag
227a1(rgyud): drug cu byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la bye ba bzlas pa'o// de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ro blangs la khrus byas nas nye bar mkha ba thams cad kyis mchod de/
227a2(rgyud): srid ma langs pa de srid du bkra bar bya'o// langs nas dngul chu dang bcud len dang / mi snang ba la sogs pa thams cad nges ster bar byed do// gal te mi ster na ji srid kha las lce ma byung
227a3(rgyud): pa de srid du bza bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de gcad par bya'o// de bzung bas nyi ba stong gi gzi brjing can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'a
227a4(rgyud): can che bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu 'tshob/ sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo lhun po bye ba phrag stong sprul ba dang gling stong phrag 'phen pa
227a5(rgyud): dang rgya mtsho stong phrag skems pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang /
227a6(rgyud): lo zhing 'khyil ba dang / mo brgyad gnyis pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing rga ba dang 'tshe ba med par
227a7(rgyud): 'gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ngocanam 'byong gying bang thug chen pos de grang ces paka'aphrul to// de bzhin du yang ban byin bu dang / dpag pasam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang /
227b1(rgyud): gyi char pa dang / gnam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re ba thams cad rjes su 'gengs pa dang / 'khor lo ts+tsha/
227b2(rgyud): ba'i rgyal po dang rin po che thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang bud med rin po che dang khyim bdag rin po che dang / glang po ni
227b3(rgyud): po che dang rta rin po che dang bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po las pad+ma sor drug pa'i tshad byas pa pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil
227b4(rgyud): krung bcas te/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams gsum mam bzhir grangs mi gzung bar bzlas par bya'o// zla ba drug yongs su rdzogs pa dang pad+ma 'bum phrag bdun sreg thugs
227b5(rgyud): bya'o// datha ba nyanas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la skyil mo krung bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// zo rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
227b6(rgyud): skra yi ning 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa nyom stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'khor can ka.A
227b7(rgyud): bu mo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mang ga gtsug par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad du ma cig tsam gyi rnam par chu ba dang
227'a1(rgyud): mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ut+pa la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan dan dmar po'i pad+ma'i sgrub pa'ang ngo // sgrub pa
227'a2(rgyud): gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ni shel dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / mu tig gi 'bras bu 'am rin po che yongs su rtog par byed pa pos yongs su brtags pa na bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten/
227'a3(rgyud): 'bum tsam byas te/ gang yang rung ba'i grangs mi gzung bar ji srid bdag yongs su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de'i rjes su mngar gsum gyis spags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / snga ma'i
227'a4(rgyud): me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang a ka ru'i sam shing 'bum dang / tsan dan gyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang / zho zan 'bum dang / mar gyi sreg thugs
227'a5(rgyud): stong phrag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i sreg thugs 'bum phrag gcig byas la/ sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// skyil mo krung bcas
227'a6(rgyud): nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ska li zhing 'khyil ba dang
227'a7(rgyud): lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bla ma 'khor lo sgyur ba chen por
227'b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sems dpa' chen pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod do// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar byed do// skad cig tsam la 'jig rten
227'b2(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te/ lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
227'b3(rgyud): rdzogs par byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang / shing lham dang mu tig gi 'phreng ba'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i cho gas
227'b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas te 'bum phrag bdun pazla bar bya'o// yongs su rdzogs pa dang
227'b5(rgyud): me tog can gyi lcags sam lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba byed la mtshan thog thag khri'i steng du lag pa bka ba la/
227'b6(rgyud): ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang rjes su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing
227'b7(rgyud): 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams skrag pa dang / srin po rnams
228a1(rgyud): 'joms pa dang / sems can thams cad des ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen pos de skad
228a2(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u yongs su rdzogs so// de nas
228a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa
228a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po ka k+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
228a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka k+Sha pu Ta bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su skyob// gsang sngags ka k+Sha sbyar zhes bya/
228a6(rgyud): gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung // gru bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa/ kun nas yongs su bzang zhing dag/ re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa/ mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang po'i 'breng
228a7(rgyud): bzang gnyis la ni// a sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod// ka sogs lhag ma'i ri mig la// sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te bri// sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du dgod par
228b1(rgyud): bya dare mig stong pa dag la ni/ kA yig dang ni rdo rje bri/ rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su// yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus
228b2(rgyud): pa/ ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shA// dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha'i nyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor zhes su
228b3(rgyud): bshad// 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// kha tsha Sha tha par Sha// dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// ga dza Da da ba la swa// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs ldan// dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin/
228b4(rgyud): tu 'jigs// g+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha b+ha wa hA// steng 'gros dngos grub byed par brjod// slar yang nga nyaN na ma// chos kun dbang du byed par mchog/ thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa// de ni de bzhin
228b5(rgyud): gshegs stobs bcu// khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis// ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong // ro rA li lI zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin
228b6(rgyud): sngags da de dag yi ge ru yang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun// thig le sgra gtsug zla phyed tsas// sna ldan gyi ni 'phreng zhes bshad// sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi ger brjod pa de
228b7(rgyud): bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o// de bzhin ya ral ba rlung // me dang dbang ldan bdag po ste// 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams so// rlung med bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad//
229a1(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi lam zhes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// mi rtag sdug bsngal
229a2(rgyud): stong bdag med// chos kun las ni bton nas ster// stong pa mtshan med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya//
229a3(rgyud): da ni sngags kyi kak+Sha'i sbyor ba las/ rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang bral ba bshad par bya'o// yi ge rnams kyis byang chub dpyod// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya/
229a4(rgyud): dbyangs rnams kyis ni bsdus pa bshad// mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid// ster ba
229a5(rgyud): nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung // thog mar dbyangs ni thig ler ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i
229a6(rgyud): 'phreng can rab zhi pa// rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// kun gyi ye shes 'od po che// kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// de ni gdod/
229a7(rgyud): nas gnas rtag pa// yi ge med cing dbyer med pa/ byang chub sems nas rab tu bshad// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// de ni shin tu ring por shes// sangs rgyas
229b1(rgyud): kun gyi spyod pa ste/ sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// us+tha rnams kyi rnam pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa zhes su bsgrags// dbyangs dang yi ge khyad par can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyang bar bya// rang gi
229b2(rgyud): phyag rgya sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid 'di bshad bya// thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba po/
229b3(rgyud): ru bshad// zhi ba'i dbyangs kyi kun nas mnan// gsum pa'i ming ni yid ces bya// rgyu med pas te cung zad pa// bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang ldan pa la// da yi
229b4(rgyud): steng du thig le gnas// chos kun nam mkha' dang mtshungs par// yang dang yang du bshad pa yis// de ni lnga par shes par bya// yi ge lnga pa stobs po che// yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bad/
229b5(rgyud): nyid las skyes gtso// mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las rab grol byed pas// yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag
229b6(rgyud): mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed dri ma med// de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags// byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste/ brtan pa'i sems dpar rab byung ba/
229b7(rgyud): chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid// gang bsgrags de ni thams cad du// me yi sa bon dang ldan pa// dpyang ba yi ni steng du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes su
230a1(rgyud): bshad chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni// med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o// me yi sa bon yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi spyi bo ru// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med//
230a2(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang dngos
230a3(rgyud): med rab rtogs byed// me yi sa bon rab tu ldan// 'khor lo dbus su rab tu gnas// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor lo sgyur ba ye shes che// nam/
230a4(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i nor ster byed// gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// gdugs dkar zhes su bshad pa'o// brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang
230a5(rgyud): dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// spyi bor thig le mnan pa'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ye shes che// mA ma kI ru de bsgrags so// lnga yi dbyangs pa/
230a6(rgyud): yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams cad rengs byed de// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba// sdig kun rnam par spyod
230a7(rgyud): byed pa// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang // gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che// yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbus su spyod pa/
230b1(rgyud): gnag 'tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sgrud// sku gsum du ni rnam par sgom// tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu babang por bshad/ sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni/ sangs rgyas pa/
230b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'o// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni/ nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro za stobs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o// 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tu /
230b3(rgyud): pa'o// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad du mdzad do// gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po'o// me dang rab tu ldan pa dang / bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gzi brjid bung /
230b4(rgyud): po stobs po che// de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ba// sgrol ma zhes su rab tu grags// bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa gang // shes rab pha rol phyin par nges// thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan// sgra dang ldan
230b5(rgyud): pa'i mchog tu gyur// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang / me nyid dang ni yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi yang dag mnan// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan
230b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba// spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi rjes nyid la ni med// dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sde tshan dang po'i dang po ste// de nyid
230b7(rgyud): bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'jig rten mgon po thub pa che// ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sde tshan lnga pa rin chen mchog/ bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa ste// 'og tu/
231a1(rgyud): me yi yan lag ldan// khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags// dbang chen yi ge dag pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas spyan zhes rnam grangs pa// sdig pa
231a2(rgyud): thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// nam mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du rab tu gsal// mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming // rig
231a3(rgyud): pa mchog tu gsang ba ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyis// dri ma med pa stsol ba byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chen sa bon yang dag
231a4(rgyud): ldan/ 'gro ba'i rdo rje rengs byed na// gdug pa gzhan kun smos ci dgos// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro// 'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na// gdug sems
231a5(rgyud): can gzhan spos ci dgos// de nyid me dang ldan pas na// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs//
231a6(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad gnas las byung // gzhan gyi dpag dpung 'joms pa ni// me dang ldan pa nyid kyis bya// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// rlung gi dkyil
231a7(rgyud): 'khor gyis grangs pas// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// ti sa man dngal sogs// de yis phye mar rdzog par nges// rdo rjel gnas 'khor lo lo// dbus nas 'gro kun rengs par byed/ 5
231b1(rgyud): nas bskyod par byas pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas nas ni// mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son// chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag gi bdag nyid
231b2(rgyud): bsgom par bya// rlung gi sa bon rin po che// spyod pa'i steng du yang dag ldan// me las byung ba me la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang / sa yi yi ge
231b3(rgyud): steng du mnan// sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// drug pa'i sgra yi steng du gnas// 'og tu me yi sa bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed// me yi phyogs
231b4(rgyud): su gnas nas ni/ phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad sgom// rlung lha me lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che// de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya// dbang chen me ni
231b5(rgyud): sbyor ba las// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas// ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya// yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs/
231b6(rgyud): skye ba 'di las 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye ba rnam par gnas// tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang // ting nge 'dzin rnams thams cad du/
231b7(rgyud): slob dpon man ngag shes bya ste// gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje ka ka'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste/ rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par dpyad par/
232a1(rgyud): bya'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab/
232a2(rgyud): pad de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/ 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba
232a3(rgyud): tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung
232a4(rgyud): grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// zlum po kun nas bzang po ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas//
232a5(rgyud): yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad la ge sa can// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid// bdag gi dngos grub bsgom par bya// ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen po// snying khar tra
232a6(rgyud): ba dang pad+ma// de yi steng du dung brtag bya// dung gi dbus su lce yin te// rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi steng du rin chen pad// yang nas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan yang // 'bar zhing rkan gyi
232a7(rgyud): mthar khyab pa// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa// pa yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thig pa 'dzag pa ni// go rims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba phyed dang thab
232b1(rgyud): gcig yang na zla ba bzhi'am ni// zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor babang po bsgrub par bya// skyil krung gis ni nyer gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi
232b2(rgyud): dbyings ni mtha' dag tu// thams cad du ni yongs su gang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i// ji snyed rig
232b3(rgyud): pa thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyis// lus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug bsam// dung gi sgra ni gsal ba
232b4(rgyud): bsamad/ pad+ma'i khams la yang dag rten// pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams// mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te// de las kyang ni ji ltar gyur// slar yang lce ru son pa
232b5(rgyud): dang / yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o// lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ba// gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// skra yis nam mkha' kun gang bar/
232b6(rgyud): sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla// de bzhin du ni snying khar sgra// lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas// mchu 'am so las rab bkra ba'i// gal te 'od zer mthong na ni// de tshe grub par rnam par shes/
232b7(rgyud): grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yis// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang // 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang
233a1(rgyud): mtshungs pa// rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha// yi ge mchog tu phra ba yis// a yi yi ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin// rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug
233a2(rgyud): mtshungs// yi ge yi ger yongs su gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs shing // snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa// de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba
233a3(rgyud): ji srid dkan gyi bar du son// slar yang yi ge thams cad ni// yang dang yang du gsal byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dang // yang dang yang du rnam par 'don// 'jig rten kun tu de song/
233a4(rgyud): ste nachos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba// rang gis 'gro ba rnam byas te// slar yang 'ongs nas rang gnas su// 'jug pa ru ni yongs su brtag/ de nas sla/
233a5(rgyud): dang yi ge ni// lte bar song ste yongs su gnas// lte ba ru ni pad+ma mchog/ pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdzes// de yi steng du dung chen po// rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra/
233a6(rgyud): brang gi gnas nas yongs su byung // slar yang mgrin par song nas su// rdo rje lce la yang dag reg/ 'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med// kha ba pa zho ltar dkar 'od//
233a7(rgyud): bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'ang// rdo rje lce ni mtha' dag rnams// yang dang yang du gsal bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsar son te// slar yang snying kha nyid du song // thig le las ni gug kyer gyur//
233b1(rgyud): gug kyed rimo rang po can// chags rnam pa ni 'dus pa las// de ni yi ger rnam par shes// yi ge las ni sgra skye zhing // sgra las na da de las dbyangs// dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur// yi ge las/
233b2(rgyud): ni cha shas tshogs// tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu 'gyur// tshig rkang las ni tshigs bcad dang // de bzhin du ni gA thA dang // 'phreng 'dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te// 'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang /
233b3(rgyud): rang gi snying por rab tu 'gyur// de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor che// blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di mi
233b4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// thams cad du ni brtan par bya// yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub bo// rmad byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i// yang dag lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag 'grub thams cad skyo ba rnams kyi// yi ge
233b5(rgyud): gcig pa gsang chen po// ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog tu dge/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// rang snying zla bar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba
233b6(rgyud): 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de las bstan bcos thams cad ni// nges par gdon pa nyid du bya// ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dri// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed// bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing //
233b7(rgyud): de nyid kyang ni 'chang bar byed// sems can kun gyis thams cad du// dngos po cung bad gang bsams pa// de dag thams cad rnam shes te// skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces
234a1(rgyud): bya ba las/ ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
234a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol
234a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de dag gis gsol ba btab pa nye bar gsan nas de de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi
234a4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par bri// yang na bcu drug rtsibs
234a5(rgyud): kyang bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod// 'khor lo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mtha' ru rin chen rnam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis ni spel bar byed// de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni// 'khor
234a6(rgyud): lo sgyur ba stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ de yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thon// 'gro ba thams cad snang byas
234a7(rgyud): nas// sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug/ 'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che// 'khor lo sgyur bar bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang che dang dbang phyug dang // rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang /
234b1(rgyud): kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras/ rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing // nges par 'khor lo sgyur dang mtshungs// gser gyi 'khor la rin po che// de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid
234b2(rgyud): dang dme tog can gyi lcags kyang rung // rang gi lag gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor lo sgyur ba gzi brjid che// mtshan/
234b3(rgyud): rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de'i sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki ti/ muN+Di tsakra wa rti dzA/
234b4(rgyud): la dz+wa la d+hu na bi d+hu na tra sa ya mA ra ya/ uts+tsha Ta ya ha na b+hany+dza pro khi ni kuN+Da li ni a pa rA dzi tA sA d+hA ri Ni/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM oM a pa rA dzi ta d+hi ka sA hA/ snying po'o// na maHsar+b+ba buH
234b5(rgyud): nAM da a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn a pa rA dzi ta d+hi ka swA hA/ mchog gi snying po'o// 'khor lo sgyur bar rab grub ster// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// lung na dbang phyug/
234b6(rgyud): dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// nam mkha' la
234b7(rgyud): ni yongs su sgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyis su med 'byung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad byung ba// de ni me yir shes
235a1(rgyud): par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba legs 'bar ba// 'khor lo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan/
235a2(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nyi ma re re'i bkra shis sgom// gzi brjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs dpa' bo na/
235a3(rgyud): snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam// nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par khyab// de dang
235a4(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes che dang stobs dang shugs// kun tu 'gro ba nyid//
235a5(rgyud): dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid dag dang // rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni// gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni// oM
235a6(rgyud): ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a nA ba lo ki ti murti te/ te dzo rA si dz+wa la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi b+ha bi b+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM te dzo rA si swA hA/ snying po'o// oM dza la te dze rA sa
235a7(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// dag pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams kyis// nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal// kun tu 'gro ba'i 'grub par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// gzi brjid
235b1(rgyud): phung po gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs po che// gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing // gtsug tor steng na
235b2(rgyud): 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM aHhUM/ gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa 'di/ bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni
235b3(rgyud): g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas
235b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor byed// 'khor lo 'od ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba
235b5(rgyud): bya ba'i don du dag pa ste// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// nam mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// 'gro ba
235b6(rgyud): brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngags su gyur pa ni// oM d+hu na pA ta ya ts+tshan+da tsa kre Na
235b7(rgyud): badz+ra Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char// skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni stobs ldan byed// chos kyi 'khor lo
236a1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs so// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa badz+ra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ba// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mong/
236a2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od // de yi snying la rdo rje me// dri ma med pa skye bar 'gyur// nyon mongs rtag rgyu yongs zad kyi/
236a3(rgyud): dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni oM kle sha a sha ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags// drag cing
236a4(rgyud): drag po'i gzhan gnon pos// sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas
236a5(rgyud): pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom// bden pa bzhi yi khu tshur che// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid//
236a6(rgyud): khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes// brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni// 'di dag thams
236a7(rgyud): cad ma skyes par// rdo rje khu tshur bsgom nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags su gyur pa ni// oM bi dza ye hAHde bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshung che// shes rab pha rol phyin
236b1(rgyud): gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// dngos grub las byung 'od/
236b2(rgyud): gsal ba// gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o// rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis/
236b3(rgyud): 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad du// kun nas phun sum tshogs pa kun// bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya// sngags ni/
236b4(rgyud): oM dz+wa la dz+wa la dI pya dI pya ud ga toSh+Tha Shi d+hu na d+hu na hUM/ snying 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis gsungs// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang
236b5(rgyud): rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/
236b6(rgyud): tshad skyob gdugs dkar chen po re// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing // chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med
236b7(rgyud): puN+Da ri kar gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongs su gang // bcud len lta bur bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs
237a1(rgyud): pa/ 'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che// sngags ni// oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// ye shes che dang stobs mgyogs 'gro/ dpa' bo thams
237a2(rgyud): cad tho bo 'gyur shing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdugs dkar po yi sgrub thabs so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par// 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs ral gri naM/
237a3(rgyud): sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// nam mkha'i mthong rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis//
237a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni/
237a5(rgyud): oM dz+wa la dz+wa loSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la bad+ha bad+ha da ma da ma dru ma dru ma da ha da ha na hUM/ rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral gri che// shes rab ye shes dri ma med// sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug/
237a6(rgyud): tor 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// seng ge'i khri yi steng du bsam//
237a7(rgyud): yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gnas// kun tu gtsug tor cher 'bar ba// snying khar yongs su sgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas// thog ma tha ma med zhi ga// chos kyi
237b1(rgyud): sku ni mchog tu che// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// kun tu gtsug tor stobs pa che// skad cig de la 'grung 'gyur te// rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no// sngags na / oM badz+ra ban d+harmA/
237b2(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa bco// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// da ni kun gyis dbang bskur ro// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen /
237b3(rgyud): las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtsug tor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang
237b4(rgyud): 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa rgyas pa bka' stsal du gsol/
237b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub sems/
237b6(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par bya ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye shes rdo rje che// snying khar yongs su bsgoms nas su// ral gri 'bang ba gzi brjid che// mtha' klas pa la rnam
237b7(rgyud): par gnas// 'jam dbyangs zhes bya bsgom par bya// gur kum gyi ni rnam pa 'dra// gtsug na zur phud lnga ldan pa// gzhon nu byis pa'i gzugs can ni// mtha' yas rgyas pa'i rlabs che ba
238a1(rgyud): rnam par 'gro ba lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po phyag na bsnams// dpa' chen dang ni me las 'khrungs// ye shes chen po gzi brjid che// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge thal/
238a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog/ nyon mongs thams cad zad par byed// rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don// dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba bo// rig pa mchog gi bang
238a3(rgyud): nyid 'di// zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog/ mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang // kun nas yongs su
238a4(rgyud): gsal ba po// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// nam mkha'i khams na rnam par gnas// yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya// ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom// dpa' bo pad+ma la gnas pa// zla
238a5(rgyud): ba'i mdog can 'od po che// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes phra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar// gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
238a6(rgyud): ye shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni/ oM bA kye daM na maH/ gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang // gsang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed// rnam thar gsum gyi sgoms
238a7(rgyud): gnas pha rol phyin drug rab tu gsal// rang nyid shes rab yin no zhes// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te// sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i
238b1(rgyud): mdog ston zla lta bur cher gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog/ stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// bstan bcos
238b2(rgyud): thams cad rab smra zhing // dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang // byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// dbang phyug kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog
238b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun tu 'gro ba thob 'grub na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // rkang pas spyod pa de nyid mchog
238b4(rgyud): ril bu dang ni mi snang ba// thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// chos kyi dung gyi mchog las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyang/
238b5(rgyud): zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// bsams pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gro na// gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ci dgos// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub
238b6(rgyud): pa'i thabs so// snying khang pad+ma chen po la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnas// 'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa// phyag bzhi pa la zhal
238b7(rgyud): bzhi pa// dung dang kun nga zla ltar dag/ chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug lces// de la gnas pa dge ba sgom// rang bzhin gyis ni
239a1(rgyud): kun dag/ gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba// gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni// snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo che// kun tu rnam par 'gro ba
239a2(rgyud): yis// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs shing ni// ral pa'i thor gtsugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus su dpa' bo che// 'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag/ ston ka'i rma ba lta bur gsal// kun tu rnam
239a3(rgyud): mkha' yongs gang ba// gsang sngags sbyor bdag bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// chos kyi dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyis yang dag gang // kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni//
239a4(rgyud): khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du dag dgang bar bya// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba kun// snang dang mi snang dngos po ni// yang dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems la ni//
239a5(rgyud): stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya// rtsa don dbyibs ni 'di bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba// kun nas yongs su bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i mdun du gzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas
239a6(rgyud): de ma thab// slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po// bcom ldan rnal 'byor can 'grub na// dpal
239a7(rgyud): po thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing // rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang // rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang // rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can// sa dang pha rol
239b1(rgyud): byin sogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gnan lta smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni/ oM A ro lika/ gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni// rang nyid khams/
239b2(rgyud): gsum rnam par rgyal// longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis rnam par ster// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub// 'jig rten gsu
239b3(rgyud): gyis rgyal rnams ni// srid pa bkug nas rnam par ster// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs so// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs// me yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ste/
239b4(rgyud): de yi dbus su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa// de yi dbus su de 'dra bsam// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can/
239b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du// kun nas yongs su gsal bar byed// hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// dbyar gyi sprin dang
239b6(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra// 'bar ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'jigs// bskal pa'i mi dang 'dra bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa las mche
239b7(rgyud): ba bzhi// 'jigs pa'i 'dus kyi thal ba 'dra// hUM gi yi ge bzhi dang ldan// sprin 'khrugs pa dang rab tu 'dra// rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu bsgom// sngags kyi tshig
240a1(rgyud): ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni sub+hA dz+ha/ grah+Na grah+Na d+hu/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho b+ha ga wa nA/ bid+d+ha rA hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis/
240a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs// chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas// de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na// sdug/
240a3(rgyud): bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan snying khar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyi sngon du sgrub// bsam pa thams
240a4(rgyud): cad rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po thams cad sbyin 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHka gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis//
240a5(rgyud): dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// longs spyod ji snyed thams cad rnams// de snyed thams cad rnam par ster// rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o// / dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i//
240a6(rgyud): byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku// snying khar bzla zhing gzugs brnyana'o// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba ldan// 'jig rten khams ni 'byam klas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// rdo rje yis na sna
240a7(rgyud): pa dang // dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dge/ gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba// ral pa'i thor tsugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che// dung dang kun da zla 'od bzang // bsgoms
240b1(rgyud): nas sems can thams cad la/ brtan pa'i don du dbang bsrung bya// yang nasams can thams cad la// bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro// bsgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis med ma rgyal ba/
240b2(rgyud): las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // gnas sogs dbye bas rnam par dbye// byams pas kun tu rnam par spro// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bapa
240b3(rgyud): shin tu dri ma med par gnas// ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i sems// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam// bdag nyid byams/
240b4(rgyud): pa yin no zhes// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung zad li zhing 'khyil ba'i sku// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen sems ni rnam dag pas// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par bya// 'di'i
240b5(rgyud): gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM a dzi tany+dza ya sarba satwa sa ma yA nu ga ta swA hA/ gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab//
240b6(rgyud): byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ong // dang po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sgrub pa'i thams mchog bsgom par bya// oM me tre ya tri/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang // dga' ldan du ni gnas par
240b7(rgyud): 'gyur dang sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag/ rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs// byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// 'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur// byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin
241a1(rgyud): gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos ni legs mnyan nas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni// de ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// mthar yang/
241a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad ni// byams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur// byams pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// rang gi lus ni thams cad ni// nam mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du sgom// chos
241a3(rgyud): bdag med pas bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid nam mkha'i snying por 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das// nam mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa yis// rang
241a4(rgyud): gi sems can sems la spro// kun gyi sems las spros nas ni// slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar bya// nam mkhar sa many+dza rA blta// rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus
241a5(rgyud): gnas par// rin chen kha dog 'od po che// rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa// lag na rin chen stobs po che// rin chen sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// nam mkha'i dam pa 'grub pa yin//
241a6(rgyud): oM A kA sha gar+b+hA ya swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po stobs po che// bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// dpa' bo sangs
241a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis// dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa// nam mkha' snying po bsgrubs pa yis// de dag thams cad myur du ster// nam mkha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so//
241b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rnon rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// kun tu babang ba 'ong bzang ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus suni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dngos grub mtshan/
241b2(rgyud): ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi lus ni ji snyed pa'i// rang gi phra rab rdul rnams kyis// de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du// yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su// rang gi
241b3(rgyud): 'khor los yongs bskor nas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te// bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes// yi ge lnga pa zhes su bshad// 'di yi sngags chen bzla bar bya// yang na 'dir ni lha
241b4(rgyud): gzhan gyis// rtag tu sngags su gyur pa'o// oM sa hrIHkA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing // gdod nas dag cing rang byung ba// grub pas gsang sngags 'di yis ni// de mi
241b5(rgyud): shes rab dri med cing // gzugs mdzes pa ni de dang mtshungs// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba// kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so//
241b6(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa 'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang // bcud kyis
241b7(rgyud): len gyis bde thag tu// ring po nyid du mthogs par// sgrib pa rnam sel mtshungs par 'gyur// a sarba ni wa ra Na bi zham b+hi AH/ a nA sar ya sAH/ gtso bo gsang sngags 'di 'dzin la// rnam
242a1(rgyud): par sel bar grags pa ste// thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun gyi thams cad du// 'dod nas skye med rang bzhin gyis// gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba med//
242a2(rgyud): ltar chos 'di shes nas ni// lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas// rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i// rjes su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar// gsal ba'i rnam par gnas/
242a3(rgyud): pa'o/ me yis yongs su bskor ba yis// phyag rgya ral gri gzi brjid che// yang nas yang du sems byed cing // dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che// rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha'
242a4(rgyud): las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas ni stsol ba nyid// rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thabs so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rdo rje yi ni dbus na bzhugs//
242a5(rgyud): gser gyi mdog can sku chen po// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// snying khar dri yi phyag rgya gnas// mkha' snying zhes byar bdag nyid bsgom// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// rang gi gsang sngags/
242a6(rgyud): brjod par bya// mkha' snying zhes byar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di// oM k+Sha haHrA dzAHswAhA/ bsam yas sngags mchog 'di yis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab
242a7(rgyud): gsal mdzad// sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// bad pa med cing 'khrul pa med// bad med
242b1(rgyud): mchog gi shes rab cas/ mabya dkyil 'khor dbas sun// shes rabardadza' bdag tud da ga/ thagras ma par rnye dka' ba// 'bad pa mas na bsgob par ga/ mam dkyil 'khor sas
242b2(rgyud): nod dgaser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po rma ba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// sngags ni/ a ak+Sha ya ma ti swAhA/ sngags kyi yig gsang ba 'di// thams
242b3(rgyud): cad blo gros gsal bar byed// ye shes mi zang 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog ces bya// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// sangs rgyas kyad kyang thon/
242b4(rgyud): 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub thabs so// kun nas shes rab chen po can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par// gser gyi
242b5(rgyud): dog gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag tu bsam// re ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// nam mkha'
242b6(rgyud): bdag po bdag yin zhes// lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du// thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tu dri med byang chub sems// rang snying me long lta bur bsam// de nas yi ge'i tshig
242b7(rgyud): bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang // yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing // de bzhin bum pa bza
243a1(rgyud): po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// nye bar mkho ba thams cad 'bab// 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed yod pa de dag kun// 'dir mi skad cis
243a2(rgyud): tsam nyid la// dngos grub dam pa stsal bar 'gyur// oM ga ga na gany+dza ga~M swA hA// nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che// nor gyi rgyun ni rab 'bebs pa// nam mkha'i mdzod ni stobs po che// skad
243a3(rgyud): cig ma la byed par 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs// rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol//
243a4(rgyud): lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya// lag na rin chen phyag brkyang ba// za ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sgyur bas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rin chen zhes bya ba// rin chen thams cad
243a5(rgyud): stsol bar mdzod// thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pri yang sku mdog sngo bsangs 'od// dbang chen dang ni mi las byung // phyag na rin chen cher gsal ba// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya//
243a6(rgyud): oM rat+na pA Ni ra muHswA hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// rab tu 'bad de bsgrubs nas ni// 'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni// rin chen thams cad rab stsol byed// lag na rin po che sgrub pa'i/
243a7(rgyud): thabs sa// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi'i tshulas rab gang ba// stong gsum nis ni bsam par bya// padz+ra gcig gi steng na gnas// de yi steng
243b1(rgyud): drug / rnam na zums/ de nga du gas / ma sa dkyil lab da pa / dem snyeng su sngon 'grus // ma bkyal dung drung / #
243b2(rgyud): dru bang chen po// 'dab ma btung ba 'od gsal ba// de steng rtag tu bsam pa na// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che// rgya mtsho'i blo gros nas grags pa// 'bar ba'i 'bring ba 'jigs pa'i
243b3(rgyud): 'dod dadung dang kun ra zla ba'i mdog/ rgyad rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi lag na phyag rgya che// rdo rje steng du rab tu grags// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes/
243b4(rgyud): rgya mama'i thi gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags patha bar bya// sngags na/ oM sA ga ram ti sa ra mAH/ sngags 'di mchog dang gtso zo ste// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// rdo rje
243b5(rgyud): sbyor bas myangs nas ni// shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs// rang nyid sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs// thub rten 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal// dngos grub gzhan lta spos ci dgos/
243b6(rgyud): mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// ut+pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od// rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
243b7(rgyud): su ni / ji snyed sa steng mtha' rag tu// khyab la sdug cing mtho bas// ma ning snying po rnams dag pa'i// mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon zan// chos kyi smin
244a1(rgyud): #la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas sa ni yang dag brnyes// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// yi ge mchog ni steng du 'bar// thugs kyi rdo/
244a2(rgyud): rje cher gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra garba hUM/ 'di ni sngags mchog gtso za ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing /
244a3(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kyang stsol mdzad na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// bdag nyid
244a4(rgyud): rdo rje yin no zhes// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzhan// bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob/
244a5(rgyud): des na rnam pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje snying pos yang dag byung // rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje// sbyin pa byed pa de yis bsgrub// rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen me las
244a6(rgyud): yang dag byung // nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i 'od// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po// 'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas/
244a7(rgyud): pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can// phyag rgya de yi snying khar gnas// rin chen sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM rat+na ka ra hrIHrat+na na dad swA hA/ rin
244b1(rgyud): chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di// phyogs rnams kyi ni sa yi phyug/ sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya// rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// de bzhin/
244b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
244b3(rgyud): thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom
244b4(rgyud): ldan 'das skyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor lo sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa
244b5(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ chung khams rab tu gsal ba la// me ni dbus nas dbus su'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// 'od zer lnga yi 'phreng bas mdzes
244b6(rgyud): de yi mdun du bya ba yang // bdud rtsi 'bar ba chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi gdan la ni// rdo rje chen po 'bar 'breng can// g.yon nyid du ni be con can// rig pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par spras//
244b7(rgyud): rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni// rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i// khro bo thams cad dgod par bya// de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang // gsang chen mchog tu
245a1(rgyud): 'bar ba'o// gzhal du med cing grangs med mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs /
245a2(rgyud): dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun pa ni bshad pa yin// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// 'jigs pa'i bskal pa can thal bas//
245a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'bar ba me yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jigs pa chen pos dus mtshan gyis// char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar ba kun
245a4(rgyud): gyis rnam par brgyan// dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang // gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po che// rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba// thod pa'i cod pan steng du 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan
245a5(rgyud): gyis/ rgod ma kha yi me ltar gnas// smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i gdong //
245a6(rgyud): gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan// 'jig rten snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan// gcig tu gyur cing rnam pa mang // rnam mnganal ldan de dag gi/ sngo sar la sogs tha dad
245a7(rgyud): ldan// zhabs kyang rnam pa du ma ldan// sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khra zo'i rgyal po stobs po che// shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la/
245b1(rgyud): sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas// ma gadrug ga pas drug snang ba can// zhal drug pa ste gsum pan// char smin mdog 'dra cher gnag pa// dus mtha'i midang 'dra bar gnas// mdog can rgyal/
245b2(rgyud): baM 'khyil ba'ang// bar ma yin me tog mtshungs// khri za zad pa'i 'greng ba 'ching // gshin rje mthar mdzad stobs po che// de la sngags kyang / oM AHhUM paT/ oM la ma mthan cu par
245b3(rgyud): oM dz+dzaHSh+Ti bi kr-i tA nan hUM sarba sha tAn nA sha ya stam+b+ha ya hU~M phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid 'di// khyab bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba po// gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun gyi
245b4(rgyud): bdag nyid gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing // dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing // rdo rje snang mdzad legs par 'dul// shin tu gdug
245b5(rgyud): drag rnams la// zhi ba'i nye bar mi sbyar te// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad// thugs rjes khro bo'i ngang tshul can// 'jig rten gsum yang nges
245b6(rgyud): sreg mdzad// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugs rjes khro bos ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed// gshin rje mthar byed
245b7(rgyud): kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// de nyid bcom ldan nal 'byor te// khro bo gzegs ma zhes su grags// rin chen 'bang ba'i khro ba che// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus dnga'adra// @
246a1(rgyud): sngon po'i 'dab ma bzhin// de yi kha dog rnam par gsal// drag po chen po 'azhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// spyan gsum pal khro gnyed brtsepa//
246a2(rgyud): phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar// me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog ltar shin tu dmar// de yis khro gnyer bsnyer ba yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed// khro bo'i rgyal
246a3(rgyud): po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// ma lus sa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des// 'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na// skye ba gnan lta spos ci dgos//
246a4(rgyud): sngags ni/ oM ka Ni ka Ni hU~M phaT/ khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams cad sreg byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// khro bo gze/
246a5(rgyud): ma sgrub pa'i thabs so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// rta mgrin zhes su bshad pa yin// rtagatu
246a6(rgyud): 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rgya skyegs mdog ltar dmar ba'o// chu dang gzi brjid can reg pa// me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan// 'dod ldan rnams la 'dod pa 'byung // gdug pa can
246a7(rgyud): rnams gdug pa 'byung // zhi ba la yang zhi ba 'byung // stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan// phyag bzhi pa
246b1(rgyud): la brtson 'grus che// seng ge ltar gnas mche bab ni// / rta mgrin rgyal po chen pa na// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig nyid la gnas nas ni// thams cad sbyang ba bsgrub pa
246b2(rgyud): sngags ni/ me ya pre tat+ta bo b+ha be ts+tsha phaT/ oM a ma tong b+hA ba dz+ra phaT/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar// khra ba skyil krung byas nas ni// 'jig rten thams cad
246b3(rgyud): rab tu mnyes// pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po 'di// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha// tshogs
246b4(rgyud): kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang // mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor de// gcig
246b5(rgyud): pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor ba dag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro ba'i dbang du song // de nas sangs rgyas thams
246b6(rgyud): cad kyis// sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni// g.yo ba med par bsam par bya// slob dpon mi g.yo khro bo che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan// ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gsang // thog ma
246b7(rgyud): ma med pa'i mchog/ pri lang ku ru sngo ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// khro bo ma ngag pa bran dang ni//
247a1(rgyud): po nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan// skye bo kun gyis yongs su gang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na// bka' lung yang ni yongs su stsol// sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta badz+raH/
247a2(rgyud): tsaN+Da mahA ro laN s+pho Ta la ng+ku / traka traM maM/ khro bo gzi brjid chen po 'ang// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas/
247a3(rgyud): rlung dang me las yang dag byung // 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin no// dgug dang bzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub
247a4(rgyud): bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas mchog/ khro bo'i phyag rgya rang byung ba// drag po thog ma tha ma med// rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas//
247a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
247a6(rgyud): slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs
247a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor skyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor te/
247b1(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs kyis ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi dbus su pad chen po// lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes/
247b2(rgyud): nyi gu rtsa lnga'i 'dabam ldan// rdo rje rin chen legs par brgyan// de yi dbus su rtag bri ba// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la/
247b3(rgyud): rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri// shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya// phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs par// go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod/
247b4(rgyud): phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog dbye ba thams cad du// rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa// chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de las 'od zer bsam mi khyab// sngo ser la sogs dbye ba
247b5(rgyud): yis/ shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin// shes rab chen po gzugs chen po/
247b6(rgyud): 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rten// sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting
247b7(rgyud): 'dzin la zhugs// du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan ma// shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad// kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum// sems can kun gyi thams
248a1(rgyud): cad du// thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab// sems kyi rgyud bzhin legs par bzhugs// zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab// dri ma med cing ngang gis stong // nam
248a2(rgyud): mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// thog ma tha ma med cing ni// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden pa gnyis la
248a3(rgyud): rnam par gnas// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// chos kyi sku ru de bshad do// dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes// sems dang thams cad thams cad du// yid kyi rnam shes nas su bshad// shes
248a4(rgyud): rab blo dang blo gros dran// lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs// rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs// kun rdzo ba dang ni dam//
248a5(rgyud): pa'i don// rnam pa gnyis su de rab brtags// ji ltar bud shing la brten nas// me yi sa bon gnas pa dang // til la til mar ji bzhin no// bur shing ro bzhir rab tu brtag/ me tog dri ni dzi/
248a6(rgyud): bzhin nam// zhol mar gsar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung // gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan las// ji bzhin gtsubs pas me 'byung ste// de//
248a7(rgyud): bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrubs pas yongs su brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// yang nas yang du bsrub par bya// mun pa thams cad rnam sel ba'i/
248b1(rgyud): nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag/ nam mkha' dri ma med rten nas// nyi ma tha ba ji bzhin gnas// 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'bar ba stong phrag gin stod// mun pa kun 'joms skar mas
248b2(rgyud): kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// der gnas
248b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gsang sngags 'di ni bsam par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni dag pa'i dngos// rang bzhin
248b4(rgyud): med par rnam par gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med// yi ge de nyid de lta bu// gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa/
248b5(rgyud): lang / thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// oM drA swA hA/ oM swAhA/ oM shru ti m+pa ti bi dza ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas rnams
248b6(rgyud): shes rab 'dis// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// de nyid 'khor los rnam par sgyur// 'dis ni dngos grub thams cad dang // grub pa nyid ni byed par
248b7(rgyud): gnas dang bstan bcos rab tu 'chang byed dang // shes bya thams cad khyad par du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun// dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/
249a1(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs so// shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam// gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan la/

249a3(rgyud): gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyon cigs rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni// rnal 'byor ma la mchod du/
249a4(rgyud): ba sha dang dad ma che na yi ge'i mthar thug pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// zan
249a5(rgyud): du gyur nas nye bar gnas// phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur/
249a6(rgyud): mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// 'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do// sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// chu yi dkyil 'khor dgas pan/

249b1(rgyud): mda' rgya ma dog gang dgapa/ grubs ram pa cod pan 'ju// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang ma 'dus// rtag tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas/ ma na/ sa ya ga rjegag dag dag
249b2(rgyud): dkar ma yi phyag rgya che// dung dang kun dazla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i
249b3(rgyud): lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan// zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs// gos dkar mo
249b4(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs so// sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis yongs
249b5(rgyud): gang ba// 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma// thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rol pa yi ni yi ges mchod// sngags ni/ oM tA re tut+tA re swA hA/ chos kyis
