249b7(rgyud): cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ phyag bzhi spyan ni gsum pa dang // ral ba'i/
250a1(rgyud): cod pan dag gis brgyan// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan// brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs sel ma// tha ba'i dkyi/
250a2(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du// shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni 'khrugs par mdzad// khro gnyer can zhes legs par
250a3(rgyud): grags// sngags kyi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sngags ni/ oM b+ha ya nA sha ni/ trA sa ni tA sa/ trA sa ya/ b+h+ri ku Ta ta DA be tA Di be ra Ti shwe te shwe ta dzi Ti ni/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson
250a4(rgyud): 'grus che// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang mgu byed na// gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos// khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
250a5(rgyud): dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan// rdo rje'i 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kunas nas dkris// der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen pri yang ku ltar/
250a6(rgyud): ljang // phyag bzhi pa der bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// rdo rje'i dbus
250a7(rgyud): song rab tu gnas// khro bo hUM mdzad gang ba'i mtha'// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan// lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed// dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad cig tsam gyis 'gro/
250b1(rgyud): bkun// nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rlung gi 'phreng bache// rdo rje 'khor la rab tu gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i me ltang drag/ snang ba chen po stobs po che// brda ga'i rnam pa'ang/
250b2(rgyud): rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni/ oM gu la ny+dza tI ye na maHshaM ka re/ kAn+ti ka re/ g+hun+ta g+hun+d+ha g+hAn+di ni g+hA ta ya mU ts+yai ni swAhA/ oM ku/
250b3(rgyud): lan+d+ha ri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba thams/
250b4(rgyud): 'gugs byed la// rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin// mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// chung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor// de yi dbus su snang bar/
250b5(rgyud): zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan// de spos pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa
250b6(rgyud): gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang // de yi thugs kar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i 'breng
250b7(rgyud): pa 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi// nam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// nges par byung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten khams nams
251a1(rgyud): #dag tu// kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang // bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du// khro ba dang ldan spo ba'i zhal// lte ba 'byung ning sku che ba/ mche ba bani yis rnam par brgyan//
251a2(rgyud): 'bar ba yi ni 'phreng ba gsal// gzugs mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang ldan// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shr-i kha lA yA d+hi ba ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya ma hA bi d+yA rA dzA ya te pra dz+wa li ta/ hastA ya na nI la kar+N+Na ya ki/
251a3(rgyud): rA ta rU pa lam bo da rA ya/ b+hU b+hI ku Ti mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu khA ya / tsa tur daMSh+Ta ka rA lA ya/ e h+ye hi a s+ya ra shi rA ra/ ma nu pra wi sh+ya shi ra gr-ih+Na grI bA gr-ih+Na hastA pa daM gr-ih+Na bi Sha/ a be sha ya/ ko pa
251a4(rgyud): ya kaM pa ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma ya/ maN+Da la mad+h+ye/ bi kurba bi kurba/ tsun tsA// kun+da kuT+TA/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ mahA Ni/ ni kr-in+d+rA ya/ hr-i da ya/ ts+tshin+da/ ba la ba la/ kiny+dza rA ya si/ de ba ka nA ga/ yak+Sha
251a5(rgyud): rak+Sha sa/ bi shA tsa tsan+d+rA ya/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ dzA ti ma nu s+pha ra hA hA/ nai d+hi ni d+hi/ ni Shi ni Shi/ badz+ra shaM ka lA/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM badza ra Ni hU~M baT/ oM badz+ra Ni d+hu phaT/ oM badz+ra kA li hU~M phaT swAhA
251a6(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis len ni bde ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang // gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang // lha dang lha min/
251a7(rgyud): 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang // rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni// grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yi// thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed// /
251b1(rgyud): bud med gzugs kyis sgrub par byed// rdo rje lu gu rgyud mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ pad+ma dmar pos rab tu gnas/ phyag bzhi pa la du ba'/
251b2(rgyud): gzugs// dung dang kun nga zla ba'ang // thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ni ba la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyis bdag skyes mchog/ rnal 'byor
251b3(rgyud): bas ni rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas mtha' las yang dag 'byung // der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni// skul byed ma zhes yongs su grags// sngags kyi 'phreng ba'i yi ge ni// kun nas 'phro ba mu tig
251b4(rgyud): 'dra da nam mkha'i khams ni songs gang ba// ji srid de yi spyod yul yang // de srid de yi 'od zer sgom// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sprul// sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsu le tsurje swA hA/ 'di yi sngags
251b5(rgyud): kyi mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa po// mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig kun 'dzad byed cing // phun sum tshogs kun rab
251b6(rgyud): stsol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par mdzad// skul byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag
251b7(rgyud): nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/ sangs rgyas kun dang ma
252a1(rgyud): sbyong ba// mkha' ma sa brjom// 'dod chags me cing chags thal med// dgram dpags par 'gyug// zung me m+b+ha na// dza
252a2(rgyud): theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags// rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub pa// nus pa yis ni rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'dir// bkun
252a3(rgyud): par bya bar 'os ma yin// ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste// rnyed pa kun dang bde dang spro// thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'dra//
252a4(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// kun la kun nas
252a5(rgyud): thams cad du// kun tu kun nas rang nyid kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo// thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs
252a6(rgyud): nyid// sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du yang de bshad do// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// thog ma tha ma med ni ba// byang chub sangs rgyas
252a7(rgyud): bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin badra 'dzin// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral griral gri 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin
252b1(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni// 'di rnams kyi yang rigs cir 'gyur// de nyid chags dang chags bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa du yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gdun
252b2(rgyud): mchog 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de nyid de// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa// thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa
252b3(rgyud): sna tshogs mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha/
252b4(rgyud): nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan sgra ma chen po 'chang // rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas
252b5(rgyud): 'khor lo can mi bskyod// tshe dang rin chen 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog/ don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' blta na sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs
252b6(rgyud): bar mdzad par nyid yin// rin chen sgrol ma de bzhin tog/ rdo rje band pa snang bache/ rdo rje chos dang no bache// rgyu dang sgra mchog bdud rtsi dang // las dang ga cha gnod sbyin che// khu tshung de bzhin gshegs pa/
252b7(rgyud): bam na lam ldanan byod// ma pa pa skams pa// da ba rgyas nga tum nga dag / blan ma na rnam pa mags// sa dpa / ma sa dzis she sa
253a1(rgyud): khro bo gshegs ma snang ba che// rdo rje mi ni 'od chen po// gzugs rnams kyi ni mchog gcig tu// ting nge 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog gtso// sa dang pha rol
253a2(rgyud): phyin pa stobs// tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi// dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por gyur pa gang // bsgom par
253a3(rgyud): bya ba rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu ste// byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa// mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam/
253a4(rgyud): po che// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad brtags pa// stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyis bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun// mtha
253a5(rgyud): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni// dgu la gnas par 'gyur ba dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhi// sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang // so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// de bzhin srung ba mi mnga' ba/
253a6(rgyud): skal pa chen po'i mi 'jigs pa// mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang de bzhin no// byang chub kyi ni skye mchog gtso// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa/
253a7(rgyud): po// nyon mongs can gyi mi mthun phyogs// zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dang // skye dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon/
253b1(rgyud): mchog gi bdag nyid dbyangs bdag po// kun rdzogs brjod pa thams cad dang // sgra rnams kyan spyod yul 'gyur// brjod du med cing spros pa bral// stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med// tshig /
253b2(rgyud): mtha' sgra yi rnam dgod pa// 'jig rten tha snyad tshul du gtogs// de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyi ni yongs su brtags// sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs pa yang
253b3(rgyud): dag brnyes// rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du// ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags// mtha' yas sku dang sku chen po// rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa// pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba che// thams cad sku ni las bab/
253b4(rgyud): byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba// kun tu 'od kyi sa chen po// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
253b5(rgyud): gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba// gsum pa nam mkha' 'od ces bya// mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// rdo rje'i 'od mtha' gang zhigs//
253b6(rgyud): bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba// bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu gnas// drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya// bang
253b7(rgyud): bzhin rab tu rnam par snang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ bdag gi med cing yongs bzung med// bdun pa las kyis shes bya// sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad pa che// brkyang pa dpe med pa zhes
254a1(rgyud): byang dpe ni de la yod ma yin// dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya// dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa// bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med/
254a2(rgyud): bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya// sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams
254a3(rgyud): kyis don dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa// thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de bzhin gshegs pa
254a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las// sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa
254a5(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du/
254a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
254a7(rgyud): cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas mnyam par bzhugs so// de nas
254b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyi rtogs nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'
254b2(rgyud): stsal to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to//
254b3(rgyud): nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i
254b4(rgyud): lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par
254b5(rgyud): rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas/ sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du
254b6(rgyud): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rjernal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
254b7(rgyud): dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legs so legs so// de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
255a1(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
255a2(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa de nas dkyil 'khor chen
255a3(rgyud): po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig
255a4(rgyud): bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje snying po yongs bcug pa// byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang // sgom
255a5(rgyud): legs kyi mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje pad+ma thams cad du// las kyi rdo rje thams cad du// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od // dril bcas sna tshogs
255a6(rgyud): mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rlung bskyod pa'i// gos dang me tog chun pos spras// zla ba byed pas nye bar mdzes// ral gri lta bur ut+pa la// lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs rgyan//
255a7(rgyud): chu yis dkyil 'khor longs bskor ba// mu khyud bzhin du rnam par gnas// de la'ang sgo logs la sogs pa// mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas//
255b1(rgyud): brgyad dang ni yongs su ldan// dkyil 'khor legs pa rnam par spras// rdo rje'i thig dang yongs su ldan// rdo rje'i 'khor lo cher 'bar ba// de yi dbus su snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad// de yi/
255b2(rgyud): steng du rdo rje che// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas// bad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bgad// de yi steng du lags
255b3(rgyud): bzhugs pa// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan ni sdig pa bcom// rdo rje'i 'phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i
255b4(rgyud): rin chen chen po'i 'phreng ba ches// spras pa rnam par dgod par bya// de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba// yi ge yi ni mchog gtso bo// sa yi steng dang ldan pa g.yas// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig pu// drug
255b5(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal ba// thig le nA das legs par brgyan// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yis// don can rab tu bskyed par bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can// gcig pu'i
255b6(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha// chos kyi sku ni ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
255b7(rgyud): rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das de
256a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do// dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa// me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od/
256a2(rgyud): chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med// rdo rjes rnam gnon chung dkyil 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje
256a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid
256a4(rgyud): kyi thugs ka nas phyung ba'o// oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas 'di rnam par byung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyung ste/ rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig
256a5(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus
256a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi don mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub
256a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e mtsho
256b1(rgyud): rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po ye shes rnam dag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed de// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang
256b2(rgyud): zhig brtan phyir lus min yang // sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to// de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye
256b3(rgyud): 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar po/ ser po/ dmar po/ ljang khu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas/ rang gi sngags kyi yi ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to//
256b4(rgyud): dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rA dza/ rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra rA ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra sA d+ha gde
256b5(rgyud): bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rat+na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra te dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha'
256b6(rgyud): mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ke tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra hA sa/ de bzhin du 'ong dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting nge
256b7(rgyud): 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra d+harma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra he tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgra
257a1(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra thA Sha/ de bzhin du rje rdzar na yong pa'i dkyil 'khor la las sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra kar+tha/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting ngo /
257a2(rgyud): 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs khu tshur bcangs pa'i ting nge
257a3(rgyud): 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje'i dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
257a4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra d+hA tu hUM/ rang gi rig pa mchog ni oM badz+ra d+hA tI shwa ri hUM badz+ri Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de
257a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa
257a6(rgyud): mchog 'di phyung ba oM ak+Sho b+h+yaHa/ oM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti tsit+ta badz+ra Na hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil
257a7(rgyud): 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa oM badz+ra rat+na saM b+ha ba dzA/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na gar+b+ha ti hUM/
257b1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
257b2(rgyud): nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mi tA b+hA hrIH/ oM badz+ra d+hA ri Ni hUM de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa
257b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa oM sar+b+ba
257b4(rgyud): a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a/ oM ba dza ma hA ba le hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la rnam par gzigs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam
257b5(rgyud): par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
257b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ras/
257b7(rgyud): ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas chos thams cad mnyam pa
258a1(rgyud): nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di byung ngo // oM sar+b+ba d+ha trA sa ma tra dz+nyA na badz+ra hU/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams
258a2(rgyud): cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs par mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod par mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pazangs/
258a3(rgyud): cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba sa twa sa ma tA pra bany+tsa bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste/ slar
258a4(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na gnas nas bka' nod cing 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
258a5(rgyud): cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byos shig/ de de bzhin no zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
258a6(rgyud): gsheg pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams byung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis
258a7(rgyud): rnams su de bzhin du rnam par gnas so// sgo rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams dang / mtshams rnams su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams bshad do// de dag gi sngags su gyur pa ni//
258b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra me g+he nA nA/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su gzhag par bya'o// a sna ha ba \u0f7f/ oM badz+ra sha rang brjem a/ oM badz+ra Na kA li kI li hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod/
258b2(rgyud): phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa dang mtshams rnams su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gar+b+he nA/ oM ma d+hu badz+ra Ni r+b+hu/ r+m+mA b+h+rU~M/ oM mno/
258b3(rgyud): b+ha ba badz+ri Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra shi shi re ho ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs la sogs pa'i/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe/ oM badz+ra sha bI/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM
258b4(rgyud): badz+ra ra sa oM badz+ra s+phar she/ mnyes par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' bde rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma ya hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'dis de
258b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang // ji bzhin gnas
258b6(rgyud): su sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHoM pra be sha hUM / sar+b+ba ta/
258b7(rgyud): thA ga te/ oM sa ma ye ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wan oM tu Sh+ya hoH/ b+ha ga wAn badz+ra a be sha aH/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i 'phrin las so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la byams
259a1(rgyud): pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad/
259a2(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs slob ma bcug ste dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas/ slob ma dang banas pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o//
259a3(rgyud): de la dang po kho nar re zhig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/
259a4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o// de nas
259a5(rgyud): 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni skyil krung bcas nas/ dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas te sor mo phan tshun
259a6(rgyud): bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rdorje bsdams pa bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid de
259a7(rgyud): rked pa'i phyogs su bzung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdam pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mda' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje ma'i phyag
259b1(rgyud): rgya'o// de nyid las legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo legs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsngag/
259b2(rgyud): pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba nani rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// kha'i thang du bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhang pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje
259b3(rgyud): bsdams pa de nyid kha'i thang du bskor ba ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying la
259b4(rgyud): sgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang / snying kha dang / mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba/
259b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying khar bcangs pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sgeg mo dang bdug pa ma/
259b6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing rnam par dgod pa dang / sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang // dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang
259b7(rgyud): nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gar byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu
260a1(rgyud): sbyar// 'thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgeg par
260a2(rgyud): sbyor ba'i rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba'i spyan// bsnyems bcas rdo rje can gyir dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can// ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya// 'khrugs pa'i lta stangs
260a3(rgyud): khro rnams kyi// btsun mo rnams kyi rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // bsdigs spyod rnams kyi lta stangs te// chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'i// shugs kyi lta stangs phyag rgya'o//
260a4(rgyud): tshogs dang po nya pho nya mo'i// lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin
260a5(rgyud): byed// mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med gnas// rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas su/
260a6(rgyud): ni yongs su bsdams// 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can// 'jig rten pa rnams mchu yi phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu gnag/
260a7(rgyud): dka'i 'dod chags dang // sdang dang mongs las thams cad du// rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas rab tu 'gro ba yang // mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo po nya tshogs kyi yang /
260b1(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' las mchog/ sta stangs mchul sogs pa'i ming // brag rgya thams cad ma dang bsdub// slob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya// rnga mang mu yi dbye ba dang // dbang po la sogs
260b2(rgyud): rab dbye dang // de dag phyag rgya sna tshogs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi brtags pa nyid// sna tshog sa ni gzi brjid che// tshad med yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog
260b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyung chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so//
260b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil
260b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchogayang dag rab tu bshang bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs pa nis ni mdzes par bya// sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan/
260b6(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba
260b7(rgyud): mchog gis brgyan pa po// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yis nye 'khor brgyad du ni// 'gram du rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang // 'khor lo dag ni bri bar bya//
261a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de mi dbus su ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba gzhag/ 'khrala'o lte ba'i dbus su ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams
261a2(rgyud): cad ni// ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no// dkyil
261a3(rgyud): 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten
261a4(rgyud): gsums las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta ba bas bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu'o// de yi dbus/
261a5(rgyud): su khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang // khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i shazhal// rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba//
261a6(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba yi napas kyis ni// dka' zlog dbang phyug chen po gnod// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas sbas// in+d+ra r-Il mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// na
261a7(rgyud): bzhi pa la thub par dka'// be con dang ni nags par mdzod// dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad// gnyis ba zhag pa sdigs mdzub can// phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog/ khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu
261b1(rgyud): brtag/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'o// lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par sbrel// snying khar phyag rgya legs gzhag nas// sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum sa rgyal/
261b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams su// cha rnams kun tu thams
261b3(rgyud): cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'// de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog
261b4(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
261b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad// gru ba ni
261b6(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya ba'i ming can no// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba//
261b7(rgyud): yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// zla ba'i 'od can tha ba'i bdog/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa lanal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa go//
262a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas sbas// sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas rab 'byams rgya che ba'i// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la
262a2(rgyud): de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// sha Sha'i sde yi mtha' dge ba// kA yig don ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan// me yi sa bon
262a3(rgyud): gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// pad+ma'i thal mo rab tu brkyang // bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag
262a4(rgyud): bshad// dbyug gu'i ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun du bgrang 'phreng pad+ma yi// rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/
262a5(rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs pa dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyal po'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
262a6(rgyud): gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje rin chen zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs banis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su rin chen che/
262a7(rgyud): yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar// de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni// rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de dbus ma ra ka ta 'dra// rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan/
262b1(rgyud): can/ rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// mdun du kun gyi dbang bskur gtso// rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog/ g.yas su pad+ma rA ga ste// rgyab tu in+d+ra nI la'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin/
262b2(rgyud): chen g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin chen rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa bzhi ni// gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis/
262b3(rgyud): de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang // me yi sa bon gyis gsal byas// dbyangs kyi gnyis pas kun nas mnan// dbang sgyur ba ni steng du gnas// de yi phyag rgya
262b4(rgyud): yang dag bshad// rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskums te// rin chen rnam pa legs 'byung ba// de ni rdo rje rin chen no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ma
262b5(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad bye ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa'i//
262b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi ni yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbus su pad chen po'o// kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i gzugs ni yongs su bri// rdo rje khur 'dzin ma
262b7(rgyud): pa ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas 'phreng bar rnam par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'//
263a1(rgyud): mya ngan 'das don legs gsal bya// sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yongs su ldan// sna tshogs bkra ba mchog tu 'bar/
263a2(rgyud): de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas
263a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che// sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes/
263a4(rgyud): de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// ral gri'i 'phre/
263a5(rgyud): bas rnam par brgyan// gsang sngags chen po yi ge lnga// de yi drung du legs par gnas// dbyangs dang smra ba kun nas de'i// thugs ka ru ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol nyid ni grwa bzhi mdzes// thig
263a6(rgyud): bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo gcig gis ni shin tu mdzes// shes rab pha rol byiphyin pa nyid// de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog
263a7(rgyud): 'dod na// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngon du bshad pa'i cha ga yas// mchod sogs chog rgyas pa nyid// gzug pa'i cho ga de bzhin du// ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin// shes rab
263b1(rgyud): shes dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi yis ni yang
263b2(rgyud): dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'phreng ba ni// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su brtson
263b3(rgyud): chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu ni stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che// chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pani/
263b4(rgyud): rgyu yi don du so sor bskyed// dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan// yi ge chen po'i 'phreng ba can// 'khor lo gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// de yi mdun du dung yin la/
263b5(rgyud): rgyab tu zhags pa brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas
263b6(rgyud): ni da chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad yang dag 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor
263b7(rgyud): chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi thig gdab po// de yi dkyil du snang ba che// mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba/
264a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gzhon nu rab tu ring /
264a2(rgyud): pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyan par mdzad// 'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// dbyangs dgu pa la thig le dang /
264a3(rgyud): nA da yis ni rnam par brgyadan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la// thig le nA das rnam par brgyad// gtso bo de'i sngags pa yang // nam mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/
264a4(rgyud): sngags kyi 'phreng ba mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i tshul// tog ni phyag rgyar gyur pa de'i// de bzhin du ni nges par bcing // de lta'i dkyil 'khor
264a5(rgyud): bris nas ni// nam mkha' yi ni mdzod de la// gal te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas
264a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni/
264a7(rgyud): khro za'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// der yang rdo rje 'di yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bzhi pa lan
264b1(rgyud): bzhi pa// bad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas// rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus// bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms mdzad// de sngags mi ger gyur pa na// sha Sha'i sde tshan mthar dge ba/
264b2(rgyud): rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya// khro za'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje gnong rgyu/
264b3(rgyud): de yi ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag
264b4(rgyud): rab tu bshar bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su 'khor lo tsha// lcags kyu yis ni rnam par mdzes// dbus su bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal/
264b5(rgyud): lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo rje ljags kyu khu tshur che// 'bar ba 'phro bas rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad
264b6(rgyud): 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar// sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa// byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas// dbyangs drug pa yis legs par bye// zla phyed thig les/
264b7(rgyud): legs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar// 'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge/ dgug pa la sogs thams
265a1(rgyud): cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu// don yod rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru
265a2(rgyud): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i//
265a3(rgyud): rnam pa can// de yi dbus su gru gsum grags// lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyun
265a4(rgyud): rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba// de yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po// sde tshan
265a5(rgyud): gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni// gnyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas// de yi thig le mya ngan 'das// sngags kyi 'phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri
265a6(rgyud): bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang // sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad yongs su sgrub// rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro//
265a7(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni
265b1(rgyud): mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pas// dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yi dbus su pang chen po/
265b2(rgyud): 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'od kyi 'breng ba can// de yi phyag
265b3(rgyud): rgya mchog tu ni// mdzes pa yis ni mda' gzhur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog 'gyur// de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa// rdo rje chags pa mchog
265b4(rgyud): tu bde// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gyur pa// k+Sha yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi 'phreng bas yang dag brgyan// me tog mda' ni yongs su 'phen// re ba
265b5(rgyud): thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed// rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po/
265b6(rgyud): mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshang bya ba// rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs zhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su
265b7(rgyud): cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi dbus su pad+ma chen po// ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo/
266a1(rgyud): bsam par bya// rdo rje legs pa stobs po che// dung dang kund zla ba dkar// khab bzhi'i 'od ltar mdzes// legs so stsol batshim par mdzad// ting nge 'dzin dbang ma /
266a2(rgyud): po sgyur// rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs// sgo yi skyong ba nyid kyang ni// rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar//
266a3(rgyud): lha mo yi ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni rab sgrub byed// thig le gnyis dang yongs su ldan// legs stsol bas ni rnam par gnas// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab tu
266a4(rgyud): bskor// bdag nyid dag pas gzhug pa sogs// thams cad yongs su spyad par bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu
266a5(rgyud): bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su grags// rdo rje nyims blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i
266a6(rgyud): bang bya// de yin 'du bri byab// rdo rje rgya la 'od pos// rdo rje nyi ma'i steng duni/ gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba/ de yi dbus su gzi 'arjod che// 'bar ba man me ltasu// pargya chen po 'dab brgyad pa
266a7(rgyud): de 'brums ni shin tu mangs/ dem rtse ba di kyil 'khong// de rdzogs brjod thabs pam bzang sa 'amatshas dang mtshungs pa'i 'o// mya skyegs chub ma chung ba ra dog/ phyag pan pas
266b1(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i nyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbu/
266b2(rgyud): su ni// sngags kyi 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor ro//
266b3(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshang bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po rdo rje tog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtsa babs bzhis
266b4(rgyud): ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// mchog tu 'bar ba yini drung // zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen
266b5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan yongs bsgreng ba// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// zhal bzhi pa la gzi brjid che/ in+d+ra nI la mtshung ba'i 'od// rin chen char pa ra
266b6(rgyud): tu 'bebs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// me yis rab tu gsal byas pa// tog gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor// sngags kyi
266b7(rgyud): 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ sang dag
267a1(rgyud): rab tu bshang bye ga// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags pa/ rdorje bcang pa mtshungs pa'i 'od// grub ni pa la sgo bani pa// thababs banis ni mdzes par byas// thog bzhi dang ni yang da/
267a2(rgyud): ldan dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi//
267a3(rgyud): dbus su ni// ston ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa// rkyen rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan//
267a4(rgyud): de yi gsang sngags gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du bsgrub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang ming rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas
267a5(rgyud): thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje bzhed pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis
267a6(rgyud): ni mdzes par byas// thig pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag blo// de yi steng du'ang pad+ma nAM// pad+mA me las yang dag byung // gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// thor/
267a7(rgyud): cog dag gis rnam par brgyan// chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na// thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dge/ de yi mdog gi de nyid ni// 'phro ba'i ma ra ka ta 'dra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal
267b1(rgyud): bani pa/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid dag gi 'khor lo ni// smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas// thams cad sos/
267b2(rgyud): gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab chod bya// rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil
267b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su go cha che// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi
267b4(rgyud): dbus su btson chen po// rdo rje srung bar yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge / phyag
267b5(rgyud): rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po go 'phang mchog/ de yig sang sngags gzi brjid che// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog/ mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod// steng du nA das brgyan
267b6(rgyud): par bya// kun nas kha dog du ma yis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi 'phreng ba yongs su ldan// glog gi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod

268a1(rgyud): ni mdzes par bya// theg pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan/ khu chur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba// gzi brjid chen po gser
268a2(rgyud): gyi mdog/ 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kun da
268a3(rgyud): dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba/ khu tshur gyis ni sdud
268a4(rgyud): par bshad// de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa// sde tshan lta pa'i gsum pa ni/ 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdorje/
268a5(rgyud): sku// 'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas// de lnga'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de la sogs pa'i mtha'
268a6(rgyud): yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil
268a7(rgyud): 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru ba'i bris nas ni// sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spang // rtse gsum snam bu nyid dang ni/ dung dang pad+ma sogs pas brgyam// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtse gsum
268b1(rgyud): pa r+dz+dzas na ldan// rgya mchog la 'on mig sam// sdug gi sngags ston mug ldan pa// thal pas drugs shing mgro sa// das pa'i chogs ni dab byung ba/ tshus kyil 'dor dngas /
268b2(rgyud): dbadzin pa shegs pa thams cad la// phyag 'arnas pani dazlas nga'i sngags ni/ mam rba d+hAg/ gsang sngags 'din cher bsang ga/ bdag nyid chen po dbang phyu gI dbang drug
268b3(rgyud): pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// dkyil 'khor chen po nyid la/ dbang phyug chen pa'i gnas su kyi la zhag par bya'o// lag pa song gi bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dang phyug
268b4(rgyud): dang sbyin cig byug bani pa lag pa skyong gis gnas pa'o// rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA ga la hU~M r+dz+dzaH/ oMnan+te shwar k+Sha/ 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do// dga' byed dbang phyug sa
268b5(rgyud): nag po chen po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// de nyid kyi ni tshig yis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thog gradab bya// der ni pad+ma yang dag bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su spang rtsi byed/
268b6(rgyud): sogs mthar byed spyan bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal bar byed// nyid kyi sgrub thabs de bzhin no// me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan/ rang
268b7(rgyud): gi ming rtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni/ oM ma d+hu kr-id+b+has/ oM sA dz+nyA na swaH/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi
269a1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab bo// dbus su tum pu ru'o// shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o//
269a2(rgyud): lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byung du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM tuM bu ru
269a3(rgyud): hUM/ oM dza ye hUM/ oM bi dza ye hUM/ oM a dzi tin+tu/ oM a pa rA dzi ti hAM/ dga' ba 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol// 'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs
269a4(rgyud): rgyus kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag pa dgod par rab bshad bya// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// tum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod// sdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas// rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o//
269a5(rgyud): mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan gyis mi thub mthe'u chung la// lag pa'i dbus su yi ge oM// dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyag/ rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog
269a6(rgyud): tu bshad// sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang // phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu// so sor brtan par bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rengs
269a7(rgyud): byed la sogs go rims bzhin// las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag ste bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te
269b1(rgyud): gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyi legs par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par
269b2(rgyud): mdzad po byang chub sems ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang // legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ blo gros dag pa ye shes che/
269b3(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba tshe// thog ma tha ma med khyab pa// ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal// rdo rje can chen
269b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon// chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi blam
269b5(rgyud): blang theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' bo mchog tu dpa' ba'i mchog zab cing yangs la phra ba dang // thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po che/
269b6(rgyud): tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las phul du byung // rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa/
269b7(rgyud): rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po lugs kyu che// rdo rje chags pa mda' chen po// rdo rje legs pa legs gru
270a1(rgyud): #mdad/ rdo rje chen ma mchog mchog/ rdorje gzi brjid legs brjid mdang// rdul mtshan chen po na chen tog/ rdo rje btsud pa lags bshad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug/
270a2(rgyud): pad+ma che// shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po// sems dpa' smra ba legs bzhad mdzad// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje srung ba legs srung mdzad/
270a3(rgyud): khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams sbyor sel// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ legs so rdor can rnal 'byor che// de
270a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge/ snying po'i rgyan ces mtshan gsol ba// 'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tu
270a5(rgyud): mdzad// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang // sba bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yi ge bral// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las// shes rab kyi pha/
270a6(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongasu rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/
270a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol pa btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba bas
270b1(rgyud): pa'i tshig nye bar gsan ngas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma'ang snyoms par zhugs so//
270b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to//
270b3(rgyud): zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs
270b4(rgyud): de las 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas// sems can thams cad
270b5(rgyud): kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
270b6(rgyud): legs par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'
270b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la'ang rab tu gnas nas rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de/ yongs su dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la
271a1(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas/ sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag pos kyang sems can yongs su smin cing phreng ba'i khro bos de bzhin
271a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang byin gyis brlabs te sngar log nas bcom ldan 'das
271a3(rgyud): kyis thugs kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho zag med shes rab ni// sangs rgyas
271a4(rgyud): skyob pa thams cad kyi// shes rab shin tu dri med sems// sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad nas// e ma'o chos ni
271a5(rgyud): bsam med nyid// bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi lus
271a6(rgyud): su mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / bod kyi dkyil 'khor dang /
271a7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyun
271b1(rgyud): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
271b2(rgyud): 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
271b3(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus
271b4(rgyud): dang phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par
271b5(rgyud): spong ngo do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len/
271b6(rgyud): pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / pri'i tshor ba dang / byi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang // nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos
271b7(rgyud): dang byi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnams
272a1(rgyud): spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten/
272a2(rgyud): du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas so// oM kAM/ oM tsa tA ra smr-i t+yu bas+thA nA nA hUM/ yang /
272a3(rgyud): dag par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyes pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa skyed cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyi mthu skyed do// smon
272a4(rgyud): lam yang dag par 'debs so// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad
272a5(rgyud): brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / sgom pa yongs
272a6(rgyud): su rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// chos tshad med pa thams cad don dam par chad par
272a7(rgyud): rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM sa myaka pra hA Na sar+b+ba ta sa ma tA a d+hiSh+Thi te a tshwa/ yang dag par
272b1(rgyud): spong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do// sems
272b2(rgyud): dang brtson 'grus dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos
272b3(rgyud): thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM ri d+hi pA da pA ra mi he la ba pa ra hUM hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam panyis
272b4(rgyud): kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rabakyi
272b5(rgyud): dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang sgyur bas spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM in+d+ra ya ba bo d+ha pradz+nye e sheny+dza nA ma n+ya nA pa ga tA ya AHhUM/ dbang
272b6(rgyud): po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// stobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes
272b7(rgyud): rab kyi stobs so zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa/ stongs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba// gdod ma nas dag pas
273a1(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ba la aHhUM hUM baHstobs 'phel ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi ni byams pa dang
273a2(rgyud): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms pa'o// oM brah+ma bi d+hA rA d+h+r-iSh+T+r-i na kaM maM druM kAM hUM hUM/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs
273a3(rgyud): pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa
273a4(rgyud): dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM
273a5(rgyud): pra ti sam+bi daHswa hUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong
273a6(rgyud): ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid
273a7(rgyud): dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam pa rang pyod pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM sarba a nu smr-i ti bud d+his pa da di shi hU~M hUM hUM/ dran pa drug gis/
273b1(rgyud): rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub tu
273b2(rgyud): yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang
273b3(rgyud): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sar+b+ba trA sa bo d+h+yaM ga sa ma tA pra tiSh+Ti dru
273b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag
273b5(rgyud): dang yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tshe ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi
273b6(rgyud): sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// oM Ar+yASh+TA ga mArga maT/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
273b7(rgyud): pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam pa dang
274a1(rgyud): med pa'i rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod do// de la
274a2(rgyud): mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtsa
274a3(rgyud): gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa
274a4(rgyud): ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed do// lha 'am lnga las gzhan gang yang rung ba don du mi gnyer zhing 'phags par yang mi 'dod pa
274a5(rgyud): stedangos po thams cad la ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o// oM kha sa mAHsarba
274a6(rgyud): d+harmAHlaM/ de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po
274a7(rgyud): mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi mkhyen
274b1(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i spobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// de bzhin gshegs pa
274b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// oM dag pa la sa mu tAthA/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par
274b3(rgyud): thar par brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di
274b4(rgyud): ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes la yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing
274b5(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skyed mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o//
274b6(rgyud): de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
274b7(rgyud): ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di/
275a1(rgyud): ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te
275a2(rgyud): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar par pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te
275a3(rgyud): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin/
275a4(rgyud): pa snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to// oM sa man+ta b+ha dre swa b+hA ba bi shud d+he d+haM ShaM khaM/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab
275a5(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar
275a6(rgyud): bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze bam/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan ci'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya
275a7(rgyud): ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang ngag chu ba med pa thob pa dang mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/
275b1(rgyud): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra skrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngas/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa/
275b2(rgyud): 'am dgazhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zang
275b3(rgyud): par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes
275b4(rgyud): bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bstan na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyor ro// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i
275b5(rgyud): 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur bar brten pa de dag la nan tan byas nas/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge sbyong
275b6(rgyud): ma/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag
275b7(rgyud): par rjes su mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros te brjod par bya'o// mi 'jigs pa ni ngar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan
276a1(rgyud): nyid do zhes/ oM be sha ra d+ya sa ma tA pra b+hA a a/ aM aHmthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhen 'dod pas dben pa/
276a2(rgyud): sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcos pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar
276a3(rgyud): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nyes bzhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa ting nge
276a4(rgyud): 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' bo'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te/ dran pa dang
276a5(rgyud): ldan zhing shes bzhin du bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam
276a6(rgyud): gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba'ang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal
276a7(rgyud): ba'ang med/ btang snyoms pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/
276b1(rgyud): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
276b2(rgyud): de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
276b3(rgyud): de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nub
276b4(rgyud): zad med med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min
276b5(rgyud): skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtogs par
276b6(rgyud): mi byed/ dngos po med par rtogs par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM a na nuHbi mok+Sha mu
276b7(rgyud): len/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
277a1(rgyud): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol/
277a2(rgyud): phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
277a3(rgyud): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
277a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ bstan/
277a5(rgyud): pa'i rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra mi ta an+t+ra pa ra~M pU raNI/ oM hrA d+h+r-i te/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de las bcu pa gang zhen/
277a6(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i sa dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya
277a7(rgyud): ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba dang / sa thams cad don gcig ste/
277b1(rgyud): 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to// ye shes kyang ci'ang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba brjo/
277b2(rgyud): pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni sarba rdza pa ri pU ra Ni ba bruM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang
277b3(rgyud): zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang
277b4(rgyud): bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / slu ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa
277b5(rgyud): dor ba ste/ den dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya ba s+thA nA bi ga te hU~M/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
277b6(rgyud): pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang // mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang
277b7(rgyud): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam
278a1(rgyud): par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba dang / dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad dang legs par rab tu ldan pa'i phyir ro// oM sarba bi shi
