278a2(rgyud): tAM hUM hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa
278a3(rgyud): mi mnga'u'o// ca co mi mnga' 'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga' 'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' 'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi
278a4(rgyud): mnga' 'o// mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' bo// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi
278a5(rgyud): mnga' 'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mda' 'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' la/
278a6(rgyud): 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags
278a7(rgyud): ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon grog
278b1(rgyud): ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du dus thams ca/
278b2(rgyud): tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// oM a we Ni ka bud+ha d+harma sa ma tA aHb+hI ra
278b3(rgyud): hUM laM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhen/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor
278b4(rgyud): las mtshan pa nyid de/ 'di yi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa mu khyud dang bcas rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// phyag dang zhabs
278b5(rgyud): kyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing / de'ang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma' ba dang dma' ba ni mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dang pa'i
278b6(rgyud): rgyal po lta bu dra bas 'brel ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri mo'i 'phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o//
278b7(rgyud): phyag dag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha
279a1(rgyud): / can dang / kA tsa lin+d+ra da ltar 'jam pa reg na bde ba'o// bdun mtho bar gyur te/ phyag gnyis dag dang / zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i
279a2(rgyud): phyogs gcig go/ sor mo ring ba ste/ 'di yi zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do// rting pa yangs pa ste/ 'di'i rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tsham par yangs par 'gyur ro//
279a3(rgyud): sku che zhing drang pa nyid do// 'phye bo ma yin zhing zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ mtho ba 'di'i
279a4(rgyud): srid dang rjes su 'tshams pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de/ 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur ro// ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo
279a5(rgyud): gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed do//
279a6(rgyud): byin po ri dgas e n+ya ya'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas a n+ya ya rnams kyi lta bu'o// phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste/ rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis
279a7(rgyud): rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la re pa'o// mdoms kyi sra basbubs su nub pa ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro/ bsku mdog gser 'dra ba ste
279b1(rgyud): 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro// pags pa srab pa ste/ shin tu 'jam pa gser shog ltar 'jam pa'i pags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o// s+phu re re nas skyes
279b2(rgyud): ba ste'adi'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can te/ 'di'i sprin ma dag gis dbus na ras chung legs pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i mdog can g.yas phyogs
279b3(rgyud): su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bur shin tu gsol bar byed do// sku stod seng ge lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku steng du yangs pa seng ge'i lta bur 'gyur ro//
279b4(rgyud): dpung mgo zlum pa ste yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar rgyas par 'gyur zhing gsar shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin
279b5(rgyud): pa can no// yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas na/ ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de rtsa rnams yin la/ de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mabris pa dang
279b6(rgyud): bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyis phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o// shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa skyes bu chen po'i chu dang nang ngag mnyam pa'o// dbu gtsug
279b7(rgyud): tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing nga / gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring bas te/ snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags
280a1(rgyud): kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs na /
280a2(rgyud): du ji lta ba de lta phyi rol du'ang thos shing bya ka la bing ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'gum pa seng ge lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro// tshems
280a3(rgyud): dkar bas te/ dung dang kun da dang zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so// tshems mnyam pa ste/ ha cang dma' ba ma yin/ mtho bo ma yin/ mi mnyam pa mchi/
280a4(rgyud): pa'i rtse mo can gyi tshems rnams su 'gyur ro// tshems thags bzang ba ste tshems rnams bar med pa'o// tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du tshems
280a5(rgyud): nyi shu'o// spyan mthon mthing ste/ spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ ri mo dmar mo rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la/ gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po/
280a6(rgyud): kho na shin tu rnam por dag par 'gyur ro// rdzim pa'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang gang steng ma yin pa de rnams sdeng kho nar
280a7(rgyud): gnas pa ma 'dzings pa legs par gzhol ba'o// sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog
280b1(rgyud): can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog dang 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog can dang 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang
280b2(rgyud): 'ga' zhig rnams kyis dung dang / kun da dang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / bga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog can dang 'ga' zhig
280b3(rgyud): gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa
280b4(rgyud): rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongasu rgyas par mdzad pa dang ji srid du mi tog gi gzhi'i
280b5(rgyud): snying po'i rgyun bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar byed cing chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang
280b6(rgyud): bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang / gsum dang / ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad da/
280b7(rgyud): dang dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas/ rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang / zang zing dang / don 'thun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can
281a1(rgyud): rnams la phan 'dogs shing phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams
281a2(rgyud): thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ lha rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya'i// mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshan nyid med pa'i nyid kyi phyir
281a3(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// lnga thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o// lha thams cad dang / byang chub dang
281a4(rgyud): chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba ra la
281a5(rgyud): kAn sa ma tA d+har+m+ma te ma/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
281a6(rgyud): sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sor mo rnams zlum par 'gyur ba dang / sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang sor mo rnam
281a7(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / rnam ming pa dang rtsa nims mdud pa med pa dang / 'ong bu mi mngo pa dang zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i skabs sa
281b1(rgyud): gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs
281b2(rgyud): pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam
281b3(rgyud): par dang ba dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku dgu pa med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang bcan dang / gzigs pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod
281b4(rgyud): pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / dku zlum pa dang / dku skabs phyin pa dang / dku ma rnyongs pa dang / dku skyed gzhu'i lag bcangs lta bu dang / lte ba zab pa dang / lte ba mi g.yo ba dang /
281b5(rgyud): lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang / pags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag brag dang sme ba med pa dang /
281b6(rgyud): sku brtan pa dang / phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag ki ri mo mi yo ba dang / mchu bim po lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mngon zhing
281b7(rgyud): rlob la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyan pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche dus
282a1(rgyud): padang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gcang ba dang / spyan langs pa dang / spyan mngon mdzang dang / rdzi ma gnag bdud/ sngonam sdug
282a2(rgyud): pa dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu za ba dang / sprin ma rjes su 'thun pa dang /
282a3(rgyud): kha dog ma nyams pa dang / sman mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / yongs su rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas
282a4(rgyud): pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra stug pa dang / dbu sgo 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra mnyam pa
282a5(rgyud): dang dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khums pa dang / dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang / yung drung 'khyil bse brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang /
282a6(rgyud): dpral ba dung lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med//
282a7(rgyud): pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin pas mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam
282b1(rgyud): / sa rgya smram rgya / s+yA sa smra /
282b2(rgyud): stong pa nyid thob pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang dpe byang mnyam pa 'id thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i don la legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams sogs pa'o// oMs na byanyan sam ma
282b3(rgyud): na sprul ma/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas
282b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par mdzad do// oM byang chub sems chen khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag
282b5(rgyud): nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chos chen khyod legs so// tshad med ched du khyod legs so// shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang // mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// sangs rgyas snga
282b6(rgyud): mas ma gsungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis dgyes par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kun
282b7(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdong ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// rdo rje ye shes stobs can la// shin tu sgrib med zhi ba la// rdo rje chos rnams legs sar+b+ba/
283a1(rgyud): pa/ theg pa chen po'i go' yang thob// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che// dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dge chos mchog tu/
283a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba med// bder gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal// ces pa'o// na mo stu te/ oM maM hUM na mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// zhes pa'o//
283a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams/
283a4(rgyud): cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus par mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal byor can gyi
283a5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid kyi rigs thams kyi 'khor lo bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug/
283a6(rgyud): chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gi de ma thag yona'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ngos te bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad/
283a7(rgyud): ci byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ denas 'di las yang dag bshad/ byang chub dkyil 'khor blan med/ rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas slob pa thams cad
283b1(rgyud): kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// me tog 'bring bas rnam brgyan pa// kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni// kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams/
283b2(rgyud): dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras bus rnam brgyan pa// der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog/ gal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug
283b3(rgyud): lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// ri stengs rnams su kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod kyi
283b4(rgyud): yi gnas su ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don dam par ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshul kun dang // chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang // phyag na pad+ma dpal bya ba/ dam/
283b5(rgyud): ba'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' ba// rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams su ni// rdo rje rin chen de yi ni// rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub bya// rtags gcig pa dang ba glung
283b6(rgyud): gnas/ chu klung 'dus pa rnams su yang // sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnam so// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lha rnams gnas mchog kun du /
283b7(rgyud): nam mkha' 'a mo ni phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par bzhag pa der// rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa// bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya// phyogs kun mnyam
284a1(rgyud): nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi// phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig brgyad pa'o// de yi phyi ru 'khor lo na/
284a2(rgyud): kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs pa ni yis mdzes pa ste// sna tshogs gos dang me tog 'phreng // rnga yab sogs kyis rnam brgyan pa// dkyil
284a3(rgyud): 'khor kun la gnas pa yi// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni
284a4(rgyud): gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan//
284a5(rgyud): khor lo sgyur ba thams cad ni// sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya// lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni/ rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan// gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni// rdo rje gzi
284a6(rgyud): brjid la sogs bri// byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni// gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pas kun nas bri bar bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor can
284a7(rgyud): gyis ni// dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su// gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya// gal te dngos grub
284b1(rgyud): mchog 'dod na// dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas// me mtshams su ni cher 'phags so// bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sam/
284b2(rgyud): dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsang zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams su ni// mchod pa
284b3(rgyud): rnams ni bzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs dang // bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no// sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor
284b4(rgyud): gnas rnams su// kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya/
284b5(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// snga ma brtag pa ji bzhin du// phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya// bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams/
284b6(rgyud): thams cad tshon gyi rab brtag pa// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar 'gyur// rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub/
284b7(rgyud): ga dman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba// kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid che'i// rin chen bdun
285a1(rgyud): gyi mchod pa che'ang // yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas
285a2(rgyud): pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che// pad+ma'i rnam par brtag shes bya// rin po che yi rin chen rnams// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o// dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshig rnam// do ba byas pa de nyidani/
285a3(rgyud): gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir gsang ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi za
285a4(rgyud): bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa 'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams ji skad thams cad de// rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu sogs//
285a5(rgyud): bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khang // kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sti//
285a6(rgyud): bya cung zad yod// 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba// mngon
285a7(rgyud): par dbang bskur de nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la// slob ma bzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas/ khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang // sa bon
285b1(rgyud): 'bras bu dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur las// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tu yang // sangs rgyas rin chen
285b2(rgyud): chen po kun// cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdug so dkar steng na gnas pa'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du
285b3(rgyud): dbang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni mngon mtho ba// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang // rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba 'am// seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang
285b4(rgyud): bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni rjod byed cing // dpal gyi mngon mtho zhes bya ba'i// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba// bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u// gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya/
285b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes bshad do// tsun dan rgyu dang bum pa che// gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs pa// kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni// rtag
285b6(rgyud): shes rab can gyis brtag/ gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas/ phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa/ don de dang de brtag bya/
285b7(rgyud): de rnams phyag tu dam par bshad// dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong // sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rag pa
286a1(rgyud): tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang // ga pur de bzhin gur kum dang // a ka ru dang lha yi shing / tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// sa~M hAM bya g+h+raM de bzhin mchog/ kun nas sa/
286a2(rgyud): de ba dang // gi ri kar Na tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad// lhag nas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing // dang po rdo rje dbang bskur
286a3(rgyud): ba shes rab thams cad rab 'jug byed// rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni// gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas// sman kun dang ni sa bon kun// 'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni/
286a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas byin brlabs rnal 'byor las// dab bskur don du rab brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas
286a5(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// / rigs gzugs skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs/ phun tshogs
286a6(rgyud): ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis// rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs pa// dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par bsgyur//
286a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du shrI badz+ra maN+Di a lang kA ra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs
286b1(rgyud): kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che/
286b2(rgyud): dang pad+ma dang las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan
286b3(rgyud): khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
286b4(rgyud): kyi ye shes phyag rgya brnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud cing las sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems/
286b5(rgyud): can gyi khams thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang
286b6(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan pa kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
286b7(rgyud): dril bu btags pa rlung gis bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing nye bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par
287a1(rgyud): yongs su dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khang bzangs 'od mtha' yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug lag khang me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis/
287a2(rgyud): bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin nam mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas/
287a3(rgyud): 'khrungs pa'i dbus rnam par snang mdzad kyi song po 'od gsal ba'i gnal med khang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyun de bzhin gshegs pa
287a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdorje/ de bzhin gshegs pa myi bzungs/ mi 'grog/ 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul/ yang /
287a5(rgyud): nga'i mtha' gsal/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad 'khyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzangasade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
287a6(rgyud): shes smra de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chu gyi snying pos chen po'i dam pa la bzhugs so// de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems/
287a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mo sra bsor zhi mdun du bdang chos ston par mdzad do// thog mar dag pa bar du dge ba tha ma/
287b1(rgyud): dge ba don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do// de nas/
287b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
287b3(rgyud): shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/
287b4(rgyud): las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nam mkha' lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ sku rin po che chos kyi sku/
287b5(rgyud): sprul pa'i sku/ las mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems don yod pa/ yongs su bsdus pa/ dge ba 'phel ba/ rgyal po chen po/ snang ba stog/ banang ba po/ chos dang ldan pa/ shas
287b6(rgyud): rab 'khor lo// skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung ba po// gnod sbyin can/ mtshams sbyor ba/ gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can / ye shes can/
287b7(rgyud): khyab bdag chen po// sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'du bar byed pa/
288a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po/
288a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang
288a3(rgyud): chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa/ de yis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dag pa/ nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa po//
288a4(rgyud): gzugs thams cad yongs su mthong ba/ ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka'
288a5(rgyud): lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod pa// rin chen tog ste 'od byed pa// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon//
288a6(rgyud): don yod pa ni las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab la rab tu gnas
288a7(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjes su thob pa
288b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi gnyis su med cing mnyam pa nyid mig/
288b2(rgyud): pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pa mthar phyin pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas
288b3(rgyud): bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po nyid la phyi/
288b4(rgyud): gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams su kun tu gnas so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/
288b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rab
288b6(rgyud): tu dgyes pa'i zhal ras kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se gol brdabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i snying po
288b7(rgyud): chen po 'di ched du brjod pa bud+d+ha sa mA dza AHhAHoM hUM badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi
289a1(rgyud): khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin yang dag par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom/
289a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis lhan cig yang dag par sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo'i ye shes yongasu bskyed de gnas
289a3(rgyud): thams cad du rnam par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
289a4(rgyud): cad nyid du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'khor los
289a5(rgyud): sgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod pa deng bshad par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs shig/ b+h+rUM de nasami bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
289a6(rgyud): rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de
289a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs so// zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo la bde ba thams cad yang dag par ston no//
289b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul mngon
289b2(rgyud): bar btags pa 'di nyid dbyangs kyis ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam
289b3(rgyud): par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
289b4(rgyud): so phreng ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
289b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas so// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gti mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/
289b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas
289b7(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid sim pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste // byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang
290a1(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lus rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste
290a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ga rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa den/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa
290a3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyu rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang
290a4(rgyud): yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnams par dag pa'i
290a5(rgyud): gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpe'i gnas so// dngos po
290a6(rgyud): thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa/
290a7(rgyud): ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug
290b1(rgyud): gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa po// sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams cad gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ba/ bstan pa la brdzi ba med pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying po bka' stsal/
290b2(rgyud): ba b+h+rUM/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig tsam yang thos na/ de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du sgrib pa thams
290b3(rgyud): cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po nye bar bsags kyang // nams kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song rnams su ltung bar
290b4(rgyud): mi 'gyur ro// sdig pa rnams byas pa tsam na'ang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / rgyu ma chad par tshul bzhin yid la byed pa
290b5(rgyud): deni/ skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// chos thams cad dga' zhing mgul rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang
290b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba bcu drugan/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// hU~M de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang
290b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do// rdo rje ston pa nyid kyis rdo rje mnyam
291a1(rgyud): pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rang bzhin rnam par
291a2(rgyud): dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis las thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po ste/
291a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gang la las chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di nyan par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / sgom par byed na ji srid byang chub snying po la gnas kyi bar du sdig pa thams cad la
291a4(rgyud): kun tu spyod pa thams cad kyang sdig pa thams cad las 'das par 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro// A de nas yang
291a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
291a6(rgyud): par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags spros pa med pa'o// zhe sdang gi smos pa med pa'i phyir zhe sdang spros pa med pa'o// gti mug gi spros pa med
291a7(rgyud): pa'i phyir gti mug spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
291b1(rgyud): phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na/ de 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar
291b2(rgyud): gzung nas/ khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par 'gyur ro//
291b3(rgyud): hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba
291b4(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro//
291b5(rgyud): zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na chos thams cad
291b6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro//
291b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi
292a1(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi
292a2(rgyud): skyon glo bur ba'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// hrI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
292a3(rgyud): khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
292a4(rgyud): tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas khams gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal srid yongs su thob par 'gyur ro// don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// /
292a5(rgyud): chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyis lus dang ngag dang / yid bde ba thob par 'gyur ro//
292a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'tshang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
292a7(rgyud): ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas de bzhin
292b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas ting /
292b2(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su bzung bas su dang / gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te// 'jam dpal gang la
292b3(rgyud): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di ldan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad ling sgom par byed na/ de dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes
292b4(rgyud): thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / su dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor thob par 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag pa
292b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// AHde nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge'i 'khor la
292b6(rgyud): bskor ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar
292b7(rgyud): gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan mas dben pa dang smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'i
293a1(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// aM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gnas pa'i de
293a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/
293a3(rgyud): kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs
293a4(rgyud): nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas 'khor lo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur ro// hUM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
293a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i tshul
293a6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pas de bzhin gshes/
293a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang // chos thams cad yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba
293b1(rgyud): dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / rjod pa dang / skom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// mau danas/
293b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
293b3(rgyud): tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos
293b4(rgyud): nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ haHde nas bcom
293b5(rgyud): ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal
293b6(rgyud): pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don nyid dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas
293b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams/
294a1(rgyud): cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu/
294a2(rgyud): bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad
294a3(rgyud): kyis dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / phas thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems
294a4(rgyud): can thams cad las kyi snying po'o// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang mu med cing mthar phyin pa'i chos dang / slar/
294a5(rgyud): yang 'di rtog pa dang yongs su mthar thug pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don du chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i chung
294a6(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang / shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa/
294a7(rgyud): thams cad mu med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mthar thug pa'i phyir chos thams cad
294b1(rgyud): yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na/ de ni dag cing mthar phyin pa'i
294b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa nyid kyis sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur
294b3(rgyud): ro// b+h+yo de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar
294b4(rgyud): yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka'
294b5(rgyud): stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
294b6(rgyud): bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
294b7(rgyud): cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu
295a1(rgyud): grub pas khams gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi/
295a2(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin du bde ba chen po mchog
295a3(rgyud): tu grub par 'gyur ro// swaM/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas pa mcho ga rnams gnas gyur pa// de srid mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par
295a4(rgyud): nus kha shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni thams cad rnam dag pas// srid pa dag par 'gyur phyir ro// chags sogs kyis 'dul
295a5(rgyud): 'jig rten ni// kun nas srid par rtag sdig byed// de dag rnam par sbyang don du// srid pa'i bar du rang 'dul byed// ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba// tshon gyi skyon gyis mgos ltar// bag chags
295a6(rgyud): skyon gyis srid pa ru// rtag tu 'gro phan gos mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen po nor chen po// khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su// de dag don ni brtan par
295a7(rgyud): byed// haH'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin du nang par langs te/ gang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa
295b1(rgyud): dang / rjod par byed pa des bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par gyur/
295b2(rgyud): ro// hUM de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshung
295b3(rgyud): b+hI b+h+yo sl-i/ 'di ltar/ oM na maHsarba bud d+ha bod+d+hi satwA nA~M/ oM bo d+hi tsid+d+ha badz+re/ oM sa man+ta b+harba tsar+yA bI/ oM tsin+d+ra dA ma Ni/ oM a nai rad+d+hi/ oM dzad+hi d+hi b+ha he/ oM dzA hI pa ri wa ra t+ne/ oM ma hA rA ga d+ha me//
295b4(rgyud): oM bIr+ya ka btse/ oM sarba gA mi ni/ oM badz+ra dri D+ha ka ba tsi he hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga he/ oM swa b+ha ba shud+d+he/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi hA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM karma bi sho d+ha ne hUM phaT/ oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/
295b5(rgyud): oM karma rA ge/ oM badz+ra hUM badz+re/ oM sarba dA ma Ni/ oM hrIHoM a ka ro mu khe/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi hai oM haHpaM hUM/ oM aM/ oM sarba ha thA ga ha kA ya a gri/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka bi sho
295b6(rgyud): d+ha ne/ oM sarba ha thA ga ha tsit+ta badz+re aH/ oM s+pho Ta ya sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha nA ni pra mo k+Sha ya/ sarba a pA ya ga di b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de brjod/
295b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po 'am/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'jal dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
296a1(rgyud): bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rnalam du grag par mi 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa dang ka rim
296a2(rgyud): gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin no// gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/
296a3(rgyud): tha na yi ge gcig tsam yang thos nas/ sems can de sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na/ slar yang mtha' dag ma lus pa rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam
296a4(rgyud): dpal sems can gang la la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas na/ des shes rab kyi pha rol
296a5(rgyud): tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus so// gang du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par 'gyur te/ gang zag de'ang phyag bya ba'i 'os su
296a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la gzung ba 'am/ glegs bam du bris par gyur na/ de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de la bdud sdig
296a7(rgyud): ho can gyis bar du mi gcod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan yang lnga rnams kyis phyi bzhin rjes su 'brangs te/ de srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur zhing /
296b1(rgyud): tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa/
296b2(rgyud): dedang der skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi
296b3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings
296b4(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug dam pa chen po/ 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhis yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod nas ma
296b5(rgyud): skyes pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas yongs su dag pa'o// thams cad kyi sems
296b6(rgyud): gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yongs su rgyas pa'o// aHb+h+rUM trAM hrIHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyin
296b7(rgyud): kyi mtha' klas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad de sbed nyid du shin tu gsal ba rgya chen po snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon/
297a1(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal
297a2(rgyud): pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ de legs par nyon la rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par
297a3(rgyud): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la/
297a4(rgyud): zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po chen po la byin gyis brlab par byos shig/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
297a5(rgyud): gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi spyan sngar rnam par
297a6(rgyud): gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin le snyoms par zhugs nas// /
297a7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po
297b1(rgyud): mchog gyur pa// rdo rje snying po gsang chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud
297b2(rgyud): rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes
297b3(rgyud): thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// grwa yi cha rnams thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje'i
297b4(rgyud): thig rnams kyis spras pa'i// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de'i yang phyi rol du bya ba// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi yi ni 'od// khyad par ji lta ba bzhin du// sngags pas kun
297b5(rgyud): nas yongs bskor bya// de ltar rnam bzhi'i rnam pa dang // ji srid grong ni rnam pa bdun// sbyor ba bdun dang yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// sgo dang sgo khyud rin chen
297b6(rgyud): ni// yang dag mtho ba legs par gnas// de yi grong gi nang du ni// rab zhugs 'khor lo 'dra ba ru// rdo rje thig gis yongs su bskor// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka
297b7(rgyud): mdun gnas rnams su// dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa'o// de ltar 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa// tshad mdzes pa mi snying po che// rdo rje 'khor los rnam
298a1(rgyud): par brgyan// gru bzhi pa dang zlum po nyid// gru gsum rnam par yang dag byung // zla phyed rnam pa dang mtshungs pa// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi slar yang // slob dpon rdo
298a2(rgyud): rje yang dag 'byung // shes rab chen pos rab brtag bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od mtshungs la// sangs rgyas gzugs paran/
298a3(rgyud): gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni dngos kun tu// shes rab can gyis gzhag bya ba// dam tshig mchog bzhi rnam
298a4(rgyud): bzhi ni// go rims bzhin du yang dag bri// rdo rje chen po seng ge'i khri// 'khor lo can gyi khyab bdag gzhag/ gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang // gzi brjid phung po skal ba che// rnam
298a5(rgyud): par 'phro byed rnam rgyal nyid// de bzhin gtsug tor lnga po ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la// yongs su bskor nas snam bu la// dkyil 'khor kun du bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis
298a6(rgyud): song nas ni// dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru// mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri// mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya// rdo rje sam/
298a7(rgyud): dpa' sogs rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug rnams// rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rin
298b1(rgyud): chen sogs kyis dgang // rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor tshe dpag med pa'o// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// gnyis pa 'khor
298b2(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor kun tu der ni bri// rdo rje snying po rgyal po che// khyab bdag gsang ba'i chos
298b3(rgyud): dbang phyug/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo// byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang // nam mkha'i snying po grags chen po// kun tu
298b4(rgyud): bzang po nyid dag dang // phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// sgrib pa
298b5(rgyud): thams cad nges par sel// de nasas mi snying po mchog/ nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na rin chen bla na med// ngan song kun ni 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya/
298b6(rgyud): dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che// dkyil 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste// shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims
298b7(rgyud): bzhin du dgod// 'khor lo mdzes pa'i dge legs can// rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par brgyan// lhung bzed dang ni 'khar
299a1(rgyud): gsil dang // chos gos kyang na khyad par du// shAkya seng ge ji srid par// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod
299a2(rgyud): pas// de rnams blo ldan brdzun pas bri// byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te// pad+ma ut+pal nyid dang ni// spyi blugs pags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang /
299a3(rgyud): dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis// ma myos pa ru bri bar bya// slar yang lho ru song nas ni// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyag rgya 'bad pas bri
299a4(rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje paN+Di sha dang ni// dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang // dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang // dbyug pa rdo rjes mtshon pa dang // lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang // 'di dag dpa'
299a5(rgyud): bo'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni// 'dzum pa'i dbyangs ni blo dang ldan// gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri// ut+pal 'khor
299a6(rgyud): lo rdo rje dang // ral gri yang ni khyad par du// thod pa dang ni dgra s+tha nyid// rma bya dang ni seng ge nyid// phyag rgya 'di ni brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i gra ni
299a7(rgyud): legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi yi 'khor lo'i grA ru ni// rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid chen po 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya//
299b1(rgyud): phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs ming // gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// khyad par du ni ro nyid dang // reg dang chos kyi dbyings dag ni// mkhas pa yis/
299b2(rgyud): ni dgod par bya// sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi/
299b3(rgyud): yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam mkha' spyan zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma yang // phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan// ji srid de
299b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs rig ma// thams cad shar du dgod par bya// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma che// khro gnyer can dang grags
299b5(rgyud): 'dzin ma// khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang // mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mor yang dag ldan// de bzhin pho nya pho nya mo// gsang
299b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag tu ldan cig bri// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// sgo mo phyogs su rab sbyin la// sA ma ki dang lcags sgrog dang // khang rtse rdo rje'i mtshan ma mchog/ de ltar bris nas tho
299b7(rgyud): ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su song nas ni// der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis// skra can stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu mda'i rgyu dang // lha mo zla mdzes 'od zer 'dra//
300a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun gyi mtshamarnamasas// de bzhin nye ba'i sgra can ma// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang // 'gugs byed po lnga dang ldan/
300a2(rgyud): grwa yi cha ru bri bar bya// rdo rje mdung rtse zhes bya sogs// sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni rnam par bri// gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog/ rdo rje dregs
300a3(rgyud): mo lha mo che// rdo rje kum b+hi yang dag bri// de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad las ni 'thon nas su// shar gyi cha ni thams cad du// sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pa yis// khro
300a4(rgyud): chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa// de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// shar du bris nas sngags pa yis// de nas
300a5(rgyud): byang gi chur song ste// rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang // skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o// khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che// pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang // ma
300a6(rgyud): mo stong gis yongs bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogs su song nas su// der ni phyin te brtson chen po// khro bo chen po stobs/
300a7(rgyud): po che// rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang // de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang / khro bo gzegs ma stobs po che// khro re
300b1(rgyud): bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // rdo rjes 'og sa 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang // rkang pas bsnun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang // bran dang
300b2(rgyud): po na rjes 'gro ba// rjes 'gro can blo khro bo ni// stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor// de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni// der ni song ste brtson
300b3(rgyud): chen po// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba// gdong drug pa la lag drug pa// khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bya// khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni// bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil
300b4(rgyud): 'khor cha ni thams cad du// khro bo gtum po thams cad bri// de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas su// rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor kun tu bre bar bya// de nas sngags pa
300b5(rgyud): 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya// de nas thams cad bris nas su// de rnams tshangs sogs lha de dag/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri// dbang phyug re dang khyab 'jug
300b6(rgyud): dang // zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang // gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong // rgyal chen ris ni bzhi po dang // de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum nyid// 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams//
300b7(rgyud): 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams// tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal
301a1(rgyud): rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu
301a2(rgyud): che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i gnas pa rnams dkyil
301a3(rgyud): 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mer me lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang / bden bral du
301a4(rgyud): bden bral dang / chur chu lga dang / rlung du rlung lha dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / phyi rol tu khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ri'i rgyal po bri bar bya'o// ra ba dag gi nang
301a5(rgyud): du rgya mtsho chen po bdun dgod par bya'o// phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag
301a6(rgyud): chen po dgod par bya'o// nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rnga mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru
301a7(rgyud): bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me tog gi chun po dang / sgo khyud dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sbreng ba/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil
301b1(rgyud): 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o// de'i phyi rol du 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i tshad dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rnam par bsams
301b2(rgyud): nas/ de'i steng du rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhag par bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor rim gyis bkod nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi tshogs
301b3(rgyud): mchod nas/ nye bar zhugs te dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcings nas mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spro ba dang /
301b4(rgyud): bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du sgom pa las blang ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje
301b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad nga'o zhes bsgom par bya'o// de lta bu las langs nas de'i snyems pa 'chang zhing snying rje dang / byams pa'i 'dren byed dang / mig gis
301b6(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin
301b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rab tu 'bab pas rdo rje sems dpa'i hUM mdzad kyis phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgras rab tu bsgrag par bya'o// bsnun pa bzhis rol pa
302a1(rgyud): dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings ladam tshig la ban
302a2(rgyud): par byas nas/ rdo rjes gol gyi sbyor ba dang / kun nas 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'di bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdug mtshungs so/
302a3(rgyud): snyam du bsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i snying po bzhi por 'gyur ro// a A aM aH/ bdag byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa byas nas/ slob dpon gyis de
302a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcag kyu'i se gol gtogs nas/ sangs
302a5(rgyud): rgyus thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ badz+ra sa mA dzaH/ A gats+tsha a gats+tshan+da sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba bo d+hi satwa pa ri br-ih+NaHpraN+ye ka ra ha taiH/ sa ha/ zhes so//
302a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa mA dzaHA gats+tsha/ A gan+d+ha/ sarba ha thA ga tu badz+ra lo gi shwa raHsatwa na meHsa ha a heHoM \u0f7fT+Ta/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/
302a7(rgyud): dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / gzungs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas
302b1(rgyud): byon par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas/
302b2(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas/ sgo bzhi po rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs
302b3(rgyud): pa thams cad gzhug par bya'o// oM sarba ha thA ga ha/ su ra ha badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa d+hi tiSh+T+r-i hu/ sarba ha thA ga ha ma hA maN+Da laM/ zhes so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa/
302b4(rgyud): rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs
302b5(rgyud): lags kyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub
302b6(rgyud): thams cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i sangs
302b7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang sde byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan
303a1(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyas
303a2(rgyud): 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas/ sngags 'dis spyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya badz+ra d+hiSh+ThA naM/ ku ru mA~M/ sarba ha thA ga ta sa ma ye Shu me a d+hi tiSh+ThAn+tu sarba
303a3(rgyud): bud+d+ha mAHpra be sha yan+tu/ pra hi pA la an+d+ha/ pU dzany+tsA maM pra yats+tshan+tu/ pra biSh+Tosmai/ sarba ha thA ga ta badz+ra maN+Da a lang kA re/ mahA badz+ra maN+Da le pra hi ba la ya nu man+ta dzany+tsa me pra yats+tsha yan+tu/ de nas slob
303a4(rgyud): dpon gyis de'i thal mor me tog dkar po'o 'phreng ba sngags 'dis btegs nas/ nang du me tog bzhi dang sor mo'i rtse mo'i me tog re re bcug la/ de nas sngags 'di brjod tsong gzhug par
303a5(rgyud): bya'o// nu dz+dza hrIM/ kruM shr-i dzu baHkaHpr-i khi shrI dz+ye hUM mAM a hrI hiSh+Tha nA~M/ sarba ha thA ga ha sa ma ya satwa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs
303a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la/ sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/
303a7(rgyud): sa ma mo haM/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar byin par bya'o// de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/
303b1(rgyud): ta Ta haT/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra hUM/ bi kr-ita bi d+h+ya/ dzi dA dur dan+ta da ma ka/ ha si ha laM bo d+ha ra/ ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+dza muny+dzA/ aT+Ta T+Ta ha sa da ra bi dar/ badz+ra badz+rong+ga ta badz+ra
303b2(rgyud): ne tra/ badz+ra sho tra/ badz+ra b+hA Na/ badz+ra daSh+Ta kiny+tsi ra yi sa pre bi sha badz+ra pa Ne hrid ya ma bi sha/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/ pur+N+Na pUr+N+Na/ b+hUr+N+Na pa ya b+hUr+NA pa ya/ b+h+ra maM ya b+h+ra ma ya/ pA Na ya mo ha ya/ a
303b3(rgyud): be sha ya/ dzal+la dzalpa/ dza lU ya dzamA ye/ la bU la g+hu/ sarba ha thA ga ta dzA ka ra/ pra ba ra/ d+harma lag+d+ha/ bi dzaM ya he haM badz+ra dzI ka ra hUM kl-i ha sAhA/ dbab pa'i dam tshig go// de ltar
303b4(rgyud): pab nas/ kye khyod kyis gang dge ba 'am mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes dri'o// de nas de de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong
303b5(rgyud): ngo zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongs su bzhag la/ mig bcings pa bkrol la/ dbang //
303b6(rgyud): bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ de'i dbus su kha dog thams cad kyis pad+ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba 'am/ seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas
303b7(rgyud): de la dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la/ khyad par du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
304a1(rgyud): dang kha dan la sogs pa nye bar mkho ba dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang / gar dang / klu rnams kyis legs par mchog
304a2(rgyud): nas/ nod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go'aphang la sngags 'dis rab tu gzhag par bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+reSh+NISha a d+hi
304a3(rgyud): Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra satwa a d+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsA/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi ShiSh+Nu/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying kha dang / lte ba dang /
304a4(rgyud): rked pa nas/ rje ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas blta bar bya'o// de de ltar dbang bskur nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i ming byas nas rdo rje'i
304a5(rgyud): tshig rnams bslab par bya'o// de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis
304a6(rgyud): lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro// rig pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes
304a7(rgyud): pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// hUM/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta bar gyur pa thams cad du nges par rig par
304b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// aM/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags kyi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral ba'i ched du
304b2(rgyud): 'jug go/ sa byams pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyi zhe sdang gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis nyes pa thams cad gcod pa'i ched du 'jug go// me shes rab sgron ma mas
304b3(rgyud): ba nyid kyi phyir gti mug gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// raM/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas
304b4(rgyud): 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hri/ sems can thams cad sems gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas
304b5(rgyud): 'dis sems nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// a/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig
304b6(rgyud): pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// aM/ chos thams
304b7(rgyud): cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur/
305a1(rgyud): ro/ AM/ bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi las te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis las thams cad rjes su rdzogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / las thams/
305a2(rgyud): cad las yongs su 'das pa'i don du 'gyur ro// hUM/ ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjes su rtogs pa la
305a3(rgyud): 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// d+haM/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i/
305a4(rgyud): don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyur ro// maM chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don
305a5(rgyud): dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro// khaM 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi de nyid rab rtogs te// bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur/
305a6(rgyud): de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 'khor lo thams cad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang / yid
305a7(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang mi snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang 'khor los sgyu ba
305b1(rgyud): nyid dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// hUM yid/
305b2(rgyud): ni rtse gcig gyur pa yis// sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya// sbyor ba de mi bka'
305b3(rgyud): drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i// kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che// legs
305b4(rgyud): par mnyam par bzhag pas sgom// lo ni phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// kun du bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas sgom//
305b5(rgyud): rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni// yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// de ni rang gis brtan por bsgom// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang //
305b6(rgyud): thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smros// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang // de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur
305b7(rgyud): de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog bsgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms// phyag rgya
305'a1(rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal srid thob 'gyur na/
305'a2(rgyud): dngos grub gzhan lha ci zhig smos// gdugs dka ra gtsug tor chen po ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/
305'a3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i gtsug hor phyag rgya che// de ni yang dang yang du bsgom// chos kyi rgyal srid rnam rgyal nyid// gdor bsdus pas ni thob par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yis// dam pa'i
305'a4(rgyud): yi ge bsgom par bya// legs par rab gnas 'od zer can// dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/
305'a5(rgyud): gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/
305'a6(rgyud): rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur
305'a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug hor gyi dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams so// da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o//
305'b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ rnam par byed pa'i don du shes par bya'o// oM baM/ a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
305'b2(rgyud): skor bshad do// oM a A e aHpa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par blta bar bya'o//
305'b3(rgyud): oM paM/ na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs dang / shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM naM/ da zhes
305'b4(rgyud): bya ba ni 'dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM daM/ sa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das
305'b5(rgyud): shing / yongs su nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched las sogs pa don dam pa'i bden
305'b6(rgyud): pa la nye bar len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM sr-i/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams
305'b7(rgyud): cad kyi sgor rnam par blta'o// oM ha~M/ ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o// oM kaM/ ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dang /
305''a1(rgyud): dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang / shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do// oM maM/ gzhes bya ba ni zab mo gting dpag
305''a2(rgyud): dka' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM gaM/ dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi
305''a3(rgyud): sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dzaM/ d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM d+haM/ sha zhes bya ba
305''a4(rgyud): ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM shaM/ kha zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa nam mkha' ltar gsal zhing
