305''a5(rgyud): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ oM khaM/ k+Sha zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba skye ba med pas mi zad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te/
305''a6(rgyud): chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sbyor blta bar bya'o// oM k+ShaM/ nga zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
305''a7(rgyud): blta bar bya'o// oM ngaM/ tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM thaM/ D+ha zhes
305''b1(rgyud): bya ba ni mthar phyin pa dang / mur thug pa med pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes thob pa'i mchog tu byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad/
305''b2(rgyud): do// oM R+R-i/ dzA zhes bya ba ni dri ma'i rnam par dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+haiM/ lus rnam par byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' nyon mongs
305''b3(rgyud): pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM/ sems rnam par 'byed pa ni nyes pa dang / rmongs pa dang / bag la
305''b4(rgyud): nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsul ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM a~M/ ngag rnam par 'byed pa ni ngag gi spros pa chos
305''b5(rgyud): kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sbyor blta bar bya'o// oM baM/ tsha zhes bya ba ni grib ma ma dmigs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar
305''b6(rgyud): bya'o// oM tshaM/ g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM b+ha~M/ Ta zhes bya ba ni ca co dang bral ba
305''b7(rgyud): dang rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i phyir chos kyi sgor bshad do// oM TaM/ pha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad
306a1(rgyud): kyi sgor bshad do// oM paM/ Da zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba las grol ba'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o//
306a2(rgyud): au DaM/ Sha zhes bya ba ni tshe sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ShaM/ chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam
306a3(rgyud): par gzhag go// oM uM/ chos bzhin ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM yaM/ de kho/
306a4(rgyud): na nyid ni spros pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ oM haM/ ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don yod pa'i phyir chos/
306a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM hUM/ yongs su gzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spang ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM hrI/ kun nas nyon
306a6(rgyud): mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga b+hu nga / rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad
306a7(rgyud): kyi sgor gnas so// oM tsa tsha dza dz+nyA \u0f7f/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM Ta tha Da D+ha Na/ sgom pa ni chos thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba yang dag par
306b1(rgyud): sdud pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM ha thad trA na/ gni med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go// oM pa pa ba d+ha ma/ byang rman/
306b2(rgyud): chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ya ra la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni glo ngur ba thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi
306b3(rgyud): dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongs su thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM sha Sha swA hA/ rnam pa/
306b4(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa rnam par 'byed par byed pa'o zhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par
306b5(rgyud): nges pa'o// // de nas rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni/ sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas/
306b6(rgyud): rab chen po gru bzhi pa// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi steng du rdo rje che// rdo yi steng du pad+ma gzhag/ 'dab ma brgyad pa ches bkrug// rnal 'byor gnas zhes rnam par bsha/
306b7(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// yongs su rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid bsgoms na// de ni bskal pa'i mthar thug gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi
307a1(rgyud): phyag rgya che// 'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor can// rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// b+ha ga chen po
307a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che//
307a3(rgyud): sems can kun la thams cad du// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa//
307a4(rgyud): gang tshe ye shes mthong ba yi// de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa// sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshe rnal 'byor pa bsgom na// sna tshogs/
307a5(rgyud): las ni byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes so// // 'khor lo sgyur ba rgyal po che// kun mchog sa yi dbang po ni// rdo rje
307a6(rgyud): sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// mnyam med 'khor lo sgyur ba mtshungs// gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs shing /
307a7(rgyud): mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rang nyid gzi brjid phung por 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na
307b1(rgyud): ni// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis// sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya// ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba
307b2(rgyud): yis// mnyam med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yi rnam
307b3(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// kun tu bzang po'i sogs gzugs kyis// mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// /
307b4(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gtsug tor lnga ldan spobs po che// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom
307b5(rgyud): pi yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// dom dam par ni bsgoms na no// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdorje
307b6(rgyud): chags pa'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud med gzhan lha smos ci dgos// rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya che/
307b7(rgyud): dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legs so ba ni rab gsol bas// bud med thams cad tshim par byed// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// // rdo rje rin
308a1(rgyud): chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa bsgom// de yis dar thod dbang bskur thob// rdo rje gzi brjid
308a2(rgyud): phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa bsgom par bya// kun mkhyen ye shes sbar bar byed// rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam
308a3(rgyud): par bzhag pas bsgom// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje
308a4(rgyud): bzhad pa ltar gyur te/ de ni skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / pad+ma pad chen pad+ma la// dag pa'i chos ni mnyam bzhag pas// dam pa'i/
308a5(rgyud): don du bsgom par bya// mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes rdo rje rno// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms
308a6(rgyud): na ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom bya de// mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu mi phyag rgya re// legs par mnyam par bzhag bsgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse//
308a7(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni de yis bskor// rdo rje smra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po'i ngag ni rdo yis 'chad// chos kyi phyag rgya'i
308b1(rgyud): ye shes so// // rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni// kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba byams pa che//
308b2(rgyud): rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che// dam pa'i don gyis
308b3(rgyud): bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyis de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur//
308b4(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ste// 'phreng ba yi ni dbang bskur ba// glu mas mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob
308b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub yan lag nyid// sgron mas mtha' dag gsal ba'o// bdug pas bdug pa dag la brtson// lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs//
308b6(rgyud): byed na// skye bo gzhan lha smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po 'ching 'gyur na// gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos// lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs sogs dbang
308b7(rgyud): phyug chen po'ang 'ching // 'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na// dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge mchog gi ni// phyag rgya'i ye shes
309a1(rgyud): rab sbyor bas// sbyar te myur du bsgrub par bya// 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par du// spyi gtsug snying kha rkang pa'i bar// yi ge yis/
309a2(rgyud): ni yongs gang bar// gzugs brnyan gcig gi go 'phang gyur// sems rtse gcig gyur bsam gtan gyi// sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni// dbang chen gyi ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis
309a3(rgyud): ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen gyi ni las su bshad// chu ni zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'i mtshan mas rnam par/
309a4(rgyud): mtshan// zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de bshad do// me ni gru gsum shes par bya// sum mdo yi ni gnas su gnas// dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga 'dra
309a5(rgyud): ba'i 'od// mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste// ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// ser dang // dang de bzhin dmar//
309a6(rgyud): nag po yang ni khyad par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi nas ni// tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang po rdo rje rab tu gzhag/ de yi rjes su rin chen te// pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i
309a7(rgyud): go 'phang rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/
309b1(rgyud): gnyis dang gnyis su med pas yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtag pa dang chad pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang
309b2(rgyud): mtha' dang / mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// zad pa'i sgo dang / zad pa'i mtha' dang / zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang
309b3(rgyud): bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mig lnga las yang dag par
309b4(rgyud): 'das pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sems can thams cad num mkha'i dbyings nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgyas
309b5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos
309b6(rgyud): thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi phyed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
309b7(rgyud): ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams cad spong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid/
310a1(rgyud): pas chos thams cad mi drug pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btub pa'o// ste ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi/
310a2(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gdod ma nas yongs su dag pas
310a3(rgyud): chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa
310a4(rgyud): spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par grol bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad ston pa med
310a5(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// phung po lnga yongs su 'dus pa'i
310a6(rgyud): mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu mi
310a7(rgyud): g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// don dam pa'i bden pa yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba rnam par
310b1(rgyud): mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mchog su mthar phyin pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi/
310b2(rgyud): mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas bzhab pa'o// 'jal ba'i dbang du byed pa dang dbang du bya ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgro 'dogs
310b3(rgyud): pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i
310b4(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba
310b5(rgyud): med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtog ge kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i//
310b6(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas yongs su bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i
310b7(rgyud): phyogs thams cad nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rjes su sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las/
311a1(rgyud): kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
311a2(rgyud): btab pa'o// nam mkha' dang khyad par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang /
311a3(rgyud): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i/
311a4(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas
311a5(rgyud): btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha'i rjes su byed pa'i phyir chos thams
311a6(rgyud): cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs
311a7(rgyud): byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o//
311b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas/
311b2(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas
311b3(rgyud): rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / thams cad
311b4(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so
311b5(rgyud): sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag
311b6(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// muH/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig
311b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/ 'das pa dang /
312a1(rgyud): ma 'ongs pa dang / da lhur byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyag rgya nyid kyi phyag rgya'i rlig gang gis/ phyag rgya'i tshig 'di
312a2(rgyud): rnams kyis kyang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi spong skyed par byed do// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// a aM aHA/ sngags pas/
312a3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di lta bus rgyas btab na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o// hU~M/ myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//
312a4(rgyud): khaM/ de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa ni/ snying gi dbus su rtag bsgom bya// pad+ma chen po 'das
312a5(rgyud): brgyad pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi spang du rngub sgom pa// yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thob ma tha ma med
312a6(rgyud): zhi ba// khab pa mo'i 'od 'dra 'od// dpa' bo kun da zla ltar dkar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang
312a7(rgyud): ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // ra sA ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya// thig le na das rnam par spras// gsang ba chen po mchog tu
312b1(rgyud): mdzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du 'od zer che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// rdo rje rdo rje lta bur gnas// spyi bor rtse mo lnga dang ldan// de mi sbeng
312b2(rgyud): du rtag bsam pa// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ni nga mi smra// sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di
312b3(rgyud): gsungs so// rnam par grol ba gsum thob na// thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lce ni rkan la sbyar bar bya// sna yi rtse mor yi ge hUM// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i
312b4(rgyud): go 'phang tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing spos med pa// shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya// khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam
312b5(rgyud): bya bsam gtan brtson byas te// mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// ra yig 'bar ba dang ldan pa// mgrin pa 'bad pas bcum nas ni// dkar po ser po sngon po'i 'od// dmar
312b6(rgyud): po yang ni bdag gis spro// 'bar ba 'di dag 'bad pa yis// 'di dag yang dag nyer mtshon bya// snying khar gsal bar byas nas su// de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song // gnas
312b7(rgyud): de las ni 'thon nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dgang bar bya// de las 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs par kun nas thams cad du// slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni// de ni 'jug
313a1(rgyud): par rab tu bsam// yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// rang nyid 'khor lo sgyur lta bur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// legs par mnyam par bzhag
313a2(rgyud): pas bsgom// dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang // mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ji snyed bud med yon tan dang // ldan pas kun tu gnas pa ni// bkug nas bcug ste
313a3(rgyud): bcings nas su// dbang du bya ste bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan cig yongs brten nas// sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na// shes rab pha rol phyin
313a4(rgyud): pa ste// zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa mchog/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub gang // de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rtag par shes par bya/
313a5(rgyud): bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste// spyong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed//
313a6(rgyud): sa bcu yi ni sdebs dag gis// pha rol phyin pa thams cad thob// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis
313a7(rgyud): len// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ theg chen mchog tu yid 'ongs pa// stong nyid bsgom pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog// gang gis rtag
313b1(rgyud): tu sgom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yon tan mchog las skyes par 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// bud med lus ngag yid sbyor bas// yongs reg
313b2(rgyud): a ling ga tsum pas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med kha dog ljang khu gang // rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de tshe de ni sngags pas bsten// mnyam med
313b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs// bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
313b4(rgyud): bu mo gang zhig kha dog dmar// ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags pas de dang lhan cig gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur// bud med in+d+ra nI la mtshungs// gas
313b5(rgyud): ba rdo rje rjes su sbyor// rig 'dzin rnams ni rgyal po ni// stobs chen grub par de 'gyur ro// gsang chen ma ra ha ka mtshungs// gang gis rtag tu bsten pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//
313b6(rgyud): myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad+ma ra gA dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bur sgrug
313b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ bsam pas rtag tu sgom pa ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi// mtsho/
314a1(rgyud): gi gnas kyis bsgoms na ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis mi ring bar// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur// yang dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par
314a2(rgyud): bzhag pa sgom// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs// so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// shin tu mnam bzhag bsgoms na ni// rdo rje
314a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas ting 'dzin mchog/ mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//
314a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs
314a5(rgyud): pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje sbyar bar bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga// dam pa'i don gyis
314a6(rgyud): bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba rjon
314a7(rgyud): 'grus che// spobs 'dzin lha bu nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// gsang sngags sgom pas bsgoms na ni// rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis// khyab bdag chos kun rje
314b1(rgyud): par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa// de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten shes la rab tu 'da'// rjes su dran pa rnam
314b2(rgyud): pa drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru// sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur// spobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms// bsgoms pa'i rnal
314b3(rgyud): 'byor de nyid kyis// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang //
314b4(rgyud): sa rnams kun gyis nges bskyed nas// myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su// de yi nu ma shin tu bsnun// rje ngar gyis kyang de bzhin du// mchu/
314b5(rgyud): yis mchu ni yongs su bzung // 'bad pas dam du a ling ga/ byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che// rdo rje dbyings su bdag brten pas//
314b6(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs ka ra na// rnal 'byor shes pa de bstan bya// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grub// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi thugs bsnun/
314b7(rgyud): ling ga myur du gang bar 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis// stobs chen sangs rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang ba 'di/
315a1(rgyud): yi sbyor ba yis// yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos su grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gcong mo//
315a2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab tshogs pa'o// ma 'dres pa yi chos gtso brgyad// sangs rgyas chos su grags pa ste// de rnams bsgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rang ster byed//
315a3(rgyud): bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang // 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun//
315a4(rgyud): chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba// de rnams bsgoms pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing // sbyor ba thams cad thams cad
315a5(rgyud): du'o// des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam// ye shes rin chen rab brnyed dka'// mchod
315a6(rgyud): dang dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// bshags dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // bdag nyid dbul ba de zhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la mi
315a7(rgyud): rang zhing // de bzhin yongs su bsngo ba dang // byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun du'o// thog mngar dang phye ma red du// ji lta bzhin du rjes
315b1(rgyud): bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// 'di la the tshom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni// brtan pa'i snying por legs par bdashad// sdod/
315b2(rgyud): nyid de bzhin nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa ri de shad do// 'gro ba thams cad bkug nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag pa ste/ rdo
315b3(rgyud): rgyal po mchog ces bshad// rdo rje chags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa// de yi sems ni chags par bshad//
315b4(rgyud): chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing gnyis su med// gang tshogs dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong // de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po//
315b5(rgyud): yis// ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par
315b6(rgyud): byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso// rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te// rnyog pa med cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi
315b7(rgyud): brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad dbang sgyur ba// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che// rdo rje tog ni bla na med/
316a1(rgyud): ye shes snang ba rin chen che// rmad du byung ba nges par mthong // de bzhin gshegs kun bsang ba ni// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes su grags// chos kyi bdag med/
316a2(rgyud): las byung ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// rdo rje chos zhes bya bar dran// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes dri med mchog
316a3(rgyud): zag med shes rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyis su med las byung bar mtshon// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming //
316a4(rgyud): rdo rje rgyu las nges par bshad// dgongs pa skad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis bzlas pa che// de ni rdo rje smra bar bshad//
316a5(rgyud): sems can kun gyi don la sbyar// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de ni rdo rje las su bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba
316a6(rgyud): gong na med// dag pa'i chos ni brtson chen po// rdo rje bsrung ba zhes su grags// shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad zab che//
316a7(rgyud): de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod// lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyar// sgrib pa med cing yi ge dral// de bzhin bshegs pa kun gyi bsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// rdo rje ye shes
316b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor me/ sangs rdzas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tha ma med zhib// rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin pa shegs
316b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas glur blangs pa/ oM sarba bud+d+ha par me shwa ra bud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ la li hoHsu b+ha gaHsu ra taHma skams a dI ma hA bo d+hi
316b3(rgyud): shud+ha shur+ya/ yo bI shwa ra dA b+hA bi hA da ma ka ha thA ga ha/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas
316b4(rgyud): zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs
316b5(rgyud): go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po che// hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin tu/
316b6(rgyud): yongs su mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po// rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag pa rdo rje mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byor/
316b7(rgyud): dbang phyug rnams kyi mgon// dus gsum bsam pa dbang sgyur ba// sems can rnams la phan don du// 'byung ba khyod la phyag 'tshal du// rdo rje snying po rgyan pa las// dkyil
317a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin
317a2(rgyud): 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// /
317a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don mched du brjod pa/ de nas ya
317a4(rgyud): dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzes//
317a5(rgyud): sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang // phyag rgya dang ldan rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu drug rtsibs// rnam
317a6(rgyud): par dbye ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas su legs brtags pa// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ge sar gtams pa sa rab tu mdzes// de yi
317a7(rgyud): lte ba'i dbus su ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni// de bzhin gshegs/
317a8(rgyud): pa brgyad rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub tu gnas// gzi brjid phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par
317b1(rgyud): gsal ba bri// mer ni sdeng 'gro dgod par bya// steng 'gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal ba chen po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ldan
317b2(rgyud): pas 'di dag bri// ming spyod pa ni shar du dgod// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub tu 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la badzin pa'o//
317b3(rgyud): dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// 'phreng ba rnam par
317b4(rgyud): dgod bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje bdug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs//
317b5(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// sgo srungs 'bad pas bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas par// kun tu bzang sogs rim bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams
317b6(rgyud): dang // pon yi ni 'khor dag dang // khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin pho nya pho nyam// rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi
317b7(rgyud): rol rdo rje'i ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas dri// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug
318a1(rgyud): dbang chen mying // dbang po la sogs lnga thams rgyud// ma mo kun dang srin mo rnams// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang klu// de bzhin sgra rnams thams/
318a2(rgyud): cad dang // brtson 'grus chen po nam mkha' lding // 'bad pa yis ni dro bar bya// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su// khyad par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug
318a3(rgyud): spos rol mo'i tshogs// de bzhin bza' dang sngon mo sogs// 'phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi
318a4(rgyud): g.yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug/ yongs su
318a5(rgyud): dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa// cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdo rje'i
318a6(rgyud): dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba ni de nas sbyin// seng ge'i khri yi sbeng du ni// dar dang me tog chun pos sbas// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che// bla re rgya che 'bar ba
318a7(rgyud): dang // de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras kyis rab mchod pa// g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas/
318b1(rgyud): 'dad pa yis ni gzhag par bya// rin chen sma na kun gyis gang ba'i// bum pa legs par bzhag byas te// rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gis dbang bskur bya/
318b2(rgyud): rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang dung dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan dbang bad+ma dang // sangs
318b3(rgyud): NA sa kun gyi skyob pa ni// sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur byin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba/ sangs rgyas kun sgrol ma sbyin/
318b4(rgyud): de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba// khyad par du ni sngags pas bya// de la dam tshig cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // sgrub
318b5(rgyud): po kun la smad mi bya// sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la// smad par mi bya/
318b6(rgyud): blang mi bya// de la mngon par dag nga spangs// sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs shing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya
318b7(rgyud): sbeng so bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ga gnam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad
319a1(rgyud): chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam rmos kun dang // dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam
319a2(rgyud): tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yong mi spong // lus can kun la 'tsha mi bya// khyod kyi sa ser sna mi bya ste// phrag dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya//
319a3(rgyud): byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde// rang gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spang // thams cad mkhyen pa yongs mi dor// rtag tu srog rlugs gsad mi bya// sems
319a4(rgyud): can kun la snying rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par bsgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs bsdu bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// dam tshig
319a5(rgyud): de nyid 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcing ba// go rims bzhin du bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di dag
319a6(rgyud): khyad par gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// thal mo brtan par bsdam par bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul du mdzes// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// pad+ma'i
319a7(rgyud): thal mo zhes su bsgrags// rtse mo thams cad legs brkyang ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// re re'i mtshams su nges bcings pa// de ni rdo rje thal mor brtags// sor
319b1(rgyud): mo thams cad nges bsdams pa// rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa// sor mo brkyang sde steng du bstan// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khru tshur nang du byas
319b2(rgyud): nas ni// gnyis kA sbyor bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dam tshig rgya
319b3(rgyud): rgya 'di yin no// ming med nang btsug khu tshur gyis// kun gyi rtse mor yongs su brtag/ rdo rje'i rnam pa legs par sbyar// rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrags// mthe'u chung srin lag
319b4(rgyud): khu tshur las// gung mo legs par brkyang nas su// mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su sbyar// 'khor lo sa sbyar ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni// gdugs dkar
319b5(rgyud): zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya// gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya che// gzi brjid phung po nyid gsol byed// de nyid
319b6(rgyud): ral gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba// rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas// gtsug tor rnam pa'i/
319b7(rgyud): 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba zhes su bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa yongs su sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gung mo'i rtse
320a1(rgyud): mchog tu sbyar// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis// legs so ba ni sbyar bar bya// gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse// bye ba gzi brjid
320a2(rgyud): mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma pad+ma lnga bur bskum// ral gri 'dzin pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs/
320a3(rgyud): 'khor lo sbyar ba'i 'khor los sgyur// kha ru phye mo'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che// gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'i
320a4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad// khu tshur bcangs pa khu tshur gyi// rdo rje thal mo snying khar
320a5(rgyud): gzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags// yongs su sbyar ba spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje 'phreng ba zhes su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdong du dgrol// rdo rje glu mar rjes su bsgrags// 'gyed/
320a6(rgyud): cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad// pad+ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye// spyi bor yongs su sbyar la gzhag/ snying khar mthe bong mnyam pa dang // rab tu brkyang ba byug
320a7(rgyud): pa'o// lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gzhag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis// dri yi phyag rgya
320b1(rgyud): zhes su brjod// gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni// ro yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg pa zhes su bshad// mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongs su sbyar
320b2(rgyud): ma rtsub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtagabazhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag/ phyag rgya kun dang
320b3(rgyud): nye ba'i rgyu// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongs su sbyar la bsdam// mdzub mo gnyis po bskum nas ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing // kun tu bzang po blo ldan gyis//
320b4(rgyud): las rtse mo rtse mo bskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas so// mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// rol gri'i rnam par brtag pa ste// 'di ni nam mkha'i snying po yi// phyag rgyar
320b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i mtshon cha yi// rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par// thams cad kyis ni yongs su brjod// gar ni
320b6(rgyud): sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang // pad+ma lta bur rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis// de nyid me tog zum tshul dang // ut+pal rnam pa ltar mdzes pa/
320b7(rgyud): 'di ni pad+ma'i sgrol ba'i rgya// pad+ma'i mgon po zhes su grags// mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'dra bar legs par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha yi phyogs
321a1(rgyud): su rab tu brtag/ pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba 'i// khro gnyer du ni ne bar sbyar// rdo rje bal mo 'bebs pa che/ dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldam/ yid panin/
321a2(rgyud): nor bu'i rnam pa bzung // thal mo legs par rab tu btung // mi zad blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yi// rin chen rdo rje
321a3(rgyud): snying khar gzhag/ nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// nam mkha'i mdzod nyid sbar bar byed// rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe'u chung mthe bong nges par bcing // lag pa gnyis ni
321a4(rgyud): nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyang rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du bsgreng // mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgyu// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur
321a5(rgyud): nang du byas nas su// mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo bya// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste// rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid shag ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o//
321a6(rgyud): gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur// mdung rtse chen por rab du brtag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongs su gzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pa'i// gshin
321a7(rgyud): rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid ral gri byas pa ni// skra can ma ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te// mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya// 'di ni nye ba'i skra can ma yi rgyar//
321b1(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa sbeng bcings te// dbu ma gnyis na rnas par spangs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang /
321b2(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin// mdzub mo mthe bong bsdams pa ni// mA ma kIr ni yongs su bshad// mdzub mor lcags sgrog rnam pa las// gung mo'i dbu
321b3(rgyud): ma rdo rjer bya// 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya// rdo rje lta bur yongs su bshad// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// khro bo gzigs mar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya// rdo rje rtse mo
321b4(rgyud): nyid kyir bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya// skul byed lha mor yongs su bshad// thal mo yongs su sbyar ba
321b5(rgyud): las// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong drag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas spyan gyir rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyis ni skyil krung bca'// rnal 'byor rig pas lus bsrangs
321b6(rgyud): te// lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bgod// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya// sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'o// mi bskyod pa yis la
321b7(rgyud): reg/ rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med// ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'jigs 'jigs pa med pa/
322a1(rgyud): sbyin// blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mnyam par bzhag pa phyag rgya kun// 'ching ba'am ni 'ching du gzhug/ 'jig
322a2(rgyud): rten pa yi phyag rgya la/ lag pa gcig ni rab brkyang ste// dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan par bya// lha mi dbang po rdo rjer 'gyur// lag pa g.yas
322a3(rgyud): pas brtag par bya// ma yi oM yig lag pa dag/ mthe bong gung mo nyid la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo ste/
322a4(rgyud): 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa gcig gis thod pa ni// ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis bsgreng ral gri ni// srin po bdag nyid chen po'i'o// mdzub mo
322a5(rgyud): mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lhar bu ra legs par brkyang // rlung lnga rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyis
322a6(rgyud): rab tu brtag/ dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug to'i phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag
322a7(rgyud): rgya ni// tshangs pa yi ru legs par bshad// drag po'i gsal shing zhes bya ste// lha mo'i pa Ti sa ru brjod// tshogs bdag gi ni sgra ru bshad// zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro//
322b1(rgyud): ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bsnun par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya// dpa' bo kun
322b2(rgyud): gyis rab tu gnang // dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad rab
322b3(rgyud): mchod phyig// lnga chen pos ni rab tu brtags// ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis// mi'am ci rnams kyir brjod bya// pi wang bsgreng ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can gyi ni rnam par bshad
322b4(rgyud): rtag tu dun du b+hi sgrog pa// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod// lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa// klu rnams kyir ni legs par bshad// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis//
322b5(rgyud): 'gyed dang 'du ba'i de bzhin no// lag pa zhags pa nges bcings pas// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs/
322b6(rgyud): las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yis// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyis ni// rin chen yang dang yang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdon nas zhi// chos
322b7(rgyud): dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong pa mkha' 'drar shes nas su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab tu
323a1(rgyud): gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mi 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal// mi rtag
323a2(rgyud): sdug bsngal spong pa ru// srid pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgya sa kun dang dpa' bo yis// sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha dang // lbu brgya yi chu
323a3(rgyud): drar dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar// zo chun khyod mo ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas
323a4(rgyud): kyi tshul 'dra ba// zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par bal+la// rtag tu glog gi 'phreng ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dang mtshungs par gnas// 'khor ba shin tu bslang ba ste// rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra
323a5(rgyud): bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni// bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rang nyid kyis// sems ni logs sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan
323a6(rgyud): ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lnga nyid dang // de nyid gsum ni rab tu/
323a7(rgyud): gnas// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal tog/ phyag rgya yi ge
323b1(rgyud): bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ba med// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la// dngos po'i de nyid du ni bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos
323b2(rgyud): po yin// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// stong pa nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i
323b3(rgyud): sems// glang tshe de ltar nyid gyur pa// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing //
323b4(rgyud): rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ phyag rgya'i
323b5(rgyud): rim par phye ba'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rdo
323b6(rgyud): rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol
323b7(rgyud): ba btab pa'i tshig nye ba rigs na nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas/ zas gtsang gi rigs
324a1(rgyud): la mngon par gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar mnan nas 'khod de/ bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byung
324a2(rgyud): chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms
324a3(rgyud): par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sa gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ha badz+ra sa
324a4(rgyud): mA dzaHA kaR+Sha ya sarba ha thA ga han hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te chos kyi dbyings su spros nas/ phyogs
324a5(rgyud): bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab ste/ nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu lngar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to//
324a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug sde/ bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/ de nyid kyi thugs kar rab tu bzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
324a7(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs par mdzad do// oM tsid+d+ha pra hi pe d+haM ka ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la
324b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyis 'od bsal ba sems rin po che nges
324b2(rgyud): par byung ste spros par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs
324b3(rgyud): pa/ nam mkha' lngar gdod nas ni ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang 'chi bas rnam
324b4(rgyud): par khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas/ slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pAdrA yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la
324b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar sems 'od gsal ba de yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lhar byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar rnam par
324b6(rgyud): gzhag go// legs par rnam par dag pa'i nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad spangs pa/ me long lta bur bstan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di rjod
324b7(rgyud): do/ oM dz+nyA na ra sI bi sradza hUM/ de ni rjes thogs nyid las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo // de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te shes
325a1(rgyud): bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse bskyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje'i sku/
325a2(rgyud): chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rab tu gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags
325a3(rgyud): 'dis byin gyis brlabs so// oM hiSh+Ta badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa/ oM s+phar badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdus so// oM saM ha ra badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
325a4(rgyud): cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba ha thu ga
325a5(rgyud): ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM badz+ra at+ma ko&haM/ de nas de bzhin
325a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs gzigs nas
325a7(rgyud): sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad do// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tasnga thA a ha ma pi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdza
325b1(rgyud): pa'i rgyu/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges par bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten spong ba rnams kyis mchong
325b2(rgyud): nas/ lnga dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa zhes smra bsgrags so// de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab
325b3(rgyud): bskor nas/ de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te/ gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o// // de nas bcom
325b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka las rdo rje/
325b5(rgyud): phyung ste/ nyid kyi phyag tu bzhag par gyur te/ de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs
325b6(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang 'phreng bas dbang bskur
325b7(rgyud): ba zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so// de nas thugs ka nas phyung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
326a1(rgyud): spyan sdu dang / rgyab dang / drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dreng/
326a2(rgyud): bar rnam par gnas so// de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / bdug pa la sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed cing / gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / lcags//
326a3(rgyud): klu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed de/ 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams
326a4(rgyud): cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhes su gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// sgo khyud dang ni kha khyer dang // rta babs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi
326a5(rgyud): dbu su khri chen po// kun nas yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yi sbrang du pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// de yi lta ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya//
326a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun tu// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye 'khor du// 'khor lo sgyur ba la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras
326a7(rgyud): po rnam par dgod// kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan// brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud
326b1(rgyud): chen po las/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi choga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par byung mdzad kyis slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa
326b2(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po ru ni rtogs
326b3(rgyud): par bya// ri mo mang po sna tshogs pas// sgo dang sgo khyud brtag par bya// rngu babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// ge sar ldan
326b4(rgyud): zhing rab mdzes pa// 'dab ma brgyad kyi kra ba'i mdun// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar por mchog/ khab bzho lngar
326b5(rgyud): dkar gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od// kun da zla ba lngar dkar brtan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par
326b6(rgyud): dgod// thams cad zla ba lur dkar zhing // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mtshan cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi// dkyis
326b7(rgyud): 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
327a1(rgyud): pos me lU zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid/
327a2(rgyud): mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid rjes su brjod// gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya// sum mdo'i ris kyi rnam par mtshungs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog dam
327a3(rgyud): po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag tu pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs
327a4(rgyud): pa// sum mdo'i snying khar gzhag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs// ya ba'i me tog drag dang 'dra// pad+ma pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag
327a5(rgyud): 'bar// bzang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sra sa// khro bo
327a6(rgyud): dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// ni mchi
327a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus son par// thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus// 'phreng ba dang
327b1(rgyud): po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan b+hi d+hAd chen po las/ me lnga zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
327b2(rgyud): rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rdung lnga'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil
327b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad// zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// A ta
327b4(rgyud): si yi me tog 'dra// in+d+ra ni la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad chen po// bai DUR+Ya mi 'od dang 'dra// shin tu gnas pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas/
327b5(rgyud): de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po 'khyil ba 'bar ba'i gzi// mtshan mo nab mo lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa nam mkha' lnga bur
327b6(rgyud): gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri// khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin po nya po nya mo// thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhin nag po'i
327b7(rgyud): gos byon pa// kha dog nag po thams cad du// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsnams// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba// bla bere rgyas pa mnyam pa ni/
328a1(rgyud): kha dog nag po sna rlogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// mdor bsdus nus ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyis/
328a2(rgyud): rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgoms// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o//
328a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug/
328a4(rgyud): chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
328a5(rgyud): chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa kun// yang dag
328a6(rgyud): mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i sku ru bya// sgra dang gzugs
328a7(rgyud): dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i 'phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// hUM sngags pas snying khar son pa bsgom
328b1(rgyud): gsang phyugs dge ba brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gri sta ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rabu gsal pa// pad+mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug go// dus smin
328b2(rgyud): sprin g+hi hUM gi sgra// tsA Ta tsaT+Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gI kA sma ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs// nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen sgra ru rab tu bshad// pi wang gling
328b3(rgyud): bu de bzhin glu// gar gyi rkyen gyi sgra dang ni// rdza rnga'i ngar sgra hUM gi sgra// spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang // de nas gzugs kyi bzlas
328b4(rgyud): pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// de rjes rnam
328b5(rgyud): pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam// lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i// phyag rgya'ang snying khar son zhes bya// rang gi rigs rims
328b6(rgyud): cho ga yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od lngar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thams cad du// kun nas baspu'i rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng
328b7(rgyud): dge bas// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes su bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa ni// gsang sngags sgrub pos brtsam par bya// mchod dang byin brlabs dbang bskur mchog/ spol
329a1(rgyud): sogs rims thams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas pa bcwo bo 'di// bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa mchu lce min// rka na dang spyi bo nyid ma yin//
329a2(rgyud): nang min phyi dang gnyis bur min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/
329a3(rgyud): sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad// de nas spang du mdor bsdus te// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya// dri
329a4(rgyud): ma med cing legs par gnas// de la yi ge rnam par dgod// tshig gi 'phreng ba ma chad pa// mu tig 'phreng ba lhar brgyus pa// chare sprin gyi ni ma 'dra'i 'od// de tshe thams
329a5(rgyud): cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // ji lha ji ltar yi ge'i 'phreng // mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa// de lha de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid ni/
329a6(rgyud): du 'gyur// mthu stobs lha dbang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug las che ba lhag/ bzlas pa de nyid mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'o// ji ltar sems ni
329a7(rgyud): bsgom pa yis// de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las// bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
329b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/ mnyam med mig yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'a/
329b2(rgyud): ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la'ang
329b3(rgyud): tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par
329b4(rgyud): stsol/ rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs
329b5(rgyud): rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnas su gshegs kyang e ma chos nyid bzang // bde
329b6(rgyud): bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa ba rIs gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi ga mo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// se
329b7(rgyud): shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po
330a1(rgyud): dus gsum sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pas// dam tshig mchogagasum dngos grub dam pa bdag la sol// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ yang dag yon/
330a2(rgyud): tan rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs de kun baspyod na// rab
330a3(rgyud): yangs dngos grub stsol 'gyur te// bskal par gnas shing bskul bar bskul// lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru// bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam snang
330a4(rgyud): mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med// don grub rgyal po thams cad du// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// /
330a5(rgyud): dngos grub yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shubs//
330a6(rgyud): mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi
330a7(rgyud): dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// smyung bar gnas pa'i rog med// ji ltar bshad pa
330b1(rgyud): tshogs bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste/ gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar dzi ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog sIl mA bak+Sha ma la bdug spos kyis bdugs te
330b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sarba
330b3(rgyud): pA ta kA bA yi ka bA ka tsIn+da mAn sod d+hA tA na rA ga/ de Sha mo sa ma da mA na biSh+Ta Na yad kr-i haM ha na traM kA li kaM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba pA pa s+pho Ta yA mi swAhA/ oM sarba pan pra ti de sha ya mi swAhA/ darma/
330b4(rgyud): rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba ha thA ga he nAn Ad ma b+hA ba ni ra yA ha yA mi/ sarba ha thA ga taHpra ti gr-ih+Na na hu mAM swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod
330b5(rgyud): nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni/ oM sarba ha thA ga ta puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha ran a nu mo de ya mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis bya ste/
330b6(rgyud): sarba ha thA ga ha sa mar+tha dA dra ma swA badz+ra sa ma ya ma hA bo d+hi tsa~Mt+ta un pa da ya mi swAhA/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lu bzhugs pa'i
330b7(rgyud): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po chen mo'i mad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// oM dung rdo /
331a1(rgyud): sngags 'dis bdag yongs su dag par byas te/ oM sa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba ha thA ga hAHsa pA ba shu d+ho&haM/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa/ 'od/
331a2(rgyud): gsal ba'i snang ba shin tu gnas par byas te/ oM d+harma d+hA tra sA d+ha ba At+ma kro&haM/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig
331a3(rgyud): rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+hA sa ro&haM/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi
331a4(rgyud): dbyings rgya chen por spros nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do zhes nga rgyal bskyed la/ bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal bar ldan
331a5(rgyud): cig gnas par bya ste/ nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste/ thun mtshams gsum du dus dzaM lta bar yi ge la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyi 'bum phrag ni
331a6(rgyud): shu bzlas par bya zhing / nyi ma re rer spong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag re bzlas te/ ji srid mtshan ma thob pa de srid du'o// tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur kum la sogs pa rnams kyis
331a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor byas te/ nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa byas nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba 'am/ sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar me stong phrag brgyad spar la/ rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas te/
331b1(rgyud): ma'i mechog gam/ me tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mchod rten la mchod de/ ji srid 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa ma thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs
331b2(rgyud): pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de nas sreg thugs 'bum phrag gcig dbang bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyur ro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas
331b3(rgyud): pas dbang phyub chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis de bzhin
331b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa 'am/ yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so// bde bar gshegs
331b5(rgyud): pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyi mchod rten nyi ma re re la re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha ma'ang mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin
331b6(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas/ ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lnga rnams me tog gi char 'bebs par 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lnga dang / klu dang /
331b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang bstod par byed cing / ji srid A bI tsi mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can dmyal ba
332a1(rgyud): thams cad bsil bar 'gyur ro// yi dgas rnams kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems can rnam
332a2(rgyud): la gdung bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyur ro// de'i rjes la lus dang ba gsar gyi mdog lnga bu dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam
332a3(rgyud): pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / spobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten
332a4(rgyud): gyi khams su rgyu ba dang 'khor lo sgyur ba ltar che ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bskrod cing sbeng du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
332a5(rgyud): stong gsum gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba dang lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas
332a6(rgyud): yongs su bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis
332a7(rgyud): legs par mchod cing grub pa mas cad mod kyis lhung bar 'gyur ro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i ldan byed sbar bar 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang /
332b1(rgyud): gzugs dang dpa' bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'ang so sor thob par 'gyur ro// sems can thams
332b2(rgyud): cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// phyi ma'i mthar tshe byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya/
332b3(rgyud): ba nges par ston par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang
332b4(rgyud): mtshungs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
332b5(rgyud): thams cad mchod par bya ste/ gi'u wang ngam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du bzhag la/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur
332b6(rgyud): ba dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams cad 'dzin pa nyid do// rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma spong shar ba'i kha dog dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par sgra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / gdu bu
332b7(rgyud): dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas pa dang / rig pa
333a1(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ro// mchod phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par
333a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'khor los khyab 'jug tu 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung ste sa srungs kyi bu byas la/ de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te/
333a3(rgyud): de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i sde/ 'di nyid kyi sa lha'i bye brag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ des de'i longs spyod la spyod par
333a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu'am bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o// bdun byas pas/
333a5(rgyud): ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas bka' stsal pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhun po'i tshad tsam gyi ri
333a6(rgyud): ro'ang hUM zhes brjod pas lhung ba dang / rgya mtsho skams pa dang / ljon pa drung nas 'byin pa dang / bum pa nam mkha' la 'phan pa dang / glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyis/
333a7(rgyud): mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed do// sems can thams cad 'jengs par byed do// sgrubang po las gang dang gang spang par don/
333b1(rgyud): pa de dang de thams cad byed do// yang zla ba gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'jum
333b2(rgyud): drabya thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la gnas shing 'chags par byed do// me 'bar ba dang glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa ston par byed do// gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur ro//
333b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pa pos bye ba bdun bzlas nas 'di drag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / snam
333b4(rgyud): sbyar dang / 'khar gsil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas/ ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sprul pa du ma
333b5(rgyud): byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
333b6(rgyud): kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyis mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te/ rma med pa'i ral gri blangs te
333b7(rgyud): 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de/ brgyad pa 'am/ bcu bzhi pa 'am/ zhagang ba la skyil krung bcas te ji srid du ral gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de'i rjes
334a1(rgyud): thogs nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgra grag go// sbeng nas me tog gi chur 'bab par 'gyur ro// lhan cig pa ji skyed pa dang bcas pa steng du 'gro'o// rig pa 'dzin
334a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cha lugs dang
334a3(rgyud): rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur rgyu ba dang / skad cig tsam gyi sa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par dpyod pa dang / rga shi med pa dang / nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che
334a4(rgyud): ba mthong ba dang mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa chen po stong phrag tu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
334a5(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo'am pa Ti sa blangs te/ 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/ nim pa'i lo ma tsha ba'i mar
334a6(rgyud): khu la btags pa 'bum phrag gcig sreg blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal
334a7(rgyud): he ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum du sreg blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed de/
334b1(rgyud): kye skyes bud dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o// ral gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas l+h+wa ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por
334b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mngag bdag lda ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyug gas
334b3(rgyud): 'og thams cad kyi bdag po/ lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo hUM zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis lhag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug
334b4(rgyud): kyang hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis rlag par byed na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ni dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum cu byas te/ mchod rten
334b5(rgyud): re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o// thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ tha mar me tog can gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mthog
334b6(rgyud): tsam pa bzung nas cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed pa skyil mo krung bcings te/ ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig
334b7(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'tshe ba dang / 'jig rten gyi
335a1(rgyud): khams spyod rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams la
335a2(rgyud): nyi ma re re zhing mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag drug cu byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la bye ba bzlas pa'o//
