335a3(rgyud): de nas mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i ro la khrus byas nas/ nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod de/ ji srid ma langs pa de ji srid du bzla bar bya'o// langs nas dngul chu dang /
335a4(rgyud): bcud len dang mi snang ba la sogs pa thams cad de la ster bar byed do// gal te mi sbar na ji srid kha las lce ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de gcad par
335a5(rgyud): bya'o// de bzung bas nyi ma sbyong gi gzi brjid can/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rgyal po/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug
335a6(rgyud): cu 'tsho ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phral gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo lhun po bye ba phrag stong sprul ba dang / gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho sbyong drag skams pa/
335a7(rgyud): dang lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang / skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang
335b1(rgyud): lo brgyad gnyis pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing / rga ba dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhes bcom
335b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang / nor gyi/
335b3(rgyud): char ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re ba thams cad rjes su 'gengs
335b4(rgyud): pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang / rin po che thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'di lnga ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang
335b5(rgyud): nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang/ bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po las pad+ma sor
335b6(rgyud): drug pa'i tshad byas la/ pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil krung bcings te/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams gsum mam bzhir grangs mi gzung
335b7(rgyud): bar brjes par bya'o// zla badrug yongs su rdzogs pa dang / pad+ma 'bum phrag bdun sreg zugs bya'o// rlab sa nas sgrub la btsam par bya ste/ ge bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la spyi gre
336a1(rgyud): bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// tho rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ska li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par rgyan gyi tsha/
336a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba/
336a3(rgyud): tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyu ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa
336a4(rgyud): rnams rnam par mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ut+pa la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan dan dmar po'i pad+ma'i sgrub pa'ang ngo // sgrub pa gzhan yang 'byung ste/ shel dang / pad+ma rA ga 'am/ mu tig
336a5(rgyud): gi 'bras bu'am/ rin po che yongs su rtog par byed pa pos yongs su brtags pa la/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas te/ gang yang rung bar
336a6(rgyud): grangs mi gzung bar ji srid bdag yongs su dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de'i rjes su mngar gsum gyis bags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / sna ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum
336a7(rgyud): dang / a ka ru'i yam shing 'bum dang / tsan dan gyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang / zho zan 'bum dang / mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag
336b1(rgyud): gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i sreg blags 'bum phrag gcig byas la sbyin sreg yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// skyil mo krung bcas de
336b2(rgyud): bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar bde sring du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rna ma
336b3(rgyud): zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi
336b4(rgyud): slar 'khor lo sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod do// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen
336b5(rgyud): bkur bar byed do// skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon
336b6(rgyud): par rdzogs par byas te/ lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku
336b7(rgyud): dang / shing lham dang / mu zhig gi 'phreng ba'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i tshogs bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba drag
337a1(rgyud): spong byas te 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o// yongs su rdzogs pa dang / me tog can gyi lcags sam/ lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam/
337a2(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog thag lag pas rdo rje de bzung nas mdun du khri'i steng du lag pa bkab la/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du
337a3(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor lo sbyar ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang rjes su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig
337a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams skrag pa dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang /
337a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje snying
337a6(rgyud): po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas bco
337a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par banag ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gso/
337b1(rgyud): ba dab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po kak+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom
337b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka k+Sha pu tra bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes su skyob/
337b3(rgyud): gsang sngags ka kA sbyar zhes bya// gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung // gru bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa// kun nas yongs su bzang zhing dag/ re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa// mdor
337b4(rgyud): bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dbang po'i 'phreng bzang gnyis la no// a sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod// ka sogs lhag ma'i ri mig la// sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te bri// sbyor
337b5(rgyud): ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// re mig stong pa dag la ni// kA yig dang ni rdo rje bri// rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog
337b6(rgyud): dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su// mi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// ka tsa Ta ta la ya sha// dag cing chu mi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad+ma'i gas
337b7(rgyud): kyi lha nyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad// 'bar ba'i midang mtshungs pa'i 'od// kha tshaHthai pa raSh+Ta// dbang chen gyi ni dkyi
338a1(rgyud): 'khor ldan// gadz+ra rad pa la swA// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs ldan// dbyar gyi sprin lngar shin tu 'jigs// b+hadz+ha r+d+had+ha b+ha wa sa/ steng 'gros
338a2(rgyud): dngos grub byed por brjod// srar yang nga ny+ra Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed pa'i mchog/ thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu// khyad
338a3(rgyud): par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis// ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong // r-i r-I l-i l-i zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags// de dag
338a4(rgyud): yi ge ru yang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun// thig le sgra gtsug zla phyed ces// rjes dbyangs kyi ni 'phreng zhes bshad// sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi/

338a6(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam chu dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi lam shes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// /
338a7(rgyud): mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos rnams kun gyi sdom bu brjod// stong pa mtshan med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/
338b1(rgyud): rlangs pa yis ni shes par bya// dA ni sngags kyi kak+Sha'i sbyor ba la rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang bral ba bshad par bya'o// mi ge rnams kyis byang chub spyod// sangs rgyas
338b2(rgyud): nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs rnams yig rnams bsdus par bshad// mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de/
338b3(rgyud): gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid// sbar ba nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung //
338b4(rgyud): thog mar dbyangs ni thig le ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng can rab bzhi pa// rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// kun gyi ye
338b5(rgyud): shes 'od chen po// kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// de nyid bral ba rtag pa ste// yi ge med cing dbyer med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad// dung
338b6(rgyud): dang kun da zla ltar dag / gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// de ni shin tu ring por shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// dro ba'i bzhi pa sbyar ba ni/

339a1(rgyud): da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid 'dir bshad bya// thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa sgrub po ru bshad// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun
339a2(rgyud): nas mnan// gsum pa me yi ming can no// rgyu med pas he cung zad pa// bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang tha dad med// de yi steng du thig le gnas// chos kun
339a3(rgyud): nam mkha' dang mtshungs par// yang dang yang du bshad pa yin// de ni lnga pa shes par bya// yi ge lnga pa spobs po che// yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso// mthu
339a4(rgyud): stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las rab grol byed pa// yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug kyang rab tu
339a5(rgyud): sbur byed dri ma med// de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags// byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste// brtan pa'i sems dpa' rang byung ba// chos kun gyis//
339a6(rgyud): ni de bzhin nyid// gang bsgrubs de nyid thams cad du// 'bar ba me yi sa bon ldan// spyod pa yi ni steng du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes su
339a7(rgyud): bshad// chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni// med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o// me yi sa bon yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi spyi bo ru// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med// de nyid
339b1(rgyud): bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos

339b5(rgyud): dbyangs dang ye shes che// mA ma ki ru de bsgrags so// lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dpal zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig
339b6(rgyud): pa thams cad reng byed de// sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa// rnam par sel ba rnam shes bya// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// phyag ni rdo rje spongs chen dang // gshin rje mthar
339b7(rgyud): byed khro bo che// yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbus su spyod pa gzhag tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum du ni rnam par
340a1(rgyud): sgom/ tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de nyid
340a2(rgyud): bcom ldan mgon po ni// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo spobs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o// 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tu spangs pa'o//
340a3(rgyud): dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad do// gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po'o// me yis rab tu gsal bar byas// bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gzi brjid
340a4(rgyud): phung po stobs po che// de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ba// sgrol ma zhes su rab tu grags// bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa gang // shes rab pha rol phyin par nges// thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan//

340a6(rgyud): mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan zhes bya ba// spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi rjes nyid la ni med// dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// me dang dbang chen du brjod/

340b1(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sde tshan lnga pa rin chen mchogabazhi pa'i sa bon dam pa de// 'og tu me yi yan lag 'bar// khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags// dbang chen yi ge/
340b2(rgyud): dag pa las// thig le sbrams rnam par brgya na// sangs rgyas spyan zhes rnam grags pa// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// nam mnga'i spyan
340b3(rgyud): zhes brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du ba gsol byed// mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming // rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos
340b4(rgyud): rnams kyi// dri ma med pa stsol bar byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan// 'gro ba'i rdo rje rengs
340b5(rgyud): byed na// gdug sems gzhan kun lha ci smos// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro// 'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na// gdug sems can gzhan
340b6(rgyud): smos ci dgos// de nyid me dang ldan pas ni// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden pa'i byin
340b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs// rnam snang mdzad bya gnas las byung // gzhan gyi dmags dpung 'joms pa ni// rgyu ni me yis gsal byas pa// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra
341a1(rgyud): yis rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis grangs pa'i// hrI se man da ra la sogs// de yis phye mar rlog
341a2(rgyud): par nges// rdo rje la gnas 'khor lo yi// dbus gnas 'gro kun rengs par byed// gnas nas spyod par byed pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugs
341a3(rgyud): su gnas nas ni// mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son// chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung gi sa bon rin po che// spyod pa'i steng du yang dag
341a4(rgyud): ldan// me las byung ba me la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang / ka sa yi yi ge steng du gnas// sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// drug pa'i/
341a5(rgyud): sgra yi steng du gnas// 'og tu me yi sa bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed// me yi phyogs su gnas nas ni// phyag rgya'i
341a6(rgyud): bdag nyid thams cad sgom// rlung lha me lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che// de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya// dbang chen mo ni sbyor ba las/
341a7(rgyud): 'khor lo sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas// ye shes rgya tshon bsgrub par bya// yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor ye shes phun
341b1(rgyud): sum tshobs// skye ba 'di la 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom mi b+ha'o// dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye bas rnam par dbye// tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang /
341b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang sngags 'byung ba/ slob dpon man ngag las shes bya// gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las/ rdo rje ka k+Sha'i sbyor ba ma
341b3(rgyud): bsdus te bstan pa ste rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par spyad par bya'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das
341b4(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/
341b5(rgyud): 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas pa legs par bsgrubs pa nam mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
341b6(rgyud): kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/
341b7(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// zlum po kun nas bzang po ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas// de yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab
342a1(rgyud): ma brgyad la ke sar can// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid// bdag gis dngos grub bsgom par bya// ngag gi dbang phyug 'od chen//
342a2(rgyud): po// snying khar zla ba der pad+ma// de yi steng du dung brtag bya// dung gi dbus su lce yin te// rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi steng du rin chen pad// yang na sangs rgyas gzugs
342a3(rgyud): brnyan yang // 'bar zhing kan gyi mthar khyab pa// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa// pa yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa na/
342a4(rgyud): rims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba phyed dang zla ba gsum// zla ba bzhi'am zla ba nyid// zla ba brgyad du rab ma chog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya// skyil krung gis
342a5(rgyud): ni nyer gnas te// dang po sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dag tu// thams cad du ni yongs su gang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos
342a6(rgyud): dbyings mnam dang mi mnam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i// ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog
342a7(rgyud): rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyi// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pasam/ gdung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam/ pad+ma'i khams la yang dag brten// pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las/
342b1(rgyud): sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams// mgrin par son nas spa gyur te// sgra ni dbyangs nyid lhag pa'o// slar yang lce ru son pa dang // yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o// lce yi yaM//
342b2(rgyud): gi cher 'bar ba// gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul/ kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// sgra yis nam mkha' kun gang gi/ sgrub pos mdo ru
342b3(rgyud): bsdus te bzla// de bzhin du ni snying khar smra'am// lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas// mchu'am so la rab bkra ba'i// gal te 'od zer mthong na ni// de tshe grub par rnam
342b4(rgyud): par shes// grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag ni sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje/
342b5(rgyud): sems dpa' nga // 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa// rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha// yi ge mchog tu phra ba yi// a yi yi ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par bkra
342b6(rgyud): ba nyi ma bzhin// rang gi lte ba mthar thug mtshungs// yi ge yi ger yongs su gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs shing // snying
342b7(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa// de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba// ji srid rkan gyi bar du son// slar yang yi ge thams cad ni// yang dang yang du gsal byed cing // lce la rdo rje/
343a1(rgyud): 'bar ba ni// rdul phran lta bur byed bzhin pa'i// rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dag/ yang dang yang du rnam par 'don// 'jig rten kun du de song ste/
343a2(rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ga rang gis 'gro ba snang byas te// slar yang 'ong nas rang gnas su// 'jug pa ru ni yongs su brtag
343a3(rgyud): ji srid phyogs kun song ba yi// yi ge kha ru rab tu 'jug/ lus la lus can gyi gzugs brnyen// sems kyis phyag rgya legs par bsam// de nas sgra dang yi ge ni// lte bar
343a4(rgyud): song sde yongs su gnas// lte ba ru ni pad+ma mchog/ pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdzes// de yi steng du dung chen po// rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// de las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra// brang
343a5(rgyud): gi gnas nas yongs su byung // slar yang mgrin par son nas su// rdo rje lce la yang dag reg/ 'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med//
343a6(rgyud): khab bzho ltar dkar 'ong // bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje'i lce ni mtha' dag rnams// yang dang yang du gsal bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsar spong ste// slar
343a7(rgyud): yang snying kha nyid du song // thig le las ni gug kyad gyur// gug kyang ri mo ring po can// rma sha sa rnam bzhi 'dus pa las// de ni yi ge ra rnam par shes// yi ge las ni sba
343b1(rgyud): skye zhing // sgra las na dade las dbyangs// dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur// yi ge las ni cha shas tshogs// tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu gyur// tshig gang las ni tshigs
343b2(rgyud): bcad dang // de bzhin du ni ga tha dang // 'phreng 'dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te// 'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang // rang gi snying por rab 'jug 'gyur// de nas bzlas pa'i
343b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor che// blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad du ni
343b4(rgyud): brtan par bya// yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub po// rmad byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag 'grub thams cad skyo ba rnams kyis// yi ge gcig pa
343b5(rgyud): gsang chen po// ngag ni sgrub thabs mchog tu dge/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rang nyid zla bar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i
343b6(rgyud): 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de la bstan bcos thams cad ni// nges pa gdon pa nyid du bya// ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed//
343b7(rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing // de nyid kyang ni 'chad par byed// sems can kun gyis thams cad du// dngos po cung zad gang bsam pa// de dag thams cad rnam shes
344a1(rgyud): te/ skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba las ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan/
344a2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs chen po mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom
344a3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabra bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis gsol
344a4(rgyud): ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ de de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po chen pos de bzhin gshegs
344a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par bya ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/
344a6(rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'am yang na// rtsibs bcu drug pa rnam par bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod// 'khor lo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mtha' ru rin chen
344a7(rgyud): rnam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis ni spel bar bya// de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshung
344b1(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ de yi phyag rgya bgrangs las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thon// 'gro ba thams cad snang byas nas// sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug/ 'khor lo'i dngos/
344b2(rgyud): grub gzi brjid che// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang che dang dbang phyug dang // rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang // kun du 'gro ba nyid dang ni// kun gyi dbang phyug
344b3(rgyud): phun tshogs 'bras// rga dang 'chi bi med thob cing // nges par 'khor lo sgyur dang mtshungs// gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che// de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid dang // me tog can gyi
344b4(rgyud): lcags kyang rlung // rang gi lag gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor lo sgyur ba gzi brjid che// mtshan
344b5(rgyud): rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de yi sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM sarba ha thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba 'o/
344b6(rgyud): ki ti/ muN+Di tsakra war+t+ti dz+wa la dz+wa la d+hu na bi d+hu na trA sa ya mA ra ya/ uts+tsha Ta ya ha na b+hany+dza pro khi ni kuN+Da li ni a ba ra dzI tA s+tha d+hA ri Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM au a pa ra dza~M dIH/
344b7(rgyud): ka swAhA/ snying po'o// na maHsan+ta bud+d+hA na~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM a pa rA dza~M d+ha d+ha ki swAhA/ cho ga'i snying po'o// 'khor lo sgyur ba rang grub ste/ sangs rgyas nyid kun thob nas
345a1(rgyud): ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// yang na dbang phyug dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos//
345a2(rgyud): 'khor lo sbyar ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// nam mkha' la ni yongs su sgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs rgyas
345a3(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyis su med 'byung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad byung ba// de ni ye yir shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yang
345a4(rgyud): 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus
345a5(rgyud): gnas par// nyi ma re rer bkra shis sgom// gzi brjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs dpa' ba ni// snang ba shar ba
345a6(rgyud): lta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam// nam mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par khyab// de dang
345a7(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// kun du kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs//
345b1(rgyud): kun tu 'gro ba rji dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad nyidi dag dang // rdo rje n+yan kun nyid dang ni// gzi brjid mchog kun thod gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur/
345b2(rgyud): de la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni/ oM da thA ga hoSh+NISha a ba lo ki ta mur+d+ha hi dzo ru shi dza la dz+wa la/ D+haka d+ha kA/ dA ra da ra/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAR+tha/ rtsa ba'i sngags so//
345b3(rgyud): oM he dz+wa ra si swAhA/ snying po'o// oM dz+wal te dza raM si hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// dag pa'i sngags tshig 'di rnams kyis// nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal// kun tu 'gro ba
345b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid thob gyur// gzi brjid phung po'i gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum
345b5(rgyud): pa spobs po che// gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing // gtsug hor steng son 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM AHhUM/
345b6(rgyud): gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa nas// bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub
345b7(rgyud): pa'i thabs so// / chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab
346a1(rgyud): skor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// rtsibs bcu gnyis pa yongs su gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba/ bya ba'i
346a2(rgyud): don du dag pa ste/ sangs rgyas rab bzhin gru chen po/ nam mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom/
346a3(rgyud): 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rten cing brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngags su gyur pa ni// oM d+hun pA ta
346a4(rgyud): tshin+da tsakre Na badz+ri Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char// skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni rab skor byed/
346a5(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so// / pam+ba rarA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ga rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na/
346a6(rgyud): mongs rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi snying la rdo rje me// dri ma med pa skyes par 'gyur// nyon mongs
346a7(rgyud): rtag tu yongs zad cing // dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM kle sha a sha ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni
346b1(rgyud): nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags// drag cing drag pos gzhan gnon pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sder byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs so//
346b2(rgyud): dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che// bdud bzhi las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// bden
346b3(rgyud): pa bzhi yi khu tshur che// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid// khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid de// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyid sangs rgyas
346b4(rgyud): yin no zhes// brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes pa// rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags su gyur pa ni// oM birdza ma /
346b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
346b6(rgyud): khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// // dngos po thams cad gyen 'phags pa// gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
346b7(rgyud): dbus su'o// rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten kun gyis thams cad du// kun
347a1(rgyud): nas phun sum tshogs pa kun/ bkug nas gus par sbyin par bya// sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la dI pyA dI prA ung+ga toSh+NI Sha d+hu na d+hu na hUM/ steng 'gro'i gtsug hor zhes
347a2(rgyud): bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis gsungs// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
347a3(rgyud): so// sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// tshad skyob gdugs dka' chen po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/
347a4(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i kha dog chen 'bar zhing // chu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med puN+Da ri ka ra gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongs su dang /
347a5(rgyud): bcud kyis len gyi mchog lta bur// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams
347a6(rgyud): cad yongs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug hor gdugs dkar che// sngags ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hA niH/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyogs 'gro/
347a7(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdugs dkar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'bar
347b1(rgyud): ba'i 'phreng 'khrugs ral gri ni// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// nam mkha'i mthongs
347b2(rgyud): rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sngags
347b3(rgyud): pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa loSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ma da ma/ dru ma dru ma da ha da ha na hUM phaT/ rgyal ba'i gtsug
347b4(rgyud): tor bal gri che// shes rab ye shes dri ma med// sngags pa kun nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
347b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// seng ge'i khri yi steng du bsam// yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gnas// kun tu gtsug
347b6(rgyud): tor che 'bar ba// snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas// thog ma tha ma med zhig// chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che// 'di
347b7(rgyud): ni bsgrubs ba cas byos mi gsun tu gtsug po slobs po che// gang tses de la 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no// thags ni/ oM badz+ran
348a1(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de ni kun gyis dbang bskur ro// kun gyi/
348a2(rgyud): gtsug hor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba rgyud chen po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongs
348a3(rgyud): su rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
348a4(rgyud): la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
348a5(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas/ de ma thag pa kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub/
348a6(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye shes rdo rje che// snying khar yongs su bsgoms nas su// ral gri sngon po phyag na bsnams//
348a7(rgyud): dbang chen dang ni me las 'khrungs// ye shes chen po gzi brjid re// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog nyon mongs thams cad zad
348b1(rgyud): par byed// rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa'o// kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don// dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba po// rim pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di// nal drug pa
348b2(rgyud): phyag drug mcho// mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba mis// phyag drug dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na stobs kyi sgra kyang // kun
348b3(rgyud): nas yongs su gsal bapo// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// nam mkha'i khrugs na rnam par gnas// yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya// ting nge 'dzin gnas sdig pa
348b4(rgyud): bcom/ dpa' bo pad+mal gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che// rnal 'byor pa mi ye shes phra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar// gdod nas myanyes pa
348b5(rgyud): zhes bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni/ oM bak+She na
348b6(rgyud): maHgsang sngags 'di ni mchog du gsang // gsang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed// rnam thar gsum gyi sgo la gnas// pha rol phyin drug rab du gsal// rang nyid shes
348b7(rgyud): rab yin no zhes// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te// sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las// pad+ma ra ba lta bu'i mdog/ ston zla lnga
349a1(rgyud): bur cher gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog/ spobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma me
349a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra zhing // dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas// kun gyi rgyal po sngags pa nyid// rang nyid kun gyi rgyal mo mtshungs// rig pa
349a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad dang // byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// dbang phyug kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // yang na sangs
349a4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi// kun tu 'gro ba thob 'gyur ba// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // rkang pas spyod pa dri med mchog/ ril bu dang ni mi
349a5(rgyud): snang ba// thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// chos kyi gsung gi mchog las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs/
349a6(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// bsam pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyi// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gro na// gzhan pa'i lha lha smos
349a7(rgyud): ci dgos// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / snying khar pad+ma chen po la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su gnas// 'jig rten dbang phyug dpal
349b1(rgyud): ba che// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// dung dang kun du zla lhur dag/ chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po
349b2(rgyud): la bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug ches// de la gnas pa dge ba sgom// rang bzhin gyis ni 'di dag kun// gdod nas ma skyes ma byung ba// gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni//
349b3(rgyud): snying khar yongs su bsgom par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo che// kun tu rnam par 'phros pa yis// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs shing zhi// ral pa'i thor tsugs 'dzin
349b4(rgyud): pa po// ral pa'i dbus su dpa' bo che// 'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag/ sbron ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal// kun tu nam mkha' yongs gang ba// gsang sngags sbyor ba dag
349b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyis yang dag gang // kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni// zla ba'i dkyil
349b6(rgyud): 'khor yang dag gnas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du bdag dgang bar bya// 'gro ba brdzun dang g.yo ba kun// snang dang mi snang dngos po ni// yang dang
349b7(rgyud): yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems la ni// stob so po ches ni dgang bar bya// kha dog dbyibs ni 'di bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba/ kun nas
350a1(rgyud): yongs su bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i mdun du gzhag par bya// de nas sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni// dgug dang
350a2(rgyud): gzhug dang bcing ba las// dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po// bcom ldan rnal 'byor can grub na// dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing // ra
350a3(rgyud): gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang // rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang // rnam par rgyas pa'i nor sder 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can// gas dang pha rol phyin sogs
350a4(rgyud): dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni/ oM a ro li ka/ gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni// rang nyid khams
350a5(rgyud): gsum rnam par rgyal// longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis rnam par ster// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub/
350a6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid ni// srid par bkug nas rnam par ster// 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs so// / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs/
350a7(rgyud): me yi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste// de yi dbus su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs pa// de yi dbus su de 'dra bsam// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de yi dbus su
350b1(rgyud): gzi brjid che// 'char pa lta bu'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid can// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa'i sul sa thams cad du// kun nas
350b2(rgyud): yongs su gsal bar byed// hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgyal po 'khyil pa dang mtshungs pa// zar ma yi ni me tog 'dra// 'bar ba dmar pos/
350b3(rgyud): 'khrigs shing 'jigs// bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa la mche ba bzhi// 'jig pa'i dus kyi thal ba 'dra// sprin gyi sgra dang mtshungs pa yi// hUM gi
350b4(rgyud): yi ge bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sngags kyi tshig ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NahUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM.a na
350b5(rgyud): ya ho b+ha ga bAn bing+ga rA dza hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed na// bud med gzhan lha smos
350b6(rgyud): dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs// chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas// de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na// sdug bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos//
350b7(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan snying khar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyis sngon du sgrub// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs
351a1(rgyud): byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po thams cad sbyin gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir/ oM Dak+ki hU~M dzaH
351a2(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// longs spyod ji snyed thams cad rnams// de snyed thams cad rnam par ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o// /
351a3(rgyud): dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku// snying khar zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'od// rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba ldan// 'jig
351a4(rgyud): rten khams ni 'byam klas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dag/ gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba// ral pa'i//
351a5(rgyud): thor tsugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che// dung dang kun du zla 'od bzang // bsgoms nas sems can thams cad la// brtan pa'i don du dbang bskur bya//
351a6(rgyud): yang na sems can thams cad la// bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro// sgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis med ma rgyal ba las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang / thim
351a7(rgyud): sogs phyogs dbyes rnam par dbye// byams pa kun tu rnam par spro// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar// 'das shing shin tu dri
351b1(rgyud): ma med// ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i sems// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam// bdag nyid/
351b2(rgyud): byams pa yin no zhes// dpa' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung zad li zhing 'khril ba'i sgra// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen sems ni rnam dag pas/
351b3(rgyud): rang bdag nyid ni bsgoms par bya// 'di'i gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni/ oM a dzi trany+dza sarba satwa sa ma ya ma nu ga ha swA hA/ gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di/
351b4(rgyud): byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab// byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ong // dang po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyi// sgrub pa'i thabs mchog
351b5(rgyud): bsgom par bya// oM mai tre ya tri/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang // dga' ldan du ni gnas par 'gyur// sgrib po kun dang bral ba'i bdag/ rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs/
351b6(rgyud): byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// 'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur// byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos ni legs
351b7(rgyud): mnyan nas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni// de ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni// byams pa'i yid
352a1(rgyud): kyis thob par 'gyur// byams pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / rang gi lus ni thams cad ni// nam mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du sgom// chos bdag/
352a2(rgyud): med pa bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid nam mkha' snying por 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das// nam mkha'i 'od zer
352a3(rgyud): gyur pa yis// sems can rang gi sems las spro// thams cad sems las spros nas ni// slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar bya// nam mkha' mnyam par 'gro ba blta/
352a4(rgyud): rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen kha dog 'od chen po// rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa// lag na rin chen stobs po che/
352a5(rgyud): rin chen sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis// nam mkha'i dam pa 'grub pa yin// sngags ni/ oM A kA sha gar+N+Na ya swAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po stobs po che// bcom ldan rnal
352a6(rgyud): 'byor 'grub pa 'gyur// rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa/
352a7(rgyud): nam mkha' snying po bsgrubs pa yis// de dag thams cad myur du sba ra// nam mkha' snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// / sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rgyan rnams
352b1(rgyud): kun gyis brgyan pa yis// kun tu bzang po 'od bzang po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/
352b2(rgyud): rang gi lus ni ji snyed pa'i// rang gi phra rab rdul rnams kyis// de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du// yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su// rang gi
352b3(rgyud): 'khor los yongs bskor nas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te// bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes// mi ge lnga po zhes su bshad// 'di yi sngags chen bzlas par bya/
352b4(rgyud): yang na 'dir ni lha gzhan gyi// rtag tu sngags su gyur pa'o// oM sAM hrIHkA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing // gdod nas dag cing rang byung ba// 'di ni bsgrubs
352b5(rgyud): pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// de yi ye shes dri med cing // gzugs mdzes pa ni de dang mtshungs// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba// kun bzang
352b6(rgyud): mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sgrib pa
352b7(rgyud): thams cad rnam sel ba// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang // bcud kyis len gyis bde blag tu// ring po nyid du mi thogs par// sgrib
353a1(rgyud): pa rnam sel mtshungs par 'gyur// sngags 'byung ba ni/ oM sarba ni wa ra Na biSh+kan+ti swAhA/ oM nI sa rA ya swAhA/ gtso bo gsang sngags 'di 'dzin la/
353a2(rgyud): rnam par sel ba grags pa ste// thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun gyis thams cad du// gdod nas skye med rang bzhin gyis// gdod nas bdag cing 'gyur ba
353a3(rgyud): med// de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni// lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas// rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i// rjes su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma
353a4(rgyud): ltar// gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pa'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i// me yis yongs su bskor ba yis// phyag na ral gri gzi brjid che// yang
353a5(rgyud): nas yang du sems byed cing // dngos grub 'di ni gzi brjid che// rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas ni stsal/
353a6(rgyud): ba nyid// rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thabs so// // dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rdo rje yin dbus na bzhugs// gser gyi mdog can sku chen po// 'bar/
353a7(rgyud): ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// snying khar rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas// sa snying zhes byar bdag nyid sgom// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang gi gsang sngags brjod par bya// sa snying
353b1(rgyud): zhes byar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di// oM k+Shi saHrA dzaHswAhA/ bsam las sngags mchog 'di yis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab gsol mdzad/
353b2(rgyud): sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// // zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med// zag med mchog ni/
353b3(rgyud): shes rab can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dge/ blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba// 'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya// me yi dkyil 'khor
353b4(rgyud): dbus su ni// gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// sngags ni/ oM a kA ya ma ti swAhA/ sngags kyi yi ge
353b5(rgyud): gsang ba 'di// thams cad dro bros gsal bar byed// yo shes mi zad 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya 'o// dngos grub kun gyi mchog shes bya// shes rab ye shes
353b6(rgyud): med mdzes// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub thabs so// // kun nas shes rab chen po can//
353b7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par// gser gyi kha dog gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag bsam bya// re ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad//
354a1(rgyud): rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// nam mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes// lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du// thams cad rig pas brdzun par bya// shin tu/
354a2(rgyud): dri med byang chub sems// rang snying me long lnga bar bsam// de nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag
354a3(rgyud): mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang // yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing // de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// nye bar mkho ba thams cad
354a4(rgyud): 'bab// 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed yod pa de dag kun// 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// oM ga ga na gany+dza gaM swA hA
354a5(rgyud): nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che// nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'bebs pa// nam mkha'i mdzod ni stobs po che// skad cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i
354a6(rgyud): thabs so// / rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs// rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol// lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya//
354a7(rgyud): lag na rin chen phyag rgya che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rin chen zhes bya dang // rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzad/
354b1(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pri yAng ku mdog sngo bsangs 'od// dbang chen dang ni mAM las byung // phyag na rin chen cher gsal ba// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// oM
354b2(rgyud): rat+na pa Ni ra mu swAhA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub na ni// gri ba kun gyi lag tu ni// rin chen thams cad rab stsol byed// lag na rin po che'i
354b3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs so// / chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi'i chu yi rab gang ba// stong gsum zhes ni bsam par bya// pad+ma gcig gi sbeng na
354b4(rgyud): gnas// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog/ de steng du yang gsang chen po// ma yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// de yi steng du brtson 'gras che// rtse mo brgya pa
354b5(rgyud): rdo rje byung // de yi spang du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad po 'od gsal ba// de sbeng rtag tu bsam pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che// rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa//
354b6(rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi lag na phyag rgya che// rdo rje drung du rab tu grags// rang gi lpag
354b7(rgyud): pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya// sngags ni/ oM sA ga ra ma ti sa ra swAhA/ sngags 'di
355a1(rgyud): mchog dang gtsu'o ste// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs na ni// shes rab tu mtshar blo thos mtshungs// rang ni sangs rgyas
355a2(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs// thugs rje 'jig rten dbang phyug rgya la// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen
355a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// ut+pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od// rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ji snyed sa spangs mtha' dag tu// khyab la
355a4(rgyud): sdug cing mtho ba yi// sra zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i// mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas sa ni yang
355a5(rgyud): dge brnyes// in+d+ra ni la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// yi ge mchog ni sbeng du 'bar// thugs kar rdo rje cher gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin//
355a6(rgyud): sngags ni/ oM badz+ra gar+b+ha hUM/ 'di ni sngags mchog gtso bo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing // rnam pa kun tu phun tshegs kun/
355a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid kun stsol mdzad na// dngos grub gzhan lha smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes//
355b1(rgyud): nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzhan// bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob// des na rnam/
355b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje snying po yang dag byung // rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje// sbyin byed rtse mo drug pas bsgrub// rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dbang chen me las yang dag
355b3(rgyud): byung // nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i lus// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po// 'gro ba snang bar byed de
355b4(rgyud): gnas// pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can// phyag rgya de mi snying bar gnas/ rin chen sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM rad+na kaH
355b5(rgyud): rat+ne dad swA hA/ rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di// mchog rnams kyi ni sa'i dbang phyug/ sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya/ rgya 'i nor rnams rtsol bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub
355b6(rgyud): pa'i thabs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so//
355b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus de gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po la gsol
356a1(rgyud): ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom ldan 'das skyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor lo sgyur ba chen pos de skad ces
356a2(rgyud): gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar/ rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khams rab tu
356a3(rgyud): gsal ba la// me ni dbus nas dbus su'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// 'od zer lnga yi 'phreng bas mdzes// de yi mdun du bya ba yang // mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po mo// de yi
356a4(rgyud): g.yas kyi chu ru ni// rdo rje chen po 'bar 'phrang can// g.yon nyid du ni be con che// rig pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par spras// rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni// rin chen 'bar bas rnam par
356a5(rgyud): brgyan// phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i// khro bo thams cad dgod par bya// de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang // gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba'o// gzhal du med cing grangs med mchog
356a6(rgyud): chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// de nyid gsang //
356a7(rgyud): pa'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun par ni bshad pa yin// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// 'jigs pa'i thal ba mchog tu 'bar// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'bar
356b1(rgyud): ba'i me yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jig pa chen po'i dus can gyi// char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od// pad+ma ra ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar ba kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ dur khrod
356b2(rgyud): me bzhin shin tu yang // gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po che// rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba// thod pa'i con pa na steng du 'bar// 'jig pa chen po'i dus can gyi// rgod mkha yi me
356b3(rgyud): lhar gnas// smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i gdong //
356b4(rgyud): gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan// 'jig rten snang ba gar mdzad pa// phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan// gcig tu 'gyur zhing rnam pa mang // rnam snang zhal ldan de dag gi/ sngo ser la/
356b5(rgyud): sogs tha dad ldan// zhabs kyang rnam pa dum ldan// sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che// shin tu gdug
356b6(rgyud): cing drag rnams la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas// phyag drug zhal drug snang ba can// zhabs drag pa ste gsus po che// char sprin mdog 'dra cher gnag pa// dus mtha'i
356b7(rgyud): me dang 'dra bar gnas// mdog chen rgyal po 'khyil ba 'dra// zar ma yi ni me tog mtshungs// khro bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba 'chang // gshin rje mthar byed stobs po che// de la sngags
357a1(rgyud): kyang / oM aHhUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma thu na hUM phaT/ oM hriHSh+T+rIHbi kri tAn na sU sarba sha rdzun na sha ya swam+b+ha la hU~M phaT sngags kyi rgyal po bdag nyid 'di/
357a2(rgyud): khyab bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba po// gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing // dbang du yang ni mdzad par
357a3(rgyud): gnas// rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing // rdo rje snang mdzad legs par 'dul// shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la// zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis//
357a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad// thugs rje khro bo'i ngang tshul can// 'jig rten gsum yang nges sreg mdzad// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid/
357a5(rgyud): sku/ thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul ba mdzad pa bskyed// gshin rje mthar mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khro ba
357a6(rgyud): gzegs ma zhes su grags// dmar po 'bar ba'i khro bo che// 'jig pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab ma gzhan// de yi kha dog rnam par bsam// drag po chen po
357a7(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrig pa'i 'od// spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bster// phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar// me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog
357b1(rgyud): ltar shin tu 'bar// de yi khro gnyer bsnyer ba yis// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// ma lus sa rnams
357b2(rgyud): thams cad du// sngon po'i bdag nyid chen po de// 'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na// skye bo gzhan lha smos ci dgos// sngags ni/ oM ka Ni d+h+rU ni hUM phaT/ khro bo 'di yi sngags
357b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams cad sreg byed na// skye bo gzhan lnga smos ci dgos/ khro bo gzegs ma sgrub pa'i thabs so// /
357b4(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// rta mgrin zhes su bshad pa yin// rtag tu 'char ka'i
357b5(rgyud): mdog 'dra ba// rgya stegs mdog ltar dmar ba po// chu dang gzi brjid can reg pa// me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan// 'dod ldan rnams la 'dod pa 'byung // gdug pa can rnams
357b6(rgyud): gdug pa 'byung // zhi ba la yang zhi ba 'byung // stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan// phyag bzhi pa la
357b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus che// seng ge ltar gnas mche ba bzhi// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig nyid la bslangs nas ni// thams cad slong ba bsgrub par bya//
358a1(rgyud): sngags ni/ oM a mri tod+b+ha bod b+ha be hUM phaT/ oM a mri tod b+hA ba hUM phaT/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar// khro bo'i skyil mo
358a2(rgyud): krung byas nas// 'jig rten thams cad rab nyid bya// pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po ni// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ste// rta mi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par/
358a3(rgyud): bya// dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang // mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin sgrub pa'i
358a4(rgyud): thabs so// // de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor
358a5(rgyud): bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro bo'i dbang du song // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni// g.yo ba med par bsam par bya// slob dpon mi
358a6(rgyud): g.yo khro bo che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan// ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gang // thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ pri yang ku ltar ldang ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing
358a7(rgyud): byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// khro bo mngag pa bran dang ni// pho nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan// skye bo kun
358b1(rgyud): gyis yongs su gang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na// bka' lung yang ni yongs su stsol// zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas so// sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta dz+ra d+ha tsaN+Da/
358b2(rgyud): hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ka hAM mAM/ khro bo'i gzi brjid chen po 'di// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas
358b3(rgyud): rlung dang me las yang dag byung // 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin no// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang /
358b4(rgyud): dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas mchog/ khro bo phyag rgya rang 'byung ba// drag po thog ma tha ma med// rnam
358b5(rgyud): par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas/
358b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal
358b7(rgyud): po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor
359a1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge/ grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs kyis ni rnam par mdzes/
359a2(rgyud): thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi dbus su pad chen po// lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan// rdo rje rin
359a3(rgyud): chen legs par brgyan// de yi dbus su rtug bri ba// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i/
359a4(rgyud): dbye ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri// shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya// phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs par// go rim so bzhin
359a5(rgyud): du rnam par dgod// phyogs cu'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog dbye ba thams cad du// rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de las 'od zer/
359a6(rgyud): bsam mi khyab// sngo ser la sogs dbye ba yis// shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid
359a7(rgyud): kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin// shes rab chen po gzugs chen po// 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas
359b1(rgyud): brten// sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs// du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan pa/ shes rab pa
359b2(rgyud): rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad// kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum// sems can kun gyi thams cad du// thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab/
359b3(rgyud): sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par zhugs// zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab// dri ma med cing ngang gi stong // nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// /
359b4(rgyud): thog ma tha ma med cing zhi// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas// dam pa dang ni dam pa'i don// chos kyi skur
359b5(rgyud): de bshad do// dbang po kun kyang rnam par shes// sems can thams cad thams cad du// yid kyi rnam shes zhes su bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros ldan// lhag mthong dang ni ye
359b6(rgyud): shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// rnam pa gnyis su de
359b7(rgyud): rab brtags// ji ltar bud shing la brten nas// me yi sa bon gnas pa dang // hil la til mar ji bzhin no// bur shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag/ me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam// zho la
360a1(rgyud): ma ragra sar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po byung // gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan la// ji bzhin gtsub
360a2(rgyud): pas me 'byung ste// de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrubs pas yongs su brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// yang nas yang du grub par byed//
360a3(rgyud): mun pa thams cad rnamasel ba'i// nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag/ nam mkha'i dri ma med brten nas// nyi ma zla ba bzhin du gnas// 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'dur ba stong dra
360a4(rgyud): bI ni snod// mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las
360a5(rgyud): ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te//
360a6(rgyud): gsang sngags 'dis ni bsam par bya// rang bzhin gyi ni drag pa'i dngos// rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas// rang bzhin gyi ni 'od gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med// /
360a7(rgyud): yi ge de nyid de lta bu// gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin mar
360b1(rgyud): bshad// oM prany+dza swAs+t+ra/ oM shUshru hi s+thi ti bi dz+ra ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed// oM yaM/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi
360b2(rgyud): yum// 'di ni 'khor lo rnam par sbyar// 'di ni dngos grub thams cad dang // grub pa 'di ni byed par gnas// bstan bcos rab tu 'chang byed dang // shes bya thams cad khyad par
360b3(rgyud): du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun// dbang phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// // shes rab pha rol
360b4(rgyud): phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam// gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya//
360b5(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge rnam par brgyan// mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas spyan zhes btags pa yi// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyon cig sa rnams
360b6(rgyud): 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dza la tiSh+Tha sin+d+hu lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni// rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu bshad// dbang chen
360b7(rgyud): yi ge'i mthar thug pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkugs ste//
361a1(rgyud): bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas/ phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol cing snang
361a2(rgyud): ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// 'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do// sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag
361a3(rgyud): rgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / chu yi dkyil 'khor dgyes pa na// bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i mkha' la
361a4(rgyud): gnas// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa mo// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// grub pa ral pa'i con pan 'arang // 'gro ba mtha' dag snang
361a5(rgyud): mdzad ma// rtag tu nam mkha' bzhin du gnas// sngags ni/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ka TaM ka Te swAhA/ gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya che// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng
361a6(rgyud): pa che// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i/
361a7(rgyud): thabs// zhi ba'i ro dang yang dag ldan// zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan// zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thabs// gos dkar mo'i sgrub
361b1(rgyud): pa'i thabs so// / sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gsum// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ sgeg pa'i nyams kyis
361b2(rgyud): yongs gang ba// 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma// thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rol la yi ni yi ge mchogasngags ni//
361b3(rgyud): tA re hut+tA re tu re swAhA/ chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sgrol mas legs par rab tu gnas// gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la// bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog
361b4(rgyud): kun tu kun tshe thams cad du// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni// rnal 'byor
361b5(rgyud): dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ phyag bani spyan ni gsum pa dang // ral pa'i cod pan dag gis gnas// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog lhur dkar// dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan//
361b6(rgyud): brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs sel ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du// shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hUM gi yi ge zab
361b7(rgyud): mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni 'khrugs par mdzad// khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sngags ni/ oM b+ha ya nA sa ni trAs
362a1(rgyud): ni d+hu ye/ tra sa ya/ d+h+r-i ku Ti ha TI hre Di be rashwe te ke tA dza ni/ oM ra k+ki hUM dzaHswAhA/ ga sang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog
362a2(rgyud): 'byo ba klan kyang 'thugs byed na/ gdug pa'i sems lnga spos ci dgos// khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bdu sas nas par/
362a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan// rdo rje'i 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris// der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen pri yang ku ltar ljang //
362a4(rgyud): phyag bzhi par de bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams che ba zhi ba// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba che// rdo rje'i dbus
362a5(rgyud): song rab tu gnas// khro bo hUM mdzad gang ba'i mtha'// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs par ltar// lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed// dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad
362a6(rgyud): cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun// nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rlung gi 'phreng ba che// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas// 'jig pa chen po'i me ltar drag snang ba chen mo
362a7(rgyud): stobs mo che// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni/ oM ku la d+hA dri ye
362b1(rgyud): na maHshaM ka re/ shAn+ti ka re/ g+hun+da g+hun+da b+huH ni/ b+hA ta ya g+hu Ti ni swAhA/ oM ku lan d+ha ri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog sangs rgyas kun gyis
362b2(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed la// rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin// ma
362b3(rgyud): ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor// de yi dbus su snang ba che// zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par brgyan/
362b4(rgyud): des spros pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad//
362b5(rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang // de yi thugs kar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i
362b6(rgyud): 'od// de yi 'bar ba lcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// nges par phyung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni
362b7(rgyud): mtha' dag tu// kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang // bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du// khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal// lto ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba// mche ba bzhi yis rnam par brgyan//
363a1(rgyud): 'bar ba yi ni 'phreng ba gsal// gzugs mdzes drag pa'i gzugs dang ldan// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shr-i kha lA ya dwI pa ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya ma hA bid+d+ha
363a2(rgyud): dzA ya te pra dzA li ta/ has+t+ra ya na mo nI la kar+N+Na ya ki rA ta rU pa lam+bod rA ya/ b+h+r-i ku Ta mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu khA ya tsa tu daMSh+Ti ka rA la yA e h+ye he a s+ya sha rA ri/
363a3(rgyud): ma nu pra be sh+ya/ shi raM grih+Na grI bA grih+Na/ ha ta pa daM grih+Na biSha/ A be sha ya/ kaM pa ya/ kaM pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+yA/ bi rgurba bi rkurba/ tsUr+N+Na tsUr+N+Na kun+da kun+tha/
363a4(rgyud): s+phoT ya swo Ta ya mar+thA Ni/ na krir+tha ya/ hr-i da ya/ ts+tshin+da/ ba la ba la/ kiny+dza rA ya si/ de ba nA ka/ yAk+Sha/ rak+ShA sa pi shAn+da nau swaM d+h+waM myA sama?/
363a5(rgyud): ya ya ma nu sA ra dzA ti ma ru sma rA hA hU/ nI d+hi ni d+hi naM shi ni shi/ badz+ra shr-i Sha lA/ A dz+nyA pa yaHswAhA/ oM badz+ra re Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+rI Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kA li/
363a6(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di mi sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis len ni bde ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang // gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang // tshangs pa/
363a7(rgyud): lo sogs lha rnams dang // lha dang lha min lto 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang // rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni// grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs
363b1(rgyud): par 'dod pa yis/ thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed// bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// // zla ba'i dkyil
363b2(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma dmar po rab tu gnas// phyag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/
363b3(rgyud): zhi ba la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyi bdag skyes mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas bye ba yang dag 'byung // der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni// skul/
363b4(rgyud): byed ma zhes yongs su grags// sngags kyi 'phreng ba'i yi ge ldan// kun nas rnam par 'phro byed pa// nam mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba// ji srid de yi spyod yul yang // de srid de
363b5(rgyud): yi 'od zer bsgoms// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sprul// sngags ni/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun swAhA/ 'di yi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa'o//
363b6(rgyud): mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig kun 'dzad byed cing // phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang
363b7(rgyud): dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sder byed pa'o// skub byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// / gsang ba mchog gi dbyes pa na/ thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu
364a1(rgyud): bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha//
364a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// 'dod chags med cing chag bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya/
364a3(rgyud): 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags// nus pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis// rang bzhin nyid kyis da grub bo// 'jig
364a4(rgyud): rten gsum gyi bud med 'dis// bskur bar bya ba 'os pa yis// ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste// rnyed pa kun dang bde dang sngo// thams cad bud med sgyums 'grub/ rang
364a5(rgyud): gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'dis// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun
364a6(rgyud): dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// kun la kun nas thams cad du// rnam kun kun tshe rang nyid kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo// thams cad
364a7(rgyud): dngos po rang nyid 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du yang de bshad do// bdud dang
364b1(rgyud): bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma/
364b2(rgyud): 'dzin// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral gri ral gri 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid
364b3(rgyud): dang ni// 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// de nyid chags dang chags bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa ru yang 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog 'dzi/
364b4(rgyud): rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de nyid do// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa// thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro// de la
364b5(rgyud): sogs pa mchog gi mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun du de 'gyur ro// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te//
364b6(rgyud): gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan sgyu ma chen po 'chang // rnam snang rtag pa
364b7(rgyud): thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod// tshe dang rin chen 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog
365a1(rgyud): don yon sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' blta na sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin// rin chen/
365a2(rgyud): sgrol ma de bzhin tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa snang ba che// rdo rje chos dang rno ba che// sgyu dang smra mchog bdud rtsi dang // las dang go cha gnod sbyin che// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun//
365a3(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' spobs po che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad dang // rta mgrin zhes ni rnam par grags// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// mchog gi dbang
365a4(rgyud): phyag gshin rje gshed// khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che// rdo rje me ni 'od chen po// gzungs rnams kyi ni mchog gcig pu// ting nge 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma// shes rab pha rol/
365a5(rgyud): phyin mchog gtso// sa dang pha rol phyin pa stobs// tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi// dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnams
365a6(rgyud): dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por gyur pa gang // bsgom par bya bar rab du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan gcig pu nyid// byang chub yan lag bdun btags pa//
365a7(rgyud): mtha' gcig yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad btags pa// stobs bcu yi/
365b1(rgyud): ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni// dgu la
365b2(rgyud): gnas par gyur pa dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis// sems can bsdu bas bsdus pa dang // so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// de bzhin srung ba mi mnga' ba// skal ba chen po'i//
365b3(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa// mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang de bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi spyod pa dang // bden pa bzhin ni
365b4(rgyud): ston pa po// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dang // skye dgu'i bdag po
365b5(rgyud): skye dgu'i mgon// mchog gi bdag nyid ces su brjod// kun rdzob brjod pa thams cad dang // sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur// brjod du med cing spros pa bral// spong pa mkha' mnyam
365b6(rgyud): mtshungs pa med// tshig mtha' sgra yis rnam dgod pa// 'jig rten tha snyad tshul du rtogs// de tshe lus tshogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyis ni yongs su brtags// sku ni sprul
365b7(rgyud): pa nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag brnyes// rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du// ye shes sku sogs yongs su brtags// mtha' yas sku dang sku chen po// rin chen sku ni 'od byed
366a1(rgyud): pa// pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba che// thams cad sku ni las bzang byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal
366a2(rgyud): 'byor te// byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba// kun tu 'od kyis chen po// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba/
366a3(rgyud): gsum pa nam mkha'i 'od ces bya// mnga' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// rdo rje 'od mtha' gang zhig sa// bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba// bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje
366a4(rgyud): zhes ni yongs su bsgrags// lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya// dbang bskur bar ni rab tu gnas// drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya// pad bzhin rab tu rnam par snang // rang bzhin gyis/
366a5(rgyud): ni chos nyid dag/ bdag po med cing yongs bzung med// bdun pa las kyi 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad pa che// brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya// dpe ni de la yod
366a6(rgyud): ma yin// dgu pa dpe dang bral zhes bya// dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa// bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med// bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces
366a7(rgyud): bya// sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don
