366b1(rgyud): dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes kyang brjod pa// thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de bzhin
366b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
366b3(rgyud): thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyis dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gso
366b4(rgyud): ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i
366b5(rgyud): de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjes su bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid
366b6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid byin gyis brlabs nas rnam par bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs
366b7(rgyud): nas ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po
367a1(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
367a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sa la gtsugs te/
367a3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsolashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya
367a4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas/ sems can thams cad thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur pa bka' stsal du
367a5(rgyud): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal
367a6(rgyud): khyod gang slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legs so legs so// de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / theg
367a7(rgyud): pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes
367b1(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka'
367b2(rgyud): stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bani pa// rta babs
367b3(rgyud): bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje snying po yongs bskor ba// byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje
367b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyi spras// rdo rje pad+ma thams cad la// las kyi rdo rje thams cad du// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba
367b5(rgyud): 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba rlung bstod pa'i// gos dang me tog chun pos spras// zla ba skyed pas nye bar mdzes// ras gri rdo rje/
367b6(rgyud): ut+pal// lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// chu yis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba// khor yug bzhin du rnam par gnas// de la'ang sgo dang sgo khyud sogs// mkhas pa
367b7(rgyud): yis ni spro bar bya// de yi nang du bri bar bya// 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas// cha brgyad kyis ni yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor legs par rnam par spras// rdo rje'i thig gis
368a1(rgyud): yongs su bskor// rdo rje'i 'khor lo cher 'bar ba// de yi dbus su snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad// de yi steng du rdo rje che// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu
368a2(rgyud): gnas// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad// de yi steng du legs bzhugs bya//
368a3(rgyud): khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan gnas sdig pa bcom// rdo rje'i 'phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'jis/
368a4(rgyud): pa'i 'od// rin chen chen po'i 'phreng ba ches// spras pa rnam par dgod par bya// de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba// yi ge yi ni mchog gtso bo// sha sa'i sde pa gsal byed ni//
368a5(rgyud): mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig pu// drug pa'i dbyangs kyis legs gsal ba// thig le nAd sa legs par brgyan// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yi// don can rab tu bskyed
368a6(rgyud): par bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lnga// chos kyi sku ni ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa
368a7(rgyud): ma bskyod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / de bzhin
368b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gis bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs
368b2(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do// dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa// me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od// chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med/
368b3(rgyud): rjes rnam gnon rlung dkyil 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
368b4(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi
368b5(rgyud): thugs ka nas phyung ba'o// oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnam phyung ste/ rdo rje'i 'od zer de
368b6(rgyud): rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de
368b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nasa'ajig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba mngon
369a1(rgyud): par rdzogs nas/ skur yang gcig tu 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
369a2(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje snying po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma'o rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po ye shes rnam dag pa// rdo rje
369a3(rgyud): sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' brtan bskyed de// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang bzhi brtan phyir lus min yang // sangs rgyas sku nyid du 'gyur ro//
369a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon te/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar po
369a5(rgyud): ser po/ dmar po ljang khu'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi yi ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to// dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni oM ba
369a6(rgyud): rA dzaH/ rjes su chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ru ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu/ de bzhin du
369a7(rgyud): rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rat+na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra te dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
369b1(rgyud): cad kyi nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra k+She hude bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra swA sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag med
369b2(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rnamashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na/ dam pa'i chos 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
369b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra he hu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra b+hA Sha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ las sna
369b4(rgyud): tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra karma brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ra k+Sha ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/
369b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs khu tshur bcings pa'i ting nge 'dzin nI/ oM badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
369b6(rgyud): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs
369b7(rgyud): nas 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra d+hA hu hUM/ rang gi rig pa mchog ni/ oM badz+ra d+hA hI sha ri hUM badz+ri Ni/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems
370a1(rgyud): dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi
370a2(rgyud): rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba/ oM ak+Sho b+h+yaH/ aM/ oM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti tsid+d+ha badz+re badz+ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam
370a3(rgyud): tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa
370a4(rgyud): oM rat+na saM b+hA ba traM/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hi hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam rig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
370a5(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mi tA ba hriHoM badz+ra d+ha ri Ni hUM
370a6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nga
370a7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mo b+ha sid+d+hi aM/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba le hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
370b1(rgyud): par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la rnam par gzigs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/
370b2(rgyud): oM sarba ta thAg ha sa ma hA dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong
370b3(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma hA dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM
370b4(rgyud): de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i
370b5(rgyud): snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM sarba d+hams ma hA dz+nyA na badz+rA hUM/ de nas 'di rnam par byung ba tsam gyis kyang / slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor bas
370b6(rgyud): cad byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod pa mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam
370b7(rgyud): pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di byung ngo // oM sarba sarba sa ma hA pra pan+d+ha bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di byung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste/ slar/
371a1(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar gnas nas bka' nod cing 'khod do// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun// bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub
371a2(rgyud): par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byos shig/ de de bzhin no zhes
371a3(rgyud): gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sem sad dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas/ rdo rje sgeg/
371a4(rgyud): mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grwa rnams su de bzhin du rnam par gnas so// sgo rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams dang / mtshams rnams
371a5(rgyud): su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams bshad do// de dag gi sngags su gyur pa ni/ oM badz+ra me g+he TaM TaM/ 'khor lo'i mtshams su gzhag par/
371a6(rgyud): bya'o// oM sne ha badz+re Ni haM/ oM sha radwa badz+re aM aM/ oM badz+ri Ni ki li ki li hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor grwa dang
371a7(rgyud): mtshams rnams su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM ma ny+dzu badz+ri Ni/ b+hu k+Sh+mAM/ oM ma nod b+ha/
371b1(rgyud): ba badz+rir+t+ti hUM/ oM badz+ra shai shi re ho ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i sgo'i mtshams rnams su gzugs la sogs pa'i/ oM badz+ra rU pa/ oM badz+ra/
371b2(rgyud): shrag+ne/ oM badz+rA rA se/ oM badz+ra swa rme/ mnyes par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma la hoH/ su ra NA s+t+waM/ dga'
371b3(rgyud): bde chen po'i rdo rje snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod/
371b4(rgyud): dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang // ji bzhin gnas su sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig
371b5(rgyud): rnams kyang / au e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ au pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba ha thA ga ha/ au sa ma ye b+han+na tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wan/ au hu Sh+ya ho b+ha ga wa na dz+ra a bi sha aH/ 'di dag
371b6(rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i 'phrin las so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
371b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas slob ma bcug ste/ dbang bskur ba la sogs pa byas nas/ slob ma dang
372a1(rgyud): bcas pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po kho nar re zhig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/
372a2(rgyud): slob dpon ni dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/
372a3(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o// de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings/
372a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ni/ skyil krung bcings nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis lag pa gnyis byugs nas phyag rgya bcings pa rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas
372a5(rgyud): he/ ser mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil krung gi dbus su rdo rje bsdams par bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni grwar
372a6(rgyud): tshogs kyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid rked pa'i phyogs su bzung ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje rgyal
372a7(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mda' 'phen pa lnga bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid la legs so ba sbyin pas rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo rje legs pa'i'o// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag
372b1(rgyud): rnams so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag/
372b2(rgyud): rgyu'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid khar byas pa ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid
372b3(rgyud): snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskor ba ni rdo rje rgya'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar bsgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya rnams so//
372b4(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang / snying kha dang / mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las
372b5(rgyud): 'grim pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying khar btsir ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sgeg mo dang bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i
372b6(rgyud): sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing rnams 'khor dgod pa dang // sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang // dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid//
372b7(rgyud): rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab tshogs pa// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// rang nyid rdo rje'i gar byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
373a1(rgyud): phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu sbyar// thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil krung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can// sangs rgyas
373a2(rgyud): rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgeg pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhi ba'i spyan// bsnyems bcas rdo rje can gyis dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can// ting /
373a3(rgyud): 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya// 'khrugs pa'i lha stangs khro rnams kyis// btsun mo rnams kyi so rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // sdig spyod rnams kyi lha stangs spang // chos
373a4(rgyud): rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'o// shugs kyi lha spangs phyag rgya'o// tshogs dang pho nya pho nya mo'i// lha stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo pa med/
373a5(rgyud): cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med gnas//
373a6(rgyud): rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas so ni yongs su bsdam// 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yi
373a7(rgyud): phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can// 'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu gnag dka'i 'dod chags dang // sdang dang rmongs las
373b1(rgyud): mas na na/ ba cing rnas 'a dang ldan pa/ so ba nas rab tu 'thob srung / a n+ta'i stas rgyur shes par bya// l+h+wamamo rgyags kyi rug dems smras pa pa'
373b2(rgyud): yas mchog/ lha stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming // phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pa// skyob pa rnams kyis kun shes bya// ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang // dbang po la sogs rab
373b3(rgyud): dbye dang // de dag phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che// tshad med yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi/
373b4(rgyud): phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzogs so// /
373b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
373b6(rgyud): chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rnga babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// sna tshogs kham
373b7(rgyud): ni bsam yas mchog/ dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas
374a1(rgyud): sku gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba mchog gis brgyan pa po// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i
374a2(rgyud): dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// 'khor lo can brgyad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba gzhag/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i/
374a3(rgyud): dbus su ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni// ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa
374a4(rgyud): mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i skor ba ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no// dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
374a5(rgyud): rtog pa'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags// gru bzhi
374a6(rgyud): pa la sgo bzhi pa// rnga babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu'o// de yi dbus su khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las
374a7(rgyud): rnam rgyal yang // khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ span gsal 'bar ba chen po pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yon brkyang ba
374b1(rgyud): yi zhabs kyis ni// dka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// zhal/
374b2(rgyud): bzhi pa la thub par dka'// be con dang ni zhags par brjod// dang po na ni rdo rje bshad// gnyis pa zhags pa sdigs mdzub can// phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog/ khu tshur gnyis
374b3(rgyud): ni rab tu brtag/ mthe'u chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba// lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par sbrel// snying khar phyag rgya legs bzhag nas// sdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig
374b4(rgyud): rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams su//
374b5(rgyud): chu rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'// de bzhin gni dgra
374b6(rgyud): nyid// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar mkho ba'i mchod pa thams
374b7(rgyud): cad kyis mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/
375a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// de dbus dkyil
375a2(rgyud): 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya ba'i ming can no// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de mi lte ba'i dbus su ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ rba
375a3(rgyud): ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bani pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras//
375a4(rgyud): sku rnams thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas rab 'byam rgya che ba'i// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar dge ba//
375a5(rgyud): k+Sha yig don ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan// me yis sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig
375a6(rgyud): rten dbang phyug ces bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang // bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad// dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun
375a7(rgyud): du bgrang 'phreng pad+ma yi// rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du/
375b1(rgyud): ji ltar rigs par dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya/
375b2(rgyud): dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje rin chen zhes su bshad// klu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs banis ni mdzes par bya// de yi dbus su rin chen che// yan lag brgyad pa mchog
375b3(rgyud): tu 'bar// de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni// rin chen 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de dbus pad+ma rA ga 'dra// rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen 'dreng
375b4(rgyud): bas rnam par mdzes// mdun gyi kun gyi dbang bskur gtso/ rin chen de yi gtso bo mchog/ g.yas su pad+ma rA ga ste// rgyab tu in+d+ra ni la'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen g.yon/
375b5(rgyud): phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin chen rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi gra yi ni// gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad
375b6(rgyud): kyi// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang // me yi sa bon gyis gsal byas// dbyangs kyi gnyis pas kun nas mnan// dbang sgyur ba ni spang du gnas
375b7(rgyud): de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskums te// rin chen rnam pa legs byung ba// de ni rdo rje rin chen no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// /
376a1(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang /
376a2(rgyud): dag ldan// rdo rje 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbus su pad chen po// kha dog sna tshogs yongs
376a3(rgyud): 'bar ga/ de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje sna tshogs yongs su bri// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin mdzes pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che//
376a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'// mya ngan 'das don legs gsal byas// sgeg sogs rig ma/
376a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yongs su ldan// sna tshogs bkru ba mchog tu 'bar// de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis
376a6(rgyud): thams cad nas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang
376a7(rgyud): dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes kyil 'khor lo// sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// de yi/
376b1(rgyud): lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/
376b2(rgyud): ral gri 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// gsang sngags chen po'i yi ge lnga// de yi drung du legs par gnas// dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis gsung sngags ni// thugs ka ru ni yang /
376b3(rgyud): dag gnas// phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo bzhi yis ni shin tu mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid//
376b4(rgyud): de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga yis// mchod sogs chog rgyas pa nyid// bzhugs
376b5(rgyud): pa'i cho ga de bzhin du// ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin// shes rab ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen mchog/ yang dag rab tu
376b6(rgyud): bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri bar bya// chos
376b7(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'phreng ba ni// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu ni stobs po che// phyag bani pa la a/
377a1(rgyud): bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni/
377a2(rgyud): rgya yi don du so sor bskyed// dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan// rang gi yi ge'i 'phreng ba che// 'khor lo gnyis kyi rnam par brgyan// de yi mdun du
377a3(rgyud): dung yin la// rgyab tu zhags par brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin//
377a4(rgyud): de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad yang dga' bar// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro//
377a5(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi thig gdab bo// de yi dkyil du snang ba
377a6(rgyud): che// mkha' bzhi shin tu 'od gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod// dam pa'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin
377a7(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ gzhon nus rab tu brjid pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba sogs pas spras// rdo rje dkyil 'khor brgyan par mdzad// 'di/
377b1(rgyud): yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// dbyangs dgu pa la thig le dang // nA da yis ni rnam par brgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la// thig le nA das rnam par brgyan// de yang gtso
377b2(rgyud): bo'i gsang sngags 'gyur// nam mkha'i mdzod ni zab bskor mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sngags kyi 'phreng ba mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa yis rnams kun//
377b3(rgyud): thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i mtshungs// tog ni phyag rgya gyur pa de'i// de bzhin du ni nges par bcing // de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// nam mkha'i yi ni mdzod de la// gal
377b4(rgyud): te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad
377b5(rgyud): bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyob pa yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// de yang rdo rje me yi mchog
377b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bani pA la zhal bzhi pa// pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas// rgyan rnams
377b7(rgyud): kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus// bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms mdzad// de sngags yi ger gyur pa ni// sha Sha'i sde tshan mthara' dge ba// rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya//
378a1(rgyud): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor// sngags kyi yi ge 'phreng ba re// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje'i gnod sbyin/
378a2(rgyud): de yis ni// gal te grub pa mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
378a3(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su 'kho lo che// lcags kyu yis ni rnam par mdzes// dbus su
378a4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal// lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur che// 'bar ba 'phro
378a5(rgyud): bas rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar// sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa// byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas
378a6(rgyud): dbyangs drug pa yis legs par phye// zla phyed thig les legs par brtan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar// 'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil
378a7(rgyud): 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge/ dgug pa la sogs thams cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu// don yod rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro//
378b1(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngo
378b2(rgyud): grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// de yi dbus su gru gsum grags// lcags kyu'i mchog tu dge ba'o// de yi
378b3(rgyud): dbus su sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar// zhags pa lcag/
378b4(rgyud): klu 'dzin dge ba/ de yi ga sang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsal ba po// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni// gnyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas// de yi theg
378b5(rgyud): le mya ngan 'das// sngags kyi 'phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang // sbyor ba
378b6(rgyud): bzhin rnam par dgod// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad yongs su sgrub// rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor
378b7(rgyud): chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes
379a1(rgyud): par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor dri bar bya// thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pa/ dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin/
379a2(rgyud): de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi
379a3(rgyud): pa// spyan gsum 'od kyi 'phreng ba can// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni// mdzes pa yi ni mda' gzhur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog
379a4(rgyud): gyur/ de yis gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa// rdo rje rjes chags mchog gi bde// sha Sha'i sde yi mthur gyur pa// k+Sha yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag
379a5(rgyud): ldan// sngags kyi 'phreng bas yang dag brgyan// me tog mda' ni yongs su 'phen// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams
379a6(rgyud): cad rab mchod byed// rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis
379a7(rgyud): su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi
379b1(rgyud): dbus su pad chen po// ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi skye ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba'i gzugs brnyanA yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya// rdo rje
379b2(rgyud): legs pa stobs po che// dung dang kun da zla ba dkar// khab bzho'i 'od ldar mdzes// legs so stsol ba tshim par mdzad// ting nge 'dzin dbang mang po sbyar// rdo rje zhig mo sos/
379b3(rgyud): mchod pa// de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs// sgo mi skyong ba nyid kyang ni// rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar/
379b4(rgyud): ha yi yi ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni rang sgrub byed// thig le gnyis dang yongs su ldan// legs stsol bas ni rnam par gnas// de lnga'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mcho/
379b5(rgyud): pa thams cad rab tu skor/ bdag nyid dag pas bzhugs pa sogs/ thams cad yongs su smad par bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil
379b6(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su grags// rdo rje nyi mas blo gros ldan// grwa bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas//
379b7(rgyud): thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// de yi nang du dri bar bya// rdo rje nyi ma 'od chen po// rdo rje nyi ma'i steng du ni// gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba// de mi
380a1(rgyud): dbus su gzi brdzi che// 'bar ba yi ni me lta bu// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// rdo rje gzi
380a2(rgyud): brjid stobs po che// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de yi
380a3(rgyud): sngags su yongs grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'o// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags kyi 'phreng bas yongs
380a4(rgyud): su bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor ro//
380a5(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po rdo rje'i rtog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/
380a6(rgyud): babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de mi dbus su ni// mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung // zla ba
380a7(rgyud): byed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs paspangs pa// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// sel bzhi pa la gzi brjid che//
380b1(rgyud): ni la mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen char pa rab rtul khebs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi bA sang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// me yis rab tugs la zlas
380b2(rgyud): pa// rtog gi phyag rgyas yongs su bskor// sngags kyi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lnga'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje tog gi dkyim
380b3(rgyud): 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen mo mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes klags pa/ rdo rje bzhud pa mtshungs pa'i snong// khru bani pa
380b4(rgyud): la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po dri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in+d+ra nI la
380b5(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od// de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// sbron ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha'
380b6(rgyud): dag snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang sngags sngags chen po//
380b7(rgyud): yi don du grub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang ming rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya//
381a1(rgyud): rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs
381a2(rgyud): bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// de yi steng bu'ang pad+ma che// pad+ma me las yang dag bya// gru gsum mchog
381a3(rgyud): tu mdzes pa po// sum mdo'i ris kyis rnam par brgyan// chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na// thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dge/ de mi bdag gi de nyid ni// 'phro ba'i ma ru ka tra
381a4(rgyud): 'dra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gnyis pa'i mdog du gyur pa ni// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid ngag gi 'khor lo
381a5(rgyud): ni// smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu gnas// thams cad so sor gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas
381a6(rgyud): thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyin pa yis/
381a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad dri bar bya// de yi dbus su ko cha che// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brtan// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje srung ba yang dag bri// phyag bzhi
381b1(rgyud): pa lanal bzhi pa// rten rnams kun gyis brtan papo// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba
381b2(rgyud): chen po'i ko 'phang mchog/ de mi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sha Sha'i sde mi mtha' gnas mchog/ mthon po'i rgyur ni mngon par 'dzod// steng du na ngas brtan par dwa u
381b3(rgyud): nas kha dog du ma yis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi 'phreng ba yongs su ldan// glog gi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//
381b4(rgyud): mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dgra rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
381b5(rgyud): pa// rnga babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong ba
381b6(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog/ 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de yi sbeng du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur spobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa/
381b7(rgyud): tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// kun da dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyis su/
382a1(rgyud): med pa mchog gsang ba// khu tshur gyis ni sdung par bshad// de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa// sde chen lnga pa'i gsum/
382a2(rgyud): pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur mchod par
382a3(rgyud): bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas
382a4(rgyud): byang chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas ni// sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spangs// rtse gsum/
382a5(rgyud): paT+Ti sa dang ni// dung dang pad+ma sogs pas brgyan// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan// khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa// skrag gi pags/
382a6(rgyud): gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la// ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// phyag
382a7(rgyud): 'tshal ba ni 'di bri'o// de yi sngags ni/ oM tri sa suM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni cher gsang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug che'i// dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil
382b1(rgyud): 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor chen po sa nyid la dbang phyus chen po'i gnas sun ga po chen po klagag par bya'o// lag pa spong gi sdu brla byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbyung /
382b2(rgyud): phyag dang snyan cig bya g+sa zhi pa/ ldan gsum pa'o// lag pa snong kyis gnas pa'o// rang gi sngags ni/ oM mAt+ma kAl+yA ts+tsha ts+yai.oM nan ti ke shA rA d+h+r-i d+ho/ 'di bzlas na ngo/
382b3(rgyud): gru thams cad byed do// dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po'i dkyis 'khor ro// de nyid kyi ni tshig mo // dkyil 'khor thu ba'i thig gdu bya// de nI par+Na
382b4(rgyud): yang dag bri// pad+ma'i dbus su spang rdzi ri byed// la sogs ming po gsum bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// sbrang rtsir byed dang rgyal bar byed// de bzhin nyid
382b5(rgyud): du'ang sgrub byed do// me tog mda' dang yongs su ldan// rang gi ming gtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni/ mad+hu kr-iT stAM/ oM sA/ d+ha na sA/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod/
382b6(rgyud): gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdub bo//
382b7(rgyud): dbus su tum pu ru'o// shar gyi 'dab mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris
383a1(rgyud): nas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM tum bu ru tsA/ oM dza ya hA/ oM bi dza ye hAM/ oM a dzi he hAM/ oM a pa rA dze he na/
383a2(rgyud): dga' ba 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol// 'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag par dgod par rab bshad
383a3(rgyud): bya// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// hum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod// sdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas// rnam la gung mo nyid la'o// mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan
383a4(rgyud): gyis mi thub mthe'u chung la// lag pa'i dbus su yi ge oM// dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyab// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang
383a5(rgyud): rnam par dbye ba yang // phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu// so sor brtan par bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rengs
383a6(rgyud): byed la sogs go rims bzhin// las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags pas mnyam par bzhug sde kyu// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar ya
383a7(rgyud): 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par bstod
383b1(rgyud): pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang // legs/
383b2(rgyud): pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ blo gros dag pa ye shes che/ thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba che// thog ma tha ma med khyab bdag/ ma 'dres
383b3(rgyud): ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal// rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyod pa dang mi zad mgon// chos dbyings gzhan
383b4(rgyud): dang gzhan min pa// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i bla// theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' bo mchog tu dpa' ba'i mchog/ zab cing yang
383b5(rgyud): la phra ba dang // thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul/
383b6(rgyud): byung phul las phul du byung // rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid
383b7(rgyud): che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems chen po// rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che// rdo rje chags pa mda' chen po// rdo rje legs pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog
384a1(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzad// rgyal mtshan chen po rin chen tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa legs bzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma che// shes rab
384a2(rgyud): ye shes legs rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po// sems dpa' sgrub legs bzhad mdzad// sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje srung ba legs srung mdzad/
384a3(rgyud): po chen po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams snor sel// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ legs so rdor can rnal 'byor
384a4(rgyud): che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge/ snying po'i rkyen ces mtshan gsol ba// 'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes
384a5(rgyud): snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang // spa bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yi ge bral// rdo rje snying
384a6(rgyud): po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// // de nas bcom
384a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo//
384b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul 'jug pa ye shes rdo rje zhes bya/
384b2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma'ang snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid
384b3(rgyud): la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab ye
384b4(rgyud): shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs de las 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha'
384b5(rgyud): klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad na/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par spangs te
384b6(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad
384b7(rgyud): nas mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos rdo/
385a1(rgyud): pa la'ang rab tu gnas nas/ rnon po dang / d+hU dang / smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de yongs su dag nas/ yang pad+ma'i sems dpa'i ting /
385a2(rgyud): nge 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag po dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bsrung ba dang / khro bo dang / de bzhin
385a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan
385a4(rgyud): 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o zag med shes rab bdag
385a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// shes rab shin tu dri med sems// sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnams dpyad na// e
385a6(rgyud): ma'o chos ni bsam med nyid// bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas/ byang chub
385a7(rgyud): sems dpa'i bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil
385b1(rgyud): 'khor dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad
385b2(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
385b3(rgyud): mdzad kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhu bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// legs par rab tu nyon la
385b4(rgyud): yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka'
385b5(rgyud): stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi
385b6(rgyud): chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do//
385b7(rgyud): lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang /
386a1(rgyud): byi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas/
386a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod
386a3(rgyud): do// chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du'ang nye bar len pa med do// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyis
386a4(rgyud): gnas so// oM kAM/ oM tsa tA ri smi tU pa s+tha nA nA hUM/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams ma bskyed pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa skyed
386a5(rgyud): cing rtsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyis rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spangs pa'i phyir 'dun pa la
386a6(rgyud): sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyis rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par
386a7(rgyud): 'debs so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / yangs par bya ba'i phyir dang / sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do//
386b1(rgyud): 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin no// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// chos rnams thams cad don dam par mi spong ba dang / mi spong ba ma yin pa'i/
386b2(rgyud): ched du rtogs par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM sa mya ga prA hA Na sarba ha tha ga ha sa mA hA a d+hiSh+Ti aHraHhUM/ yang dag par
386b3(rgyud): spong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya'o//
386b4(rgyud): brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i
386b5(rgyud): chos thams cad sgyu ma sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du 'jug go// zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor lo sgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM rin+ti pA da pA ra mi te la dA pa ra hUM hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pa
386b6(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge
386b7(rgyud): 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang bskur ba spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal ho// oM in+d+ra swa
387a1(rgyud): ba bo d+ha pra dz+nye i Sh+Ta dz+nyA nA nA ma rgyan pa gang+gA sa aHd+hU/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// spobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang
387a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid
387a3(rgyud): la gnas pa/ stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad bral ba/ gdod ma na sa dag pa sa 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ba la aHhUM hUM baH/ stobs 'phel ba
387a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi nibyams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms so// oM brah+ma bi hA rA d+hiSh+ThA na kaM maM dz+ra kAM hUM traM/
387a5(rgyud): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni spobs pa so so//
387a6(rgyud): yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshogs so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos
387a7(rgyud): thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra ti sam+bi daHswa hUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam
387b1(rgyud): pa nyid do// rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims
387b2(rgyud): rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o// chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par spyod pas
387b3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge 'dzin la dbang sgyur ba bka' stsal to// oM sarba a nu smi ti bud+d+he saM pa dA ti shi hUM hUM hUM/ rjes su dran pa drug gi shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
387b4(rgyud): gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang dga' ba yang
387b5(rgyud): drag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub yan lag
387b6(rgyud): ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sarba tA bo d+h+yaM ga sa ma tA su pra tiSh+Tha te drA baM/ 'phagra pa'i
387b7(rgyud): lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lba ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i tshor ba dang / yang
388a1(rgyud): dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par/
388a2(rgyud): so sor rig par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// oM Ar+ya Sh+TaM ga mArga maT/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin
388a3(rgyud): gsum ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / gsog dang / gsob kyi rnam pa/
388a4(rgyud): dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces brjod do// de la mtshan ma med
388a5(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse
388a6(rgyud): gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa
388a7(rgyud): sde/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed de/ lha 'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung bden du mi gnyer zhing gsol ba 'dengs par ya
388b1(rgyud): mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po thams cad la ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o//
388b2(rgyud): kha sa maHsarba d+harma/ khaM / de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs
388b3(rgyud): dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i spobs dang / kun nas nyon
388b4(rgyud): mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa'i spobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs so// zag pa zad pa
388b5(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i stobs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i phyir shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa'o// oM da sha ba la sa ma he thaM/ spobs bcu mnyam pa
388b6(rgyud): nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba de ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i
388b7(rgyud): 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las
389a1(rgyud): yang dag par 'dus te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnam nub par gyur cig/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam/
389a2(rgyud): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par zab pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par
389a3(rgyud): shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang
389a4(rgyud): dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las
389a5(rgyud): yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
389a6(rgyud): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'im
389a7(rgyud): nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa/ snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa
389b1(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal pa// oM sa man ba tre sarba b+hA pa'i shud rten las/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa pa ni ga zhin/ bdag/
389b2(rgyud): gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs margyas soshes pa par bdag la dab slong ngang/ zun na
389b3(rgyud): bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan ci'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong sde tu yang dag par
389b4(rgyud): rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag med pa thob pa dang / bag tshab med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs la thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bcar 'o//
389b5(rgyud): gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra ba sgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang
389b6(rgyud): ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge
389b7(rgyud): sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang
390a1(rgyud): yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bstan na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i/
390a2(rgyud): nges par 'byung ba'i lam du bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ yang dag par sdug bsngal zad pa dang / yang dag par sdug bsngal mthar bya bar ga la 'gyur zhes dge sbyong
390a3(rgyud): ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs su'ang zung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
390a4(rgyud): ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su spros te brjod par bya'o// mi 'jig pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid de ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yid 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i//
390a5(rgyud): phyir ro// oM bai shA ra d+ya sa ma dA pra pa tA a A/ aM aHmthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i
390a6(rgyud): chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
390a7(rgyud): de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhin sa nang yongs su dngas te sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba
390b1(rgyud): dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can lus
390b2(rgyud): kyis bde ba myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la
390b3(rgyud): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pasabade ba'ang med sdug bsngal
390b4(rgyud): ba'ang med/ btang snyoms pa dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das
390b5(rgyud): te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te/
390b6(rgyud): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrub
390b7(rgyud): te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs de gnas so//
391a1(rgyud): de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam//
391a2(rgyud): pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam
391a3(rgyud): par thar pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed/ dngos po med par rtog par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so// 'di ni mthar gyis
391a4(rgyud): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM anan+ta/ bi mo k+Sha mu khe shum/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha
391a5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
391a6(rgyud): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu/
391a7(rgyud): phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang
391b1(rgyud): spros pa med pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyidon gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ro rje'i pha rol tu phyin padang/
391b2(rgyud): rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / brtan pa
391b3(rgyud): rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra mi hA ar+tha pa'i pU ra Ni/ oM br-i hUM haM/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sa bcu po
391b4(rgyud): gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / sbyang bka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du zla
391b5(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba dang sa thams cad don
391b6(rgyud): gcig ste/ 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to// ye shes kyang ci 'ang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ mi ge med pa/ don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa
391b7(rgyud): 'od gsal ba/ brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// oM b+hu mi bi sho d+ha ni sarbAr+tha pa ri pU ra Ni baM bruM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub
392a1(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor/
392a2(rgyud): spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / bIr mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang / byang chub
392a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang mi gnas pa dor bste/ don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di lhur gnas pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya ba sman big te hUM
392a4(rgyud): rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad
392a5(rgyud): la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang /
392a6(rgyud): sems la dbang ba'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba/ dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad
392a7(rgyud): legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// oM sarba pa shi he dz+dza trA~M hU~M thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
392b1(rgyud): pa bco brgyad kyang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// co mi mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mang 'o// brags mnyam par ma gnag pa mi mang //
392b2(rgyud): 'du shes sgra chags mi snang 'o// ma brtags pa'i bting sems mi mnga'o// 'dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// btsun 'bras yongs su rnams pa mi mnga'o// dru
392b3(rgyud): pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mang //
392b4(rgyud): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ong ba'i 'dus
392b5(rgyud): ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar 'byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro
392b6(rgyud): pa ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba stim
392b7(rgyud): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'di chos rjes skye ba'i bsgyur 'phro lags// // rgya dpe la gtugs shing slob dpon rab zhi bshes gnyen gyi 'brel pa dang yang bstun nas
393a1(rgyud): zhus dag byas shing / mi bcos su mi rung ba re re tsam 'brel pa dang bskrun nas bcos shing / chu thugag yar khral du blangs nas nA du sngon gyis bgyis pa'o//
393a2(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de la sa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes
393a3(rgyud): bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang
393a4(rgyud): legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o// sa rnams thams cad don gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi don no// ye shes kyang don dam par/
393a5(rgyud): ci'ang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ 'gyur ba med pa/ don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ brjod du med pa'o zhes pa'i don gang
393a6(rgyud): yin pa'o// oM b+hU mi bi sho d+ha ni sarbAr+tha pa ri pU ra Ni baM b+h+rUM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa
393a7(rgyud): bcu rnams ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / byis par gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba bskyed pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
393b1(rgyud): pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa/
393b2(rgyud): ni don dam par na rnam par gzhag pa dang bral ba ste/ rnam par gzhag pa gcig nyid kyi phyir na 'di lta ste/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya bstan bi ga he hUM/ rnam par gnas
393b3(rgyud): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams ci zhe na/ tshel dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang
393b4(rgyud): ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / stobs la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang pa
393b5(rgyud): dang sems la dbang ba'o// dbang rnams thams cad kyang don dam par dbang med pa/ rang bzhin rnam par dben pa/ kun rdzob tu dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa/
393b6(rgyud): ste/ chos legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// oM sarba ba shi he hUM b+h+rUM hUM/ dbang thams cad ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
393b7(rgyud): 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams ci zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa dang / ca co med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa med pa dang
394a1(rgyud): tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes med pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang
394a2(rgyud): dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i mi shes gzigs pa nyams pa
394a3(rgyud): med pa dang / 'das pa'i 'dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang /
394a4(rgyud): da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / sku'i 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / gsung gi 'phrin
394a5(rgyud): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// thugs kyi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
394a6(rgyud): thams cad ni yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na shes rab yongs
394a7(rgyud): su dag pa'o// oM a wa Ni ka pran+d+ha rnams ma te aHbI ra hUM kha~M ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
394b1(rgyud): / na/ da smra su nga su
394b2(rgyud): dang cas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs so// sngag dang gabs kyimakyil legs par byanas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyisas gni sa rab
394b3(rgyud): mtho ga ni dmar pad / dam nan ni mthong 'o// phyag dang rnams kyi sor mo dang pa'i rdul po smra bar thabs 'brel pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sdug das
394b4(rgyud): zhabs de dag ga ser gyi mdog can gyi lo'i 'greng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o// byas dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis
394b5(rgyud): phyag dang zhabs dag ras pal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis la bzhin du gzhon sha can dang ga tsali nA d+hA sbyar 'jam pa/ reg na bde ba'o// bdun mthong ra gyur to/
394b6(rgyud): phyag gnyis dag dang / zhabs gnyis dag dang / sreg gong dge dang / mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig dag gis so// sor mo ring ba stsu/ 'di'i zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis
394b7(rgyud): ring ba nyid do// rting pa yangs pa ste/ 'di'i rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rjes su 'tshams par yangs par 'gyur ro// sku che zhing drang ba nyid de/ 'bye bo ma yin zhing zhom pa ma
395a1(rgyud): yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs par skyes pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ mtho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tshams/
395a2(rgyud): pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de 'di'i pus mo dang longs bu mtho bar 'gyur ro// ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu rnams rtse mo gyen du
395a3(rgyud): phyogs par 'gyur zhing ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyi gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mdog gsal bar byed do//
395a4(rgyud): byin pa ri dgas a n+ya ya'i lha bu ste bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas e n+ya ya rnams lta bu'o// phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste/ rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag
395a5(rgyud): mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub sde/ sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro//
395a6(rgyud): mdog gser 'dra ba ste 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro// pags pa srab pa ste/ shin du 'jam pa gser shog lngar 'jam pa'i pags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul
395a7(rgyud): med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o// spu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur ro// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod spu can te/ 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na
395b1(rgyud): ras skud legs pa lnga bu dung bcad pa'i kha dog can g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod spu nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed do// sru spyod seng ge/
395b2(rgyud): lta bu ste/ 'di'i sku steng du yangs pa seng ge lta bur 'gyur ro// dpung mgo zlum pa ste/ yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyur ro// thal kong rgyas pa ste/ 'di'i nye bar
395b3(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur zhing gi ser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can no// yan lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do zhes pas na/ ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de/
395b4(rgyud): rtsa rnams yin pa de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o// shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng
395b5(rgyud): gab pa sde skyes bu chen po'i chu dang zheng dag mnyam pa'o// dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lha bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin
395b6(rgyud): tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring ba ste/ snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing dbu skra'i mthar thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs
395b7(rgyud): pa'i dbyangs te/ 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta ba de ltar phyi rol du'ang thos shing / bya ka la ring ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 'gram pa seng ge'i lta bu ste/ 'gram pa
396a1(rgyud): dag seng ge'i bzhin du zlum par 'gyur ro// tshems dkar ba sde/ dung dang / kun da dang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so// tshems mnyam pa ste/ he cang dmara' ba ma yin//
396a2(rgyud): mtho ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi tshems rnams su 'gyur ro// choms thags bzang bskye/ tshems rnams par med pa'o// tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / sbrang du/
396a3(rgyud): tshems nyi shu'o// spyan mthon mthing ste/ spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ ri mo dmar po rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid du phyir la/ gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu
396a4(rgyud): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rdzi ma pa'i lta bu ste/ spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi bzhin du 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings pa/
396a5(rgyud): legs par gzhol ba'o// sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+ma//
396a6(rgyud): rA ga'i mdog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis rung dang / kun da dang / zla ba lngar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis
396a7(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis nam mkha'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten khams rang/
396b1(rgyud): 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnams su snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / spong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du mashog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan/
396b2(rgyud): bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul ba'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam
