396b3(rgyud): par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyis dang / gsum dang / ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad kyi 'od dang dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas/ rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang / zang zing dang / don
396b4(rgyud): 'thun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing / phan btag nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa/
396b5(rgyud): nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa 'o/ de bzhin ga shegs pa rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par basmra bar bya'i/ mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid
396b6(rgyud): kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ spong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub
396b7(rgyud): chos rnam thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ stong nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnam so zhes pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa ra lak+Sha Na sa ma ha d+harma te oM/ mtshan thams cad/
397a1(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// / dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ce zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te/
397a2(rgyud): sen mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sen mo rnams zlum par gyur pa dang / sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams gdud pa med pa dang / long bra mi mngon/
397a3(rgyud): pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa da/ rim gyis gshegs
397a4(rgyud): pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongs su gyur pa'i pus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dngas pa dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang /
397a5(rgyud): sku dgu pa med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs pa yongs su dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / dku zlum pa dang / dku skabs byin pa dang / dku/
397a6(rgyud): ma rnyongs pa dang / sku rked gzhu'i lag bcangs lta bu dang kalte ba zab pa dang / lte ba mi g.yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par dbyes pa dang /
397a7(rgyud): pag pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang sme ba med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang / phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mi yo ba dang / mchu bim pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang /
397b1(rgyud): mnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i sngags dang / glang po che'i ngaro can dang / snyan cing marten pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba sbrum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche/
397b2(rgyud): dbyin gyis zlab dang / lhan gtsang ba dang / lhan yangs pa dang / spyan mngon mthing dang / rdzi ma gnags dang / sprin ma thug pa dang / sprin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes shing balnga'i 'dabs la su dang / sbyin
397b3(rgyud): ring ba dang / smin ma'i rdzu nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu phra ba dang / smin ma rjes su 'thun pa dang / kha dog mnyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams shing skyon dang /
397b4(rgyud): bral ba dang / sku yongs su rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra sdug pa dang / dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / dbu skra
397b5(rgyud): mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khums pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khrugs pa dang / dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral ba dung
397b6(rgyud): khu bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can/ mnyam pa nyid la legs
397b7(rgyud): par rab tu gnas pa/ gsal byed dang gsal byed ma yin pa mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ mtshan dang
398a1(rgyud): dpe byad thams cad sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan pa la legs par rab tu gnas pa/ dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos
398a2(rgyud): thams cad dang dpe byad mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis su med pa'i don la gnas par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o// oM a nu byany+dzan sa ma hA su pra tiSh+Thi ta badz+ra dz+nyA na hUM lAM aM/ dpe
398a3(rgyud): byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
398a4(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la legs so zhes bya ba rnams kyis mnyes par mdzad do// oM/ byang chub sems chen khyod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs/
398a5(rgyud): rgyas chen po khyod legs so// ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi// rdo rje ye shes khyod legs so// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// tshad med ched du khyod legs so// shes rab dum
398a6(rgyud): pa'i ched du yang // mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// sangs rgyas snga mas ma gsungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs
398a7(rgyud): pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi'i mngon par dges par mdzad do// sangs rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la/
398b1(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes stobs chen la/ shin tu sgri ba zhi ba la// rdo rje chos rnams legs gnas pa// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lnga// gdod nas dag pa
398b2(rgyud): dpa' bo che// dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal// zhes pa'o// na mo sU ste a ma hUM hUMn mo sU ste swA hA/
398b3(rgyud): 'di ni brjod pa tsam zhig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// zhes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pos
398b4(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
398b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang 'dus pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod
398b6(rgyud): nyid kyis rigs thams cad 'khor lor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba brlab pa'i gsung gi de ma thag kho nar
398b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de nas 'di las yang dag
399a1(rgyud): bshad// byang chub dkyil 'khor bla na med// rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas stob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dka' ma/
399a2(rgyud): me tog 'phreng bas rnam brgyan pa// kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom pa ni// kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog
399a3(rgyud): bam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras bus rnam brgyan pa// der gnas sngags pas dngos grub mchog/ gal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// ri spangs /
399a4(rgyud): rnams su kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ma mo gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lnga yi gnas su ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don
399a5(rgyud): dam par ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal kun dang // chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang // phyag na pad+ma pa la bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga'/
399a6(rgyud): dang // rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams su ni// rdo rje rin chen de yis ni// rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub bya// rtags gcig pa dang ba lang lhas// chu rlung 'dus pa rnams su yang // sna tshogs bya ba thams
399a7(rgyud): cad rnams// dam rlon du bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lha rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par bzhag pa der// rtag par
399b1(rgyud): bsod nams mchog gyur pa// bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya// phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bye// shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyi// phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig brgyad do//
399b2(rgyud): de yi phyi ru 'khor lo no// kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rba babs bzhi yis mdzes pa ste// sna tshogs gos dang me tog 'phreng // rnga yab sogs kyis rnam brgyad pa// dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi//
399b3(rgyud): sgo dang zho khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// gal zhe dngos grub mchog 'dod na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// sangs rgyas gzugs parnyan bri bar bya// shar/
399b4(rgyud): du bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan// 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad ni// sgeg par bcas pa kun bri bya// lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan// gtsug tor dkar po'i dbus
399b5(rgyud): su ni// rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri// byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni// gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pa kun nas bri bar bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi ni// dbang phyug mgon
399b6(rgyud): po'i nub phyogs su// gtsug tor rgyal ba brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dam bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dpal ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas/
399b7(rgyud): me mtshams su ni tshor 'a lags so// bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// gsas
400a1(rgyud): #zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams su ni// mchod pa rnams ni bzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin gzugs sgra la sogs dang // bdug pa la so sra
400a2(rgyud): gsang chen no// sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin no// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// kun tu bzang po la sogs bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor dri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni
400a3(rgyud): brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sog/ dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// snga ma rtag pa ji bzhin du// phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya// bsod nams ldan pas dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad chen gyis rab brtag
400a4(rgyud): pa// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar 'gyur// rang lnga'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub// cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin// kun duH/
400a5(rgyud): tshogs skal bzang ba// kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid che// rin chen bdun gyis mchod pa che// yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs
400a6(rgyud): kyis/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che'i// pad+ma'i rnam par shes par bya// rin po che yi rin chen rnam// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o// dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshig rnams// dor ba byas pa de nyid ni//
400a7(rgyud): gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas/
400b1(rgyud): rjes su rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa 'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams ji snyed thams cad de// rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu sogs// bu mo legs par brgyan byas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis
400b2(rgyud): bslu bar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khang // kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sbyin bya cung zad yod// 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// bla ma la ni
400b3(rgyud): yon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba// mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la// slob ma bzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang // sa bon 'dras
400b4(rgyud): bu dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur las// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab tu yang // sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun// cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ro// dpal
400b5(rgyud): ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar steng na gnas pa'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni mngon mtho ba// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin/
400b6(rgyud): glang po dang // rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba 'am// seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni rjod byed cing // dpal gyis mngon mtho zhes bya 'am// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba// bkra shis sam ni dpal be'u// gang yang bris nas
400b7(rgyud): dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rnam rgyal dbang bsku ba zhes bshad do// tsan dan chung bung ba che// gzhan gyis mi thub sman blugs la// kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni/ nag tu shes rab can gyis btab// gzhan gyis mi
401a1(rgyud): #/ thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas// phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa// der ni de dang de brtag bya// de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad// dbang bskur
401a2(rgyud): ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong // sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang // ga pur de bzhin gur kum dang // a ka ru dang lnga li shing
401a3(rgyud): tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// sa~M ha prA bI de bzhin mchog/ kun nas hAs de ba dang // gi ri kar+Na tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnams su bshad// lha gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing /
401a4(rgyud): dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba// shes rab thams cad rab 'jug byed// rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni// gser la sogs kyis thams cad nas// sman kun dang ni sa bon kun// 'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni// sangs rgyas byin/
401a5(rgyud): brlabs rnal 'byor las// dbang bskur don du rab brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'gyur// zhes pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan
401a6(rgyud): gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs so// / rigs gzugs skal bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs// phun tshogs ldan pa dpal ldan chos rje yis// rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung za
401a7(rgyud): ma rdzogs pa// dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzog par bsgyur// 'di lo tsa ba bu ston kha ches 'gyur bcos pa der snang bas sngar gyi 'gyur dang mi 'dra ba'i khyad chen po gda' 'o//
